text: I bought the size I would typically in the glass, and they are seriously tight. I would have probably gone up a half size if I had been able to try them on. I think it is fixable with a shoe stretcher, and this is just a warning.
These are just awesome, lightweight and flexible with great support. Very comfortable, Nice looking too!
The shoes arrived earlier than expected. They were in perfect shape and were exactly as the description said they would be.

My sister in law only wear these shoes. I couldn't find them in a department store, so I decided to check Amazon. I was so elated when I found them and in her hard to find size. I thought that I wouldn't get them in time for Christmas, but they arrived just as promised. My sister in law LOVED them and I was extemely satisfied!
This shoe is so comfortable and got to be one of the best running and basketball shoe. Plus your getting official Iverson shoes!Great shoe!

I was debating whether I wanted to buy a pair online or just go into a store and buy them there. Boy am I glad I went to go buy them in person... as other people have mentioned, Converse run a little big so a size 11 (which I am) is really a 9 or so. I ended up getting an 8/5 and I haven't worn 8/5 size shoes since I was 13. You really want to go and buy them in person and completely avoid this problem.

Absolutely love these shoes. Not only are they stylish & cute (can be worn with more dressed up casual) but they are very comfortable for walking. On a warm weather vacation I brought these because I still wanted to look fashionable, but be comfortable for all the walking we were going to do. Even now, I wear them a lot. They're extremely easy & fast to get on & off. I've received many compliments. I will get many more styles of this type of shoe. Best dressy comfort shoe I've owned.

I've ordered the black color last year and there were perfect.I also recently order the another pair brown color and noticed a little difference in quality. I was surprised when discovered that black one is made in BRAZIL but brown one is made in CHINA. Strange.......
Arrived on time and were an excellent price for my favorite brand of sandals. No surpises and no disappointments a good deal.

I have trouble finding shoes that fit comfortably, and these are excellent because the woven leather straps "give" enough so that your forefoot is not pinched. It would be nice if they had a bit more arch support, but they are the most comfortable casual flats I have found. They go well with skirts, shorts or pants and hold up very well. This is my second pair.

I was very dissapointed with this product. I bought some beach crocs a few years ago and they were made in Canada. These were made in China. They are not the same quality at all. These are not cushioned like the others were, they are also smaller even tho they are the exact same size as the ones made in Canada. These are NO better than the cheaper "knock offs" you find in dollar stores.

This very attractive little sandal would probably be very satisfactory, but it runs both short and narrow. It is not true to size by any means, so rather than return them, I gave them to a cousin with smaller feet. They were on sale. Now I know why.

I received these shoes for Christmas and had to order another pair because they didn't fit. Sizes run big, I'm a size 13 and fit comfortably in a 12. My one gripe with this shoe is that you should wear mid-ankle or higher socks because lower styles tend to get bunched up. The only reason for 4 stars is that the sizes are big and it kept me from wearing these shoes a month ago! I will be buying more of Clark's brand.
These shoes were well worth the money. They are very stylish and comfortable. I would recommend these shoes to any woman needing a break from stilettos like myself!!!
Being a Santa these shoes ar GREAT! They take me back to my childhood and what I do now. How fun. I get so many complaments.Thanks so much for making such a great product.

My feet are important and the quality of shoes I get my feet on are important too that's why I choose Vaneli shoes, specially for the office, I wear them at least 9 hours a day that's why I have these particular style in many colors. They are so comfortable and look very nice, the leather is so soft, they feel like gloves, true to the size, just make sure you order the right width. Nothing like Vaneli shoes!

I normally wear a size 10 in womens, but these are sort of big. I wish I saw the reviews before I bought them. I would have gone down a size. I definately suggest you go do that before you commit to a purchace with these shoes. They got here super fast, I was wearing them two days later!! Thank you so much.

I discovered this shoe while recovering from a foot injury and bought it for the ease of entry/exit and philosophy of the manufacturer. I have since bought a second pair and when not at work, wear nothing else winter or summer. Only draw back is the wear of the sole but have found a convient cobler who replaces the heel every other year. Definately a shoe worth every penny.

Worn these for two plus yrs. now. Sole is almost still new looking.Positives: The soles do not wear and are soft enough to protect your back, legs and feet when walking. Are waterproof and warm but not hot. Comfortable after broken in.Negatives: Scuff easily, hard to maintain. Shoe laces break after a short period of time. Could feel heavy to a person not used to weighty boots.July 2009-Still going strong. This is an exceptional boot Even though it looks like it has been through a war (or two)-comfort ++.
These are the best flip flops ever! They are so comfy and stay put on my narrow feet. They can be dressed up or down.
Got it as a gift and I love it! The colors look vibrant and its the perfect size, feels sturdy. Altogether a great bag!

This has been a decent winter running shoe with plenty of stability, fair amount of cushion, and decent traction. My primary gripe has been the insert not staying in place and riding back in the shoe.
My son absolutely loved this shoes. They came in perfect condition. The best part was I did not have to hunt them down locally.
These shoes are really very comfortable. It takes a couple of wears for the shoe to shape according to your foot size, but after that it is perfect and goes well with almost anything.
Love these shoes! In nursing school, so I'm on my feet a lot. Takes a bit to break in but they are worth the $$!
This is a great jazz shoe, looks great and stretches slightly. The size is exactly true to size. In the product description, it says "runs large", but that is not true.
I bought my first pair of Rockport Prowalkers in 1993 and wore them 1-2 days/week since then. I cannot believe how long they've lasted and how comfortable they are. The new pair are great.

The reviews in various running magazines purport these shoes to be for the heavier runner. They are no such thing. Imagine strapping a couple of pine boards to the bottom of your feet and trying to run and you get a pretty good idea of how these shoes feel. They are extremely firm ( and I do mean extremely). Also, they have the least forefoot cushioning I have ever seen in a shoe including dress street and work shoes. Even though mine are fitted properly the bottoms tend to slap my forefoot as I run. Heavier runners beware!!! I am 250lbs and run fine in cushioned shoes. The Adidas Nova Cushions work great and are cheaper. They are, however, not as cool looking which is what probably sells these shoes. These, like so many other shoes today are designed to appeal to kids. Serious runners beware. My Ken Griffey Jr's make better running shoes since the cushioning in the bottom is much better while still being "firm". They also weigh about the same and the stiffness is about the same. Forwarned is forarmed.

My mother-in-law has so much trouble finding comfortable shoes Between diabetes & problems that should be surgically corrected, but her high blood pressure prohibits surgery, finding shoes is like the proverbial needle in a hay stack search. Aetrex offered a full grain leather comfort shoe with velcro closures for easy adjustment. One look & I thought,"That's the shoe for Mom!"...and it was! She put them on, grabbed her cane, & wore them for her weekly shopping outing, & kept them on when we arrived back home. Amazing!!! Thanks, Amazon, for leading me in the right direction, & thanks to Aetrex, also, for solving the comfort dilemma!
I saved $20 by buying these shoes online. They were $54 at a nearby store, I am very happy with them.
So comfortable, lightweight and convenient. Now I've graduated to Crocs Malindi. They're my "dress" Crocs. I highly recommend!!
I'm so glad I brought these shoes for my father because he's been wanting a pair for so long, so I got them and he loves them. They're a great Shoe for a great price.

I think Chuck's look cool, which is why I bought these, but I had no idea they were so uncomfortable. If you can deal with a shoe that has almost no cushion and no arch, then by all means get them (I still wear them every once in a while). But if comfort is a big thing to you, I would look elsewhere.

These Keens are a very cool do everything kind of shoe. I actually purchased these shoes for myself after seeing that the men's versions only came in the same boring colors...navy blue, black, grey. Me being extremely secure with my sexuality I decided that I wanted the Process Blue(bright) and that I was willing to wear a womens size to get them. I have 4E wide feet...that is right not one E but 4, however I usually wear a 9 in mens shoes. Well after some trying I found the the womens' 11 fits me perfect. After going through all of this I recieved the shoes very quickly and found them to be a bit tight but after a short hike on the Appalachian Trail they settled right in nicely and have been very comfortable especially on the hikes where you have to cross a stream or river and your feet are doomed to get wet and stay that way. So far not a single blister from my neon blue womens' Keens on my big fat duck paddle of a foot.Great shoe with great quality.
These are them. Everyone wants them. They blew up this year and everyone is getting special colors, but the real deal are the gray suede.
They are a little to wide but otherwise they are great. I get to spread my toes on demi-point. I just hope they do not get to loose. I would recommend it to others.
Very comfortable, relatively short time wearing them until they are comfortable.Good for work in rugged terrain and very good in hot weather too.

The shoes are very shiny, pretty much can be considered tux shoes. They are also quite stiff, makes your stride a little flat footed. Returned the product because I knew I wouldnt wear them to anything except for a prom or wedding.

Don't usually purchase shoes without trying them on first and I should have stuck with my rule. They are advertised as a Wide, but actually they didn't feel like it. The quality of the shoe is Wonderful and the shoe is really cute. I think it would be great for the average foot. I'm wondering since they put elastic in the shoe, that's what they considered "wide". Since I wore it once, I probably can't return it. If you have a regular width foot, I'd order this. Cute shoe!

I normally wear an 8.5 (wide, if they have it) so I ordered these shoes a 1/2 size up (and wide) from other reviews suggestions. Welp...it still wasn't enough. These shoes definitely run small, and with hindsight I would have ordered a 9.5. Because it's too small, and because I'm too cheap to send them back, I will wear them anyway and just suffer a little bit from the pinching on the top side of my foot and toe box area. They are very cute though, and the heel is low enough to walk a moderate distance, but tall enough to add a little length to the legs. I took a risk by buying shoes I had never tried on before online, and it was almost a good idea.

I bought these boots for work (building maintenance) because I have diabetes and arthritis in my feet, and needed comfortable shoes that looked good. These fit the bill - I am very happy with the purchase. They are comfortable, the sole is soft, and they look good with minimal care. They are well padded on the sides and in the tongue. It remains to be seen how durable they are (I purchased them about six weeks ago), but from all indications they will hold up well. I wear a size 12.5, and these fit true. The multiple insoles are a good idea to help fractional sizing, and the arch support insole really helps my feet by the end of my shift.{update} It has now been over a year, and I have worn these boots every work day since I bought them. The fit is still as good as it was, and, with a shine, they continue to look great. They are a bit pricey, but the quality is well worth it in my opinion. Some of my co-workers buy $30.00 shoes from a big box store, and they have been through two or three pairs since I got these.

I have bought my first pair of Reebok Classic Nyon's back in 8th grade, this was the year 2001. I had bought a few more after that. Now they are the only show i will ever wear again.Thank You Very Much Reebok,Jeffrey M. Goldner JR

These shoes fit true to size for me. I have this same style in several colors, and this is my 3rd pair of the chocolate color over several years. Highly recommended for comfort. Not a lot of padding in the sole, but the leather upper molds to the foot well. Great casual shoe.

Bought these sandals for a cruise and they worked out perfectly. True to size. I really appreciate their arch support which made them easy to wear for hours without foot fatigue. I highly recommend this sandal for comfort and good looks.

I love the way these shoes feel and look. I wore them almost every day this summer. Unfortunately, they seem to only last one summer. The clasp broke just the other day as I was walking, and my shoe fell off. Luckily I was at home so I did not have to try to get home without a shoe. I thought these would be better quality - that's why I bought them. Am a little disappointed as these are my second pair of Dr. Scholl's that have broken. Don't think I will buy them again. Shoes should last more than one season.
These shoes are awesome! they look great with everything. you will not be sorry you bought them.

The speedo Womens Surfwalker Pro Water Shoe was one of my best investments. The shoe is comfortable, quality of workmanship is well made. I purchased the color pink and black, just love my shoes. I also get compliments on them too. Thank you amazon for such good quality products.

Good shoe for starting out players. Looks the same as the web picture.Easy to use cleat tightener and overall great shoe. Only downside is limited amount of color options (would have preferred white and blue).

I found the crocs to be very comfortable and easy on my feet.they are a little wider than my other shoes but that seemed to help by giving the feet more room and not allowing any soreness. my feet would hurt after an hour's walk in my shoes but the crocs didn't bother me. I started to alternate my shoes and the crocs when walking so I hope to get good results. overall the crocs are very good to me.

I love my crocs. I have three pairs and wear them everywhere. They are very, very good for my feet. Other people have told me that they make their feet sweat, but for me they are perfect. The thick sole and the spring are wonderful. And ... if they get dirty, just wash them under the tap. Somebody asked me one time: "Do you think I would look ridiculous if I wore those?" and I answered: "not anymore ridiculous than I look" but really, I don't care. Comfort is everything. I have noticed that all the nurses and medical personnel in hospitals wear them, even doctors. They are on their feet all day long so that should mean something. As I said above: they are life savers.
I'm a Sperry Top-Sider fan. A great shoe for casual dress or boating activities. Quality, fit, comfort, looks....all there, pure and simple. A great product!
I love my Yak Traxs!!!! They are the best thing!!! I have had a pair for years, they work so well on ice I recently bought a pair for my hubby and my brother.

True to size, great quality and my kids love them. These are great summer shoes- my kids wear them so much that they only last about 2-3 months. They grow so fast that the shoes last about the right amount of time.

Bought these for a white school uniform shoe. It is narrow at the ball of the foot, completely straight where your foot would be widest. Might want to consider a wide width or one size larger, even if you don't normally need wide. Seems to hold up well to wear. Leather in good condition.

I am a ED RN and haven't worked a shift without my Dansko's in 8 years. I normally wear a size 8 1/2 - 9 shoe and I wear a size 40 with Dansko clogs. I love them! For anyone new to Dansko's, give yourself at least 2 weeks of consistent wear before you determine if they are for you. I hated them at first, but was given same advice and am glad I followed it, as they are the best shoes I've ever had. I actually have one pair for work and another for home. Lastly, they are higher cost, but one pair will last you for years.
I have been buying Hi-Tec for years. When I found the Altitude IV I fell in love instantly. This shoe fits great, has little break in time and still holds its sturdiness as it ages. Well recomended.
The product is excellent, just send me the color is not requested, although in the case said White, the content was dirty unbleached white

Delivery time was excellent. The comments others have made about the boot running narrow are correct. I ordered a wide but while the boot fits ok it does feel tight in the width. The first couple of times I wore it on short hikes it was comfortable, but on a 3 hour hike it rubbed off the skin on the side of my left heel. Also, the boots have a very stiff sole. However, walking in wet snow the boot remained perfectly dry. I'm new to hiking so perhaps this is normal, but the boot leaves something to be desired as far as foot comfort goes.

I have worn these for some time now and can only rate them as mediocre.The ankle support should be two padded ridges instead of just one. This would provide more ankle support.The insoles can just be removed and tossed, because you will want something that provides some real comfort. I chose Orthotics such as Dr. Scholls.The velcro closures could be made so that they can be pulled up tighter for a snug fit. The pieces fixed to the lower part are not long enough.Last, but not least, the tongue is just a single layer of what appears to be split cowhide leather. The designer should have taken an example from other manufacturers and heavily padded the tongue for more comfort and support.Not worth the cost is my opinion.

Couldn't find this particular color/design combo in stores, so was very happy to find it here at a great price!Converse shoes run a bit big, so make sure you order a good half to one size smaller than you would wear

The shoe is incredible, however I ordered an 9.5 ameican measure and the shoe is too long for my foot, but I think the measure is wrong because of all shoes I have bought from amazon habe been 9.5 american and all they fitted like a glove, however this 9.5 shoe looks like it is a 10.5I just gave this product 3 star mark because the shoe looks incredible and its confortable in the right size

I ordered my boots because they sounded great. I am not disappointed,they are great right out of the box.Fit well except the tongue is very short and could fit better around the ankle more. My order was delayed because of the snow but i am happy to finally be wearing them. Thank you very much for selling these fine and affordable boots. P.S I will spread the word to all the people i know who want happy feet. signed Mark Berglund

When I first got them, they felt a little bit tight on my feet. I was disappointed and was going to return them, but then someone told me that after a few times they should become more comfortable. They were right!These are very comfortable shoes. And I wear them on daily basis. I have a child and we go to farms, dirt, parks etc. they have maintained their looks and are sturdy.I recommend.
i love these shoes, they are totally cute. the only draw back is they are kinda like satin over paper. they aren't as soft as i thought they would be, but i great buy none the less.

I purchased these shoes as a gift for my aunt in PA. She said it is the most comfortable shoe she has ever worn. I will purchase another pair for her closer to spring but told her the red ones are year-round too. Next, I will purchase a pair for me. Many thanks. NJ
This is a great shoe..... Very comfortable and well made..... Has a European look and great fit...... For the money you can't go wrong.....
These shoes were exactly what I was looking for. The price was the best I've seen anywhere. I couldn't be happier.

Wonderful sneakers! They are comfortable and stylish. They run slightly large ( I wear a size 7 shoe, so I ordered a 7). They are very roomie, but comfortable and I can wear thick socks with them if I need to.
These sneakers are OK....don't know if these are original or knock offs...fit is not the same as the Keds I remember!

For over 25 years I have relied on Softspots for casual wear. The shoes are durable and very comfortable. Great for travel and slip off going through airport security. The range of color choices (black, navy, brown, taupe) add a plus.

I love these boots. I have been buying them over and over again over the past 10 years. And only buy this one. Strong sturdy well made. A bit heavy if you are not use to wearing boots. Once you get use to the weight great for construction work. The last pair I bought I did not even want to wear them for work they also look good for hanging out!
Great price and delivery for Chuck Taylors. Very happy and so was my daughter!

They look great however whenever I walk more than a little, the toe beside my pinkie hurts and I get corns. P.S. they aren't too small for me so I don't know what went wrong. Not sure I would recommend them.
This is my first pair of sandals from Keen. I have a wide foot and was skeptical I would get a good fit. They are the best sandals I have ever owned. Thank you Keen and Amazon.

I had ordered a black pair of this (along with 2 other pairs, different brands and models) using the amazon.com's shoe promotion (buy 80$, 20$ off). I am now returning the item. I had got the black pair. I don't know about the other pairs, but for this model in black I can say that the upper material is not leather as described. It is mostly (90%) fabric with small leather pieces where the straps come together. I was really disappointed since I was expecting shoes with leather upper. If you like fabric shoes, this might be for you, but be warned that the fabric is really stiff and my feeling is they would not extend. I regularly wear 7.5M in nine west, but since the upper material is fabric, the shoes would not extend, they are really tight in the front part. If you really want these shoes, I advice to order half size larger unless you have really narrow feet.Other than wrong description given here about the upper material, the shoes look overall above average and pretty. The sole is pretty stiff and would not bend. For some occasions these might be a good choice if you like fabric shoes, but otherwise it is not really for walking, or for long wearing. At least that was my first impression. Since i didn't wear these and am returning someone who actually owns a pair and is wearing may evaluate more accurately.Overall OK shoes. Would expect better from nine west though! That's why i gave 3 stars.
COLOR WAS NOT WAS SHOWN. NO TIME TO RETURN THEM THOUGH WE HAD TO USE THEM

This is the second pair of Carolina boots I have purchased in succession. I do not remember the model of last years pair but I paid about $30 more. I work in a metal fabrication shop and am pretty hard on boots. I expect and depend a pair of boots to last a full year as our company does provide a limited boot allowance. The sole on these boots wore as well as any pair I have owned. I have owned Caterpillar and Wolverine in the past. This pair (8510) took a few days to break in so I had to alternate with an old pair but once broken in I was very satisfied with the comfort. Eventually I put in some neoprene inserts to help with cushioning. I walk briskly and put on many miles in our large shop and I was happy with how the support held up. The only problem I had was the leather around the steel toe came apart earlier than last years pair and toward the end of the year I was concerned the toe would actually fall out. Keep in mine that working with steel and sheet metal is brutal on foot wear. I decided to move up a bit this year and just purchased the 1809 model and though early they broke in much easier. I intend to buy some Toe Guard or Gorilla Toe Guard to protect the toe. If it wasn't for the toe leather falling apart I would have given it five stars
Thank you for resending the Crocs to the new address! They got here in less than a week.

I wanted something current and interesting. I have had knee replacement and needed a 2" heel only. Not only was this shoe perfect it is amazingly comfortable. It looks great on too! Mission accomplished. Oh and not to forget the very affordable price!
I purchased these shoes a half size larger than I normally wear and found them still very tight. Toe area is quite narrow. Otherwise, well made and good height for dancing.
PLEASE I WANT YOU TO SEND THE ITEM BY POST BECAUSE IT IS VERY DEFFICULT TO GET THE YOU HAVE BOUGHT

I purchased a pair of altitude iv boots from amazon a week ago. I had a chance to wear and test them yesterday. I was very unsatisfied with the way that they preformed. The "cleat like" sole made it impossible to walk up a slightly inclined damp board. If I was able to return these shoes I would without hesitation, but instead I am stuck with a pair of boots that I feel are useless bordering on unsafe. These boots are one dimensional; they seem to work well if you only walk on soft earth or dirt. If you plan to wear these in to town... don't buy. They seem to be affordable, but found them cheaper at my local outdoor store.**Update**While I stand behind what I said above... These boots did turn out to be very comfortable. The footbed provides good arch support. They are very much a hiking/ snow clearing boot. Great if you don't intend to wear them to work. The rubber on a work boot like (timberland pro) is very different and allows the wearer to walk up a wet inclined board while these are better suited for a muddy inclined path.
I love these shoes. They are very comfortable, and people compliment me about these shoes all the time.
I really like these shoes and they are very good quality but I ordered the narrow size and find that they are still too wide. When I measure them against a pair of mediums, they seem the same.

My daughter loves these shoes. We did buy a bigger size (1/2 size bigger)as some suggested but they are a bit too big for her. I would have bought her usual size - but she will grow into them. They seem sturdy and look very nice.

I bought this style (in the chololate brown) for a wedding. The first day I wore them for 16 hours! They are the most comfortable heels I have ever owned! I usually wear a 7, but the store clerk suggested I buy a 6.5 and put a gel insert to keep my foot in place. I now want to buy this shoe in every color!
This great outdoor shoes, has a very price-quality relation. Are you loocking for a outdoor shoes ???. Look at that. Confortable and good price.

I couldn't believe that the shoe would be a full size too large so I went with a half size smaller, and was wrong. A full size smaller than normal is, if anything, still slightly large. But a fine shoe!

Dada's are some of the best basketball shoes i have ever had. The only bad thing i have found is the price difference between youth and large. $20.00 more for a bigger size is rediculous, but other than that they are really cool shoes especially how you can personalize them with your teams colors and your team name, your name, and your number. Some of the reasons they are really good shoes are because they are comfortable, have good traction, and just look good.
I got these for my son's 14th birthday. He was so excited he threw them on on the spot. He has worn them about a month now and they are still his favorites.
Extremely comfortable, good tread, sturdy construction. These will last me for years. Oh, also have good arch support and cushioning around your ankle. I recommend them.
Lots of copy cats out there but there's nothing like the real Sperries. We were really happy to find them so reasonably priced.

This seems to be a very nice shoe, but they run incredibly small! My daughter is normally a 12 1/2, so I ordered 1 13 1/2 and she could not even get her foot in it. You then have to pay a $5.00 re stock fee to exchange the size!I would not have been so annoyed with this, had the description said runs small! We are awaiting the new pair. The original came pretty quickly (about 4-5 days) I sent them back a week ago.

I'm giving this shoe 3 stars for one reason. The width runs too narrow. I have had a similar sizing problem in the past and that was with Reebok. Otherwise it is a very attractive and comfortable shoe that looks like it it will last for a long time.

I walk back and forth to work, 6.5 mile roundtrip. I got these for walking in the snow and slush. I have put over 100 miles of roadside walking on these in all kinds of weather (rain, snow, & slush). Never a sore spot and my feet stay dry! I just love these!
Never owned a pair of Tim's before. Took them out for an all day hike and WOW! Really resistant to water, comfortable, and are durable. look forward to owning these for a few years.

Someone should have said these boots run rather small. The boot is fine I love it but the size is small, I wear size 11W in other manufaactures products but to get a boot to fit I had to order and return twice before I got a pair to fit, (13M).JAMES K. BEAL Sr.

These are the best shoes I have ever worn in any sport. I play senior "over 50" slow pitch softball and the cushion in these are gentle on old knees. Several ladies on the team bought them and all rave about them.

I used these for my wedding.I wore them for about 4 hours and they were comfortable until the end, they started to hurt a bit. But definitely good for several hours! I added a gel pad prior to the wedding, because due to the height the ball of the foot can tend to hurt. Also, these shoes tend to run narrow, so buy a larger size than your average size. The bottom of the heel and the front part of the foot are very flat. I didn't try to dance in these because of the height. Overall they add the needed height, and are very secure (unlike the average "stripper" shoe). One bad thing about these shoes are they tend to scuff easily. This won't be noticed by everyone else, but you may notice the scuffs yourself.

He has been wearing these boots every day for over 2 years now...whether he's landscaping, logging, snow shoveling. plumbing or working on a vehicle., it's a guarantee it will be done in his Carolina's...just yesterday he started rambling on again about how much he really loves them. Every once in awhile he gets out that flat gold can of black wax and replaces the laces and then holds 'em up to the light with pride," Look Hun, just like new again!" In fact, while I am right here on this link, right now....I think I will secretly order him another pair to keep aside for him, as a back-up..... ;)
they really fit good, are comfortable and nice and smooth for dancing.Glad that I made this purchase would do again
That's a product with a long tradition in market and I just was replacing my old sneakers. Coverse really rules.
I now own five pairs!!! All in different colors! Hope they never stop selling them!

Trust AMAZON to enable me to find EXACTLY what I wanted at a great price! I just moved to New England from the southern U.S. and badly needed a good-looking, but PRACTICAL winter boot with excellent traction on the soles. I had been searching and nothing suited my perameters. Until my new BEARPAW boots. THEY HAVE IT ALL! COMFORT, LOOKS, WIDE GROOVES ON SOLES, AND SNUGLY WARMTH. In short, a great product at a very fair price!

I have narrow feet. These shoes are so narrow that I have to get the next wider width. I ordered them in black which I loved, but had to return them and now they only have brown. It is an attractive shoe- I may just get the brown.
Love these - cute, comfortable and the sale price was fantastic. Super fast shipping also! Would recommend.

Fit is true to size. Was a bit leary ordering, arches are usually an issue. I am on my feet at least 10hrs a day and have no aches or pains related to wearing these shoes. Toe is just wide and round enough to be comfortable without looking odd or big.

I live in a wet climate, not a ton of snow, but these boots are great. Super warm and waterproof. Great for heading out to the mountains or for just going to the dog park. I think they do run a bit big....I wear a 9 and there is room for my foot to move a bit, however, not an issue when I wear thicker socks. I ordered the Buff, but received the black...however, I liked the black so much I decided to keep them.
My daughter loved the shoes. They are good quality and reasonable price. The vendor sent the shoes on time. My daughter says they are "very cool"

We are very happy with these shoes. My daughter has been running Cross Country and Track for four years and has always bought this style. Many of her teammates wear them as well. They are a very good shoe for the price.
I really like the Keds sneakers.. I ordered Navy and they look black. I would order again but in another color.

Received product in a timely manner. Grandson was so excited that he tried them on immediately.Fit was perfect,sole will be stiff until broken in. The red and black color really popped. Highly recommended.

I recently purchased a pair of the Reebok DMX Walking shoes while on vacation in nothern California. I have a pair of New Balance 842 Walking shoes that I normally use but I left them at home. The Reebok DMX Max Walking shoes have been a pleasant surprise. They are comfortable and have the feeling of walking on air. They were also about half the price of my New Balance 842s. I did considerable walking while in northern California up and down hills and on flat land and my legs really never got tired. I now use them at home over my New Balance 842s. I normally walk 3 1/2 to 5 miles a day.

these shoes were exactly what i was hoping for. they are my first pair of chucks and i must say i LOVE them!!! i want them in every color possible!=P super comfortable too...i could wear them forever!

Didn't have time to "break" my new shoes in before leaving for a trip to New York City. Didn't need to. I put them on for our flight (nice to be able to just slip them off to go through security) and wore them the entire time walking for miles each day seeing the sights of NYC. Very comfortable, true to size. Plan to buy another pair (in a different color). I got the black/silver ones - not much silver, they are a shiney black with black fabric. Highly recommend for anyone planning a trip where you will be doing lots of walking and want something a little dressier than athletic shoes.

I love these sandals and have ordered them over the internet for many years. They are basically my favorite shoe and I order them in many colors. I fear that they are being phased out, as they are getting hard for me to find now.
These boots are fabulous. I am a man and I'm size 11 US. They fit me perfectly, feel very comfortable, and look expensive. I am very pleased with the product.

I ordered this flip flop in white and they are so cute and comfortable, that I ordered another pair in black. They are so pretty with crystals on the straps ans so much cheaper that Havainanas. Buy them in you regular size and they fit perfectly.

I love these shoes because they are so quick to put on and easy to clean. My son enjoys wearing them, so they must be comfortable too. In addition, the navy ones I picked aren't some outlandish color, so they go well with many of his things. We're extremely happy with them!
did not wash well... price was great but doesn't seem like the same Keds that you buy in dept stores. Not real happy with them.
I usually wear a 10AAA, but this shoe was too narrow for me. Maybe it would have stretched out, but I don't have the patience for that. So I had to return it.
I love these shoes! They added to my new years eve outfit. I'm soo glad that I used amazon.com to find them. Took me a long time of looking to finally find these shoes and at a great price.

Not original but for the money good knock offs.. I just use them for walking of gravel roads but it is necessary to put in an insole.. then they are fine. They seem to last for about 250 miles, then the tip comes loose.

was a little worried about the sizing but the one i ordered fit just fine.this is a wonderful and sexy shoe, and very easy to walk in. the chunky heel is very forgiving and easy to balance in. with the platform being as thick as it is, it makes the shoe like walking in a 2 to 2 1/2 inch heel. great for beginners just learning to walk in heels,and perfect for extended wear. very easy on the feet. have worn this shoe for 9-10 hours at a time with very little effort. great buy for the money. would and will be ordering more of these in different colors.

I order the water shoes and was very pleased with my purchase. It is excatly what I wanted and I got it in no time flat. I was a little hesitant about ordering on line but this experience was well worth it..

This is the third time I have purchased this shoe, it isso comfortable, my other shoes are jealous as they sit silently in the closet collecting dust. If you want a comfortable shoe, a good looking shoe, I recomment this one. And the price was right!

I have 6 pair of the Scout, and have had more that I have worn out! They are the most comfortable sandal I have ever worn, and I am about to purchase another pair. I am 76 years old, and have problems with balance and my back, and have had foot surgery, and the Scout keeps me moving!
Received the promptly ,they are made very well .This is my second pair and just love the way they fit .
the shoes were awesome quality, shipped very quickly, but i guess that style runs big, i usually wear an 11, ordered that. they were huge, had to send them back.

I ordered these shoes for my son who is a Crossfit Trainer. He wears a size 13 shoe so this is what I ordered. When the shoes arrived they were at least 2 sizes too large. My son said that they measured at least a size 14/15. I had to return them. So if you are ordered these remember that they run very large.

the only reason i gave it 3 stars is because it is not a flat. there is a drop in them. i usually only run in true flats with 0 drop. its ok for longer runs. my feet get way too hot in them though. i really didnt like them, but that is my opinion. i would compair them to the nike free 7.0 only with a much much firmer sole. i have only ran about 20 miles in them. cool color pattern though!

I have been running for 5 years now and increasing my mileage in the last year. I've tried similar Nike and New Balance running shoes in this price range and none of them has lasted as long nor been as comfortable. It is a cushion-y and stable shoe for someone with a neutral running stride (I can't speak for any other stride.) They have even been fine in the sub-freezing winters of the northeast.

I should have ordered this as a size 12 or 11 1/2 if available but I still likeed the shoe and still have them for around the house lounging around but not good for any strenuous sport because of snug because of size, not the shoe.

My daughter has average little girl feet. I think these run narrow. They are really cute & if your little girl has narrow feet-buy them. Otherwise, skip these "ouchy" shoes! Also, I think the elastic in the back was a little unforgiving on the backs of her heels.

I purchased these boots at a very good price, but I still have problems with hot spots when I hike. These boots are warm and they appear to be well-padded. They also offer very good support. However, after about 5 miles of hiking, I continue to have some hot spots. I have a slightly higher than normal in-step, so if I tighten the laces, I get a hot spot on the top of my foot. I have also had hot spots on the bone on the high side of my ankle. I always wear good hiking socks, but this doesn't seem to help. A neoprene ankle protector has helped the most, but this makes my foot feel constricted after four or five miles. If you're going to do serious hiking,either allow a significant time for breakin, with short walks to be sure you have addressed any problems, or consider a higher quality boot.

I have had these shoes about ten days. I have three other pairs of Ecco Shoes I have purchased over the last five years. They are great shoes however this is the first "high end" Ecco I have purchased. It is an awesome shoe. Comfortable out of the box it wears well with a suit or dress slacks. I am a trainer (seminars and workshops) so I stand for hours usually on concrete floors. These shoes have made it easier on my feet. I purchased this style as they were being discontinued so I paid less than the retail of $190. However if I had to I would pay the full price for the shoes. I really enjoy this shoe and the quality of the materials. The inner leather lining makes them cool in the hot summer of Houston. I have enjoyed Ecco Shoes for the last five years but this pair and style is the best pair yet! I would highly recommend them.
This purchase was a replacement product and therefore a known entity. It is a good and useful summer sandal that meets a need. Ordering and shipping were on schedule and as described.

My son asked me for these shoes. He wears a size 14 and has difficulty finding his size shoes. Therefore, it is a pleasure to be able to find and order what he needs. He's been wearing Rockport shoes for many years because they are comfortable and durable.
Bought a pair of these a couple months ago. The styling isn't too bad, but they fit my foot so nice I have since bought 4 more new pairs to have later, before they get discontinued everywhere.
Comfortable, durable and true to size. Clarks is a great, reliable brand. Shoes will get water spots over time, so treat them accordingly.

I love the Breeze Walker sandal. I gave it 4 stars because they changed their sole. At least that is my opinion. I am going to call the manufacturer to check. What I am referring to is that it seems to be a man-made composition instead of the way it used to be leather. As a result I feel like it is slippery if there is perspiration. Other than that it is a very comfortable walking shoe.

The only problem 5.11 has with these boots is that they are incredibly durable and have prevented me from buying another pair for two years. I work in law enforcement and I am very tough on boots. I have worn these boots every day for two years and there is not a single place on the boot where any defects can be seen or felt. The bottom still has plenty of tread whereas other boots I have worn for 6 months have lost all tread on the outside. They are quiet, comfortable, easy to run in, light, have kept my feet dry in downpours, and most of all--durable. I will continue to wear nothing but HRTs for as long as they are manufactured. Period.

I was so excited to find these sandals then when I received them they were not the same quality that I had purchased 8 yrs ago. The leather was not that soft supple type that is comfortable it felt more like vinyl and they were too small. I sent them back and got a refund.
We received the sneakers rapidly. They were just what we ordered and at a better price than I could find in the store.
I bought these tennis shoes for my fiance and he just loves them! He's even talking about buying the exact pair

Some guys I work with on my Army dive team swear by these as dive booties because you can take your fins off and move out cross country without having to stop and put on boots. I bought a pair to try out and thought they were ok. I have kind of a wide foot and low arches so this shoe isn't really made for my foot.
You can never go wrong with SAS shoes. All of us girls have worn them for years, and they are so comfortable. The service was great, and delivered on time, the prices cannot be beat.
I am in the process of buying myself a pair of puma "Anjan".

Ordered these online. The first time they arrived we realized we had ordered them a size smaller than we needed. The Converse All-Star is a great looking shoe. The only problem is that they run big in size. Ex. If you wear a men's 10 1/2 you probably should order a 9 1/2 or 10. Otherwise you might feel like you're wearing clown shoes.

I couldnt of been happier. I purchased these shoes 5 years ago and they have lasted me all this time. I wish that I could find another pair

This is a shoe that you could wear with your business and formal wardrobe and yet walk around all day. It's extremely comfortable. Evrything is good.Though I return because I can find a better deal nearly the same but different brand, I like this one.The size may vary compare to the other one with the same size I means I has tried this size 8 and felt a bit loose).

This shoe is off da chain i bought this shoe when it came out. I gots the blue and white ones and they comfterable as hell they gots a spring in the sole so dat the wheel spins the only bad thing is that when you walk you hear the air from the spring but overall this shoe is off da hizzle.
Size was small for me, but my daughter loved them!! They are comfortable, fresh on feet and great price. Delivered right on time.
My son loves these shoes! They are stylish and he says they are very comfortable. We've tried other brands of sneakers and he's just not as happy.

These are the most comfortable shoes I own. The only draw back is the run a size larger than you normally are use to so you may want to go down a size. You can wear with anything anytime. love it!!!!!it's so light and comfortable....perfect for walking, shopping,,,,,,,and the price is great

This is the only set of hiking boots I've ever had that doesn't sacrifice comfort for support or vice-versa. Maximum support + maximum comfort = excellent boot. Break-in time is minimal and once they do it's as if they've become part of your feet. Best boots I've ever worn.
These boots are surprisingly high quality! Nice leather with good print. People cannot tell these from real lizard skin! Much more than I paid for.

I just received my tap shoes this morning, one day before the due date. I love the color and the taps look so shiny and thick. Excellent shoes, very confortable and they look good. Exactly what you would expect from clarks. Would recomend them to anyone looking for a light and confortable everyday shoe.

I ordered these for my fourteen year old daughter for Christmas and the arrived very nicely packaged and in only three days with free shipping. She tried them on and absolutely loves them and begged to wear them but no dice, I wrapped them up for Christmas.

I received my shoes within two days. They are very lightweight, but beautiful. I didnt expect HIGH quality for 4.90, but I think they will last a bit. Very pretty tips. Super sparkly and girly. I wear a size 10 and got the Large ones. They fit ALMOST perfectly. I wish they had half-sizes though. I would order from them again. I got a great deal here.

I've tried a bunch of sandals. NONE are as comfortable as these. I wear them all day long. Even to large theme parks like Disneyland. They cradle the foot and are so comfy. Great shoe. You will buy many pairs of them, guaranteed.
Well symple a well made capezio, looking great, very comfortable,great red color, They have double red and black braid. I recommend it

I just bought my third pair of these boots in five years. I found them to be almost indestructible for light machine shop and daily use on the street. They are VERY COMFORTABLE, ideal if one is on your feet all day.They also polish up well and are presentable WORN as a dress boot/shoe.They felt like a favorite, comfortable old pair of shoes from the first time I put them on...SORT OF INDUSTRIAL STRENGTH BUNNY SLIPPERS!The boots are very well made from real leather.They are not heavy duty enough for heavy construction,logging or concrete work. Good for light farm work and driving.THEY ARE THE BEST WEARING WORK BOOT, I HAVE FOUND FOR DAY TO DAY WEAR.The soles have some tread, giving you fair traction in the grass, snow and ice plus have excellent wear resistance.Also...the boot's sole patterns does not leave large clumps of the outside on the kitchen floor, while stepping into the house.The boot sizing is pretty much exact. Only buy your exact sizeExcept a WIDER SHOE if you plan to wear multiple pairs of thick socks in the winter.They have an excellent size / width selection. I usually need a 14 EEEEE in a boot.The boots are almost waterproof, you will need to apply a reasonable coat of waterproofing silicone spray or mystery oil leather treatment. KIWI SHOE POLISH makes them shine up very well.The leather uppers are well cut out pattern and sewn together with care.I never had problems with the leather, material, sewn seams splitting or tearing, and no loosening or unusual wear with the heels or soles.The leather is thick enough to protect but still thin enough to be flexible.I have bought both he 6 inch and 8 inch versions of this farm boot.Both boot heights are just as easy to get on and off, however the eight inch high boot does gives you a bit more ankle support.So, I prefer the eight inch height.The only thing I can recommend extra for these boots...Order a bit thicker,round nylon boot laces, instead of the flat, cotton shoe laces that come FACTORY standard with these boots.If you need soles with more traction get something with a VIBRAM sole.However, trust me, your wife will remind you,often, to remove your boots before coming into the house with VIBRAM soles on.The only tougher and better boots I have seen and bought,have been just as happy with, are the White's Smoke Jumper Logging Boots and they COST ALMOST $500.00The FARM BOOTS are a great deal! I wish more American companies made things with this amount of care /pride in the product,a good design philosophy, used quality materials and all put together with wonderful workmanship!The people at WORK AMERICA remind me and hearken back to an earlier time in this country, when something that was stamped AMERICAN MADE or MADE IN USA meant often this product was the best made in the world!http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B008D94HNQ/ref=cm_cr_rev_prod_title
Very happy w/the product, shipped right away, fits true to size.

I have been using Kiwi shoe polish for many years and have never been disappointed in it. It applies easily and evenly and without too much effort can be brushed into an excellent shine. It's thick enough to nicely fill in little nicks in your shoe leather. The third-party seller delivered it to me promptly, although this observation may not be of too much value to you because you may be buying from a different seller.
Very comfortable. I'm on my feet 10 hrs. a day on concreet floors and these are the best I ever found.

Super fast delivery. Thank you. I will be wearing these boots with a 70's style dress. They are beautiful and I cant wait to wear them. I have aways had big calves and they fit perfect. They seem well made with nice material. I love these boots!

Brought these shoes couple months ago & have been happy with them. I generally am US sz11 or AU sz10 but found these are running a little bigger so when I purchase my next pair of these will be getting US sz10.5 instead of 11. I find them very comfortable for working long shifts & they are wearing well so far, but am thinking of adding a little more arch support but they are ok without added extra's.Update: I've had these shoes for near 12 months & they are great. I want to order more but amazon dont have them only other shoe sellers do that dont do shipping to Australia.Plz Amazon get these shoes back to being able to be shipped to Australia as I need another 2 pairs.These shoes fit my insoles for Plantis nicely & am finding that these shoes are the only ones I can wear atm because of hip ligament injury

THESE ARE NICE AND SPACIOUS BOOTS AND THE BURGANDY IS A HARD COLOR TO FIND BUT MY GOD THEY COME WITH NO INTERIOR CUSHIONING SO BEWARE.....IT TOOK 2 SETS OF INNER CUSHIONS TO RENDER THESE WEARABLE. IF IT WERE NOT FOR THE COLOR THEY WOULD HAVE GONE RIGHT BACK.THEY ARE DRESSY ENOUGH FOR WORK ON IN CLEMENT DAYS BUT THAT HARD FOOT BASE ALMOST GOT THESE A 1 STAR RATING.

I bought a pair of these last year, and tore up the top of my foot. I chalked it up to trying to wear these at the beach. Dog ate them so I bought another pair. Only mild indoor walking at the hotel and 1 trip to the store. Soles of my feet were killing me.

This is the only sandal I can wear without hurting my feet. I can wear these sandals right out of the box on an all day shopping spree and my feet are fine! I wear a D width and these are truly the best fit for wide width feet. I have them in every color!

My two daughters needed character shoes for a performing arts tour. Rather than go to a dance studio or supply shop, I ordered 5 pairs of these for my daughters to try on. I ordered in different sizes/widths close to the needed sizes. They ran within a half size of true size for us, and we were able to find two pairs that worked within the 5 pairs I ordered. They have a good selection of the larger, harder to find size ranges and the wider widths.This is a decent, suitable, affordable basic shoe and seems to be a good value for the price range. Ordering from Amazon and taking advantage of the free return policy for the unwanted shoes saved me a 70 mile round trip to the store, and a considerable amount of money that I would have spent at a retail establishment.

I am in my upper 40's and shoe comfort is a must. I paired my Chucks with a pair of Sof Sole insoles and they are soooo comfy. I have not tried to run in them or walk a marathon. Not sure I want to take that risk. I boughy my insoles from Sports Authority for $15. They are the gel ones that are super thin.
No Complaints. Everything ran smoothly. I recommend this seller and this product to everyone. They are absolutely great, and they were exactly as described/pictured.

It's a great ballet shoe, nice leather and sole piece--seem well made. Unfortunately I thought street shoe size would work for this also. It didn't. I had to send it back and get another size up. You might want to get a size larger too..but great for the price!

These shoes are comfortable, and the price was right. They run a little smaller per size than the Aetrex Rhino Runner which I reviewed earlier, and are not quite as comfortable to me, but I would buy another pair when these are worn out. Nice to have a black shoe for comfort wear sometimes, instead of wearing the more flashy Rhino Runner. They seem to be holding up well.
[[ASIN:B000FAI9X0 Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Hi Top red high top tennis shoes.They were just what the kid wanted, and they fit. He has been wearing them daily. Great!Vazel
i had a converse b4 but it was getting really old so i decided to buy a new one. it was just as i wanted it to be. its sure NOT to disappoint.
True to size but really wide, other wise good quality. Also nice pink color. I don't recommend them unless your are in need of some width.
These shoes are very comfortable and very cute! They are very versatile- good for work, going out, or just for casual occasions. I would not recommend going on long walks in them though.

Great traction. Makes you confident while walking on ice. As soon as I wasn't wearing them, I fell and bruised my hip. Do not wear indoors(floor scratches), and have a drip tray for them beside the door because inevitably if your using these in the conditions that their built for then your going to be bringing in dirty ice particles with you. I don't use them all the time in winter, but when it's icy, they've paid themselves off 10 fold. Great gear for emergency workers when the conditions call.
Nice-looking shoe, but too expensive. For big foot guys like me, makes your feet look a lot smaller.

I selected this brand specifically because I had another pair and loved them, but I put a LOT of miles on them and so wanted a spare. Although this was not the exact same style, it was equally as comfortable, study and stylish. I love this brand for a nice looking shoe for work that is very comfortable to walk in!
These shoes last for SO long and fit great. The color is perfect and they are wonderful to dance in.

The sandals are exactly what I need. Comfortable and good style for daily wear, excellent quality for tough environment/activities, easy to adjust. You can even simply step in as a slipper. Perfect summer sandals.

I love these shoes! They are so comfortable, I end up wearing them all the time. They are great for days at the gym when I'm doing weight days ( so I don't have to wear my running shoes). I love walking around town in these shoes. My other shoes always made my feet hurt after a while. I've been complemented so many times on these shoes. I will probably buy my brother a pair of these for Christmas.The only issue I have, which is slight, is that the bottom sole seems to be made out of a flimsy plastics. Other than that the fabric of the shoe is very high quality, and the toe has a nice suede.

I got a pair of converse shoes for Christmas almost 3 years ago, and I have been wearing these shoes almost ever since. They feel comfortable, they look good, and they have hardly any wear on them after 3 years. As a matter of fact, I have them on right now as i am writing this review..I'm thinking about buying another pair in a different color just because i love them so much.

Wonderful experience all the way through. The shoes are soooo comfortable and are dressy enough to wear with summer pants and shorts. As always, dealing with Amazon is the best: never any problem they can't solve. Have ordered these shoes in another color b/c I loved my first pair so much.

I'm a nurse in a busy facility. I rarely have the luxury of sitting down during my shift. I am always walking and standing. I really don't have foot problems but saw this ad and thought I'd buy a pair to see how they feel. First - the sizing is a bit odd. I wear a standard size 8 - medium width, and I guess I was too quick to order the 8M- which turns out to be US size 8D. These shoes are a bit snug around the toe area, and my feet are not wide at all. The heel also comes up a bit high on my ankle, which is a bit uncomfortable.They are sturdy shoes and I expect them to last a long, long time. Compared to the nurse shoes I usually wear, these shoes are pretty hard. I'm not 100% sure I'd order them again.
I ordered these boots because they say they are 12" but they are really 10". They are also made from thin leather.
The shoes were delivered on time. They were exactly what I wanted, and they fit well. The color matched pretty well what it was advertised to be.
6 N is a hard to find shoe size. This white sandal was perfect in every way. It's exactly what I was looking for !!

I normally love Reef sandals but these are different than sandals I have bought from them in the past few years. I held these up to last year's sandals and the same size has about a half inch trimmed off all the way around. Sure, my foot still fits on the shoe but just barely. I should have returned them but I was hoping I could make them work. I don't think I will ever wear them in public because it looks like I can't afford to buy shoes that fit. I'm really disappointed with this change in their sandals.

The shipping fast, the product came in the right size that i ordered. The shoes are great I love them. Only problem is they sent me a different variation of this product than what is pictured. The stitching shown in the toe area that looks like a "cowboy style" is replaced by a rounded curved line. I bought these over a cheaper model to get that "cowboy v" stitch and received the cheaper model anyways... should have ordered them elsewhere and saved 5 to 10 dollars.
comfortable shoe for a great price. I read the reviews and ordered a half size bigger, in wide instead of regular. It fits perfectly!

These were for my brother who requires sturdy and supportive sneakers with velcro closures for daily use. The extra wide width was a bonus, and they're very comfortable for him. They also arrived within very quickly. We're very satisfied.

These are the most comfortable shoes to wear all year round. I love the convenience of just sliding them on and off without having to untie the laces. They look good with just about everything. I would definately buy these again.

Before I explain my rating, let's get the "Size" issue out of the way. There is a sizing guide on the order screen; it explains that you merely have to place your foot on a ruler and then check the measurement (heel to toe) on the guide to get the right slipper size. It is not the same as your shoe size.My Tamarac Slippers fit me perfectly; they do not pinch or fall off my feet. Previously I used moccasins purchased at a well known discount store. I often go outdoors in the evening for a number of reasons; the moccasins have fairly thin soles so I could feel every pebble of twig that I stepped on. The Tamaracs have a more substantial sole and are actually durable enough to use outdoors. While not as thick-soled as my workboots, they are firm enough that I do not have to walk around like a cat on broken glass.I look forward to the end of my day when I can kick off my boots and slip my feet into my Tamaracs. They look so good and are so comfortable that I intend to wear them when going into town for errands. Should I worry about what people will think when they see I am wearing slippers? Well, who cares what a fat, bearded old man is wearing anyhow - let them think I am eccentric. At least my feet will love me because they will be comfortable.R-von

I chose four stars because I like the shoes, but I'm not yet sure if the leather would stand up to rigorous wear because it seems quite thin and a bit dry. I might put some leather conditioner on and see how that goes.The shape is good, and the fitting guide is VERY helpful. I'm very pleased with the fit of the three pairs I bought recently for my kids and I.I'd definitely recommend them for beginners.

My son absolutely loves these shoes. He spends a lot of time creating art on them w/Sharpies, it's great they wear so well. Because they are a tennis shoe, they're supportive w/ plenty of cushioning in in the soles. Thumbs up for these classic gems! BTW, fit runs true to size.
estoy feliz con la compra pues no conseguia numero grande en chile para mi esposo. ademas la entrega fue rapida

These shoes were ok looking. The buckle is golden, and the material is not the best. The leather is very flat/dull looking, and it is hard. This brand tends to be all over the place when it comes to sizes. I own the Rosa heels in Medium width, and they are slightly wide, and I have wide feet for my shoe size. So I was expecting these to fit, but the front of the shoe is quite narrow, so my toes were squeezing in them when I tried them on. As the material felt hard, I thought it would take several sessions of pain to break them in, so I returned them. If you have wide feet, order a half size or one size above your street size, or order the wide widht ones. They are not pretty anyway with the leather being so dull looking.
My boyfriend absolutely loves them ! So warm and comfy and you can run to curb in your slippers..He's thanked me three times for them !

The boot is comfortable and keeps its good looks. However what appear to be a 1 1/2 inch thick heel is actually only the thickness of the tread. If you wear down the back of the heel on one side (which most people do) cardboard or something starts to show through. That chunky heel you see is basically 1/4 inch thin.

These shoes are true to size, are authentic converse, are comfortable, and arrived on time and in the correct color. My only complaint about converse is that they are a bit too narrow. However you can find them at pretty much any shoe store so you can always try them on first before you buy them. I am happy about the price too (they were $10 more expensive at DSW than here on amazon). They don't offer much in terms of arch support, but overall I can't complain.
The shoes were delivered on time. They were exactly what I wanted, and they fit well. The color matched pretty well what it was advertised to be.
Couldn't find the right size at the store so looked for it at Amazon, then found it and purchased here. Everything was perfect. My daughter loved this shoes, and delivery was done as expected.

I read a lot of reviews and checked the Capezio website before ordering, and (sure enough) this shoe seems to be sized about like normal street shoes. My daughter wears 11 or 11.5 and the pair I ordered (size 12) was a little big (as I hoped). Quality seems good enough to hold up to weekly lessons for a lot longer than they will fit!

These socks are for shoe size 12.5-5. My son is a size 5. I bought these for him for soccer. I think they will fit for another year, even if his foot grows. Currently, they fit over his shin guards and fold over below the knee about 2.5". If he grows, the fold will be smaller, but that's OK. I love how these came in a huge variety of colors, so I could get the color that matches the league jerseys. My son said, "They're fuzzy. I like that," when he put them on for the first time. I don't think they're fuzzier than other athletic socks, so I'm not sure what he meant. But, he's happy, so I'm happy. These are a great price for 3 pairs!
I got these for running around cleaning my house and running errands (my new lace up shoes for anyone follows flylady :P) . They fit well and are very comfortable. I also really like the red color :)

I recently purchased this shoe after a friend of mine recommended ASICS shoes to me. This is my first pair of running shoes and I am very pleased with it. The shoes were very comfortable from the day one.One comment that I have about the shoe is that they are quite narrow in the front. I have wide feet and would have prefferred a little wider shoe. I worked out fine for me, however, because I had purchased 1/2 size longer than what I usually wear.Overall, I am very happy with this pair and would recommend it.
The Crocs are excellent, great size, and perfect. Shipped in timely manner. I would recommend buying from this seller. Top notch.

I purchased black Life-Stride Malibu sandals during the summer. They are comfortable and I love to wear them all the time. They look nice with shorts, jeans or dresses. The temperature is often warm here so I wear them often.

the shoes are gorgeous, great red color, great design, great quality, but yes unfortunatly a bit uncomfortable...might bring them to get stretched out; or i heard taken a walk in the rain, then sitting back someplace (not to warm) and letting then dry on your feet works. The 7.5 is a little snug but i feel once their broken in they'll fit perfect. I'd totally buy again though, the leathers beautiful and they have great yellow ones too!
Bought these shoes for my teenage son.He loves them - still wearing them after two years.The great part of Vans is that the size is consistent around the world.

I have two pairs of these and they are awesome! They form perfectly to your foot. They have wide straps which is nice and come in many colors. They have just the right amount of cushioning. I do alot of walking in them and my feet don't hurt after. These are my favorites sandals ever!

I really like these shoes. I use them for weightlifting/running. My only warning is that they run quite big. I had to order 1.5 sizes smaller than I usually do, but they work fine. My first pair got torn up a lot around the lace-holes, but I think that was because they were too big. My current pair has no problems so far.
These boots not just look good but are very comfortable, this is my third pair .......I would recommend these to any one who is looking for a low price hiking boot

BEING A LANDSCAPER I HAVE HAD SEVERAL YEARS OF FOOT PAIN BECAUSE OF THE AMOUNT OF WALKING I DO. I PURCHASED THE LACROSSE BOOTS BECAUSE OF THE REVIEWS I HAVE SEEN ESPECIALLY FROM OTHER PEOPLE WHO ARE ARE ON THE FEET ALL DAY. I PREVIOUSLY WORE TIMBERLAND ONLY TO HELP WITH THE FOOT PAIN BUT THE LACROSSE ARE MORE COMFORTABLE AND BETTER BUILT. MY PREVIOUS PAIR OF TIMBERLAND HAD A PROBLEM WITH THE SOLE SEPARATING FROM THE BOOT. TIMBERLAND DID REPLACE THE BOOTS BUT THIS APPEARS TO STILL BE A PROBLEM FOR THEM. I AM NOT KNOCKING TIMBERLAND, BOTH BOOTS WERE MADE IN CHINA BUT IT APPEARS LACROSSE HAS BETTER QUALITY CONTROL. MY BIGGEST COMPLAINT AGAINST TIMBERLAND IS THAT IF I SPEND $120.00 FOR A PAIR OF WORK BOOTS WHY CAN'T THEY PROVIDE YOU WITH A PAIR OF LACES THAT FIT THE BOOT. IT'S HARD TO IMAGINE THAT A SMALL ITEM LIKE THIS IS NOT PICKED UP BY QUALITY CONTROL. I HAD TO BUY 4 EXTRA PAIR OF LACES TO FIND ONES THAT FIT TO REPLACE THE ORIGINAL ONES THAT ARE TOO SHORT AND I AM NOT THE ONLY ONE WITH THIS COMPLAINT. THE LACROSSE ARE MUCH EASIER TO LACE UP WHEN PUTTING ON AND IF YOU BUY THE ONES IN THE COLOR I DID THEY REALLY ARE A GOOD LOOKING BOOT WITH GREATER ARCH SUPPORT.

my step sister's daughter had some on which she wears them all the time age 11 she loves hers and then my son wanted some he got his for christmas and now we see everyone has them..kids out in our street rolling down the street them on..now my youngest son 4 wants some..he wants to wear them all the time and i have to say no dont wear them today but he wears them to the restuants and any where i will let him...they are cool..it dont take long to learn how to use them.it took my son about a week to get the hang of it..

Other boots I've had fit fine at first, then, after stretching out they just feel sloppy on my feet. While the Guide Gear boots are tight at first, after stretching out they fit like gloves from that point on. That's how they should be. The soul is rugged enough to walk around outside. I've even shoveled snow wearing these boots. I've had my first pair for years and I'm buying my second pair today.
I bought the shoes for my son. He really likes them. They fit great & he says they are very comfortable.

Careful if you have wide calves and order this. The product description is for the Denzel Plus boot, with wide calves. However, when I ordered from this page (from ShoeMall, through Amazon) they sent the regular Denzels, which are at least 2 inches smaller around the calf, so I can't wear them. From what I could see they would look great if I could zip them up! They aren't real leather, so keep that in mind. I didn't mind that since the price was low. But now I have to return them and find another pair that will really fit.
This sandal is supportive, simple, comfortable (doesn't rub or blister). So far, so good. I think they will be worth the ~$20.
These are classic black gym shoes. We needed plain black gym shoes for the school play. These shoes were perfect.
This shoe is exactly what my son wanted. The quality much better than cheaper versions. This is the real converse shoe

Soy guía de turismo en Costa Rica, mi trabajo exige largas caminatas en bosque, ciudad, playas, senderos, etc. Por tener tantos meses de lluvia siempre he usado botas hi-tec impermeables y no tengo queja alguna, los últimos 2 pares los he tenido que cambiar porque se me gasta la suela! Cómodas, ajuste perfecto, livianas, muy resistentes, y con un precio accesible!El envío fue mejor de lo esperado.Pura vida!

I loved these shoes and was so sad that I had to return these. I loved the shoe, but the right shoe was noticeably larger than the left - same size. I never have this issue with other shoes. I ended up returning and getting a different color in oiled leather & they fit fine.Only taking one start off because the sizing should be consistent.

This was an expensive present for my husband. It was definitely a splurge because these sandals are the most expensive footwear he owns. From the moment he opened the box, they haven't left his feet. He wears them everywhere. Not being a sandals kind of guy, he is now a convert and so grateful I bought them that he's being extra helpful around the house.Advisory: If you're a true size 8, I would consider ordering a size down because they run big. My husband is an 8 1/2 and they're a bit large.

I already have a pair of Keen Venice H2 sandals and loved them, so I just bought a second pair in a different color. I've found the H2's to have wider toes which are more comfortable for my feet. Not all the Keen's fit the same. As other reviewers have said, order a 1/2 size bigger. I typically wear 8's or 8.5, so I went with the 8.5 here and it's perfect.

While I'm not a runner, I bought these on advice from others that have to walk on concrete as part of their job. The anti roll and cushion soles are the best support I've had for my feet in a long time. I ended up buying a second pair, one set for work, and the other for home and biking.You can't go wrong with this shoe, not to mention you can get them in 4E widths!maloy

I purchased these sneakers for my daughter who is a school teacher and stands on her feet all day long. She swears by them. This is the newest of the skecher line in slipon's and she loves them. They came quite quickly and fit her snuggly but they will stretch with time. They tend to run tight to size. The wide width is great.
Very nice shoe it would be great if this style came in more colors. Shoes are comfortable and sturdy, great for walking.
My teenage son loves these shoes. This is his second pair and he wears them often. The Sperry Billfish costs a bit more then other Sperrys, but he prefers the style and fit of these.

I love these shoes. They are just what I was looking for. The length is perfect and accurate for my regular size, but the toe is narrow (not pointed, but narrow). So, unfortunately I am returning them because i can't figure out if I should get the next size (that would make them too big in the heal and length) or get them in a wide (which would make them too wide in the heal). What to do??!? So, unfortunately they're going back.
These are classic Converse shoes. They arrived quickly. The fit was true to size and they look great with our school uniform.
Shoe was attractive but runs very wide. Normally I wear a Medium but this fits like a wide.Not much arch support. Newer styles of LifeStride seem to be running very wide. Shoeswere returned.

I had initially purchased a pair of Asolo Moran GTX. Although they were great boots, wearing those around the house made me realize that the right boot pinched a bit too much for my liking. Those got returned and in desperation picked up a pair of these. For the price (roughly 1/3 of the Asolo) these are fantastic boots.Break-in was fairly quick with my biggest problem area being around the shin. A strategic fold of the smartwool socks intially took care of any discomfort for the test hikes around the neighborhood. I have had no issues with the boots since then. I have deliberately stepped into streams to test the "waterproofness" noting no problems. The traction seemed fine.Great boots and will most likely purchase them again.

These are one of the most comfortable dress shoes I have ever worn. I normally wear tennis shoes being a nurse and so I know what is comfortable. I bought these softspots after buying two pairs of shoes that were just so uncomfortable and produced blisters. Now I am not going to dread wearing dress shoes and now make them my go to shoes.SoftSpots Women's Stephanie Pumps
Outstanding shoes! Just like I remembered from high school years ago. I was glad to see them make a comeback and the price is great too.

I have purchased 2 pair of dansko professional shoes in the past 6 months. They fit differently and the piping on 1 pair is coming off- so I carry a Sharpie marker to hide the defect. For the price, these should wear better!
This shoe has no "break in" period. This has to be one of the most comfortable shoes I have every worn straight from the box. I hope they hold up, seems to.

this is my second pair of Reef Ginger flip flops. The first pair lasted two summers with almost daily wear. They're squishy and super comfortable and have a little arch support that justifies them being a little more expensive.
just in time and just what i needed. This are just like the first reebok shoes i got as a little kid. Light, confortable. They also fit just perfect. Strongly recomend this product.

I bought these sandals for my mom because they looked nice and were from Softspots a company I love. She hasn't worn them out yet but reportrd them to be very comfortable. Just what we were looking for. Excellent product as usual. I highly recommend,

These are my 4th pair of chucks and I love them. I know exactly what I'm getting and I don't have to try them on. I normally wear a 8.5 in womens, but I order a 6 in mens when I buy chucks. It took almost a week from when I placed my order to receive the shipping notice, but the shoes arrived 2 days after I got the email. Just wish they got here sooner!
I bought these for my husband, he liked them, but they run a size bigger, after exchangeing them for a size smaller he was happy with them.

My mom actually bought these shoes for my daughter. She found them while browsing children's shoes online. They're cute online, but they are even cuter in person. They fit my daughter well and just look so comfortable. The brown goes with most of her outfits and the cutouts give it such a sweet, delicate look. She was wearing them when she first learned to walk at almost 11 months old and these easily gave her the support she needed. I get comments from people all of the time when she has them on about how precious they are. People are always asking me where they can buy a pair. I love these shoes!!!!

It's hard to find a white tennis shoe that doesn't just look plain stupid these days. I hate the huge basketball puffy shoes and the super white polo club/preppy versions. So when I saw this shoe I had to have it. It is the right combo of both retro styling and unassuming 'I don't care' fashion. The shoes are really comfortable, durable as heck and just keep getting better looking the more they are broken in. I'm going to buy another pair because after 1 year of abuse I know I'm going to need a backup when they eventually disintegrate.I recommend the white with Navy myself. The white with black are a little too 'Run DMC'...though they wore Adidas....I know.

As the title says, I believe this is an essential purchase for any man. They're comfortable, light, and good looking. The flat sole is great for extended walking and sports (specially weight lifting in my case). I like how they look and make my feet look slim as well. Heheh. Combined with my other clothing, I like how they help make everything seem that much "tighter". These are just a must have :)
