Alright well i am a size fourteen and i usually wear 4e shoes they say its a D size shoe but to me it feel like a 4e because it fits me quite swell. any way i got the cool green ones it fits perfectly i mean the best shoes i ever got. the only problem with the green ones is that when ever you use them it attracts a lot of dirt. A lot! but all i do is spray Shout on them wait 5 minutes and then wipe it down with a damp cloth. but other than that they really have nice ankle protection, by the way there my first ankle tops i ever got and i am extremely glad i got them. i would and did recommend them to everyone. so get them the best 33 dollars i ever spent!

These shoes are even cuter in person and they make my son look so grown up. He was just growing out of a 9 when I bought these in a 10. Should have bought the 9.5, but he's wearing them anyway. Good quality and the stitching detail is very attractive.
Normal chucks...awesome as always. I've worn them for the past 2 years. They're looking a little worn now, time to buy another pair. :)
5 star all the way love vans. No abnormalitys to the show shipped fast great seller. No problems with product works great if you have wide feet as well.

I usually don't order shoes online but I don't like shopping for a wide shoe, I want to buy a wide shoe. I have bought Dockers before and Rockports with good results.Rockports are not as good as before, so I found these nicely styled Dockers in a size 10 2E and they fit great and are so comfortable.

I love Eastland shoes and I love this style. The thing is, I only had these shoes for about two weeks when the soles split on both shoes at the same location....right at the ball of my foot. Rather than going through the hassle of returning the shoes, I continue to wear them periodically and they are still together. Other than the disappointment of the soles splitting, they are great shoes. If they had not held together the rating would have been a 1.
fits too tight in the toe, and flared out in the middle. returned them for a refund. Not what I expected at all..
Love the shoe .. comfy and cool .. but .. no so happy with the color .. if I bought again, I'd chose a different color .. but to each their own I guess

Unlike almost every person who reads this review or buys this style of Reebok, I am limited in my choices. Because of childhood polio, my feet are extremely small (4.5-5)and I wear braces on both feet. The Reebok Classic is the only shoe we have been able to find that has a solid bottom or sole. This allows my shoe repairman to add an inch lift to the bottom and a wedge. I am very fortunate that the times we live in are such that the sight of someone in the grocery store in "sneakers" is an unremarkable event. It also helps that I live in So. Calif. where casual dress is the standard. I am not really as pathetic as I sound, I actually own 3 pairs of the Classic Nylon Reebok, 1 pair of black leather extra depth shoes and a pair of light tan extra depth. That's it!! I consider Sarah Jessica Parker to be a goddess.

Shoes are Great! When you buy make your order for a smaller size. I ordered size 11 and they are plenty long enough. You should order at least 1/2 size smaller. Overall shoes are just like you'd expect from Converse.
This is my second pair, the first are wearing like iron and I wanted to make sure I could replace them.
I love these shoes. They are very comfortable, and people compliment me about these shoes all the time.

The shoes that I ordered fit great. I have yet to play indoor (or any) soccer in them but I'd imagine they work great because they are reminiscent of martial arts shoes, which is what I use them for. There is one thing, these shoes are pretty squeaky once you break them in so don't expect to be a ninja wearing them.

They were narrow, like European Shoes. Buy a wider width and a half-size larger. If you have a high instep, do not buy these. They are well made but not for me. I had no trouble returning them. The vendor was fine.
You can't bet Minnetonka shoes for comfort... the company has been well known forever for this! Also, this color (sort of a muted blue/gray) goes so well with jeans, too!

I do not find these walking boots to be comfortable, as advertised. They look good, but they hurt my feet. I would like to return them, but I have worn them four or five times, thinking I would "break them in" and they would become comfortable. Hasn't worked so far.
Exactly as was expected, good very durable shoes. Very clean and wearable. Would definitely purchase again, nice to wear out.

I got these shoes just in time for the trip to Universal Studio. They were very comfortable and was a perfect fit. I love them and would order another pair at a heartbeat. The price is great ($29.89) even with the extra delivery charge, it's well worthed.
Received the promptly ,they are made very well .This is my second pair and just love the way they fit .
I love, love, love these sandals, they are the most comfortable sandals I have ever worn. Wish I could find them in more colors!

I was reluctant to buy another pair of Crocs since the ones I have are the original bulky style. I was looking for a very comfortable pair of walking shoes that I could wear with pants and skirts and dresses while traveling. I was not disappointed. These Mary Jane Crocs are diminutive yet very comfortable.
These were a replacement to the last pair I had for 12 years. They may be pricey, but you sure get your money's worth out of them. I'm saving up to get them in black too!
I can't even tell you how happy I am with my new crocs. The most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. Not really the best looking, but definitely the most comfortable.

I saw these navy blue w/white polka dot shoes online, and loved them!! They are super cute, and look great on my foot! The wedge woven part looks well constructed, but I was somewhat surprised about the material of the upper part - I didn't think that it would be as silky shiny as it is. Regardless - still cute!!They are, however, not very comfortable. They only seem to come in 8.5 & 9.5 - no 9?? I got the 8.5 & they seem to be a snug fit, but the heel keeps slipping off when I walk. I end up walking awkwardly to keep these on my feet. I am hoping that they mold to my feet a little better, and I will continue to wear them, but will plan for occasions that involve little walking.

Right out of the box, these are the most comfortable walkers I've ever had. I have arthritis in my knees and these shoes help to stabilize my stride so I can walk farther without pain. I will definitely buy more of these so I can have a pair in each color.
These shoes fit great and look cool. They were shipped on time and looked exactly as described. My son's friends complimented him on his new shoes!
These are comfortable and easy to slip on. These will also be good for surgery
I like the retro style of these shoes, very well made and a decent price. I wish the tongue of the show was wider and did not slide around as much.
I received the shoes quickly and was pleasantly suprised with the product. My husband loves them so much I'm going to get myself a pair!

I indicated "item NOT described by the seller" because the sizing seems to be off. I've worn a 10 1/2 narrow for over 40 years. I've never had a "fit" problem until now. The Ariat's seemed to be about two sizes too small. I could not even begin to get my foot into the boot.HOWEVER, the quality seemed fine; delivery was on time. It took only slightly over a week to get the refund to my credit card after shipping back the boots. I'm leery of trying to order another pair online since I am out the cost of the return shipment.
I love Capezio products! This shoe is well made and holding up great under constant wear. The shoe size was right on the money.

Well, ten dollar shoes. Great price. I love how everyone is complaining about how they are 1 size smaller than what they say.Actually you're WRONG. Asics is a company based in Kobe. If you looked at the seller's size charts, you would have clearly seen the international size chart.So it was more of your error for not selecting the correct size. So please, don't complain about the Flat. These reviews are about the QUALITY of the item...not about how it wasn't what you ordered. They gave you exactly what you wanted.So people, look at the size chart. <3
umm..these sandals are comfortable but kind of big..I selected the right size but it was kind of big..but it's not too bad. overall, good quality and comfortable :)

I'm what I like to call, "hard to fit" when it comes to shoes. I have a wide foot and can wear anything from a size 9 to a size 10.5, depending on how the shoe is made and what sort of shoe it is. For example- in sneakers, I tend to purchase a 9 to 9.5- again, depending on how the sneaker is made. If its heels, I purchase anywhere from a 9.5 to a 10.5, depending on the width of the toe and the height of the heel. It really just depends on the shoe. I relate all this to relate my experience with this particular pair of shoes.I purchased the size 10.5 W and they're an absolutely perfect fit. The inside lining is soft and nicely padded- super comfy! I'm wearing these shoes for a play that requires me to be on my feet almost continuously for several hours and I have yet to experience any foot fatigue.Since I am fairly tall, I wanted something with a teeny bit of heel for a feminine look, but not so tall that I tower over the man who plays opposite me in the show. These shoes have a perfect height heel for me.I would highly recommend these shoes to anyone who will be on their feet for long periods of time.*One little note to mention- as with most character/dancing shoes, the bottom is quite slippery. If you're not adding taps, you may want to consider adding some rubber traction panels to the bottoms.

My 2&1/2 year old daughter has a really wide foot. We purchased this shoe in a wide from the store, but it wasn't wide enough. It was easier to order the same size but in an extra-wide without having to rush out to the original store of purchase to exchange. She loves her sandals. They are very cute and comfortable. They are easy for her to put on by herself with the velcro closure. Because she likes to run and play, I thought protecting her little toes was important. Also, she can wear these with shorts as well as sundresses.
Do you have a Vans Old Skool Black White 7D(M) US ?Could you tell me on my e-mail?It's thiagomizuki@yahoo.com.br
These are the only sandals I wear. Have been ordering these for more than seven years....why buy anything else?
the sizing is about a 1/2 large even with thick wool socks. recently used during a mountain trip. over 2 ft of snow, 5 degree weather. kept feet dry and warm. at this point would recommend.

I am, and always have been a Chuck Taylor fan. I am a 39 yr old mom of 5 and at one point or another, someone in my home owns a pair. My 16 yr old son wanted a pair of hi-top Chuck Taylors for Christmas. The picture of the "unbleached" pair, looked white, so I purchased them. When the box arrived, I wrapped it and placed it under the tree. Can you imagine my disappointment (and most importantly, my son's), when he opened the box and inside there was a yellowish stained pair of Chuck's?DO NOT BUY This "unbleached" color unless you want a yellow pair of sneakers.For the first time, sizing was as issue, as well. Runs almost a whole size larger.
i bought this same boot for work last year and the damm boot this year...exact same boot ...is now shorter! not as high up the leg...but still vharging the same price.! so long sorel.
this is the third pair of the shoe that i am ordering...excellent shoe...great for casual wear and for athletics...extremely durable and looks great...one of the most comfortable shoes ive ever worn.
They are a great shoe and my granddaughter loves them. I got them in plenty of time to give them to her for her birthday.
I don't think that these shoes are original converse ,but in any case the quality is acceptable and they are true to size.It seems that one can not get original stuff these days.

I am so happy with my keds. They're my new go-to shows. I ordered a 7.5 (I normally wear somewhere between a 7 and 8) and while they fit, I think I would order a 7 if I were to purchase another pair. Stock up on no-show socks when you order them and enjoy!
These are the most comfortable timberlands my husband has ever had....He loves and wants another pair for work he said its worth it!!

Mom has special needs for her feet: wider feet now, needs a deeper toe area and needs back of slipper to cup the heal and not slip off when she walks. Also has a high instep so if slipper is not adjustable in that area she cannot get it on her foot. These slippers are perfect, ordered in the C/D width, plus they are very sturdy with a non-slip soul. She likes the rose color too. I have been searching for new slippers for her for months, thank you very much. We are both very pleased with this purchase.

These shoes need no breaking in. They are comfortable fromthe get-go. It is hard these days to find a pair of truly WHITE shoes.These fit the bill perfectly and are generic-looking enoughto go with any outfit. I originally ordered a pair for tap dancing.They were so comfortable to dance in that I ordered a pair for "street" shoesas well. Glad I did! (Remember to order one full size bigger than your regularshoe size when ordering these shoes.)
VERY fast shipping. I bought shoes as a gift and was sure that they wouldn't be delivered in time, but they made with days to spare! And the shoes looked lovely. Thanks so much! :)

Tengo estos zapatos desde hace mas de 4 años; los compre originalmente para cross training, y termine utilizandolos para casi todo, son comodos y duraderos. Una recomendación, verifiquen su talla en un vendedor local de Columbia.
Love the sandal. Great foot support. I have flat feet and have some arch problems and this sandal makes it possible for me to wear sandals, and not have aching feet, after wearing them.

MY HUSBAND WAS VERY PLEASED WITH THIS BOOT AND I WAS PLEASED WITH THE PRICE AND ALSO THAT THEY ACTUALLY FIT HIM. YEAH,,, HE IS HARD TO BUY SHOES FOR. SHIPPING WAS GOOD BUT HAD NO RETURN LABLE IN CASE THEY DIDN'T FIT JUST SO YOU KNOW. HOWEVER, I WAS THRILLED THAT WE DIDN'T NEED ONE. THANKS SO MUCH.. WE SAVED FIFTY DOLLARS ORDERING THESE FROM AMAZON.

The Bostonian Akron Oxford is my favorite dress shoe. They are very elegant and hold up well. It has a very nice leather sole as well. The price is more than many comparable brand but this is by far the best looking shoe for the price. You can't go wrong with these shoes!

I love flip flops but never had had any Tevas. Just in browsing, I discovered them and read the comments regarding the mush flip flops. Being curious, I ordered a pair. They were right, I love these and I'll always have a pair in my closet or on my feet from now on. These are wonderfully comfortable!

Definitely get one size smaller. My son usually takes a 15 and fit into a size 14 in the beeswax and they are solid without much give. Do not put protector on them as they already have a coating on them. Great boots!!!!
My wife loves these. They didn't break the bank and they are actually very comfortable (I know, I know... How do I know? I tried them on, I must admit!)
En cuanto a calidad y precio Converse cumple con lo ofrecido, excelente calidad, durable y a la moda. Dispone para todos los gustos, edades, sin distincion, siempre innovadora

I've worn these VANELi dress flats for years and have them in several colors...and highly recommend them for both comfort and quality. They are expensive, so I always wait for sales. However, the last few times I've ordered these shoes on sale from this store on Amazon, the shoes have felt like they are at least a half a size too small. Sadly, I've had to return them.

I gave this away as a gift. Slipper looks exactly as advertised but the company was Christies as in the pictures and not Slippers International, unless they are an affiliate? I was told the fleece is comfortable and warm. However the rubber sole is a bit heavy and I would not recommend it for an elderly person.

I purchased these in preparation of a hike up Mt. Leconte in Gatlinburg, TN. After breaking them in, they fit great. I didn't have a single problem the whole hike and look forward to using them for future hikes.

This very attractive little sandal would probably be very satisfactory, but it runs both short and narrow. It is not true to size by any means, so rather than return them, I gave them to a cousin with smaller feet. They were on sale. Now I know why.

I purchased these fro my brother who has terrible problems with his feet. These seem to be about the only footwear that he handle for an entire day. I recommend these to anyone who has foot comfort issues.

These were very nice, just what I was looking for, my gf loves reef flip-flops and swears by them! she loves this pair and weras them even in the winter :) shipping was very fast and the flips were in perfect condition

Hi, I'm from Colombia, it is the first time that I buy in Amazon and the product that I received was in conditions excelents, I'm very excited with the product !!! Timberland Men's Euro Hiker Boot,Grey/Grey,7 M US

These shoes were recommended by my manager at work. Since I have some pretty serious spine problems, and her husband does as well, he has been wearing these shoes for a long time, and he loves them. I figured why not, lets check them out. I ordered these in my normal size, even though some of the other reviews said to try a half size larger. I absolutely LOVE my Merrells. They are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. My toes do not get pinched, and my legs and feet are not sore and tired after a 9 hour shift in the store I work for. I can honestly say I will never buy another brand of shoes again, since Merrell makes all sorts of different styles of shoes and boots, even sandals!! Well worth the cost of the shoes, since they have very good tread, and I cannot imagine I would be walking through the soles on these in a matter of months, like I was doing with normal sneakers, even the most expensive of sneakers I would walk through the soles in 6 months or less.
These are the most comfortable boots I've ever worn. I have large calves, but these boots zip right up. They are very beautiful and I love wearing them.

We are now a Chuck Taylor family! Every one has a pair of these great sneakers and I highly recomend them to everyone! Great quality, and the fact that they come in pink for my little princess is priceless!
Like the height but they gave me blisters. It would have been better in the material was straight across instead of crossed so little toes don't get rubbed raw.

I ordered these shoes for my son who is a Crossfit Trainer. He wears a size 13 shoe so this is what I ordered. When the shoes arrived they were at least 2 sizes too large. My son said that they measured at least a size 14/15. I had to return them. So if you are ordered these remember that they run very large.
I love these shoes. However, I ordered the wrong size and exchanging them has been a hassle. It has been over a month and I do not have the shoes or the money and no one can seem to help me.

i've been kicking around my NYC classics for a few months now. one of my favorite shoes. one pair still fresh in the box in my closet. i've seen people buying them but have never seen anyone else sporting them cross my path.
....but my wife reports that it does not fil her foot very well. It is the smallest 5.5 shoe she has ever had....

Very comfortable. The "W" really does mean Wide. If you have wide feet, you know that first thought when trying on new shoes, "Oh, they,ll feel better when they've stretched a little." Not with these. They fit right away. They fit when I put them on and they still fit after they are broken in. Good quality. I like the shoes a lot, I just don't give 5 stars unless I find something amazing. I would certainly purchase another pair.

While slightly less polished than it appears in the picture, I've now owned this shoe for nearly four months, worn it to work on a near-daily basis, and it remains in great condition.Valuable information that I didn't see in the product description: the sole marks floors, so if you'd like to avoid streaking hardwood, tile, or linoleum wherever you walk, either pick up your feet or buy a different shoe!

Cons-Extremely Stiff-Way to narrow-Long soles (like short snow skis)-Heavy-Squeaks at the ankles.Pros-Very DurableEven after 3 years, these boots are still taxing to wear. However like many others, my partners on duty love these boots.
I am pleased with this shoe...however it isnot leather and I'm sure it was advertisedas such.Thanks,GW
Great shoes, order a size larger than you normally wear. Very warm and comfortable.

I've sworn by Adidas for years. Tennis shoes, trail runners, and basketball shoes. They always fit perfect and last forever...until I bought the T7 ATS Trail Shoe. My very first run yielded a small tear in the fragile mesh covering the toes. The very next run resulted in the sole of the shoe beginning to peal off near the ball of the foot. I was shocked. I've been able to stop the damage, at least temporarily, with shoe goo, but I have a pair of Adidas Estes trail runners almost 10 years old that have needed no mending. I've put them through the paces in Africa twice and back to Colorado. I may put these new T7's out to pasture and go back to my old ones. Don't buy these. They look good but may tear from looking at them too hard.
this is the third pair of the shoe that i am ordering...excellent shoe...great for casual wear and for athletics...extremely durable and looks great...one of the most comfortable shoes ive ever worn.
Bought these shoes for my teenage son.He loves them - still wearing them after two years.The great part of Vans is that the size is consistent around the world.

These are the best shoes I have ever worn in any sport. I play senior "over 50" slow pitch softball and the cushion in these are gentle on old knees. Several ladies on the team bought them and all rave about them.
I needed shoes for a burlesque dance class. Many people recommended capezio. These shoes are lightweight, comfortable and true to size. Highly recommended
Love the shoe! It's kinda retro but it feels great. Exceeds my expectations. What more can I say? It's a Reebok!
Please see my full review on the other location for this item. Fit great but sure didnt last as long as my old durashocks.

First of all these shoes look awesome. I got them for about 22 dollars and they were perfect. Shipped on time and packaging was excellent. Also they are light and thin but they are meant to be so for running purposes. Also they are very very strong on the bottom as in their sole so they will hold up for awhile. Also I use them for running only every now and then and they look great enough to where you can wear them as sneakers. This is because the spikes on the bottom are removable, comes with a handy tool for it.
I would be very greatful if u can let me know if the white chucks is one size bigger then nornal sizing cause I didnt see the remarks like on the black ones.Thanks
Keds are good quality and very comortable. These will last a long time. They have good width and arch support.
My daughter likes them. They fit well. Her dance teacher was excited, as she thinks this is a quality brand ballet shoe.

My orginal order was too big, however the instructions on how to reorder and ship back so as to maintain the free shipping offer were very clear and concise. The new pair arrived very quickly and were exactly as expected.
Terrifically comfortable shoes. I wear mine to work in the office. (I am a physician in private practice.)

I love the look and durability of Timberland boots. I wear them to work every night, but these boots ran very narrow and they hurt my feet. However, if you aren't going to wear them for 8 hrs. I think they would be OK.

usually reef products are a bit more comfortable than this, but they're okay. i basically just needed white flip flops to wear for dancing at my wedding reception. i couldn't find any at a store, especially since i like ones w/ fabric straps (not plastic). these fit the bill - they aren't anything special, but they get the job done.
Excellent quality shoes, very fast shipping and great price. As fast as children grow, this is a wonderful place to buy dance shoes.

The black version of the Itasca SeaRay Slides arrived on time and in a box. They fit and are moderately comfortable. For the $30 or so shipped, they are about what i would expect. But, these are not some deeply discounted irregulars or end of line, though they may actually be. The are worth the $24.99. The smell of rubber was dominant when i opened up the box. there is no more than a flat piece of thin material separating the rubber from the removable insert. They are light and do fit comfortably but do not , by any means compare to the other higher line mocs that happen to go on some drastic sale and if i am lucky enough to find my size at the same time they go on sale-once every 3years. maybe. So, these seemed to be ok out of the box. i am wearing them and went for a walk without them breaking down and without getting any blisters. They do have a nice back for the achilles tendon and some foam in it with a center portion cut down for easier entry and removal, not much support but a nicer addition. there are elastic gores on each side with very little stretch to them but fine. my size was on target.the only real issue was that these were no way first quality or regular. there are glue spots all over the toe and fronts of both shoes. not little ones but sizable and 4 on one shoe and a couple on the other. they do not come off. At first , i thought it was only dust from shipping or a shelf storage. only it didnt come off with a light brushing nor with some water on a cloth. For me, it isnt a big deal because i always spill something i am cooking on my new shoes the first time i wear them anyway. I cant help it, always have, I used to cook for a living and now for amusement so am used to having a couple of oil spots on everything. Some people might be put off by the glue drips. I dont really mind but would normally want to be the one who gets the first spots or stains on my shoes (or shirts) thinking that this time I will keep them in perfect shape for more than a day.For the price i paid ,no problem, had i paid the 'full price' listed on the screen of $60, i would have returned them today-the day i got them.

The shoe size is NOT equivalent to a street shoe size. The Plie I sizing is much smaller than your street shoe. I have worn an 8.5 shoe (trainer/sneaker, dress heel, boot) for as many years as I have been an adult, and I cannot fully get the ball of my foot into my 8.5 Plie I's. I have to sell them as a consequence. I don't know who decided that these are a street shoe size match, but they are delusional!!

I have been buying these for years under HURON from HUSHPUPPIES but they are no longer available? They would last for years and I wear them all day in and outside. The only reason to replace them was when they got wet too often they eventually lose some of the look they had. Why so many colors listed and only one available all the time?Now AI pourchased a first pair of Minnetonka this year and a second pair already 7 months later. This products is definately not worth the money! Please make sure this complaint reaches the manufacturer! Wish former product would come back on the market! Ties never stay tied and I had to tie them tight to hold the shoe on all the time!DEFINATELY DO NOT RECCOMMEND THIS PRODUCT and I never write these kind of reviews but this was called for!

Love my Docs. Most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. This is my 4th pair - I tried a pair with the thinner out-soles, but they "sprung a leak" (I did wear the heck out of them though...), so now I'm back to the big, thick, traditional Dr. Marten soles.
They are about half a size small. So if you are a 7.5 you need to order 8 or even 8.5. Not really comprable to finer designer shoes but not extremely bad.
These shoes were shipped quickly, and were exactly as described. My son is thrilled with them. Thanks!

Just buy them!!! Thyre used by the most ellegant players in the world. Their rubber outsole improves grip on every surface, and their frontal and lateral mesh surface lets the air flow. Plus, they wigh only 10.2 grs.

I've owned about 7 pairs of KC shoes and I've always gotten size 7.5M. When these shoes came, they were quite larger than the size 7.5 KC boots I was wearing. Amazon has a great return policy. I was able to return these in the same package - no charge to me. I only had to drop them off at a UPS Store, which was on my way home from work. They sent me a size 7M pair in just a 2 day turn around (before receiving the pair I returned). Thanks Amazon!As for the shoe - very nice style, can be worn with a suit (they are very shiny, borderline patent leather - so if you prefer a matted finish or dull finish - avoid these shoes), or even with some khaki's or denim. The insole is very comfy and not too soft. I do walk quite a bit and so far they walk well, but they do have a large heel, which I don't mind since I only stand 61". Overall, a great pair of shoes for this price. My only gripe would be that the sole itself is made of rubber, so once it wears down the shoes become unusable as you can't replace the heel, but if they hold out for at least 2 years I'll be a happy camper.

This shoe looks great with various outfits, including shorts, skirts & capris. Not true to size. I ordered a 7W but shoe fits like a medium width. Very rare for LifeStride shoes, most wide widths fit perfectly.
quick response, fast delivery, great shoes for just about any outfit.

I've bought several pair thongs over the years but keep coming back to these. as the description says, very feminine look...no clunkiness. I have no problems wearing them with skirts, capris, skinny jeans...they work with everything!can't leave out that they are so comfortable and sturdy as well..

I wouldn't have picked these up had my sister not told me her friend had purchased one in every color. When I put them on, I was sold. They are very, very comfortable!! The toe box is wide and the proportions are generous, so be sure to order a half size down from your regular size.

I can't give a five-star or other rating until I actually use the product and see how it holds up. But so far so good. The boots look good and they fit. Some reviewers have complained that the boots are too small. I wear a 10 and 1/2 shoe and bought the XL. They ARE snug, to be sure. But if I take a plastic shopping bag such as you would receive from a grocery store and put my shoe (with foot inserted) into the bag and then into the boot, the fit is fine.
Although they were too tight around the ankles for me, they were well made and thick. Would have been perfect in the cold and snow.

I've never been much of one for fancy shoes. Sure, I love the way they look, but I end up wearing them once, then stowing them to the ever-growing stash in the bottom of my closet.When I bought this shoe in the blushing bride/heather color last fall from a catalog, I expected another candidate for that stack in my closet. A shoe with the playful, sporty, yet somehow feminine details of this one simply isn't practical...right?Then they came and I tried them on.I hate to admit it, but I am now a Puma athletic shoe addict. Every pair is sporty and trendy, yet has a classical styling that is somehow sophisticated and traditional. They work for me because they're pracitcal enough to go running in, but stylish enough to wear with jeans or a sporty minidress.There's not much else to say. These are the most comfortable cute shoes I've ever had, plain and simple. They are, by far, the most versatile shoes I've ever owned. BUY THEM!
I needed to replace shoelaces in a 5-eyelet child's shoe -- the 45" laces were perfect -- enough length for double knots.

Soooo comfortable!!! I love wearing these shoes. They are stylish, comfortable, easy to clean, and most important you don't have to be bothered with annoying laces...just slip them on!! I find that Skechers run on the big side so I would recommend you order at least a half size smaller than you normally would.

These skechers are a great way to look good while exercising! They were true to size. Two small problems I have are: they are a little skinny (so if your foot tends to be wide, I wouldn't recommend), and the back of the shoe comes a little too high up the back of my foot. This doesn't bother me, but I can see how it might rub and bother some people.
I love my new crocs! They fit really well also! I honestly have not taken them off since I got them!

These boots are super cute. I actually purchased them for a Halloween costume. Because I have small feet and wide calves, I thought the lace-up feature would help. It does help, however the tongue is too small so it looks weird. I think they're my best option, so I'll take them to a shoe-repair place to have a wider tongue and longer laces put on. From what I could tell, they felt fairly comfortable in the foot though.

I received these 2 days ago and as I have worn boots for a long time I know there is a break in period, but honstly I would rather walk barefoot on concrete. The sole is so hard that it sends pain up through your feet half way up your calf. I bought a pair of gel inserts today and that has helped some. I gave them 3 stars because they seem to be of decent quality materials and well made even though they are made in China. They are quite comfortable when not walking I guess thats why they call them trucker boots, if you don't have to walk much you should be fine.
This is my fourth set of Hi Tec boots. They are the only shoe I own that never hurt my feet. They are made well and last.

Shoes arrived, but wrong size. Do NOT use the sizing info next to the size selection. It shows a US size 10 as a Euro 27 (which I ordered), but the seller uses a different sizing chart and sent a Euro 28 which, according to the sizing info on the website, is a US size 11.
Nice-looking shoe, but too expensive. For big foot guys like me, makes your feet look a lot smaller.

These are very nice shoes, but the site showed them available in a triplewide but what was shipped was a double wide. So, they were too small for my mother-in-law to wear. This was real frustrating because she has such a hard time finding shoes that fit and my husband spent quite a bit of time shopping on the internet. They were sure they had found an answer when they ordered these sandals. We got our refund (minus shipping) and that's all good, but we wish the shoes had been what they were represented to be in the beginning!

My wife, like many women has a closet full of shoes that are too tight, too loose or have some other distracting feature that will almost eliminate their being worn. These sandals, however are and have been her favorites for a very long time. So long that they finally wore out and these were their replacements. Having peripheral neuropathy, my wife needs all the footwear comfort she can muster up. While these sandals are not exactly for dress wear they fully meet her everyday needs. Guess we had better order out more as i`m afraid they may stop making them and then we will be "up the creek with no paddle".

These are so comfy. I bought the mustard color b/c my 11 yo son took over my brown Gap flip flops. I picked a color that boys wouldn't want, so he wouldn't adopt them. ;)They feel fabulous on. I'm tempted to come back and buy all the girly colors.

you will enjoy these puppies - good construction throughout. not OVERLY tickled in the color, but it is OK for the OTHER pair of hikers (to give the main ones a break). this may be only MY foot, but the right side tends to have a permanent shift to the left side of the insole during use: this is NOT uncomfortable in the least - just LOOKS a wee bit funky LOL overall though, def worth the price paid - no doubt

My orginal order was too big, however the instructions on how to reorder and ship back so as to maintain the free shipping offer were very clear and concise. The new pair arrived very quickly and were exactly as expected.

This shoe looks great with various outfits, including shorts, skirts & capris. Not true to size. I ordered a 7W but shoe fits like a medium width. Very rare for LifeStride shoes, most wide widths fit perfectly.
Man, This Shoes are so confortable. The only bad thing is that there just are in black and white.

LOVE Uggs. I don't care if they're nicknamed "Ugg-ly", they're meant to keep your feet nice and warm. Plus they're sooo comfy. Make sure you order 1/2 size less than your normal. (So if you wear 6.5, get 6) I got the black ones for $[...] shipped with no tax! =) Super happy.

This is an all-around great pair of wrestling shoes! I train MMA a little bit and with some of the drills the mats basically shave off the skin on my feet and I used to get blisters too! With these I get great grip and protection for my feet and if you tie them up correctly then you get good ankle support too.One thing, keep off of carpet while wearing them. Pet hair and lint sticks to the bottom like glue (the bottom is rubber in some areas) and therefore reduces traction until you clean them off (lick your finger and rub the rubber and it takes the dirt off).They are very comfortable too, and I have big feet so it's hard to find comfy shoes. I'd wear these everywhere if they didnt wet through so bad in rain and snow.

I ordered this shoe in white, I was very skeptical because of the price, but I was not disappointed, they were comfortable I loved them they set my black bubble dress off, I got tons of compliments. LOVE these shoes I will be ordering 2 more pair of them the red and the black

It is unfortunate. After wearing the shoes for a week, the shoe gives a black mark on top of my daughter's right foot because the flap is too hard and long for her. Since she have already wore them for a few days... I am reluctant to ask for a refund.

I got these sneakers for my husband after months of searching in stores. New Balance must not make them too much anymore. Anyway, our entire family owned a pair at one point and we must say it is by far the most comfortable, lightweight sneakers we have ever worn. Considering the price and comfort it is an excellent deal.

I'm a big fan of these. They're comfortable enough to walk around all day in, and sturdy enough to hold up to moderate wear and tear. The only thing that's a bit disappointing is that the tread and insole seem to break down quickly.

At first was worried about fit, but as I tried it on it was amazingly great snug fit. Needed a great price shoes for working out and these shoes will do the job since it is a flat shoe that will work great for it.

I got the black Women's size 7 tap shoes and they look nice. The heel was just the right height, but no taps included?! They weren't put on the shoes nor were they included in the box. This is weird. Now I notice that the photo in amazon featured just the shoes with no taps. I should've been more observant! Now I have to purchase the taps from a specialty dance store and go to a shoe repair shop to have the taps put on professionally. Beware.

So I decided to still give this product a try despite the reviews saying that the sizing is way off. I measured my daughter's feet carefully like one reviewer suggested. Her foot measures a little less than 6", which would be between size 8 and 8.5. I went ahead and ordered her a size 9 and it still didn't fit!! The problem lies in the company stated shoe size vs the sizing info provided by Amazon. The shoes itself only measure 5.75" which is not what the sizing info states for size 9. Her big toes are curled up inside. So now, we have to return the item and pay for shipping because according to Amazon, it's not their fault. Really cute shoes, but yeah, the sizing is like playing roulette, you never know what you would get!

This company was excellent to deal with. When we received the shoes, they didn't fit properly. Exchanging them was a breeze and another size was promptly sent to us at no extra charge to us. Very efficient.
I've been wearing these for years. They are the most comfortable, long lasting sneakers I have ever owned. I like the slim line to these. I don't care much for the big bulky looking ones.

I bought these boots for my 8 year old son and am very pleased with them. he's had them for a month now and they're still in pretty good shape and that's saying something because he's very hard on shoes.
Very comfortable for my narrow foot. Will buy in other colors. Had more style than others I have found in stores
These shoes were a Christmas gift for my granddaughter and she loves them.. She says they are very comfortable and snazzy.When these Converse shoes wear out, she will purchase another pair.
Converse's are classic. they are the shoes people are always going to wear. i like the high tops better though

I have lots and lots of problems wearing shoes. I find many women's shoes too constraining and tight, and have had various problems with my feet over the years that seem to just boggle the podiatrist. Putting me in orthotics seemed to make things much worse, as did just about any arch insert or other things inserted into the shoe. Most sneakers become almost unbearable to wear after several hours, and over time I've found that a light shoe with basic support worked best for me. I'd had good luck with some other easy spirit shoes so gave this one a try. And it is really amazing how comfortable this shoe is for me. It's so rare that a shoe fits and is comfortable without a serious break-in period, but this particular style just works that way for me, and I just hope they never discontinue it! I've tried a few other Easy Spirit shoes, even some walking shoes that look very similar but they just never seem to be as comfortable as this one. It definitely would not be the choice for someone who needs a lot of arch support and a really solid sidewall, but if you like very light shoes, this is an excellent one to try.

Been wearing converse for years; great shoes, came just as promised in the picture and description. Cheaper, even with the shipping expenses, then in the stores where you can find all black chucks. Shoes packaged very well; shipping was ridiculously fast, had it in two days; great amazon experience!
A great basic flip flop, goes with anything but can be more than just super casusal!

I love this flip flop! It's sooo comfortable and has some arch support. Size was true to form. I highly recommend buying a pair! The only thing that I didn't like is that I got the brown flip flop with the white thong, and the white is getting noticeably dirty. I will definitely be buying more!!!

THese sandals met all my expectations. I purchased these for my mother-in-law who had worn out this exact style of shoe. She had not been able to find them in a store and was thrilled to have them replaced.
My sons 1st pair of pre-school shoes. Very Dapper!! He looks like a big boy!!
This show is so comfortable and looks great with anything. Light weight with clean lines. No need to wear them in. They are instantly comfortable.

I've gone through three pairs of these shoes in the last decade. Yes! Ten years! I'm about to turn 29 years old and got my first pair at the end of high-school from a friend. The second pair is still with me and has worn all the way through the sole but they are still comfortable and very wearable. IMHO there isn't a better casual styled shoe out there in terms of comfort, retro style and look.I will admit that I have fairly flat feet, and the slight lack of support might be part of what makes these a little more comfortable for me.In my opinion, for fifty bucks or less depending on where you buy them, getting three to four years out of a pair of shoes is simply awesome. And I don't own a bunch of shoes I wear these every day!
I had never tried this brand before but I got them while they were on sale and I love them.. The quality is awesome.. I keep watching for other styles of them to go on sale.

I ordered my boots because they sounded great. I am not disappointed,they are great right out of the box.Fit well except the tongue is very short and could fit better around the ankle more. My order was delayed because of the snow but i am happy to finally be wearing them. Thank you very much for selling these fine and affordable boots. P.S I will spread the word to all the people i know who want happy feet. signed Mark Berglund
I love Keds and they're always true to size, so nice to know I can order them here. I'll likely order more.

I wear 8.5 to size 9. 9's were an entire size too small. They don't issue exchanges, by the time I would return them I'd lose half of what I'd paid in shipping costs, deducted and what I'd have to pay to return. They feel pretty flimsy also!

I bought these crocs size 2XL 12/13. I wear size 13 2E and they feel rather tight. My toes are punching out the front holes of these clogs. I had the crocs chinese imitation size 13 and they feel more comfortable than the originals.Please be warned that these crocs are smaller than the one that came before.I think I should have bought the crocs baya or clasic as they come in whole sizes rather than a range of sizes. My foot always end up at the larger end of the range.
Expensive shoes, I was really excited about it but got a little dissapointed with it, quality little low, materials seems to be cheap

I puchased a pair of these for a 16 mile hiking trip. out of the box, no joke, these were(are) the most comfortable pieces of footwear i have ever had on my feet. as for the water proof part, i have found these boots are superior! during my hike it rained overnight and the next morning hiking through mud and rain my feet stayed completely dry. i also purchased another pair of these for work and daily wear because they are so comfortable, and part of my job as an auto-body technician is detailing a car after it is painted for customer pick-up. the drain in the shop at work is very poor, and during washing a car, u find yourself standing in a 2 inch puddle of water and my feet stay dry all day in these boots.i would also like to add that your feet stay warm in these boots. i usually wear normal socks, but when i go hiking or camping i wear warm thick socks. either way your feet stay warm
NOTHING CAN EVER TAKE THE PLACE OF A TRIED & TRUE PAIR OF CHUCK TAYLOR ALL-STARS. (WE CALLED THEM BO-BOS IN THE 70'S)
Product was just as advertised. Only concern was that I did not receive a tracking number so I had no idea when exactly it would arrive. Other than that, great seller =)
The quality was what I expected from a Clarks product, but disappointed that it was at least one size too big.

I purchased these shoes for my daughter to start school this fall. I got them on an excellent sale for only $15.00. After receiving them, I would have gladly paid the retail price based on the quality and durability of these shoes. You can't go wrong with Stride Right brand shoes anyway.

This very attractive little sandal would probably be very satisfactory, but it runs both short and narrow. It is not true to size by any means, so rather than return them, I gave them to a cousin with smaller feet. They were on sale. Now I know why.
This shoe provides excellent stability. It's very comfortable and roomy enough for orthotics, but it is quite heavy and clunky looking.

I was desperately trying to find a pair of crocs for my grandson after a major order mess-up from the Crocs website. That is how I found this seller on Amazon. This seller was fast, efficient and reasonably priced. They also had a huge inventory of shoes in all colors and sizes. I would highly recommend this seller and would never hesitate to order from them again. My order was received within 4 days. Awesome timing.
I absolutely wore my other pair out. I have wide,high arch feet and hard to fit.These are great walking shoes
I got these shoes really fast and hate taking them off. They are comfortable and sleek. I have to keep them cleaned, but I still think it is worth it. I wear them every chance I get.

I took a chance and purchased these as a Christmas gift. When I bought them I was not 100% sure they were real UGGs or not. When I contacted UGG they told me this company is not an authorized dealer and cautioned me that these might be knock-offs. When they arrived I noticed that these boots were made in China. I found that there are several dealers selling a lot of these on the internet and they are shipped from China. According to UGG and other sources (Norton for one)they are selling counterfeit boots. Bottom line is that so far these appear to be of good quality but I am still unsure if they are the real deal or knock-offs that are over priced.

Bought these for my boyfriend. He LOVES them. They are very sturdy and the leather is thick enough not to tear or anything. He uses them as hiking boots. This item was a gift. It was received in time for Christmas 2011. received in great condition. The shoes are super comfortable and very stylish. Great buy! 2 thumbs up!

Granted, at first glance one may not be too impressed with the looks of these shoes. I was one of these people. However, on a trip to Maine, I needed a pair of shoes that would serve well on land as well as in the water on trails and on the oceans. That being said, I discovered the true toughness and comfort of these shoes. I even hiked up a 3,000 foot mountain in these things and they still exhibit modest wear on the soles and around the entire shoe. This was extremely rocky and rugged terrain to boot and would not advise this as the primary terrain to tackle with Crocs.SIZINGI am a true 10.5 in mens. However, 10 was definitely too small and uncomfortable for me, so I bought size 11 since there are no half sizes. From this discovery, it is safe to say that Crocs are pretty true to size. 11s are a little big on me, but the strap still locks my foot in place and it does not feel like my foot is coming out of the shoe if I am not using the strap. The foam material Crocs are made from grips your feet pretty well, even when wet or sweaty.COMFORTThere are not many shoes, even shoes I've spent over $100, that can match Crocs in comfort. I could wear these shoes all day and my feet would not hurt or blister while on the trails. On a regular day out, same story. For summer, they are great because air is constantly able to flow through and cool your feet. When they get wet, I mean completely soaked, they usually will dry off within about 5 minutes.STYLEThese are really not as ugly as people think. Once you wear them and get them on, they really start to grow on you both on how they look and how they feel. People who say they hate these shoes are those who have never put a pair on and worn them (I was one of these people). As far as colors go, white and lighter colors seem like they will definitely get dirty easily. I have black and they are easy to clean of, just a rinse and rub down with a rag.The main thing is people just have to have an open mind when purchasing this style of footwear. They are a little unorthodox but they are high quality, functional, and as bad looking as people think. They are so easy just to slip on and they are featherweight and easy to walk in. I use them a lot for just getting the mail or going to the gym before I put my gym shoes on. I have been pleasently surprised with Crocs' resilience and highly recommend these bad boys.
This pair of slide looks great on the website. However, it hurt my feet after I walked with it for 30 minutes.

i have a pair of light pink keds that i've had for 10+ years. when my 17 year old daughter said keds are cool again, i decided to get a pair of red. buying from amazon i saved a bunch, and they still fit and look the same quality as my originals. i love them!
I love the all black - so far they fit well. We will have to see how they wear in the long run but chucks are usually durable

I'm on my feet more than 8 hours a day and these are the most comfortable shoes I have ever had. I also suffer from a plantar fibroma and these shoes really help to relieve the pressure and discomfort from it. This is my second pair, my first lasted over a year so they hold up really well too!

I was very pleased to get these shoes, they're very iconic no matter where you go and look great with just about any casual outfit. But after about 10 months of having these, rips between the rubber parts of the shoe and the cloth began to seperate. I'm not sure whether this is due to how my feet fit within the shoe. After trying to fix the seams myself, the shoes soon began to just fall apart really and just became really unwearable. If they were cheaper I would consider getting a second pair and maybe another different pair of shoes along with them. Overall they're still nice shoes, but they may need to be pampered somewhat for them to last a long time.
these flip flops are pretty comfortable but hurt a little between the toes after a few hours. i like the tread, wish they came in white.

The Adidas Copa Mundial (Copa Mundial means World Cup in Spanish) initially came out in 1979, but was designed for the 1982 FIFA World Cup games in Spain. I purchased my first pair of Copas two decades ago for $60. Although the Copas have increased in price and have slightly changed since that time, I continue to wear this shoe for a number of reasons. The 100% kangaroo leather upper is extremely comfortable and soft. I suggest buying the shoe a little snug and allowing the thin leather to stretch and mold to your foot. I also like the classic and humble look of the shoe. These shoes don't draw attention to you like a lot of the ugly shoes on the market do today. They do allow you to use your skills to help your team to the best of your abilities. It should be noted that two years ago Adidas came out with a 25th anniversary package for the Copas. The limited-edition package included a bunch of extras (wooden shoe trees, a key chain, etc.) that I do not think are needed.
Really great shoes. My husband loves them. Very comfortable and lightweight shoes.

I ordered the Mimosa sandal in 7E Camel. It is true to size and comfortable. I love the style, looks dressy even as a low heel. The footpad inside is man-made material, but with stockings it is comfortable. Too bad the footpad isn't microfiber or something like that.

The style of this shoe is exactly what I was looking for. However, the size I ordered was too small and unfortunately it was not available in the size needed, so I had to return it and couldn't get another. Otherwise, I definitely would have kept it.

These are extremely good sneakers! I bought a brand new pair of black womens Keds Champion sneakers at a Sal. Army store I frequent quite a bit for only 4 dollars. These are great basic shoes. An older relative saw them and said they wore them during jr. high school in the 1950s as part of their gym uniform. I prefer these classic everyday shoes over something with more padding and more modern. These are very flexable shoes, the laces are better than other brands. These sell for around $30 generally. For that price I feel that makes them one of the most affordable shoes on the market. If you like old school Converse, Jack Purcell, Vans then I think you'll be very happy to own these classic shoes. A lot of the skateboard companies make copies of these and classic Vans. Just go with the originals! If I could afforf it I'd own 10 pairs but am thinking about buy 2 more pair right now. The other styles Keds now makes look great as well. If you happen to go to thrift stores check out the womens footwear. I find lots of Keds there and scored another new pair for $5 about 2 weeks after finding these.These shoes feel right and work well for all activities. No downsides to these that I can see. 5 stars!!

These are good shoes that will save your feet lots of trouble. They will accommodate inserts such as orthotics if you need to use them. They do not, as the copywriter suggests, "feel like going barefoot" -- they are a bit warm in summer as closed leather shoes tend to be. They are well made and give your foot plenty of support where it is needed. You'll notice they mostly come in colors suitable for nurses, but I am not a nurse, so I wear the black ones and sometimes children see my feet in bathroom stalls and think a man is there! What I'm trying to say is, while these shoes look quite respectable, they are not very feminine. However, if you get foot problems from less structured shoes as I did, these are great.

I have been chasing grouse, pheasant and quail (when we used to have them) all over Missouri, Kansas, Iowa and South Dakota for 30 years. I have had numerous boots over the years, Red Wing, Cabela's Kangaroo, Rocky, Irish Setter,etc. I have had some good ones but nothing compares to this Danner boot. I wanted something that wouldn't take long to break in and I preferred something made in America. I got both with this boot. They felt like a 10 year old boot the first time I wore them .... that's a good thing. Pretty pricey but I don't jack around when it comes to my feet.

This has been a difficult winter of ice and snow here in rural Connecticut and for older persons such as myself whose balance is not always the best, and for whom falling is no fun, these are a godsend. You can walk on ice and snow just like they were nornal surfaces. The flip side is don't wear them inside. Walking on a smooth floor in Yak Trax is like walking on ice without Yak Trax. They may seem a bit had to put on at first, but with experience is easier than putting on rubbers. They can eventually wear out or break, but that is the nature of elasticized materials. The walkers are good for normal use in ice and snow, but probably serious hikers would have to upgrade to a higher level model.

This is the second pair of Altitude IV boots for me and I can't imagine a better hiking boot for my purposes. I hike hilly, wooded areas daily and wear these boots throughout the year. My previous pair lasted three years and the only problem is the lining of the heel wore out. They are now my work boots.They look good and lace up well. Break in is immediate. The only thing that concerns me is that Hi-Tec might stop making them by the time I need another pair.

I must admit they are not the most attractive - a little clunky, but the comfort is worth it. They run true to size. I am even able to fit them with my store bought orthotics. In fact, I am going to buy another pair to keep as an extra, just in case they decide to discontinue them. When I bought them last year they were much more expensive.Great shoes. The shoe looks great and is very comfortable. You can feel the support right away as you slip them on. Even while standing and stretching, I can feel the bounce in the "hole"ful sole. I've had these since October and I ran 10 to 20 miles a week since I've had them. They're still in good shape but in the past month or so (maybe at the 400 mile mark) my right heel has felt tender the day after a 3 to 4 mile run. My right knee also feels locked up as I finish up my run. I'm 6'0" and 195-200 lbs and I may be pounding my feet a little harder than the normal runner. I primarily run applying the interval training method (sprint-jog-sprint-jog...) so that may have something to do with it. I've also heard that getting the right pair of socks is also very crucial to a runner's comfort, not just the shoes. Surprise, huh?I bought this shoe when it was still priced at a full $125. FinishLine was having a promotion which I took advantage of and got it for $85 including shipping otherwise I'm not a fan of overpaying for products that perform the same as its lower-priced competitors. I'm a bit of a sneaker connoisseur so I know my kicks somewhat. My friend's orthopedist uncle has actually cut down the middle of running sneakers of a handful of the better known brands and has found that adidas are functionally better than Nikes but so is New Balance, Aasics, and Sauconys. Nike's are just damn expensive because they need to pay for Lebron's ad campaigns. I'm very intrigued to start running in Aasics and Sauconys but once I make the switch, I'll be excited to wear the Megabounces as casual shoes that I can wear around town.Like I said, they still look great!

I bought these from an eBay seller actually. They were advertised as being warm and comfortable. WHAT A JOKE! They don;t have a millimeter of insole, a MM of padding. Nothing. Its just a leather shell and thats it. Don't expect these to be anything as described. If you order a size 9 like I did, you get a shell thats about size 11. You have to wear 2 pairs of socks and have an insole. And they're real wide at the top. They look a litlte like clown shoes. A complete and total waste of time, money and effort. If I lived in an are that had real stores it wouldn't a problem. But shoe stores here in Pittsburgh have 1 pair each of smen's slippers. And they're usually that horrible moccasin thing. Gosh I've learned to hate them. So, I'm, stuck trying to find a decent pair on line. So far, no good. Don't buy slippers unless you can test them first.

these appear to be identical to another pair I bought from this company however this has zippers which can make it easier to take on and off. I'm not sure why but it says these are calf boots when they are the same length as knee high boots? is there a difference between the two? I thought calf boots came to the calf and knee boots came up to the knee. not much I can do about it now. and some thing else, it says leather but its a weird type of leather almost like leather you'd find on black sketchers or something. and that leather over time, bubbles up and tears off like plastics, not tradition combat leather, i.e. service boots. wonder how long these will last, time will tell I guess.

very good purchase for my daughter, she had a pair before and she wouldn't take them off unless she went to sleep so they worn out in almost 3 years, so i got this new pair for her for xmas, i'm sure she's gonna love them.perfect sizing and quality.

I ordered a size larger as recommended and it turned out to be too large for me. Half a size larger would have been better. The shoes feel comfortable, except that the sole of the shoes feels slippery. I was afraid I would slip and fall, so I returned the shoes.

I have about 4 pair currently in different colors. I've had foot surgery and have had a hard time finding a comfortable shoe. It is good for walking and I took them on a cruise last year. My feet never hurt with all the walking I did. Try them and you will be happy - and so will your feet.Easy Spirit Women's Traveltime Mule

Classic Vans. The style hasn't changed in more than 10 years. I've had mine since 2002 I dont skate so much but I love the style, this shoes was a little bit bigger but it's ok..good choise VANS OLD SCHOOL
I purchased these shoes a half size larger than I normally wear and found them still very tight. Toe area is quite narrow. Otherwise, well made and good height for dancing.
I am very pleased with these shoes. Only wish I could get them in white also. If available let me know
love them nice price The price was right and the shoe is great I wear them as a house shoe ...

I got this pair of Easy Spirit shoes to replace my previous pair of Easy Spirit lace-ups, which had been my favorite pair of casual shoes for the past 15-20 years (I know, hard to believe they lasted that long - Easy Spirit is a great brand!). My new brown leather lace-ups are well-made, stylish, and very comfortable. If you're looking for sharp-looking shoes that are easy on the feet for long periods of wear, I'd say go for these!

I have to say I got my Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Hi Top Custom Red with Santa men's 11 shoes in three days. Very fast service and the shoes were really nice. They were a good fit, I ordered a half size larger then what I wear because I wear a heavy sock and needed the extra room. I told some of my other Santa friends about these and they each got a pair too. We all wore them at our Santa school in Santa Claus, Indiana and were they ever a big hit with the other Santa's. Everything was sent as described and I will buy from again.

Definitely try on sizes before buying to get your proper size. I usually take an 8-8 1/2 in shoes/sandals, but in these, I take a 9 regular. I got these in the 8 wide, and although there is plenty of width & toe room, the heel was alittle too wide (sloppy, not "form-fitting") as I have a narrow heel. But, overall, the comfort-factor is FABULOUS & I am big into getting the most comfortable shoe/sandal I can find. You will get that in these sandals & the bonus is that they LOOK GOOD too! Although they may be pricey, the comfort, resoleability & durability more than makes up for it.

The shoes fits well. I've worn them nearly everyday for the past two years and they still perform well. The tread is showing slight wear at the edges. When I first wore them I noticed a strange clicking or squeaking sound in the left shoe as I walked. At first I thought there was a pebble stuck somewhere so I removed all the debris but the noise was still there. There might have been a defect in the construction.Despite the sound I like wearing these shoes. They are durable, not too heavy, and have an aesthetically pleasing design.
NB is the only sneaker I will buy. Love the look of this one and it is very confortable. Great colors too.
The quality and the outlook is good, but it's kind of longer at the tip of the shoes and make it loose when I walk.
I purchased this shoe for my 2 year old daughter. It is extra cute and extra durable. Best of all, I didn't even have to leave my home to get them! I am officially an amazon junkie!

I keep buying puma since I like their design and laceless models. I only wish these shoes lasted longer. I have around 6 weeks with them and the cloth sewing that covers the plastic structure around the ankle has been disintegrating. I calculate a product life of 6 months.As always, delivery and purchase experience was excellent.

I ordered these as bridesmaid bags for my upcoming wedding they are the perfect size and very durable material.The cost was perfect too given I have 5 bridesmaids. Doesn't sit flat without anything in it but that is ok.
I love these shoes! I didn't have too wait long. My hubby wants some too =)

The tongue has a piece of metal in it that presses down on your foot - really hurts after a while. The heel part made me bleed through my socks - I needed to line the whole inside with a silicone lining. Who wants to doctor shoes that much???!!!
Have been very happy with these shoes and haveordered them many times over the years.. The quality, as in everything it seems,is not as high as it once was, but still very good.

My sister always wore clogs like these and I thought they looked clunky. Then I saw more and more people wearing them. Finally someone said, "get these if you take up boating, so the water can drain right out." So I got some, even though we don't have a boat yet.I wear them around while gardening and park them by the back door when I come in. I don't have to worry about them getting wet.They are incredibly cushy and comfortable for walking. I don't even feel the gravel underfoot as I walk to the mailbox. The toe area is roomy enough for my wide foot and that's always been a struggle to find extra wide shoes to fit. They don't slip around.For me, the part that comes up over the arch of the foot could be cut a little more open. I have a high arch though, and it rubs a little there.They really are lightweight, so you don't feel like a clodhopper in them. Convenient to slip on and I'm really glad I finally gave in and got a pair.These are softer than Crocs and don't have the rigid bumps inside. I much prefer Sloggers.

The quality of these sandals are absolutely amazing. I wore them almost every day in the spring, summer, and fall for 3 years in all kinds of environments from the mall to the trails. During the winter, I wore them around the house and even occasionally outside on a quick run to the mailbox. About 10 months ago, I deployed to Iraq for 6-months and took them with me for going between my living quarters to the shower (everyday) over dusty, rocky, dirt areas... and they held up perfectly. After I returned, I kept on wearing them. I cannot express in words how good these Sandals are.They did eventually breakdown some (but no where near as fast as other sandals) and I ordered a second pair of these sandals from Amazon, which were just like my first.Other nice touches to this product include: the beer bottle opener built into the sole and the air cushion support which really helped my feet (I have high arches).This is a GOOD investment in footwear and I'd highly recommend these sandals to anyone who doesn't want to buy new sandals every year. I hope you buy them and enjoy... note that they will have a small break-in period.

bought them last year. sometimes he complains that they are too warm. i think the rubber on the bottom makes too much noise on my hardwood floors, then again, mine are suede bottoms. slick enough to practice tango in, thats a plus. he steps on the backs of them so i think they run small. they've been in the wash a few times and no wear and tear so far.

I bought these for a halloween costume, and even though I selected standard shipping, the cost didn't show up on the balance until I got the confirmation and the order had gone through--shipping cost as much as the shoes I thought I was getting at a discount!Also, though I used the conversion chart to get a women's size, they ended up being too small.

This is the sixth pair of Superstars I have purchased, and I probably will never purchase another brand or style. The arch support is phenomonal, which is surprising for a shoe that looks so flat. I wear them for both work and play and my feet are never disappointed, not to mention they are totally adorable in every color.

The Danner Super Rainforest boots are the longest lasting work boot I've ever owned. I'm a contractor that wears these boots over 200 days per year, and for the past 10 years these are my boot of choice. They can stand up to the rigors of contruction, and double as a good hunting boot. I normally get 3 yrs. wear out of a pair. I highly recommend them to anyone who wants a boot that won't fall apart under the pressures of the jobsite

These socks are for shoe size 12.5-5. My son is a size 5. I bought these for him for soccer. I think they will fit for another year, even if his foot grows. Currently, they fit over his shin guards and fold over below the knee about 2.5". If he grows, the fold will be smaller, but that's OK. I love how these came in a huge variety of colors, so I could get the color that matches the league jerseys. My son said, "They're fuzzy. I like that," when he put them on for the first time. I don't think they're fuzzier than other athletic socks, so I'm not sure what he meant. But, he's happy, so I'm happy. These are a great price for 3 pairs!

Worked out of the box, used them for a few days on the treadmill, but probably wasnt needed. I have been using them for the weekly Treks here at Mission Peaks in the Bay Area, CA, which has pretty good uphills. No complains so far.Rated 4 only for the fact that the heels could use a little more padding - the heel of the shoe is hard which is good for support but not too good when you are walking up-slope. Also have been wearing 2 socks for better grip and to provide more cushion for the heels.
Get about 1/2 size bigger than the actual shoe size. Quite comfortable. Got it for my 5 year old cousin and she loved it.

This boot has just the right amount of arch support (I have a "normal" arch), are "Made in America" and the heel is just the right height. Normally I wear a 11.5 D, but I chose an EE in 11.5 because it gave extra toe room and the heel still felt real good, but to snug up the heel just a bit more I put in some inexpensive "heel cups" now the heel fits like a D width but I have the toe room of an EE and it's like having the best of both worlds. When walking in them the feeling is one of stability and comfort with little lateral movement. While these are considered a work boot I plan to wear them around town for "casual" affairs they are that comfortable and good looking.Before I bought these I really thought I was going to get the Chippewa Arroyo Packer but the arch support was too high and the heel is another 1/4" higher than the Double H and that combination made it feel like I was walking on my toes plus pushing against my arches.Never owned Double H or a packer, but I would certainley buy these again! "Made in America" was a big selling point for me here and the leather is very high quality and so are the ICE soles and stitching. Since I will not be wearing them for work I imagine they will last 20 years based on some of my other footwear performance made with similar quality materials.I purchased mine at Sheplers in Mesa, AZ (even though their web site does not even list the boot), they had a good price at $190 and I also had a 25% off a single item coupon so I only paid $142.50 plus tax.

The Converse All-Star is a great looking shoe. The only problem is that they run big in size. Ex. If you wear a men's 10 1/2 you probably should order a 9 1/2 or 10. Otherwise you might feel like you're wearing clown shoes.
This was a very good buy. The price was right, they're comfortable and well made. I can't think of anything bad to say about them.

The best shoes ever, but if you use coverse.com to buy your shoes prepair for the SLOWEST loading site you have ever experienced! Many times I didn't buy shoes because of the speed of their site. I have really fast internet and their site is by far the slowest of any site I use. If you have the patients you can't beat the shoes (I always use the create your own) I have created some really unique shoes.

got this for my BF and he really likes it. It is nicer quality than all the other boots he has. Although he did buy the uggs (one with lining)which I assume he will wear for the winter. It's sexy without being too flashy. It's classy with a touch of edge. Looks great with a good polish and perfect for fancy jeans.
I have received so many compliments on this shoe, especially when wearing it with Jeans and Colored shirt at work. Pefect shoe for Business Casual., comfortable and stylish.
Package arrived on time and in excellent condition. Would gladly do business with seller in the future.
Yes, a great running shoe at a great price. The shoes are fabulous looking and fitting. True to size and so comfy! I love running and I love these shoes!

These are great run around shoes and camping. Light weight so you'renot logged down on short hikes. Don.t show dirt and i,ve washd them in the past. I wear 8.5 N andthese shoes fit pefectly. Nice navy lighter than shown but not toolight. Avazoncame through again for me. Jakjaneus

This is a well made, but poorly designed shoe tree.You can't get it out of the shoe because the hand hold to remove it pushes the heel into the shoe harder instead or releasing the pressure. This makes it impossible to remove. I ended-up putting a knob on the top that I can push in the right direction to compress the shoe tree and remove it.
My very favorite shoe. I have Morton's Neuroma and this fits so well. Have never had to return the items.

THE SHOES WERE A CHRISTMAS PRESENT FOR MY DAD. HE IS OLD SKOOL TO SAY THE LEAST. THE SHOES WERE LIKE PEOPLE BUYING THROWBACK JERSEYS. HE HAS NOT HAD ANY COMPLAINT ABOUT THE SHOES. TRUST ME THE SHOES HAVE GOT TO BE COMFORTABLE OR THEY WOULD HAVE BEEN RETUTNED INSTANTLY.
great shoes..i'm not happy it made in vietnam, but i still love my beeswax anyway..i'm so glad that i have it now..

This is my second pair of this Hi Tec boot. The first pair lasted a very long time and was very comfortable the whole time. They break in right away. For years I was a die hard Danner buyer and I can say these beat my last pair of over priced Danner hikers hands down. (really they were more sneaker than hiker -I still love my Danner steel toes for a work boot) But my favorite thing about these Hi Tec boots are the eyes and hooks -THEY ARE THE BEST I'VE EVER OWNED. The laces last forever because the eyes and hooks are so smooth and rounded. Like I said, just bought my second pair -five star goodness.

Bought these, because I liked the unusual blend of blue and cream and love Softwalk shoes. Then I wasn't sure I liked them after they arrived, because they are so unusual. Well, I started wearing them, and they are super comfortable. Not only that, but I get lots of compliments about how nice they look with pants and jeans. People really think they're boots. The tread on the bottom helps with walking in snow and ice. They are warm and comfy, even with the heel. I usually wear size 8 1/2, but softwalks often run a little shorter for me. Because of all the padding, I opted for a size 9. and it seems to fit well. I might have been able to wear 8 1/2, but the toe area may have been a little too snug then.

These shoes are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned and are very durable as well. As I write this review I am ordering my third pair to replace the ones I have been wearing for the last 14+ months.The ONLY reason I am not giving them 5 stars is due to the quality of the laces. The laces that come with them simply do not last as long as I would like.Might not be the fault of the laces though - the shoes are so durable they might just be outlasting what most laces are capable of.
I love these shoes. Durable, dependable, flexible. I use a different pair for winter weather but for every other season converses always fit.

These are cute, they stay tied, and there's just enough slip to use these babies on a dance floor without having to spring for full suede bottoms. They also hold up well when you throw them into a huge dance bag and accidentally crush them in the trunk of your car.
These are really Great boots,............ I would recommend these for any growing boy, or girl,............ Just buy a half size larger!!!!!!

I like the concept of this wallet. It seems to have a place for everything I needed. However, the bag is very soft and I wanted something with a more solid construction. I would also have liked the credit card compartment to open fully for easier access which it did not. So, reluctantly, I returned the bag and will continue my search for the perfect wallet.
great sneakers! look great and fit perfectly. can wear with anything!the best for skydiving :)will definitely buy again, maybe different colors.thank you.
This is faux chincilla and it runs small. I wear a 9.5 and I have turned it into a mule just by wearing it, so I would order a size up. Like the color and comfort. Good company-Footsmart.

It's a classy shoe that fits well and rides well too. I bought a pair four years ago and they are still holding up - although they're beat up, they've become my factory loafers - I can wear them anywhere. Remember, you may be paying twice as much as normal tassel loafers, but they are definitely twice the shoe. It's so comfortable.
