The butterfly is so cute! It's nice to have something distinguishing without having to get a crazy color. I use these shoes for powerlifting as well as everyday wear. I visited the seller's website and they have a pretty large variety of designs. Would like to see some in kids' sizes but I couldn't be happier with my new Chucks!

Good part: it's airy, good looking, cushioning as they said, received on timeBad part: It's too tight around your foot and I would say you should consider this factor before to buy it! However, you can get a little bit comfort if you keep shoelaces loose otherwise ok
These are awsome. just like shown. shipping took a while but it was over christmas so it makes sense. Just as nice as the pictures showed! Love the new CHucks

i gotta say, these are the best shoes i have ever been lucky enough to find. when i wear 'em it's almost like they're not there. they're still very comfortable but it's a very light shoe which is what i wanted. worth every penny, i say

The seller sent out the shoes in perfect timing. The only drawback is that they, from my son's perspective, do not let him jump so high -- like in the commercials for the Super Ball shoe. I knew that wouldn't happen, but try explaining that to a strong-willed 4 yr old! I really like these shoes. They have a great fit, are very well made (as all Stride Rite's are), and the Velcro is easy for him to use. I have finally found a shoe that will oust him from his rain boots with no battle. He is actually wearing these more often than his rain boots!
It took a long time to find the best walking shoe. This is it. You put them on and there is no breaking them in. Comfortable from the first step. Highly recommend!
The boots are very pretty. The Size is also proper. But there is a scratch in of the boots.
Defective product, left shoe too tight and a bit short! I have had three other pairs of New Balance 574' s with out a problem.

I've been wearing Chuck Taylors since the mid-80's but this is my first pair with a black outsole (all others have been the standard off white). I went to a party over the weekend in a backyard that was very little grass, mostly dirt, and was able to just wipe off the outsole with a damp cloth. If I had gone in shoes with an off white outsole, they would have been trashed. I also like the fact that these seem just a litle more "dressy" than most canvas Chuck Taylors. Highly recommended.
Great shoes. Only gripe; the total shipping cost for my order to Australia cost more than the goods!

First off, as the name implies, these Adidas Sambas are classics. They've been around 40 years (probably more) and they still look fresh! In my shallowness, I bought them on looks alone for around-the-house/ casual-Friday's.They are a bit narrow, which is great for me. But they do lack a bit in arch/ball of the foot support. You'd think that if they're making these shoes for narrow-footed people, they would have better arch support because most people with narrow feet tend to have higher arches, right? If you have wide feet, you might want to avoid these.As for the extra-long tongue, I have to say that I kind of like it. It makes the shoes unique. But I think if you wore low-socks, the tongue might chafe you and look funny. Also, folding the tongue down looks kind of dumb as you can see part of the sizing tag.I found the sizing (10.5) to be pretty much right on, maybe a smidge bigger than my other Adidas. Overall though, for the price (I found mine on sale for $30!), I thought they were are a great deal! I really like these Samba Classics. They look fantastic and fit good for a casual shoe. I just wish they had a bit more support (like the Samba Millenium's do), then they'd be perfect.

Well this is my 2nd pair of Uggs...But I paid ALOT MORE for my first pair which were the exact same boots but a different color and NOT from Amazon!I really appreciate Amazon for this exact reason...I get quality items for MUCH LESS...and thats all I can ask for! My boots are so comfy...I LOVE MY NEW UGGS!! Oh and I did get caught in the rain with them the other day...THEY LOOK AS GOOD AS NEW after they dried!! These boots are the most COMFORTABLE footwear I have EVER worn! I love them!

I love this shoe! When I saw the black and charcoal pair on sale for just $20.69, I couldn't believe my good fortune. I ordered them right away and look forward to wearing them on my raining walks this winter. My white pair, right out of the box, took a relaxing trip to Hawaii.

These shoes are really cute and mostly comfortable. A little rough place near one toe rubbed for a while, but isn't a problem now. The sole seems narrower than the shoe itself, so it presesnts a lean profile. I walk in these for fitness, and the vents provide good circulation, but there's lots of plastic in the top, so some folks might find them hot to wear. The fit is true to size. I have liked other Skechers better than these, but still will buy Skechers.
these boots are great! Buttery soft leather that has loosened up to fit me perfectly, and they make my big feet look small. Very comfy and well worth the price.
the shoes are great, they were in mint condition when i received them. i couldn't be happier
Timberland Men's Euro Hiker Boot, Grey/Grey,9.5 M US great boots for work or very day life very comfortable, worm and soft inside great boots for fare value.
a lot longer than i thought they would be. but a nine would be to small. but they are nice. just wish they weren't so long.
Perfect! Just as described! I love my uggs. They are so warm and comfy I can't wait to order myself another pair in a different color. Uggs are totally worth the money.

This was the first time I ever purchased a pair of shoes on-line. I was initially looking at Hush Puppies, but they no longer have the styles that I remember when Hush Puppies were popular. Maybe that's why Hush Puppies are not as popular as they once were. At any rate I don't recall how I found Clark's but I'm glad I did. This shoe was just the style I was looking for. Great fit, very attractive shoe. I'm a happy camper. Or should I say happy walker?

Love these flip flops. They are so comfortable. This is my second pair. I wear them about everyday during the spring and summer. These and the Reef Lounger are awesome. You don't want to ever take them off.. They are a must for the summer!!!

I hike fairly frequently in the Sierra mountains, often in rocky, steep or muddy terrains. So I spent a good amount of time researching for the best pair of boots that will provide and comfort and durability for an all-day hike. I finally decided on these Altitude IV boots.I was very pleased with my decision, as they were very comfy, no blisters, and durable, not to mention better looking than other hiking boots. Good grip over rocks, mud and dirt trails. I will buy another pair of Altitude IV after these wear out.

A very elegant pair of shoes at a reasonable price. What really amazed me was the intact condition upon receipt. I must say that this is the first time I buy shoes online. No minor scars or damage...better than buying at the shoe store! The shoes come wrapped in protective material inside a very nice box, conserving the fresh leather smell and shine.

The boots are comfortable and easy to wear. Are not heavy, which was the main reason I was looking to replace my other pair. The boots are durable and appropriate for the snowy winter in Boston. Water does not penetrate them at the bottom. Nice buy!

This is my first purchase from this brand and honestly the most I have ever spent on a pair of flip flops. And I would do it again! They look fantastic, they have great support and the quality seems like they will last. The bottle opener on the bottom is a very nice touch and makes for great conversation at a bbq. One tiny downside is they originally felt a little to tight. As I have wore them quite a few times they have stretched a little and now feel better. I would say if you are back on forth between sizes go with the higher one, if your not, I don't know for sure that I would recommend going bigger. All around great purchase,

THIS IS AN ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL SHOE. EVERYBODY NOTICED THEM WHEN I WORE THEM FOR THE FIRST TIME. SO MANY COMPLIMENTS. COMFORTABLE TOO. I STAYED IN THEM ALL DAY AND MY FEET NEVER GOT TIRED. A GREAT VALUE.
I ordered these boots for a trip to Tasmania. They arrived before the due date and fitted beautifully. For the money these are very good value.

I love Reef flip flops. I have somewhat wide feet, and these fit great, and the cushy sole makes them really comfortable and act like they have some arch support. I can wear them for hours and walk long distances in them, with no trouble at all! Highly recommended. :)
I had worn out a pair of the original Croc thongs and loved them. This new version is comfortable with better grip than the old ones. Plus they are much more stylish!
I am having to return this item. It does not fit the person I purchased it for.I'm sorry and I will never buy clothing items for anyone's Christmas again.
I love these shoes. They are very comfortable, and people compliment me about these shoes all the time.

I spend most of my days in the elements and at my age it gets harder every year to keep the extremities warm. I have looked at these boots for the last two years wondering if they would be what they have been presented to be. I can say that they are the best pair of boots I think I have ever had, my feet are warm, dry and comfortable. If anybody appreciates that I think you will be very pleased with them. The quality in m,y opinion would be very hard to beat.

This is my first pair of rubber overshoes. They protect my shoes, are easy to take on/off, and look okay. I wear a size 11 shoe and bought the XL which is a good fit. XL would fit a 12 or 13, but would definitely be too big for a 10.
Always a great product. My other Uggs are 13 years old and still keep my feet warm. I do prefer the old style of Uggs over the new style.
These are Great shoes, I have been walking 3 1/2 mil. per day in them starting the first day out of the box!!
These shoes are great for the price. They are light and they let your feet breathe easily. Only con is there is no arch support so after wearing the for a while my feet hurt badly.
This is my fourth pair. I love them from the time I get them and miss them when they must go. Confort all year-round. Good quality.
Shipping was way fast, this is my 5th pair of Chucks the black on black is slick, they breath better than any other shoe ive ever owned and it definitely wont be my last pair.

Recently bought a pair of the Marco Oxford Bostonians at a great price from Amazon and received the package early. The shoes fit well, but I'm disappointed with the quality. My first 3 Bostonians were made in Italy, but this one was made in India. I could tell the difference in the quality - the leather is dull, the stitching unrefined, the make and look are not quite the same as my old pairs. I read from other reviews that some of the recent purchases were made in India, but I gambled. Hope that they last as long as my old ones.

Received my Reefs today and they needed no breaking in. I was a little worried that I would have to wear them for a while before they became as comfortable as my other pair which I have owned for four years and refused to get of. Shipping was extremely fast. Very satisfied with my purchase.

My knees were killing me and my toes were ate up with blisters and black toenails (gross I know, but you long distance runners know what I mean). My shoe guy put me in this shoe and voila, no more blisters and no more sore knees (well, it wasn't quite voila as my knees took a little while to adjust to the change in mechanics and heal up and the toes are still healing, but it was plenty quick for all that). Anyway, I'm in heaven. I didn't realize I was an overpronater, well I thought I was, but didn't realize how much a shoe could help. Also, these shoes are a little small (as are all running shoes) so size up a little to avoid the toes thing. I've run 3 half marathons and 2 marathons in these in less than two months. Hurray for no more sore knees. The 15 miler and half marathon right before that in the old shoes were terrible. I've saved those old ones for short trail runs in the mud. Btw, my shoe guy recommended inserts for these as he says the ones that come with the shoe wear out really quick.

The shoes are good to look at. But it is a little bit uncomfortable to walk. you feel as if you are wearing a large shoe even though it is light in weight. it has nice cushions, however your toe nails start hurting after walking for a long time. If you are buying it for everday use, its a bad idea but good for occasional uses. Personally, I would prefer something more comfortable.
I had to get these for a wedding. Let's just say technology has made more modern shoes more comfortable. Liked 'em more when I was 8.
My daughter's love these boots so much we bought this pair for their cousin. They aren't the sturdiest boots but really cute and fun to wear.

After seeing the popularity of this shoe, I decided to test it out myself and I am impressed. Although its not too comfortable, they hug your feet and don't slip off even when loose, which is exactly what I was aiming for.

This is my 2nd pair of theses Vagabond Sanuk's ...My first pair lasted a full 12-month of wearing them almost everyday. I think that is proof of a well made shoe. I wear them in almost ever situation. They are even classy enough to wear to a wedding or funeral. You can wear them with socks or without. Only down-side is in really wet situations they may loose grip somewhat.
These are good shoes. They have a classic look and the monochrome look adds a nice little something something. A good, safe buy.
These boots are so cute on my daughter. The suede is so soft and they look like a million bucks on her. Great boots!
We've have been wearing this line of Sambas since they come out (over ten years ago). A good shoe for indoor soccer, and for just wearing around.

I am always looking for comfortable shoes. As I get older, regular dress shoes can be hard on my legs if I have to be on my feet for awhile. I have bought a lot of Rockport shoes and I like them for their style and comfort. Years ago I bought Hush Puppies and I stilll own a brown pair. I bought these shoes because of their color (I wanted a white shoe for the summer) and because I like/enjoy my other pair of Hush Puppies. For their comfort, color and style, these are excellent.

My favorite dress shoes have always been made by Cole Haan. However, I was looking for a more reasonable alternative that looked great. I purchased a pair of these shoes in brown and loved them so I turned around and bought a second pair in black. These shoes can be worn with a suit or casually. Amazon has a great price on these and I have seen these for as much as 3 times this price on other websites. It is hard to get italian made shoes for under $100. To be fair, I have only had these a month so I do not know about the long term durability but so far so good. I have received many compliments on these.They tend to run a little large. So I would order about a half size smaller than your normal size. Also, the shoe inserts come out so you can add a custom insert if you like.
Bought these for weight lifting, but find myself wearing them everywhere. What's not to love about a pair of Chucks? An American classic.
These Keds are hard to find anymore. They are the only shoe my diabetic mom can wear with comfort. She can go all day with these on and her feet are so sensitive.

Simply a handsom well made pair of boots. They are are rugged yet elegant at the same time. I wear them with jeans or slacks and get compliments all the time. They are a bit difficult to slip on the first few times because of the harness, but once they're boken in, they are very comfortable.

I really do like this shoe! I own several pair of Nine West shoes and they always fit true to size and this shoe was no exception. I love the platform paired with the stiletto heel. I also thought the shape of the toe was really cute. I did feel like the toe area was a little narrow, but I have a wider foot. It was not extremely uncomfortable and is something that I hope with clear up once the shoe is broken in. Overall I think this is a very sexy, fairly comfortable shoe and I am pleased with my purchase.
These boots are extremely comfortable and very waterproof. I use them for powerwasher and stay dry and comfortable even though I am on my feet for many hours.
I buy it for a gift and the person who reseved it is very happy, they was in time and very good packing.

My daughter was required to get these shoes for her high school drama program. We never imagined that they would be so comfortable. She now wears them to ballroom dancing lessons and will use them in any stage presentation she takes part in. I would highly remcommend these shoes to anyone who is involved in theater. They are comfortable, and provide a stable base for movements that increases safety and confidence.

I have 4 pairs of these Clarks sandals in different colors and the soles of my blue ones finally wore out. I found these on Amazon.com and immediately bought them. They are a couple of shades darker than my blue ones but just as comfortable and will go with the blue items in my wardrobe. This shoe style has been around for many years. I would have to travel a distance to a Clark's store and then there is no guarantee they would have the shoe and in the color I was looking for. When I saw them on Amazon.com, I quickly purchased them and they arrived a few days later. They are extremely comfortable and completely adjustable because of the 3 straps with buckles.
The crocs are fine the only thing is I ordered them in black and when they got here they were brown.

I knew I'd made the right choice the minute I put them on. They feel like shoes made by craftsmen. Within seconds I was climbing higher on the boulder than I wanted to go-- that's how much difference they made (o.k-- I'm comparing them to climbing in running shoes!) The other point worth making is that my feet stayed comfortable while climbing.Maybe the most telling comment I can make is this one. I ran into another climber with the same shoes. When I asked him if he liked them, his face lit up. And then all the other climbers (all wearing other brands) joined in the conversation-- everyone agreed that La Sportiva Mythos was the best.
So far, good for my daughter. Comfort on the feet, no issues, just love the Endless Style, like other brand name shoes for women. She's enjoying them. Happy Holidays.

I've always loved Dr. Scholl's Exercise Sandals. I haven't worn them in quite a while, so after receiving this pair, I put them on and wore them all day long. They REALLY do exercise your legs and buns! My lower body was SORE the next day, just as if I'd gone to the gym the day before!

I where these to work and casual events whenever I can because I like them so much. The bottoms get dirty pretty quickly but the leather still looks good. Also, if you have flat feet you might want to use insoles.
These are great shoes. Very good for soccer, but also good for an all-around tennis shoe. I wear them everywhere.

I needed a pair of stylish, comfortable, and affordable brown dress shoes to wear for my 20 year high school reunion. These shoes definitely fit the bill. I danced the WHOLE NIGHT in them. I definitely recommend these Rockport shoes. I felt dressed to impress and very comfortable. Coming from someone who suffers from foot ailments, this is a strong endorsement.

I'm back here ordering a pair of these Acorn slippers to replace a pair I've had for close to 10 years. Yes, they last that long! These are the warmest and most comfortable slippers I've ever owned in my life. They were given to me as a Christmas present one year as a joke since my husband always bought me slippers or slipper socks for the holiday. Turns out the joke was on him because I had never known such warmth during the winter months with these slippers and I absolutely love them. I thought for sure I'd never be able to replace them & happened to find them here at Amazon! YAY. Can't wait to get my new pair.

I have a long history with Easy Spirit shoes but I had never seen the patterned shoes before. I was looking for a light colored shoe that wouldn't attract all the dirty smudges. This is the shoe! I've had so many compliments - so glad I made this purchase!
I am pleased with this shoe...however it isnot leather and I'm sure it was advertisedas such.Thanks,GW

I love this shoe. It's dressy, but casual enough for every day summer wear, and it's comfortable for walking around every day. I bought one years ago at a retail store, then when they started breaking down I tried to find another shoe that fit the casual-dressy-comfortable category and couldn't find anything else that came close. I found these here, and ordered the same ones I had before, and am very happy about it. Just wish they had the other colors in stock for size 6!
Not a bad boot, but needs a substantial break in period. Bought it in the wide width, but it would be nic if wide were a bit wider.

I was debating whether I wanted to buy a pair online or just go into a store and buy them there. Boy am I glad I went to go buy them in person... as other people have mentioned, Converse run a little big so a size 11 (which I am) is really a 9 or so. I ended up getting an 8/5 and I haven't worn 8/5 size shoes since I was 13. You really want to go and buy them in person and completely avoid this problem.

Compared to my last pair of boots, Chippewa's, which I loved too, these Carolinas are great, every bit as comfortable as the Chippewa's and the Copper CrazyHorse leather, while probably not quite as tough as black, is gorgeous, the nicest looking boots I've ever had the pleasure of wearing.
great shoes for exercise, really let the feet breath, just a little peaved I had to pay duty/tax since I am in canada. 5 stars on the shoes, and 0 stars for east bay...

I bought these shoes for my husband/son on a Saturday and they were delivered to my house on the following Tuesday. Super, fast delivery I really like the colors they have in these shoes, they are in a cute style, the quality is good,and the price is great.

I've ordered the black color last year and there were perfect.I also recently order the another pair brown color and noticed a little difference in quality. I was surprised when discovered that black one is made in BRAZIL but brown one is made in CHINA. Strange.......
I have another pair of these shoes and loved them; therefore, I purchased the pair through Amazon at a good price.

My Dad has very flat and painful feet. He has had quite a few surgeries on his feet. He says these shoes are so comfortable they are like slippers. That is high praise from him. At 87 comfort is very important to him. I highly recommend these shoes.

http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000E9DPE0/ref=cm_cr_rev_prod_titleI just placed my 4th order of these sandals. I wear them all summer in Mi and then I go to Texas and AZ for the winter months and wear them every day down there. I wear them daily and when the soles start showing wear, I order new ones. They are comfortable and fit and wear excellent.I wear the old ones in the yard and garden.
I purchased these boots for my niece and she really love them. They seem so nice and cozy. I plan on buying myself some now.
These sneakers are very comfortable and I am very pleased with the look and price. I would highly recommend for a casual flat everyday shoe.
Great product!I'll highly recommend.My only comment: it has not the inside flower design as shown in the photo

For the price these were good converse that lasted a little over a year and a half (I wore them a lot). The one thing I noticed is that when they arrived they smelled like spray paint and over time as the black faded it started to look like a dark green. Not that bad, but something to take into consideration.

These were comfortable right out of the box. I had dress shoes and casual shoes and I needed a nice in between. These fit that perfectly. Still not convinced? The most interesting man in the world wears these.

Great value and comfort. In fact, this is the most comfortable pair of shoes I have ever owned. I will definitely purchase more prophet shoes. I have wide feet so I ordered EE width. I've never been more comfortable. Thank you Prophet!

I purchased a pair of these shoes a few years ago and due to having another pair, I waited to wear them. At first I though they were too narrow but once I put them on, I fell in love with these shoes. I have had many pair of pinch tassled shoes over the past 30 years and next to the old Hanover brand, these are the best ever. I certainly hope I can get many years out of these as they are not the cheapest on the block but by far the best this shoes wearer has ever had.
I purchased these for my fiance for Christmas. I received them much earlier than I expected. He absolutely loved them. He said they are the most comfortable boots he owns and they fit like a glove.
excellent product excellent, very good shoes I love and attention was immediate, as received in good condition 100% recommended you purchase another opportunity lo maximo shoes ufff
these slippers pretty much fit, i'm an 8 in street shoes so i ordered this half size bigger ( 8 1/2 ) and they fit perfectly! they look pretty awesome too!
Better than they were when I got my first pair! Better look, feel and more comfortable than my old boots. Keep it up Wolverine!
Not as comfortable as the world walking classic shoe . i would recommend the latter although the pro walker is less money

I am a special ed teacher, have arthritis as a symptom of lupus and am in need of a total knee replacement. These shoes make me feel like I can run. They are so light and they conform to your feet and are a bit more acceptable for work than the regular croc clogs. I wear them with and without socks.They are true to size with a bit more room in the width. I am a 12 W and they fit great.

This is my forth pair of new balance 574s and I love them. They are very comfortable and well made. so far each time I've had to get a new pair it was from my wearing the soles down, not from falling apart. One of the things I really like about the shoes too is that aside from looking nice and being well made, they are relatively cheap. I wear a size 15 so it normally cost me a decent amount of money to get shoes. These are generally between $30-$45 when I buy them on Amazon. If you are looking for a comfortable everyday-shoe then these are a great option especially if you wear larger sizes.
Purchased these shoes for my husband as his work shoes. He wears them all the time..... absoutely LOVES them. Very comfortable, Real Leather.

I found these Birkenstocks through an amazon search, and was thrilled by the price. (About $40) I wear these shoes indoors nearly every day, so I have become attached to arizona birks because of their comfort and versility throughout the seasons. (Yes I wear socks with them) This particular variety appears to fit just a little differently at the toes than my last pair, but I am not sure if that is because the last ones had worn down by the end, or if this sizing is a little different.Either way, they are Birkenstocks, that outstanding brand of shoe, that lasts for years, and are so good to your feet.

I got a pair of yellow low-tops for Christmas last year and I LOVE THEM!!! They're about to get holes in them because I wear them so much, and I'm trying to pick out what color I should get. There's so much to love about these shoes. There's like 25 colors to pick from, so there is the oppourtunity to have a piar for EVERY SINGLE OUTFIT. Or, you can wear just one pair, like I do, and mine go with everything. These shoes are breathable, unlike tennis shoes, so your feet don't get all sweaty, which is nice too. These shoes are quite flat inside, but there's nothing that an insert can't fix. THESE SHOES ARE THE BEST!!!
I love these! Softspots knows how to make them comfortable right away. Yes, they come a little snug, but it gives them the ability to shape to your feet. Very attractive! Highly recommend!

I like this shoe its comfortable and looks nice. The only thing that I've been disappointed about so far is that after I washed shoes on gentle cycle some of the pieces started to separate from the shoe.
wasn't great for me. Those thongs are too roomy for me. I have a thin feet so they weren't good on me. If you buy them get size 1/2 smaller than your real size.
This boot is comfortable and gives me the ankle support I've needed for any type of hiking. I look forward to many years of use from these boots.

I really like this shoe. I wear a narrow shoe and it is sometimes difficult to find narrow ones. However, this shoe runs quite narrow. I'm quite confident that it will "streatch" out with some wear as the shoe is genuine leather. All in all, I am pleased with the shoes.

This is the 2nd pair of these same shoes I've purchased (from Amazon), and I love them! They fit just as expected, are lightweight, and have a really versatile color. Since they're a neutral color, I can wear them with both casual clothing and slightly nicer clothes like khakis with an untucked polo. I may even buy another pair in 3 or so years when this pair wears out!

Its a nice shoe... it beats the shoes I had been wearing before. I got the wide version since my feet are a bit wide. I don't like how shoes get narrow at the tip. They need to make some wide toed hiking shoes.

I wear these shoes absolutely everywhere because they are so good to my feet. I will be getting another pair without holes for cooler weather. My daughter works in a hospital, so I gave her a pair. She says she wants a pair in every color.
These shoes are super cute, but not meant for long walks. I have found them to be as comfortable as you would expect a shoe with this heel height and they always get noticed and complimented.
I GOT MY SHOES IN THE MAIL VERY FAST I LOVE THEM THEY GO WITH EVERYTHING I WEAR I RECOMMEND YOU BUY THEM.

These boots are warm and comfortable. I had frostbitten my feet in the past and my feet get cold quickly. These boots allow me to stand out on the cold, snowy ground for a long period of time without getting cold. Thanks Columbia!

These are the best shoes I have ever worn in any sport. I play senior "over 50" slow pitch softball and the cushion in these are gentle on old knees. Several ladies on the team bought them and all rave about them.
Total satisfaction, works perfectly, everything ok, this product its ok, and it can be recommended for others users without doubt
These Bearpaws are a great boot. Every bit as good as UGG yet 1/3 the price.
I purchase this sandals for my mother. She likes this sandals because they are very soft and easy to put on. Also the leather is very soft and comfortable.

Nice ballet shoe for the price. My preschooler wears a 9 in street shoes and the 9.5 was best in this as it gave her a tiny bit of room. Technically they should fit the foot, but she liked it that way.

Angel II is a slightly improved (more graceful-looking) version of a versatile old favorite. It is almost a flat but looks enough like a classic heel to endear itself to those of us who can't endure anything higher. And it comes in a welcome range of widths and colors.
I had a pair of these already and ordered another pair the very same size. The shoes I received were marked the same size, but turned out to actually be a full size smaller. I gave them away.

Twice I have ordered from Luskey's and twice I received the boots well packed, shipped with no dents.Only thing, wished I had an e-mail they had been shipped and when to expect delivery.I will certainly order from them again!
This style is difficult to find and I am pleased to find this source. Purchasing from Amazon is easy and expeditious.
They are great with the costume and well made. Very Happy with the product.
Vert comfy - but I would suggest a half size to full size larger if you are not fimilliar with such bodacious heels - they make your legs look KILLER!

The 990 Serries New Balance are some of the best shoes availible. After standing on concrete floor for 8 to 10 hours per day, I found other brands looked great, but were uncomfortable after 3 or 4 months. The New Balance shoes lasted twice as long and cost about the same price as the Nike and other brands I had previously purchased. I've bought nothing but New Balance ever since - for over 10 years now. Beside the durablity and the correct size avalibility, I find wearing shoes made in the USA rather than Korea or China a major plus!
I have weird shaped feet. These shoes are comfortable, fit easily on my strange feet, and my feet look better in these Tevas!

Softspots are my favorite shoes. These are super comfortable, fit well, and last a long time. So far I have two pairs of these that I use for work, and my feet never hurt. Bravo! I highly recommend them.

My daughter has what you would call a "Princess" foot. She is super fussy about her shoes. Has to fit just so and no fabric rub or discomfort when she walks. She also has a hard to fit foot. Narrow heel and wider toebox. Thus shoe shopping for her can be a chore!Recently she picked up a cute little strappy dress for summer and I mentally prepared myself for the hours she would spend finding a summery sandal to go with it.When we went to the shoe store they had a large display of Dr. Scholl's in an assortment of colors.I remembered Dr. Scholl's from my teens. They used to sell them in the drugstore.The look is timeless and she instantly fell in love with them. Because the strap across the toes is adjustable they fit her toebox comfortably. And because they are backless, they are light and breezy for summer and there is nothing in the back to cause foot discomfort.The hard part was selecting the color. The sandals come in a variety of fun colors including pink, black, tan and more. We settled on the blue. Great with jeans and a nice shade to compliment her summer dress.Because the sandals feature a wood finished bottom and contoured footbed for arch support they are sturdy and comfortable.Price is right too when you consider they will last for years and remain classic in styling.Picking Dr. Scholl's is easy. Picking the color is the challenge!
Hardrock Trail Runner - Men's by MontrailShoes top quality though tight in width; would prefer tab on back to use in putting on the shoes.

Purchased these boots originally for my son (the outdoor / boy scout / hiker) ... then went camping but my old boots (Vasque Clarion Impact Gore-Tex Hiking Boot ) which were tight even at a size 11 W... (I wear a 10.5 EEE) ... I decided to try these boots HiTec Boots at size 13M... thinking, why not give them a chance... on a weekend camp out in mud, rain and lots of walking (a Mountain Man theme camp out). The boots fit great... granted a bit long, but the width was just right, I replaced the insole with a pair of Spenco(r) Heavy Duty Insoles... they were comfortable and they kept my feet dry. So, I did the next logical thing, bought a pair for me, same size, and all... word of advise, I bought these in 11 W, they were to thin, I then bought size 13M... maybe it was just my feet, but they work for me... with a good insole, and a great lace technique, you have a good boot... enjoy.
best pair of boots I have in my closet; very comfortable; easy to walk in and elegently designed. I bought the black leather ones
muy buen producto y muy buen vendedor, todo me salio como yo esperava y hasta ahora todo esta muy bien.

I used these for my wedding.I wore them for about 4 hours and they were comfortable until the end, they started to hurt a bit. But definitely good for several hours! I added a gel pad prior to the wedding, because due to the height the ball of the foot can tend to hurt. Also, these shoes tend to run narrow, so buy a larger size than your average size. The bottom of the heel and the front part of the foot are very flat. I didn't try to dance in these because of the height. Overall they add the needed height, and are very secure (unlike the average "stripper" shoe). One bad thing about these shoes are they tend to scuff easily. This won't be noticed by everyone else, but you may notice the scuffs yourself.

This is the second pair of these boots that I order. My husband is an officer on his feet for over 12 hours and these give him support, comfort, and style. He likes the way they look and feel, and they keep a nice shine with minimal polishing. His last pair lasted him 8 years and I hope these will as well. And you can't beat the price!

I bought these for my 18 month old daughter. They are adorable with tights! She loves having these on. I'd say they run a little big, but I'm fine with that. It's sometimes nice to have sneakers to put on her that she can't take off!
These boots fell apart within one month of purchasing them!! Do not purchase these boots!!

I don't care what Capezio's sizing chart says...these are not true to size. I took my daughter to the shoe store to get her exact size before ordering. She is a 13.5. I ordered a 1.5 and her toes were at the end. So we ended up with a 2,which is just right. They are very cute and seem to be well-made. This is my daughter's first pair of ballet shoes and she loves them. The price on Amazon is reasonable.

I own several other pairs of Allen Edmonds - Park Avenues in 11D, Kenwoods in 11D, Meranos in 11D. All fit very well (though the Park Avenues are a tiny bit tight). After reading the reviews here, I ordered the Walden in 11E.Even an 11E is too tight for me. I'm not sure how the sizing works on these, but it's not right. Would highly recommend trying them on somewhere before purchasing them.

The county fair was coming into town so I wanted a pair of boots to wear during the week. My cowgirl friend had told me Ariat boots were her favorite, so that is what i searched and these were the cheapest ones I could find. I ordered them in an 8 1/2 which is what I wear in a tennis shoe. I ordered 2 day shipping and they came in 2 days! It was great shipping. When I tried them on, they were a little big, but I went and bought a pair of thick knee-high socks and wore them for a couple days and they fit great. I had to break them in like every pair of shoe, but once I got those socks they fit perfect and I feel that if I would have gotten an 8 size, they would have been too small. Great buy!! Don't hesitate:-)
I love my new shoes! they fit great and look great. My daughter keeps taking them so I may have to get her a pair. nah, let her get her own!!
Quick delivery and item was just as described. These are pretty hard to find so I was very happy to get these for my husband
Beware...Darkest blue ever, almost black. Don't know if wrong color was sent or that the picture does not represent the true color.

The loafers didn't fit but I don't think I would have kept them even if they did. I was not happy with the quality of the leather. It cost almost $10 out of pocket to send them back, and this was the cheapest way to ship.

The product was is in great quality as expected from the Timberland brand. The only issue I had was that the shoe came looking new from the outside whole the inside showed sines of wear (dirt scuffs, sand, etc.) which disappointed me since the shoe was a gift for a loved one. The shoes are comfortable and well supported as reported to me. Be careful when you go with white. Stains only come off if you clean them right away. Scuffs are easily noticeable and near impossible to get off. The colors in the pictures on Amazon are very accurate.I would definitely buy them again and would reccommend it to others.
I bought it for my girlfriend because it's her favorite ballet shoe, it's the second she have, all the same, she doesn't change it for others.

The leather on the Student Footlight is pretty stiff and will definitely need some breaking in. I'm hoping that it will soften quickly once it warms up after being worn.My actual shoe size is 9AAA but I frequently wear 8 1/2 N because I can rarely find the 9AAA. In the Jr. Footlight, I wear a 9 1/2 N. When I was trying to decide what size to get in the Student Footlight, I wondered if the fit was similar to the Jr. Footlight and I have to say the Student runs closer to street size. Based on my experience with the Jr. Footlight, I ordered the Student in a 9N and a 9 1/2 N and both were too long. The shoe does seem to run pretty narrow, for those who are wondering. I think the width will be fine once I get the length right.I didn't find a significant difference in the padding/insole of either shoe. High density foam, not much arch support. Not a cushy shoe underneath the foot, but then that may be because it is meant for dance and their assumption is that the wearer would want to be able to "feel" the floor through the shoe.As compared to the jr. footlight, the extra 1/2 inch in the heel height of the Student Footlight does make a difference in the leg line and will make the legs look even better on stage or anywhere else.

I have found athletic/walking shoes to be cheap and without support. Today, shoes are marketed as being lightweight which in my book does not make a good shoe. Eastland shoes provide the support that my feet need.
These shoes are great! My kiddie has a wide foot and I was unable to find shoes that fit him well. He is 10 months and walking, these shoes provide the support I was looking for.

This shoe was received correctly, BUT THE SECOND PAIR I ORDERED AT THE SAME TIME WERE SENT TO ME INCORRECTLY. THE WRONG COLOR WAS SENT. I HAD TO PAY ABOUT $10.00 TO RETURN THEM AND REQUESTED YOU SEND ME THE RIGHT COLOR (GREEN), BUT THE SAME INCORRECT COLOR WAS SENT TO ME THE SECOND TIME, WHICH MEANS I WILL HAVE TO PAY ANOTHER $10.00 TO RETURN THESE. I DARE NOT REQUEST THE CORRECT ONES AGAIN. I WOULD BE MOST GRATEFUL IF SOMEONE WOULD GET IN TOUCH WITH ME TO GET THIS PROBLEM RESOLVED...THANK YOUMARY GARTER
Great rock shoe. Well worth the money and good on almost all types of climbing. Don't get em too tight. I like to buy them so they fit comfortabley as there is very little stretch to the shoe.

Normally I wear a 7, some brands I wear a 7 1/2 just in case and this would be one of them. They are very narrow so buy a size higher. They are very cute because they are so unique. Even though it says "green" color I would classify them more as brown.

I purchased my rampante last week and tested it for twice so far. I have to say I am kind of dissapointed because I thought these were the perfect soccer shoes for me. The truth is the shoes are a little bit too narrow, and there is no improvment in shooting compared to cheaper shoes. I used to have lotto primato before and the shooting accurecy is same in reebok rampante. However reebok rampante's heel comfort is way advance than lotto primato, or other cheaper shoes. Nonetheless if you don't wanna pay $200 for a puma or adidas predator mania, reebok might be the second choice for you.
Comfortable!Love it! Looks great with skinny jeans. DIdn't know it came with white laces so I bought it beforehand.. oh wells. Love it! looks so clean and cute.
Chucks are the perfect shoe. They came quickly and it was easy. The shoes fit perfect and they've been great!
Great flip flop for the money...premium construction and the guys LOVE the bottle opener in the sole!

I have worn several issue boots that ranged from really good (Matterhorn ICB's) to terrible (Vietnam Era Jungle Boots were still issued in 1999 when I enlisted). USMC issues Danners now, and I have always heard great things about Danner boots. I'm in a rare spot in the military that still wears black boots and these fit the required specs nicely. The comfort is unmatched by anything I have owned to date.For comfort, they required zero break-in period. My only complaint is that the leather is squeaky. Flexing & extending my toe makes a lot of noise (it's not the sole) but this will probably (hopefully) break in. I have never had all-leather boots before, so maybe that is leather's M.O.Unfortunately I am resigned to a desk for the time being so I can't speak to how they do in the elements. They are damm sexy though.The price is good compared to Danner's website and a big thanks to all stores (including this one) on amazon that ship to FPO/APO. It's just like shipping to New York, so spread the word to all the vendors.
While I wouldn't wear this shoe to work out, it makes a great comfortable casual shoe. It is very well made model.
These flip flops are awesome! So comfortable to bought 2 more pairs in different colors. My feet do not get sweaty in these flip flops like many of the plastic type ones.
Love my chucks. This is my second pair. The blue goes with everything. I teach preschool and they are comfortable and fun to wear to work.

My granddaughter loves her Uggs and they were delivered before Christmas - which was an added bonus since the promised delivery date was after Christmas. 3 out of the six females in the family now have Uggs.
Soon after I bought a pair, . i uses them A little . A few days ago one of the air pumps in the sole sprung a leak and his right shoes rim no longer spins.

This is my 3rd pair of these exact shoes. I know, I know. It is not normally my style to buy the same pair of shoes 3 times in a row, but these are great and feel very comfortable. I seem to be able to keep these clean and nice for a whole year. i am hard on shoes, these take a beating and stay looking nice with just a little TLC. Great product, thanks!
My son needed these for wrestling and is very happy with them. He says they are comfortable and also look good. I would recommend them to anyone.

Great buy. Size fit perfectly. Normal wear and tear is almost unnoticeable. I gave them a four because in the beginning they cut at the back of my ankle but after a month or so of wearing them out they now fit like a glove. Came before delivery date. I highly recommend them. :) :) :) :) :)
I've been running in Asics shoes for more than 10 years. The GT series continues to provide good fit and comfort.
Bungalow360 makes great stuff! This whale bag was a great gift idea!!! They offer bags with different animals that are cutely designed!

Chuck Taylors are my favorite shoes. I have used them for years because they're comfortable, casual and have character. I replace them when they get too worn. I've been buying them online for a while. I found them here for under 40 bucks which was a steal. I received them in just a few days. I couldn't be happier with my new chucks.

Thank you so much for your prompt arrival!! These were purchased as a gift to my best mate and the godfather to my daughter as he is a bit addicted to shoes! He absolutley loved them and put them on straight away! He found that the added spare pair of red laces was an added bonus! The size was perfect and the description exactly as advertised!Thank you again for your quick service and quality product!
Very comfortable. I'm waiting for winter too fully enjoy the comfort.Hopefully it will survive the approaching cold weather. Yes do buy.
I've been looking for red chucks for a while now. I love these!! I would recommend getting a half size to a full size smaller though, they run quite large.

Alright well i am a size fourteen and i usually wear 4e shoes they say its a D size shoe but to me it feel like a 4e because it fits me quite swell. any way i got the cool green ones it fits perfectly i mean the best shoes i ever got. the only problem with the green ones is that when ever you use them it attracts a lot of dirt. A lot! but all i do is spray Shout on them wait 5 minutes and then wipe it down with a damp cloth. but other than that they really have nice ankle protection, by the way there my first ankle tops i ever got and i am extremely glad i got them. i would and did recommend them to everyone. so get them the best 33 dollars i ever spent!

I had the experience of having to exchange these shoes. It was fairly simple and I had no issues. I ordered them as a Christmas present for my daughter. They arrived fairly quickly in the mail. Though we ordered her normal size, they were about 1/2 size too large. So I followed the online instructions and sent them back for an exchange. I received a replacement in just a little over a week. I was impressed with the quick turnaround. The only drawback is that I had to pay to ship them back and also include a check for $7.99 to cover shipping of the new shoes.
It is true that they come larger than the regular size. They are comfortable casual shoes but would recommend them for long walks, they give me blisters.

I am not a flashy person, but I do like a great "pop" in a shoe. Nine West always makes a comfy shoe with style and this is no exception. The fushia works well with the gold accents. Every time I wear these shoes, they stir up comments - the good kind! Great with jeans or a skirt, these are a great accent piece to any wardrobe.
I am very satisfied with the shoes, I have 2 pairs.

Great warmth, comfort and quality ... IF you order 2 sizes larger than what you wear. These slippers are wayyyy small. Also order the "W" for wide. You will NEED it. I wear mens size 12. Based on other reviews, I ordered size 13W. Wish I had ordered one size larger.
i am very pleased with my product- it was a gift for my son who is an avid skate boarder and vans has b come 1 of his favorite shoes
These look better in the picture, and I was expecting the heels to be a higher, but they're very comfortable shoes. You can walk all day in them.

These Boots are it! I bought a pair (Non-steel toe) about 10 years ago for working around my hobby farm. I loved them, but when I tried to get another pair a couple years ago, I found out they were out of production. Tried several other brands/styles since then with poor results - I work on concrete floors all day now and need something that feels like a walking shoe, but can handle oil spills and such. So, a few months ago while about to buy yet another brand, I looked for these Carolina's again, and much to my surprise, I found there are back!! I immediately bought a pair to see if they were the same. Not quite, but still better than any others I've tried.PRO:Glove leather-ish soft.Very comfortable sole that is flexible, not stiff as steel, VERY MINIMAL break in period.Very sturdy lace hooks (better than my first pair).CON:None yet.
A great basic flip flop, goes with anything but can be more than just super casusal!

These converse came just as I expected, since I wear converse I knew what to expect. I usually wear a 9.5 in women but go down half a size in these guys and they fit perfect (7 in converse). Good price too, cheaper than usual.
I am unable to work in these for more then 2 or 3 hours. These shoe start to hurt my toes within that time.

I wear a half-size smaller because these shoes come in wide sizes (i.e they fit)! I'm curious to see how long they will last as they are guaranteed for 1000 miles. Very attractive and comfortable, and reasonably priced. I recommend the quick-adjust velcro for anyone who walks before or after work, or at lunch, or who takes shoes on & off throughout the day.
This a a great classic shoe--just too bad they're not made in the USA anymore.
Used to wear these years ago and just got out of the habit, am so glad to find them again and I know I will be ordering them again.

I am usually very picky about what shoes i wear and it was my first time ordering them online and not having a option of trying them on, but i heard good things about this brand and model, so i gave it a shot, i have bad support in my feet and week ankles, these shoes look kinda big, but amazingly they are very very comfortable and have nice support, and they lasted a very long time, i plan on making another order soon.
These are great shoes once your toddler is truly toddling. They are hard rubber soles and great for outside time. They are not slipper-like. A bit clunky looking.
The crocs are just as I'd heard...comfortable and cushy. I used to wear tennis shoes to walk but now wear the crocs.

Time-tested. This shoe goes really well with a great number of things, and I find myself wearing them even when the snow is piled high solely because I like the look.Protip: if it's rainy/snowy, be sure that your laces are tied in a manner that doesn't allow you to step on them, because if you do, you'll get the laces dirty, which, in turn, will cause them to fling up while you're walking and cover your shoes in wet, dirty water, making short work of the pristine, white look.
i love it... was a little bigger that i expected but i guess my son will get more use from it lol lol... hope it last...

I go through a pair of these each year, and I keep coming back to them. They are comfortable, durable, fairly light and priced right. I usually buy these at a police supply site, but Amazon is much more convenient and had them at a better price. I highly recomend these, and their shorter cousin, the 6 inch ATAC side zip.
I love Keds and they're always true to size, so nice to know I can order them here. I'll likely order more.
Great boots. These boots are comfortable and give good support. Have used Danner work boots and Danner hiking boots. They are the best boots I have worn.

These are the most comfortable sandles ever! I own about 12 pair and would wear them to work if they were a little more dressier. Please buy them from the White Mountain wholesaler as I have bought these from other dealers and the bottom sole has come apart from the sandle......

I've been a Dansko wearer for about 5 years now. I still wear my first pair, but have several others. I am a hairstylist so a good, supportive shoe is a must. I have to warn anyone who wants a pair of these to keep something in mind; if they fit you in the heel they are too small! There should be a bit of "slip" when you walk in this shoe, as it should feel like a clog. People who don't like them usually buy the wrong size. A great investment!

i was looking everywhere for a deal and found the m VERY CHEAP priced here. overall the shoes look very cool and are extremely light. im used to vans shoes that feel heavy on the feet but these shoes are very light and thin as if walking on air. i like them so far. not bad at all.
Original brand new Timberland.Boots are very confortable, as usual with TimberlandConfortable and cheapest priceI'm Very satisfied and I can suggest this purchaseVery fast shipping also

This is a "narrow" in Birkenstock speak, but I've got a wide foot and it still works for me. What a bargain! This is a full coverage clog in great quality suede, and usually around $130 in stores.Generally, Birks are the most comfortable shoe I can wear - with wide flat feet, most North American sizes are too narrow. With the contoured footbed, I get an arch support and heel cup which actually supports my foot without trying to contort it to someone else's foot shape.I am very, very psyched to have found this on Amazon. Please bring more!
there is not one single other item I would consider more vital to surviving an outbreak of the walking dead. these are a must have.
Bought this boot for varying terrain and temperature conditions. It is stable, comfortable, provides good traction, and is warm without being sweaty. I would strongly recommend this boot.

This is my 2nd time ordering these shoes. The shoes are well made, and long lasting. I feel like I am wearing house slippers when I wear these shoes yet they are supportive to my high arch. The shoes seem to run true to size. They are of good quality and long lasting. i highly recommend these shoes for those of us who do a lot of standing and/or walking.

can't ever go wrong with a pair of chucks! they always say go a half a size down, but in my boyfriends case he had to go a full size down, and me i'm safe with going half a size down..so it definitly varys

These are some of my most comfortable and dependable flip flops I've ever owned. I had my first pair for eight years until darling puppy decided to chew them into peices. I was so elated to discover that they're still available and I ordered a replacement pair. Super comfortable that gets better with time - great arch support.
Beautiful ..... but no use. Faulty design. Can not keep them on my feet.The back of the shoe is short and wide. Nothing seems to work gel pads exc...

I've been wearing these shoes to office for years. This purchase was my third pair. I wore out the other two after replacing soles at least once. The shoes are great. Simple design, hold up well, break in period is about a day and wear very comfortably after that. Bought the first two pairs at department store. This was the first time I purchased shoes through Amazon. No problems with mail purchase. Same shoes, better price. When this pair is worn out, I'll buy a another - through Amazon.

I bought the Propet Women's Stability Walker for my wife. This is in Black 6 2E for $20.78 (got a great deal on the price) with free shipping via Amazon Prime. Happy with the purchase overall, however I feel that the width runs small. My wife prefers wide shoes and I went up to 2E from C/D just to be safe but now I wish I had got the 4E. The shoe looks great though and my wife finds the cushioning very comfortable. Perhaps the overall fit will improve after breaking the shoe in a bit.

I've been wearing these shoes for years and love them. I ordered them because I have not seen them in black in the stores. Unfortunately, they were too small and had to be returned. I am probably going to reorder. My advice is to order a half size larger than you normally wear. Otherwise, they are a well constructed, long lasting shoe perfect for every day wear.
The shoes looks good and are well made, I know how young people like to stay in style and they arrived well in the time frame given.

This type of sneaker is not a durable quality sneaker at all. I have purchased at tag sales old Ked's sneakers for $3-$5 dollars which were much more durable. I save this pair purchased for going out on business trips or the like since this type of Ked's sneakers wouldn't last a week with my daily work chores, sad to say.
I found these to be a perfect fit. They are very comfortable and great for those long shopping trips. Look very nice with both casual dress and jeans.

Who notices a man's shoe?Well, oddly enough people have had nice compliments. They are comfy and easy to slip on if you need to jump out a window at a moment's notice. The tread on them is interesting. I can't say what long time wearing will do to it but it borders on wearing rubber cleats without scuffing the floor.I say buy them ... but then what would make me special for wearing them if you have the same pair?

lots of comments about size ...so much so that i anticipated having to send them back.here's my advice - don't use the size charts listed because its way off. Do this:get a tape measure - stand on it, measure from the bottom rear of your foot up to the tip of your big toe...then match that with the size next to it... (skip all the US/ EU / GB size... they are clearly wrong on the size listing)So, my daughters measurement was 10" from back to tip - we ordered size 9. Perfect fit.okay, material quality is nice for wearing around the house or art school... but from what i could tell, it won't stand up to constant use. But hey, they're inexpensive (relatively speaking) so buy a few pair.m
These are so very easy to wear - comfortable from day 1, cushy, durable, and casual looking as opposed to sloppy. This is the 3rd pair I've purchased (my sister absconded with my 2nd pair).

When basketballer Charles "Chuck" Taylor walked into the Converse company back in 1921 complaining of sore feet, he started a revolution. He designed a shoe that was to bear his name only two years later. It would go on to be THE most popular sneaker of all time. Over 500 million pairs have been sold worldwide. The popularity of these legendary shoes has gone in waves but people have always come back to Chucks throughout the past 80 years! And some people, like myself, just can't get enough of them, and go on to build a collection of these wonderful sneakers. Nowadays I only wear Chucks, no other sneaker graces my feet. They are so comfortable and good looking, and take it from me, they boost your self-esteem! Walk down the street in them and you feel ten feet tall. Sounds corny, but it's true. They're like a security blanket around your ankles. I absolutely love Chucks and won't ever stop wearing them. Do yourself a favour, buy a pair. Then see how long till you get another and another.

As the title says, I believe this is an essential purchase for any man. They're comfortable, light, and good looking. The flat sole is great for extended walking and sports (specially weight lifting in my case). I like how they look and make my feet look slim as well. Heheh. Combined with my other clothing, I like how they help make everything seem that much "tighter". These are just a must have :)
I got this as a gift for my husband. Everyday he comes home talking about how comfortable these shoes are.
Great quality boot -- I'm always willing to pay a little more for the MADE IN USA tag, but didn't have to this time! My husband goes through boots very quickly, so these will be getting re-ordered!

I can't say enough about this shoe.I had surgery on both feet and so before and after this, was well-acquainted with musculo-skeletal pain, and with many types of "comfort" shoes (no high heels for me!). I also lived in NYC (the walking-on-concrete capital of the universe!!!); which exacerbated many of my foot-knee-hip-back pains. and I work in medical care, where I cover 12-hr (plus) shifts on my feet....quite a recipe for VERY sore feet.these shoes saved my feet!! they are the most comfortable, most long-lasting, most sole-saving shoes I have ever found. I can work a 12 hour shift and I have close to no discomfort. I can stand for long periods of time with no foot pain.I would recommend these shoes to anyone who 1) has to do a lot of city walking, 2) spends long hours on their feet, and 3) has sore feet (or other joints) in general.excellent, excellent shoe.

I ordered two of these for grocery shopping. I also ordered 3 of another canvas type. Should have ordered all 5 as this bag. Great bag. Stupendous even! Just like the pricer Lands' End bags. Study, well stitched. I hauled 4 2-liter bottles today in one and it didn't strain at all. This tote is worth every penny paid and definately would purchase again should I need more totes in the future. PS - love that outside pocket - I now have somewhere to keep a pen for shopping!
These shoes are so comfortable. I ordered mine in black/silver. They look a tad bit dressier than a regular black flat shoe, but they are as comfortable as a tennis shoe.

i have owned 86 pair of the 4600 over the last 15 years. i know the shoe. this purchase was for the 85th and 86th pair.the tongue is 1/3rd as thick on these compaired to the other 84 pairthe name on the heel is half as dark as the other 84 pairthe "v" shape on the sole side is 1/2 as dark as the other 84 pairnot sure they are the real thing. bought my last pair in december 12 and that pair matched the previous 83 pair. if reebok has changed the shoe in 2 months then they must be real if not then something is wrong with these two pair

First, buy half size lower than your normal size. These boots are really made for riding, and that's why I bought them. I've been wearing zories for 50 years and these are the absolute best! The best thing is this rubber doesn't rub the top of your foot - no blisters like plastic or cheap rubber - and they are super cushy and amazingly durable. I've got 3 pairs so far and am sure I'll need more.
These shoes are very light and appear durable. I had hoped for more spring in the step. I find that it is difficult to tie the shoes with the tightness I prefer.
All great, this is my 3rd justin in 7 years, very comfortable, soft & good color,I recommend it for daily use.

I purchased my Men's Irish Setter Countrysiders because I suffer from plantar fasciitis, and I also have weak ankles. I teach middle school, and I am on my feet all day. I wore Rockports for a while, but they did not give me the ankle support that I needed. I stumbled upon these Men's Irish Setter Countrysiders while doing a google search. They are great! The insoles are removeable (perfect for me because I wear custom orthotics). They do need a couple of days to break in just above the inside ankles because they are boots, but then they fit like a glove!I am about to purchase my 2nd pair.

I love this shoe so much! I bought this in about five different colors. I'm eager to see how many more they come out with. I am trying to keep up with what they offer because they sell out fast. If you're looking for the perfect career shoe, I highly recommend this one. I am especially partial to the brown leather.

The shoe I bought was extremely cool! The last time I had a shoe like this was about three years ago. Its a Vans Omar Hassan all black super suede pretty much like this design. The difference was eS was more rugged and tough looking than the Omar Hassan series. I would love to see eS create more designs in the same super suede all black series. You can wear it likewise in semi-formal attire. My only regret is that I didnt bought a spare one for the future.
Love this shoe for my baby.Another one to add to his collection of Chucks.

Life in the midwest winters means lots of ice. I couldn't survive the winter without Yaktrax. They're great for walking on ice, snow, and trampled down snow from plows and blowers. I haven't had a tumble on the ice since I found these and they make pushing the snowblower much easier, too.

Short and simpleThese boots are very attractive. And very comfortable. Also , roomy in the toes.I worn them today for the first time in 23 degrees weather with one pair of socks.My feet FROZE!!!! these boots are not for warmth.

These are awesome, if you have wide feet, my suggestion is that you go up one size, don't go with the wide version. The wide version makes your foot look huge, and the instep, where you most likely need the width, is wider, but padded, so not really wider :) These ones are sharp!
These are excellent shoes with a lot of support. I wear them at work and to hike in. They're very tough.

I love how comfortable they feel on my feet. I did forget that Timberland's are usually sized a bit large when compared to shoes. These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. They are literally like you are walking on air. Usually when I buy Mary Jane's they slide up and down on my heel but these do not.

As a matter of fact, I have them on right now as i am writing this review..I'm thinking about buying another pair in a different color just because i love them so much.

I love these shoes. Very cute, simple, classic style. The graphite color is very versatile (comes with white laces if you don't dig the yellow). outlook is pretty good than the quetion about comfort,not so comfortable as aspecting
These shoes are very comfortable and I love the stitching on the sides and along the heel. These would be great for casual as well as work wear.

This pair is as good as described but i have to return it because i dont use shoes with laces and picture was not very clear. Return policy and customer service is top rated.

I have 2 pairs of this model shoe and love them. After being a Nike fan for years I decided to give something else a try. This shoe is lightweight and very comfortable. I also love the classic style. And you can't complain about the nice price.
NB is the only sneaker I will buy. Love the look of this one and it is very confortable. Great colors too.

I love these shoes! I am going on 15 years wearing them. I have replaced them 3 times. I can not imagine wearing anything else in the summer. I have extra wide feet and the front adjustment allows you to keep your toes from getting crushed! There is a nice space for your orthotic inserts too.Additionally these shoes are very well made. They will last you! I wore my last pair for 5 years!! And considering I wear them every day from April through October that really says something.I give these a triple A. I already brought a spare pair I will hide in the back of my closet for 2017 when these wear out.... YES they are THAT GOOD!!

I find these shoes to be the most comfortable things in the world. They complement my clothes very well. But the down side is that with all of the snow we have recieved here on the east coast....wearing them outside is not a good idea. Especially if you want to keep you feet warm. But all in all.....I love my shoes.
Bought these shoes for my teenage son.He loves them - still wearing them after two years.The great part of Vans is that the size is consistent around the world.

Arrived in good condition. My daughter is a size 6 1/2-7, so I ordered these in size 8.5. This was the smallest size available at the time, and after reading other reviews thought it would be smart to order larger in case they fit small and hard to put on. I would say the size is pretty true to fit. The 8.5 were pretty big for my 2/12 year old. She isn't wearing them much since they are a little too big in size, and they go high up in the leg so it's hard for her to walk. I had a hard time finding a pair online that were pink, not too high, and would ship to Canada. Overall, the product meets the description expectations, I just wish I found ones that went mid calf and would ship to Canada.

My boots just came in the mail today and they're great! They're really well made, however, they're narrow. I wear a size 10 1/2, so if you wear a half size, go up to the next size. If your feet aren't narrow, "normal" width, or wide, i suggest going up ANOTHER size. I bought a size 12, so they fit perfectly, and they've got room for my toes to wiggle, they don't hurt at all. I'm 5'11" and it's hard to find heels that don't hurt, but these are nice. They don't stand straight up on their own either, so they're real easy to get on and they crunch around your ankles and thighs which makes them look really nice. If you're not used to wearing heels, the heel on them is real thin and it may take some getting used to to walk in them. But otherwise, no complaints, they're comfortable and beautiful!!

I love these sneakers, I've worn through pair after pair over the years and I keep buying more. They are super light and cushiony, great for walking or running. I just can't get into new styles of running shoes that feel clunky, heavy or throw me off balance. These classic joggers haven't changed in decades and are perfect just the way they are!

Girlfriend loved them. Price was better then local area stores. She has other colors of the same shoe so they last a lifetime.

Love this sandal! I have plantar fasciitis and have difficulty finding shoes with good arch support. This one is perfect for me. The fit is true to size, the sole is not slippery, is comfortable and the style is wonderful! I know I'll get tons of compliments this summer because the one strap is plain leather and the other strap is a pattern. You don't see that in flip flops! Love the colors too. I'll be ordering another pair because you just can't have enough cool sandals.

Enjoy my shoes. Just came back from a long walk in them. Very happy with shoes and service

I love these sandals and have ordered them over the internet for many years. They are basically my favorite shoe and I order them in many colors. I fear that they are being phased out, as they are getting hard for me to find now.
This product fits way too big! I was disappointed by the lack of information about fitting. However, the product shipped fast. Just keep in mind that you should buy this product a size smaller
These shoes are adorable. I have only had a chance to wear them once, but when I did I recieved plenty of compliments and no blisters. For the price they are amazing!!!

I'm a firm believer in "you get what you pay for." And these shoes are a perfect example of that. This is my second pair of Merrells, my first set survived around 2 1/2 years of abuse before finally giving up. I wear them primarily as daily walkers (averaging 4-5 miles a day), but I've had no issue going off road with them. They've been with me in Iraq, Afghanistan, all over the US, and now Korea. They breathe well, are very comfortable, and this has been by far the best deal, price-wise. Do yourself a favor and get a set, you won't be disappointed.
Timberland Men's Euro Hiker Boot, Grey/Grey,9.5 M US great boots for work or very day life very comfortable, worm and soft inside great boots for fare value.
super fast delivery, fits great, great price. i am pleased. i wish i would have found these earlier! i m filled with joy

I have been playing soccer for 13 years at many different levels (rec, select, high school, and college). I bought my first pair of copa's 9 years ago. They are by far the best cleats around for under $... They have lasted me about 2 years for each pair. They offer superb ball control, grip, ball feel, and kick velocity. They are simply the only thing I will wear to play competitive soccer.

This was my second pair of Rainbow sandals/flip flops, and the fit and feel are different from my first. The look, too, is different. I retuned the pair, thinking I might have the wrong size, and the second pair is just as disappointing.On the good side, the sellers had excellent service and response time to the issuesI'm not sure what happened, but the new Rainbows are not what they used to be, and just don't feel as comfortable; narrow and too snug.

If your feet don't go, you don't go. I bought my first pair of these over 20 years ago and I keep buying more as I tear them up, which takes some work. I've run, climbed buildings and hills, and walked miles in the Ft. Lewis boots and they keep you going.
Great seller, responded immediately to inquiries. Product arrived on time for Christmas and was exactly as described! I would buy from again. Thank you!
My daughter loved the shoes. They are good quality and reasonable price. The vendor sent the shoes on time. My daughter says they are "very cool"

I read reviews of these before buying this pair - I have bought two pairs of Timberland boots before, one pair thats literally lasted app. 20 years with a lot of use, and another pair that only lasted two years. I received these in yesterday, and will update the review if they don't break in well or last. So far my impressions are - 1. Accurate to size, 13w, I wear New Balance / Nike wide tennis shoes as additional reference 2. Comfortable, but not cushiony if you know what I mean, I wore them all day yesterday without blisters or sore spots 3. I was expecting non insulated boots, which I got, but these are still warm to hot - gussetted tongue and no ventilation means these are not a boot I am looking forward to wearing on a construction site in the middle of a Texas summer. I have received in what I expected, and given Timberlands reputation and my exp I'm giving it 5 stars pending further experience with this pair of boots.
i normally wear a 7.5, i ordered a 7 and they are perfect. i love them. more support, and more comfortable than regular flip flops.

I'll give Ariat this - these are very cute boots! But unfortunately, the calf area is HUGE!!! I'm "average" (5'5) and the boots fit perfectly on my feet, but I can easy fit two of my calves in the boot. It was absurd - I've purchased several pairs of boots before, but these are definitely the biggest boot opening I've seen!The pair I got were already scratched (they were quite visible) on different parts of both boots, like someone had almost tried them on and in the process, scratched the leather to ensure deep marks. Also, there were black stains on one of my boots. I didn't spend a $140 on these boots so I could received used goods and defective goods. Don't plan to order from Bare Bones again.

I ordered these for my 8 year old daughter who wears between a 2.5 and 3 street shoe, depending upon the shoe. I ordered a size 4, hoping to get a couple of years out of them. They fit her nicely with room to grow, but not so much extra room that they will be cumbersome on her foot while dancing. My daughter liked 2 things about the shoes -- "they feel good on my feet", and "they are such a pretty shade of pink....they are like a baby pink, not that orangey-pink like my last pair".

I got these a number larger than I normally get, because I have a very high wrist, and wasn't sure it would fit. They feel small in size, so the fit was perfect. I also feel that they at times don't manage to warm my feet if they are already cold, which is a problem. But if I wear them all day, my feet are warm and snugly. I don't regret this purchase, and would recommend them to others.

I'm updating my reviews on this product, because I think I got a little carried away before. My previous review stated that people who were complaining about the width of these things were Bigfoot. I have a wide foot myself, and their complaints caused me to order a size vastly larger than I needed, and I still feel that that's true. These people must have freak-feet. But the fact of the matter is, after I returned the Crocs from Shoebuy for a refund, I went out to a physical store to try on some Crocs. As it turned out, not only were the Crocs that were my size wide enough, but I could actually wear a size down. I usually wear a 10, and I ended up buying a 9. This NEVER EVER EVER happens to me. I could have worn the Crocs which were my size easily enough, but I preferred the 9's, which were a nice, firm fit. I also intended them as house shoes, and will not be using the heel strap. The heel strap actually does make my toe hit the front a bit uncomfortably, but as I said- I won't use them. I only tested that out for the sake of sizing evaluation.So, the long and short of it is that I wouldSERIOUSLY RECOMMEND GETTING THE SIZE YOU WEARIf you have a wide foot, and it is generally the case that you can buy a shoe labeled "wide width", you DO NOT need to scale up for Crocs. Crocs in this design will EASILY fit wide width feet.As far as this seller goes, Shoebuy's customer service was good, and when I need a new pair, I am sure I will simply order from them.
These shoes are very comfy once worn in, and perfect for anything from walking to skateboarding. I would choose them over converse any day. They are also quite durable.

These shoes are really cute, I get compliments on them all the time . They are perfect for wearing to work because technically they are sneakers but they really are too "formal looking" for their secret to be revealed :)However, I have been wearing them for about a month and I have found two problems: 1) The back of the left shoe really cuts into my heel, making it somewhat raw and red if I walk around in these shoes all day (not heavy duty walking, just walking around in the office). 2) THEY SMELLLLLL!!!!!! I am really surprised no one has mentioned this yet. They do not breathe at ALL so they (and your feet) end up stinking so badly that it's embarrassing.
