The shoes are comfortable and well supported as reported to me. Be careful when you go with white. Stains only come off if you clean them right away. Scuffs are easily noticeable and near impossible to get off. The colors in the pictures on Amazon are very accurate.I would definitely buy them again and would reccommend it to others.

This really is the best shoe I have found for training on pavement. It is very cushioned, and I notice less leg pain than with the various kinds I was trying before these. It wears like iron - I get probably 50% more life than from a pair than from other trainers I have used. Part of that is due to the fact that the uppers are still made with real animal hides, not synthetic. I put 600 miles on my last pair and visually it looked almost brand new.Oh, the best part: they're one of the few shoes still made in the USA by American workers.
For fashion sneakers, Skechers continues to impress. These shoes look great and are very comfortable as well.

I ordered a half-size larger, in response to reviews here, and that was good advice. But alas, one shoe was larger than the other, even though marked the same size. Amazon, as always, was great about the return. Apart from that, it's a fun shoe at a good price.

This is my 3rd pair & if I didn't wear them doing everything - including yard work, I wouldn't have to order new ones. Not to mention my basset hound liked the material and chewed one up. I love these shoes and replaced them because I wear them so much - very comfortable too.
I bought these for my husband and he loooooves them. Once they are broken in they are extremely comfy not to mention convenient!

When I was a kid in the 70s, there were all kinds of new sneaker designs coming out, but nothing ever beat the reliable old standards, either Converse Chucks or Pro-Keds Court Kings. Those sneakers were great for any sport, they held up under abuse, and never went out of fashion for boys and girls alike. These Pro Keds are a bit of a play on the old design, and come in a wide variety of cuts, colors & materials. I've got several pairs of low-cuts, one pair in suede with natural (translucent brown) rubber toe, another made out of bright yellow tennis ball fuzz with white rubber, and this pair, shiny navy blue leather with light blue & white rubber. There are a variety of color combinations to pick from, in fact on the Keds website you could even make a custom pair for awhile. They are some of the toughest, well-made sneakers and incredibly comfortable as well. They're the ultimate casual weekend shoe, and the most recent ones I've gotten come with a lighter, shapely molded insert rather than just a flat foam rubber & canvas insert, giving better support. I wear a lot of Vans and Converse sneakers too, and honestly, the Pro-Keds are constructed more solidly than either of the other brands. They can stand up to serious abuse, especially the ones made out of leather.

I purchased these boots to replace a pair of burlys that were quite old; they had cracked along the top of the foot near the ankle. My husband uses them to slosh through the hilly woods on particularly soggy days as well as for wading in streams. I am told they are completely waterproof, quite comfy, have awesome traction and the fit is mostly true to size. They maybe run a fraction big, so to be a perfect fit when wearing thick socks. He's very happy with these boots. My father has been wearing LaCrosse boots for as long as I can remember and these latest boots continue in the tradition. I didn't give them a 5 for a purely girlie minor detail. I think some people might roll their eyes now, but here goes, they smell bad. Despite the advertising that they are scent free, it took a couple weeks of airing out to get rid of the rubber boot smell. It doesn't matter so much for us, but if you are planning to use them for hunting I would recommend buying them early so that they have time to lose that smell. Otherwise they are perfect!
This was the best out there for the money. Bought them for my husband for Christmas and he loves them. Very water proof after playing in the snow with the kids...
I've always been sceptical when buying any clothing and footwear online. I've always wanted a pair of Chuck's. Got these, tried them on and I love them!

I bought this for my husband to wear as work shoes as he is standing all day and he needs ankles support. The leather and manufacture seems pretty flimsy and smells really bad. And not like leather but like chemicals. The inside lining looks cheap. Too bad I bought two pairs.

IT SEEMS LOSING A RETURN TICKET FOR THIS COMPANY IS A MAJOR ERROR. I DID SO AND HAVEN'T BEEN ABLE TO CLEAR THE MATTER WITH THEM SINCE. NEEDLESS TO SAY, I STILL HAVE THE SHOES AND TIME IS RUNNING OUT FOR RETURNING THEM/
This shoe is narrow across the toes, and definitely needs a better arch support. I'm truly disappointed with this shoe, but wanted an all white leather tennis shoe.
I bought these sandals to replace an old faithful pair of keens I bought several years ago that finally had to be retired. Keens are comfortable and durable. Highly recommended!! I have several pair.

I ordered these shoes not only because their adorable, but I love the pale pink color. When I opened the box yesterday I found that they are bright, hot pink, not the pale pink that is pictured. I'm pretty sure that this is the new color that Minnetonka uses, but I thought that since I was buying from Amazon, it would be the color advertised. I am returning them and now looking at sites like ebay to find the pale pink color.
This was a gift. It arrived on time for my 80 something year old grandmother's birthday. Even she thinks they are comfortable.
These are the best flats I've ever owned! I've actually worn out my old ones and am looking desperately for another pair! Anyone know where these are still sold?
Be detailed and specific. What would you have wanted to know before you purchased the product?Not too short and not too long. Aim for between 75 and 300 words.

I WANTED THE BLACK 9WEST PUMPS. AFTER I PLACED THE ORDER AND REALIZED I IMMEDIATELY CALLED AMAZON CUSTOMER SERVICE AND SHE INSISTED THAT I ORDERED THE BLACK EVEN THOUGH THE COLOR SAID NATURAL. SO I HAD TO GO ON VACATION WITHOUT THE BLACK PUMPS THAT I WANTED.
I purchase this sandals for my mother. She likes this sandals because they are very soft and easy to put on. Also the leather is very soft and comfortable.

My 6 yr old daughter loves these shoes! we got the black and fushsia, & although very pretty to look at, not to practical for school! the front of her shoes have become pretty tattered with the sequins falling off. She is pretty active, but still wants to be girlie, so I thought these would be perfect with the sneaker type sole! And they are, except for the diminishing sequins pieces! More for pictures or dressier affairs!

These boots are some of the most comfortable that I've ever worn. Even after being on my feet for more than 6 hours my feet felt good. The boots are very warm which is kind of a draw back since I live in Las Vegas. However, after a day of work I was pleasantly surprised to find my socks were still dry. These would probably be best suited for cold climate hiking, but they work pretty good in the desert. Well worth the money.

converse are so back!! these shoes are the best ever because they're comfertable to run in(or walk..), totally durable!!(they're washable canvas!!), and completely kool! beleive me about this stuff cause i have four pairs, and all of my friends have them, and we all love them so much!! converse come in all the colors under the sun, and kool prints like camo! if you were thinking about getting these but hesitated, go ahead! they are perfect to wear with any outfit: punk, shopping, date, or even to prom! one girl at my school did, and it looked really good! you definitly won't regret your purchase!!

While I'm not the one wearing them, they certainly are attractive and classic in style. Build quality appeared good. We are actually going to laser engrave on the side of the canvas part to customize for a friend. They will be Supah cool!

First off, I'm not really a kid, but I don't want to sign up for an acount. Know that. I bought a pair a couple months ago. They obviously get kudos in the cool facter right off the bat. Then I put them to the real test. On the court. They are super comfortable and are still holding up great. They also breathe very well.This brings me to the only problems. Soon after I bought a pair, my friend did too. He plays in them not only on the hard-court, but on the black top when he's practicing also. Therefore he uses them A LOT. A few days ago one of the air pumps in the sole sprung a leak and his right shoes rim no longer spins. I've only heard of this happening to a couple people, but if you abuse your shows as much as my friend does, you might want to look else where. Also the sound of the pump is audible. Not terribly noticable, expecialy on the court.All in all, this is a great shoe and really encourage you buying it. Whether you want it for hoops or for style, it's sick no matter what.

Before my purchase I read all the rave review's about this boot. I'm now in total agreement with everyone else. This is the most comfortable shoe I've ever worn. After one week I bought a second pair (Black & Brown). I work in a casual dress office and, they look great!

I have owned these sandals before and just love how comfortable they are. I have tried very hard to find ones to compare with being as comfortable when wearing to do shopping and to do anything for a long time. I would definitely recommend them for comfort and durability.

I love these cleats. I just bought my third pair of them. I play an average of 2-3x a week in different leagues and pickup games and each pair has lasted 2-3 years. I keep buying them for a reason; they are the best cleats I've ever worn. Comfortable with great touch and durable enough that I don't mind how often I need to replace them.
excellent product, I really liked'm very pleased with the purchase. . . . . . . . . . .

I bought them thinking they would be like my keds I've own for sometime. The are called the original. They looked the same unless you get really close and see the inside isn't terry cloth they are cheaper made. I bought a med it is what I wear but i'm in the process of trying to stretch them out. Wetting them and putting them over objects to stretch them since they are so tight. Length is right but they are narrow now with wetting them the blue from the soles have come up and i'll now have to deal with that. So what can I say - could have returned them you have always been great but thought I could stretch them out since i've been unable to find the ked original in the store.

These grasshopper shoes are one of the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. The sole of the shoe is cushiony and you almost feel like you are walking on air. I was a bit concerned about the light color (they only had beige available at the time of purchase). There was a little bit of dirt on the shoes and it wiped them off lightly with some warm water. I would definitely recommend these shoes especially for summer and the warmer months.

I'm not a runner really and I bought this shoe so I can play tennis, but I can definitely tell the difference between the feeling from the shoe and my old pair of Asics. The Asics GEL technology is definitely nice and feels more dynamic upon ground impact. The Mercury trainer shoe seems to have these columns at predetermined impact points. It does add a little bounce to the run; also when I first wore them I noticed my gait changed a bit probably from the impact columns. I think it's pretty elevated at the heel but it's not too bad after you get use to it. Perhaps this is the effect of a cross trainer design, but I wouldn't know. Looks like a SHOX copy.I would probably stick with an Asics.

These crocs are just perfect for my little one on the go. He is 13 months and wearing shoes for the first time. He hated other shoes, but these are so light and comfie that he has not fussed and runs around in them happily. I highly recommend crocs for little toddlers on the go!

My mother has severe foot problems. Her "hammer toe" would rub against the top of the shoe, creating blisters, etc., so she finally stopped wearing shoes altogether. This meant, of course, she didn't leave the house. We finally found these shoes with the deeper toe-well, and she's out and about once again! Fantastic!
Son buenos ahora pense que podian ser como los SAS, si esa son las espectativas no los compres , ahora como zapato comun no estan mal
Very comfortable and very true to size. Shoe is easy to slip on and off and very good looking with jeans

I guess I will be keeping this pair, I need them for an event and it's too late to go looking elsewhere. It's seems comfortable--basic style and for women like me who can't tolerate heels, it's a nice dress option. But it's advertised on Amazon as leather and it's not leather, nor is it going to fool anyone.

I ordered these shoes for my son who is a Crossfit Trainer. He wears a size 13 shoe so this is what I ordered. When the shoes arrived they were at least 2 sizes too large. My son said that they measured at least a size 14/15. I had to return them. So if you are ordered these remember that they run very large.
Bought these shoes at a Friday sale. Great value. They fit perfectly and are quite comfortable. Stylish too!
Lovely shoes! Sturdy and so sexxy... I would highly recommend. Of course a shoe of this height is not for the faint of heart

I was traveling and I realized a need for something to be comfortable while out on an assignment that would not require trekking out to the local mall. I found a very comfortable casual shoe that is also very attractive at a great price. I cannot say enough about how comfortable this shoe is. The combination of ordering it via Amazon and getting it the next day was a much more pleasurable drill than parking at the mall an shopping for hours... I should also mention that I bought it via my Kindle Fire also purchased on Amazon. Technology via shoe leather (well rubber compound soles) meets the road.

I finished a marathon on this pair of shoes - and I don't think I could have done it without them! I used to use a Reebok prior until 2009, which I thought was the best shoes on earth (bought the same model twice). But when I tried running on these shoes for the first time in 2010, I fell in love. Long distance running never felt so light and easy! Since then I only buy Asics. I bought another model last year, it was okay but not as good as this one - so I think my next purchase would definitely be this exact same pair!

Because of issues of authenticity, I wrote to SHOE PLANET if these UGG is fake or not. This is their reply:"We only sell authentic merchandise and we are an authorized dealer to sell UGG'S. I understand your concern however, I can assure you that these came directly from the UGG manufacturer. I would recommend only buying from reputable sellers through web sites that you have heard of such as Amazon. There are guidelines that we are required to follow to prove the items are authentic. If the price is too good to be true they will almost always be fake merchandise, so be cautious about that. Please let us know if you have any additional questions."You be the judge......
This is sooooooooooooo great!!!!!!! Cleats are amazing!!!!!!!!!!!! I'm so glad I bought these Cleats!!!!! The Cleats are lightweight and are very comfortable, it feels I run 10 times faster!!
I can definitely recommend these shoes to anyone! Leather is very soft and the ComforTech features make it a comfortable shoe.

Great shoes. My son loves them, and they aren't easy for him to pull off. Once his feet got a little bigger, it did get harder to get the shoes on his feet, since you have to stretch the shoe opening *just* the right way. They are super comfortable for him though, and he loves walking in them.

These boots are great quality! I bought them for my dad who is a police officer and he loves them. He said they were hard to break in, but really good quality. I had to return them several times because of the tricky E vs EE sizing. We got it figured out and he loves his new boots.
Skechers Men's Seige Lace Looped OxfordExcellent product recominedo 100 % from Caracas - Venezuela.Excelente producto lo recominedo 100% desde Caracas-Venezuela.

I am on my fifth pair of these sandals, yes 5th. pair!! they are the BEST!!!! Bought my first pair in Old Branson, Missouri and in love with them ever since,hope they never discontinue these planning on purchasing another pair,like to have an extra pair on hand!!!

True to size and are very comfortable right out of the box so no painful breaking in the boots. I work all day on my feet and do not experience any discomfort at the end of my shift. Highly recommend.
THESE ARE ADOREABLE. i was surprised at how cheap they were. i can dress these up or down. go with almost anything. extremely confortable. buy buy buy !

Timberland is a good product. I have a few pairs of shoes from Timberland. Theses boots do have a solid fit, as one customer stated, but the fit is very comfortable! Gives a sold footing with walking in the unpredictable winter weather. Highly recommended. The price is extremely low for a Timberland product. This boot is a winner!
These was purchased as a gift for my Mom who raves about how comfortable these sneakers are. A Great buy!!!!
Great item, it is excelent for gift or any event you made, i totaly recommend it, i just love it.

I originally bought this shoe for running on a treadmill, but after I tried them on I loved them! Now I where them everywhere I go! They are so comfortable. I have really high arches, and had read that these worked great for those kinds of feet. They do for awhile, but after a long day of walking in them, the top of my right arch began to ache from rubbing on the tongue of the shoe; thats why I rated it a 4 instead of a 5. Other than that I just love them...they are stylish, comfortable on the soles of your feet, and just what I was looking for!

At less than $13, this is an amazing gift for a sister, mom, aunt or bff who has a casual, classy style. My order arrived FAST. The bag is very high quality, the stitching amazing, the color lighter than pictured, yet perfect for both holiday and year round use. The tote is neither too large or small, has loads of pockets for organization, and the handles are long enough (and soft enough)to wear comfortably as a shoulder bag.My family is scaling back on overall gift giving this year by agreement of everyone, and this gift "looks" as though I spent much more money than I did. I'll tuck a dollar store coupon organizer into it, but you could add the matching, zip top wallet for an expensive look on a budget as well... or tuck a small bottle of her favorite perfume in a pocket. The beautiful quilted tote is gift-able on its own. Very happy with my purchase!
I now own five pairs!!! All in different colors! Hope they never stop selling them!

These shoes were very comfortable, but made too much noise while walking. An air pocket formed and caused a sound with each step. I have poorly formed feet so it is probably more a problem with my feet than the shoes. I wish they didn't do that because they were so comfortable.

These are terrific flip flops. They have good arch support and the soles haven't squished down like other brands of flip flops I've had. I've been wearing them almost daily for months and they're practically like new.

Shoe looks a bit more boot like than I anticipated.Fit wise, it runs true to size. Top of the shoe rubs my ankle bone some and is uncomfortable; I hope that goes away over time as the shoe breaks in. I probably wouldn't buy this shoe again, but will wear it until they are worn out.
this is my second pair of reefs after finally deciding after 8 years that I should add a new pair. I love them!
so very comfortable . light weight . just a little too wide even for more wide feet . but very wearable . i have plantar fasciitis and these clogs are very good at alleviating the discomfort

Real ballet shoes at a reasonable price. We bought them for Christmas for our 3 budding prima ballerina granddaughters. They were ecstatic. They danced the day away. It made for a very Merry Christmas.

Wearing a AAAA shoe, it is very difficult to find a nice shoe in such widths. I have purchased several pairs of this shoe in many colors over the years. Goes with both skirts and pants. Just wish it came in silver!

The shoe is nice but they run really small. I am not sure if this is how dance shoes are supposed to fit but I wear a size 9. So I bought a size 9..they were tight so I exchanged them for a 9.5...they are still tight in the toe area. Be careful!!

For years I considered Birkenstocks to be the shoe for nerds, and wouldn't even think of wearing them. Then one summer I was on my feet all day at the Minnesota State Fair, walking 12+ hours on concrete without a break, when I happened across a booth selling Birkenstocks. My feet were throbbing, so just for the heck of it I tried on a pair. They felt wonderful! I was an instant convert, and bought them on the spot. As I continued walking around the fair, it felt like I was getting a foot massage with every step, and my feet were renewed for more miles of walking.Now I wear my Birkenstocks all the time, except when I HAVE to wear dress shoes for work.Give them a try - I think you will be pleasantly surprised, as I was.

I bought these shoes for my husband/son on a Saturday and they were delivered to my house on the following Tuesday. Super, fast delivery I really like the colors they have in these shoes, they are in a cute style, the quality is good,and the price is great.

I really like these! They are super comfortable and move nicely. However, sizing information is super confusing. The size chart is confusing so I looked to reviews for help. They were even more confusing. I ended up buying my street shoe size, and they are just a little too big. I probably could've gotten away with a 5 1/2 (I wear a 6). But other than that they are great!

This is a beautifully classic shoe and quality is nice. The heel composition is the exception. It is a hard, hard plastic or rubber. It is very slippery on tile or brick floors. Be careful. As other reviewers indicated, the sizing is off. Consider ordering a half size larger.

My son loves to be a cowboy. He can't wait to go back to Wild West City for our annual trip. He wanted a new pair of cowboy boots, and even at 9. many stores consider his foot size to be that of a man. Locally, a pair of cowboy boots for him may have cost me over $100. We decided to look online. We found a pair that was reasonable and ordered them. Everyday he anxiously awaited his purchase. They arrived in the amount of time promised. He was so excited when he opened the box and they were all they said they would be. He was absolutely thrilled and they immediately went on his feet and the fit was excellent (I ordered them 1 to 1/2 size larger than what he is wearing so that he will have room and not outgrow them immediately). The styling is really nice and the quality great. What a deal!
Product received promptly and was exactly as expected. Was a repeat purchase of product I liked and the price was right.

i have been wanting these boots for the past three years now and i have finly got them, they are everthing i wanted. i have been climbing trees and my spikes are rubbing on my legs for now on they can rub on my boots and save my legs. thanks to company.
Be warned, I was shipped a wide shoe even though my order said nothing about it being a wide(W). If you buy this item, check the size right away and make sure it is what you ordered.
I've ordered this shoe before and was a little disappointed that the quality was not consistent. I love the style and heel height works well for me.
6 N is a hard to find shoe size. This white sandal was perfect in every way. It's exactly what I was looking for !!
These are great shoes once your toddler is truly toddling. They are hard rubber soles and great for outside time. They are not slipper-like. A bit clunky looking.

Dada's are some of the best basketball shoes i have ever had. The only bad thing i have found is the price difference between youth and large. $20.00 more for a bigger size is rediculous, but other than that they are really cool shoes especially how you can personalize them with your teams colors and your team name, your name, and your number. Some of the reasons they are really good shoes are because they are comfortable, have good traction, and just look good.

I wore these to school (as a teacher I am on my feet all day). Best shoe I have bought for school and at a reasonable price. I have bad knees and need something with cushioning and support. At the end of 4 days my knees hurt much less than usual and these shoes breathe enough so my feet weren't sweaty.

These shoes are great. Stability when walking. Size/fit are true. I would recommend these shoes for all walkers, but especially for those like me, a senior citizen whose daily exercise is mainly walking. I had purchased a white pair last year and was very pleased with them so I bought these black ones to wear in the winter.

I bought four pair of these in different colors. They are the SOFTEST shoes - they just hug your feet and feel like you've slipped a soft little glove over your tootsies! ;-) I have long, narrow feet so being able to get them in my size was a plus as well. I am absolutely delighted with them.

Let me preface this review by saying that I've owned these shoes for several years and they have been among favorite casual shoes. Although the uppers and outsoles have held up remarkably well, the sort of honeycomb midsole has disintegrated - the material has basically turned to what appears like ground coffee, making them unwearable. I don't know what caused this; they're not worn constantly nor are they worn in wet or other extreme conditions. I'll probably try to contact Clarks to see if they have an explanation or an offer of adjustment.
I bought these Chuck's for my daughter and they were a perfect fit. The turnaround time was excellent! I will continue to purchase from this vendor :)

Caterpillar boots are all I wear! I'm a pipe fitter so they have to stand up to a harsh environment daily, and they just that! I also would recommend the Endure series boots from Cat. You'll be very pleased if you buy these!

These shoes are inexpensive, light weight, and very comfortable.They were hard to get on at first. There is a loop on the tongue that holds the laces... I relaced the shoes without using the loop and they went on much easier.I'm happy with them.

The best shoes ever, but if you use coverse.com to buy your shoes prepair for the SLOWEST loading site you have ever experienced! Many times I didn't buy shoes because of the speed of their site. I have really fast internet and their site is by far the slowest of any site I use. If you have the patients you can't beat the shoes (I always use the create your own) I have created some really unique shoes.

cloth on bottom sole not good for hardwood floors, knobs on bottom of sole with cloth glued to them offers even less area for grip. doubt the knobs will be comfortable, but time will tell. solid build and warm for ankle and once fabric on sole wears out and offers some grip (what where they thinking?) it might be comfortable but will definately be warm, if it doesnt make feet sweat...(just got them so unknown, but looks like the dearforms inner fabric, sorta.) if not for the knobs and cloth on bottom, this could get a five.
These shoes are even better looking in person. They are very high quality for a very low price!

I cant give a detailed review of the shoe itself, because I never received my order. I ordered a pair thru Amazon, and the seller was ShoeMall. Within a few days, my order was canceled because the shoe was no longer available. I have had another experience similar to this with ShoeMall.To comment on the shoe itself, I tried a pair of Traveltime sneakers on in a store, at the end of a long shopping day. My aching feet felt like they were walking on pillows! I couldn't believe how comfortable they were. I didnt purchase any at that time but wish I had!!

I just couldn't ask for a better pair of shoe than this. The fit is perfect. The leather uppers are just a jo to behold. They have remained shiny and clean the past 6 months that I have been using them. I am just hooping that French Shriner could come up with more shoe styles to choose from. Also this particular design doesn't come in saddle brown nor tan. Wish they'd make more colors of the design. Just love it!!!

I wish this shoe was still in production. I originally bought two pairs about 10 years ago when I used to skateboard. I don't skate anymore but I've wanted these shoes again ever since. They don't make shoes like this anymore, it's got more padding and comfort than any other shoe I've ever worn. I'm so glad to have these back on my feet and they are just as amazing as I remembered. I probably won't be able to get another pair after this so it will be a sad day when I have to retire this pair. Thankfully these shoes last forever, especially when you aren't using them for skateboarding.
The size is right, and the sole has good cushion. It hurts in between the toes in the beginning because it has an edge(like a seam of plastic), but think I will get used to it eventually.

I bought my first Dan Post boots in 2004, and they have held in great shape. I bought this pair now in black to go with my business suits. They're not as light and smooth as my other ostrich boots, but they are just as comfortable. They go great with dark suits, so if you're looking for a pair at a good price, I definitely recommend these.
The shoe fit me well, and it came in the original condition - no damages, and it came on time.

Purchased these same farm boots years ago and they lasted a long time gardening and working in the yard. The pair I purchased recently seem to be the same quality. They definately are comfortable and the fit is great.
I know this isn't the most helpful review but I would justlike to concur with the other reviews. I have had these bootsfor a year now and except for a few scuffs, they still are ingreat condition.

Reebok its that I want. You can wear those everywhere during the day. But they run small maybe for a number. I use to wear 9, but they didn't feet in my feet. so Think about this if you are going to buy these shoes.

the shoes came quickly, and my feet are 100 % better now. I have had bad heels for a few months and the shoes took my pain away in less than an hour. they are great! Now I need to look for a winter shoe so I can walk all winter too. The best shoe for heel problems I have ever found.
Very happy customer. My feet are somewhat wide and full so I was pleased these shoes fit comfortably right out of the box. I bought an 8.

I walk 12 NYC blocks each way for my every day commute and have worn these all summer long. They are great for me bc I have a very high arch and not many flip flops have any arch support. Before I got these I was getting shin splints if I walked too fast. These flip flops are comfortable and I wear them everywhere!
First time shoe buyer via internet. Purchased because I'd worn Propet before and was pleased with fit. Not disappointed! The fit was perfect and shoes delivered in a timely way.

I loved the way the flats looked like in Amazon.com only when they arrived it didn't look as I thought they would when I wore them. They are pretty and comfortable and that's what counts plus it's a good bargain.
So glad they make them in a size 16.. I do wish there was a larger selection to choose from but after size 13 the selections naturaly dwindle.
These shoes are comfortable and practical. They are a great, simple work shoe when my feet need a break. They go with just about anything.

About 10 years ago my feet started to complain due to irritated nerves (people with diabetes understand); orthotics helped; sneakers helped too but I needed dressier shoes too. These shoes, in black, did the trick. I've tried many others, with some success, but these shoes win the prize. I buy 3 pairs at a time and rotate them - the older pairs for casual/rough wear and the newest pair goes into the courtroom (lawyers are people too, mostly). If I ever hear they are being discontinued, I may rent storage space so I can buy out the stock in my size. I own 1 pair of dressy shoes that I can wear 2 or 3 hours; but for 15 hour days, there is no substitute. Like white shirts, these shoes simplify shopping and wardrobe selection.

I got this ballet shoes for my 4 year old, she loved them but you really have to buy one or even two sizes bigger,I ended up buying 2 pairs because the first ones were too small for her. So make sure you buy 1 or 2 sizes bigger, they grow so fast anyway!! The shoes are very soft and it has an elastic band to make them fit their feet.

These all black Chuck's are my favorite All Star model ! It is no small task to find them at a regular retail store-most often your best bet is to buy online. They shipped in a timely fashion. Great Kicks, good deal.
These are great shoes. Shoebuy was prompt in shipping them and you cannot beat the price. If you love boat shoes then Sperry is the only way to go...

My son is on pair four. He loves the comfort of this shoe. Oddly enough he needs a shoe horn to put them on but once on they are like a comfy glove. Sadly it looks like they are phasing out and the black and white ones are rare to find which are the only ones he'll wear.

I haven't had a pair of Wallabees since I was in high school, but happening upon a Clark's ad brought them back to mind. I ordered a pair, and am glad I did. Next to my Clark's Desert Boots and my Birkies, these are the most comfortable shoes I own. I teach, and as such am on my feet all day. My Wallabees make the concrete floor a little less hard.

I am currently playing premiere club soccer and I have been looking for a good shoe forever. I have narrow feet and weak ankles. These shoes were great. They fit right and were the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn.Since they are made of soft kangaroo leather there is no need to break them in. They provide excellent feel on the ball.CON- you must treat the leather and keep it soft or else the leather will crack. The toes wore out on my shoes from dragging my toe so just remember to treat the leather often.As a piece of advice, wait until the price drops to around $80 to save $$. This usually happens when a new model comes out.GREAT SHOE! HIGHLY RECOMENDED!

I'm wearing these bad boys right now. These sneakers have a sexy look to them, and you can't go wrong with classic chucks at this price. Buy them! Every one should have black and white sneakers in their collection. They feel great, and I haven't had any problems with them yet. This is well worth the purchase. :-)
A great product which i like very much and like all the different styles and colours and different textures and prices

I took a chance and purchased these as a Christmas gift. When I bought them I was not 100% sure they were real UGGs or not. When I contacted UGG they told me this company is not an authorized dealer and cautioned me that these might be knock-offs. When they arrived I noticed that these boots were made in China. I found that there are several dealers selling a lot of these on the internet and they are shipped from China. According to UGG and other sources (Norton for one)they are selling counterfeit boots. Bottom line is that so far these appear to be of good quality but I am still unsure if they are the real deal or knock-offs that are over priced.

I have had several pairs of these boots over the years and liked them. The most recent pair had a manufacturing defect that was biting thre inside of my left ankle. I had to lace them so loose that the support was inadequate. I guess with Chinese children making boots you can't expect perfection.

This was the second time we ordered Pink Converse Shoes for my daughter, the first time I didn't get the size right. I returned them to "Shoes R Us" I think it was called and they took care of my mistake very quickly. Unfortunately they didn't have the size I needed so I ordered a replacement pair from Last Pairs. They came quickly, fit perfectly and were reasonably priced, the same as our local mall, without the hassle! Very good experience overall, would recommend.

I have owned over 8 pairs of these boots.They are well made,comfortable to wear as soon as they are taken out of the box and waterproof.They fit true to size.I highly recommend them to anyone that wants a great boot at a great value.

hella cool chucks..theyre not cheap, good quality..i was satisfied and so would you be...one minor problem is that purple passion (which is the one i ordered) wasnt the exact color as the one shown...but its still cool!! i love them
These are classics! But dont buy any, cuz I want to be the only awesome person in the world.
They came in a timely manner, in the little Converse box. They're just as the should be: classic kicks that will last a long time.

I had been looking for an SAS outlet online without success, and found these shoes which looked VERY similar, but cost about $40 less. I decided to try a pair and they are pretty comfortable but much tighter than the SAS shoes. I use a 9W in SAS and ordered a 9 C/D in the Softspot version, although the box they came in was labeled as the same size as 9W, the same size as the SAS. The Softspot shoe is smaller and tighter than the SAS, so next time I will order a wider or bigger size.
I looked all over for these shoes found them at a great price and love them so much and will buy another pair very soon as these ones are almost destroyed

My son loves these shoes. This is the fourth pair we've bought. He swears there is nothing better for all around wear. They look nice. They last, even through Marching Band season. And they are really comfortable - that's saying something for my son with the Fred Flintstone feet.

As far as I'm concerned, this shoe is perfect. I bought the black with white laces. I can wear it every day, it's cute, it's comfortable, and it's inexpensive. It goes great with capris, boot cut jeans, skinny jeans, and slimfit pants. You can wear them with or without socks, but I prefer the liners (no shows) with these. I'll admit that I'm newer to the Keds brand as an adult and so I can't comment on how much more comfortable they used to be "back in the day." I wore this brand as a kid and to me they feel exactly the same as they once did. I've probably become pickier in my older age and I still find these to have adequate support though they are quite thin. I had been buying Vans brand shoes that look very similar to these for years, but was getting tired of paying $50 for them. I don't know how long these will last, but seeing as they are inexpensive, I won't mind if I only get a year or so out of them. One more quick note: these are very feminine for such a plain shoe. They're thin and make my feet look a little bit smaller than they really are. I don't have big feet (7.5), but I still like the effect.
[[ASIN:B0002LTGE8 Naturalizer Scout]]As difficult as it is to obtain a Narrow size, I was able to purchase this beautifully crafted shoe at a very reasonable price. Thank You.

I really like these, and of course as i get them, the east coast is slammed with bad weather, but i love when i actually do wear them. However, i recommend some high and tight socks, the opening tends to pull my socks down.

I have 2 pairs of this model shoe and love them. After being a Nike fan for years I decided to give something else a try. This shoe is lightweight and very comfortable. I also love the classic style. And you can't complain about the nice price.

I was worried these would be flipflops for the ultra skinny...meaning if you weigh over120lbs. you'll crush them and slip off of them lol but they are great strong flipflops andavery cute...I ended up getting another pair. I have one by the sliding glass doors and oneby another door out to the deck...so that I have something to slip on my feet when I need to runoutside....very comfy too and fast service!! And the PalmtreesGreen pair is really a great color for the summer too!
This is the best shoe I've found for comfort regarding my plantar fasciitis. They provide excellent arch support too. I throw them in the washer and air dry them. This is my fourth pair.
These shoes are great for the price. They are light and they let your feet breathe easily. Only con is there is no arch support so after wearing the for a while my feet hurt badly.
Shoes are nice and durable like only vans are, however this classics are very harsh on your feet the first couple weeks

I'm on my third pair of these and still couldn't be happier with them. They're incredibly lightweight and comfortable. There's a reason why they're so popular with people who are on their feet a lot. Like other purchasers have noted, they can be more than a little squeaky. But for a quick fix, all you have to do is remove the insert of the shoe and dust it with baby powder on the bottom before replacing it in the shoe. This will greatly reduc,e if not eliminate any friction which is the cause of the squeaking sound.
Third time was the charm for these boots. I finally got a full size larger than my usual and they worked beautifully! Great boots. Love 'em.
relatively comfortable. The front of my ankle hurts if i lace it too tightly. We will see if this improves with breaking it in.

I ordered the "Chuck Taylor" Converse All Stars in Black, just because I think they go with almost everything. The packaging was fine and I had no issues with the product. It arrived before the projected date and looked exactly like the photo. The box did include two pairs of laces, both black and white. I've been wearing Converse Chuck Taylors for years and needed to replace my pair that I've worn out. I rotate my shoes, so they had just ran their course. I really enjoy these shoes, I like the look, the style (which is very classic), and the comfort. These are the most recognized sneaker, ever. More people comment on these more than any other pair that I own. The only drawback is that they run large. Make sure when you order them, you order them to your true size. Other than that, I have had no issues. YMMV.

Not sure how many years now that I have purchased this boot. I had very painful feet because of plantar fascitis, and was recomended ,by my Dr.,to get a good sturdy supportive shoe. Went to the outlet mall near me and asked for a good boot that would support my ankles and help with the foot issue and put good orthotics inside them. This is what they had me try and they are comfortable, supportive, warm enough for winter, cool enough for the summer. I now buy a pair every time I need new shoes. I am a Farrier so I wear them a lot and they support my feet well. The planter fascitis does not bother me when using this boot with an orthotic which is not a pricy one

I love these sandals and have ordered them over the internet for many years. They are basically my favorite shoe and I order them in many colors. I fear that they are being phased out, as they are getting hard for me to find now.

I have been wearing this shoe for about 25-30 years (work and play) and have found it to be one of the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. I spend a lot of time on my feet and the arch support is fantastic. Additionally, I have a wide foot and tennis shoes can be hard to find in wide sizes.Now for the down side. This shoe used to be manufactured in the UK and was available through local merchants such as Kohl's. Unfortunately, most of the ones available in the US now come from Vietnam and are only available online - at least in my area. The quality is not quite as good as it use to be and I have found that the sizes do not run true to form and I have to order a half size larger than what I wear in most shoes. Since I do have to order them on line I usually order multiple pairs at a time and a pair will normally last me about 8 months with continuous wear. The last time I ordered, prior to ordering through Amazon, I ordered three pair. Two of the pairs fit just fine but the third pair was miss-labeled and was undersized. I had to take them to a shoe shop and have them streatched but,even with that, it took a month or longer to get them broken in to where they were wearable. I would have sent them back but I had already worn out the other two pair prior to putting these on and it was too late to return them.Over all, this is a very nice shoe and I would recommend it to anyone who needs a wide shoe with decent arch support but I would STRONGLY suggest that you try on EVERY PAIR you receive right after you get them to make sure they are the right size.
These look better in the picture, and I was expecting the heels to be a higher, but they're very comfortable shoes. You can walk all day in them.

Horrible quality, completely fell apart in 6 months. Broke in, and realized they also make your feet smell like dirty dogs a** if .you get them wet. *note, when wet you will slip and slide.all over the place in addition to the foul smell that will present itself.More about the quality; front toe strap partially disconnected @ 4 months, side lower connection shortly thereafter. Cannot believe such catastrophic failures from what is supposed to be a good manufacture. I guess that's why I will be going back to purchasing only rainbow or olulukai sandles as Reef has gone gimmick over quality.* on that note, be careful! The novel placement of metal "church key" beer opener in the slippers arch can cause you to lose control and eat serious s#$t when descending stairs, ladders etc, especially wood or metal! "Stay on your toes" so to speak!

I just love these shoes - I purchased a pair a couple of years ago and I should of bought them in all of the colors that they came in but I didn't and now I am sorry - they are true to size and feel as though you are wearing slippers. Wish I could find more of these because I would purchase more.
I like every product from Teva, it is really comfortable for everyday walking. The style is very casual though...but i am student, it's fine for me to wear casual sandal to school everyday.

I love these shoes and have owned many Chuck Taylor Converse shoes for 30 years. I did forget that when getting this shoe I must order a size smaller than my regular shoe size. This can be frustrating when ordering shoes online, so don't forget to order 1size down :)

I love Crocs. They're a great substitute for slippers around the house and you can wear them outside. Your feet stay cool and breathe. They won't get sweaty like they do in sneakers/tennis shoes. One warning: don't wear them on the treadmill. I didn't find they gave me enough support there, but they are great for casual wear around the house or running errands. They wear very well. I wear mine almost every day and have had them for 4 years. Might try some other styles in the Crocs brand.

Its a black K-Swiss tennis shoe. This is a classic unisex style. I bought them for my 3 year old daughter. She loves them because daddy got em for her. I think I might get a pair for my self actually.Oh..and a pair for the wife too (maybe)

This is my first Sperry product. I wear boat shoes all the time, and have had problems with them smelling bad after several weeks of use without wearing socks. A friend suggested Sperry for their strange ability to not start stinking. Sure enough, he was right. These shoes do not develop stinky foot odors. I would rate them much lower if not for that fact.The reason for the negativity is the soles suck. They are slippery when wet. For example, I slip and slide over wet metal plates that they put on streets and sidewalks that are under construction. No other shoes do that. For a shoe called a boat shoe, they aren't good in wet conditions. Other Sperrys have different soles. These are pretty smooth on the bottom, so watch out for smooth bottom Sperrys. Another bad thing about the soles is they are too thin. You feel the road, so to speak.I might try another Sperry because of their mysterious non-stinky ability, but I'll make sure there's some texture to the bottom of the sole, and that its thicker than the one on these.
Very pleased with the quality and the quick shipping. My grandson will love these as they look just like Grandpa's.
A well built shoe for walking around or working out. I like that it does not have lots of goofy colors or textures like sports shoes have now a days. I've bought them before and will buy them again.

This is standard issue footwear for anyone who wants the "look" of indie rock (the others are t-shirts that look to be from a redneck bar circa 1978 but really came from a suburban Old Navy circa 2010 and those "washed-out" blue jeans that were purchased at the same Old Navy). The shoes are grossly unfit for any athletic activity (I don't know how the heck I survived playing street hockey in these things as a teenager), provide no protection against the cold or stepping on sharp objects, begin to smell horribly after 9+ months of use and have a tendency to have the sole tear away from the rest of the shoe after those 9 months (if the smell hasn't destroyed them yet). But their coolness factor will never, ever be replicated by any footwear, past, present or future (the Roman sandal gave them a run for their money in the 1980s by the garage punk band Thee Mighty Caesars, but that's another story). Everyone should own a pair of these shoes at least once in their lifetimes.
Great shoe for my daughter's summer ballet class. Only negative is that the laces do not want to stay tied.

I love this shoe rack. To assemble the rack was easy (just pop out the side). The racks are easily stackable. I could fit 3 pairs of women's shoes on one level or 2 pairs of men's + stacked flip flops on one level. I purchased a total of 4 and have room for more when I need it. The cheap metal/plastic racks are no comparison to this!
My little ballerina just adores them. They are great quality for the price with a lovely inner lining and a tag to write your name. Don't need more at this stage...

I love these shoes! I had one pair and used them so much I was dreading having to get rid of the so I searched to find another pair since I had bought these so long ago, I was afraid they wer no longer available. Not only did I find them at amazon, but they were on sale and available with prime shipping. Need I say more. Ok maybe I will. They are comfortable and the patent leather on the top only dresses them up just enough but not too much.
I really liked these sandals....the fit was great, very cushy, and the price was awesome for this brand of shoes.......$7...
Timberland Men's Euro Hiker Boot, Grey/Grey,9.5 M US great boots for work or very day life very comfortable, worm and soft inside great boots for fare value.

I have had the chucks for about a month now and there holding up well. I like the look of them there comfortable and simple ill be wearing them for a long time! :) If you are thinking of buying some chuck T's i would there pretty cheap and they can withstand some wear amd tear! Five stars

I love these shoes. I am 44 and have spent the last 10 years dealing with back issues. I have had three back surgeries and have lingering foot, back, and mobility issues. These shoes are stable, supply great arch support, and have a deep heel register to really hold onto my foot. If I needed to there, is plenty of room to put my thick custom orthotics, but I don't need to. They have excellent support just as they are. They have a fun Mary Jane look that is so much better than most orthopaedic shoes. I wear them with pants and capris. They are a bit chunky for wearing with a skirt, but when my back is having a bad day, I have done it. I have these in black, grey, and brown.
You would expect a name like timberland to have reached a certain level of expertise to be able to build a $ 100.+ shoe that can compromise between comfort and toughness... ,but it doesn't .

With Christmas looming, I ordered these blue Converse Lo Tops. They arrived immediately! Crisp, new and perfect fit for my daughter.The extra pair of navy shoelaces arrived two weeks later, separately. No problem, we all had a good laugh over the arrival of onepair of shoelaces, amidst all the flurry of Christmas packages. Thank you!

I run marathons and various triathlon distances, and have done plenty of miles happily on Asics Kayanos. I was worried about the cushioning on such a lightweight shoe when I took them out of the box. But they run beautifully. They are so incredibly light it makes a noticeable difference to my running. Not sure how long they would last given their minimalist design, but I guess we tend to retire our shoes before there are any signs of wear & tear on the upper part of the shoe anyway. The only issue for me is the tongue design - yes the single-fold makes sense in a weight-saving capacity, and once the shoes are on there are no comfort issues (on the contrary they feel great), but if you do triathlons and need to do a fast transition, you need to spend a bit longer to make sure they are put on right. Nevertheless, they are still my new favorite running shoe. JK

Although I love the style of this boot, my legs are slender and my foot is marginally narrow. The boot literally flops around my calf and my foot can't seem to find a comfort zone as the boot is too wide to accomodate my narrow foot. Otherwise, I love the style of this boot so will be content to wear it with a pair of socks for added comfort.
Very happy with the way they feel on my feet, there is some foot support and they look good on me aswell, I will continue to buy more vans in the future

(...) AND I WEAR A LOT OF FILA'S I HAVE WORN FILA'S SINCE I STARTED WALKING AND NOW I HAVE GOTTEN TO THE POINT WHERE I WOULD LIKE TO SEE SOME BB84 MID IN LADIES I WOULD LOVE TO PURCHASE A PAIR OF PINK/WHITE/BLACK FILA'S. WHERE I LIVE I HAVE SEEN THE FILA TRUCK AND WITH THESE SPECIFIC PAIR OF SHOES ON IT AND I SAID TO MYSELF OUT OF ALL THE FILA'S I'VE WORN I HAVE NEVER SEEN ANY OF THESE AND I HAVE TO HAVE A PAIR OF THEM.SO THIS IS MY OPINION THAT IF YOU ALL HAVEN'T MADE ANY OF THEM OR HAVE EVER SENT ANY TO MY STATE I THINK YOU SHOULD AND I HAVE BEEN TALKING ABOUT THAT SPECIFIC COLOR EVERY WHERE I GO AND PEOLPE REALLY SAID THEY WOULD BUY THEM TO ONLY IF YOU SOLD THEM OR PUT THEM ON THE INTERNET SO IF YOU CAN COULD YOU PLEASE SEND ME A E-MAIL BACK FOR I COULD PURCHASE THESE SHOES OR COULD YOU PLEASE CONSIDER MAKING THESE COLOR OF SHOE SO PLENTY OF HAPPY CUSTOMERS LIKE ME COULD CONTINUE PURCHASING YOUR PRODUCT.THANK YOU

I bought my first pair when I was visiting New York. I was amazed from the quality and moreover from the comfort of a pair of shoes in this price range.The sole has excellent traction, and you can wear them in "easy" hikes.As for the look, since they're not overly "sportive", you can wear them even at the office.My first pair was tan, and contrary to the abuse it took, it never stained or discolored. Now it's beginning to show its age a little, but that is expected after all the daily wear for 10 months.Seriously, I wouldn't write a review if I wasn't overly pleased with this pair of shoes. A really good value for money...!!!

I needed a decent pair of black dress shoes and I was in a pinch. I figured these would be a decent buy -- not expensive, replaceable soles, classic look bearing a classic brand name. The first time I wore them, they fit fine -- not tight across the top, my toe not butting up into the ends. They were a bit tight, which I attributed to the newness of the shoe. I was very wrong.I've worn these puppies close to 30 times and they feel no more broken in than the day I lifted them from the box. The do LOOK worn in, because they crease very easily and the leather is particularly low-grade. I have to keep a shoe brush in my office desk drawer to buff out the constantly visible scuff marks. And even with proper care, they collect water spotting like no other leather shoe I've seen. Perhaps I have high standards because my other pair of dress shoes are Allen Edmonds. But the Bostonian name is usually associated with quality, and these are anything but.Do yourself a favor and save up a couple hundred bucks and buy a nice dress shoe from an American manufacturer. They'll be very comfortable and last you a lifetime.
My 17 yr old son loved the shoe but was so disappointed how big it was. We returned it for a size smaller we r hoping this one will work.

These boots are great. I have always wanted a pair of black leather boots, and I wore them tonight (New Year's Eve) for the first time. People liked them a lot. I had tried these on in a store. I am usually a 6 or 6 1/2. I found the 6 to be snug and the 6 1/2 slipped way too much in the heel. I took the advice from another reviewer and ordered them in wide. I don't have wide feet, but these 6Ws fit really well with a thick sock. I wore them with skinny jeans, and it worked out quite well. When I had to walk through snow they didn't let any dampness in. I can't wear high heels, and it was nice to find boots like these with low heels. Why only 4 stars? Well, I'm a tough critic, and I could imagine an even cooler design or more comfortable fit, but I'm very happy with them.
This is a great-looking shoe. However, this is no arch support, so it gets uncomfortable. With better support, this could be an outstanding shoe.

I was cautious in "breaking in" this shoe for fear of toe problems from another shoe brand. However, there was no problem with breaking in THIS shoe. Definitely will stick with the Ozweego Classic. Very lightweight, stylish but most of all COMFORTABLE.

This is a funny shoe. The bottom is flat,with no arch on the outside ( the inside arch is well developed) and the toes curls up. Works well running but feels odd walking. Works well for me, a heavy runner, and has held up well. Big toe box and true to or slightly large for size.
Despite the velcro strap, these are difficult to put on because of the shallow opening at the front of the shoe. Maybe it would fit a very skinny foot.
These shoes are comfortable as well as long lasting. They do not make your feet sweat or smell bad like other high top shoes. This shoe never goes op of style

I got these shoes a month ago to wear to work since I wanted sandals but the dress code dictates shoes much have a covered toe and heel strap. I don't think I've taken them off since! The only drawback for me is that they aren't really comfy for walking long distances (over a mile.) I started to get blisters. But for every day wear they are fabulous!

The boots are great but come with no care instructions at all. The care instructions that come with the care products are also very poor. Hard to understand why such a quality product would not have good care instructions other than the fact the manufacturer would prefer one to ruin the boots so you will buy more !!!!!!!!

These run a bit narrow in the toes but are still comfortable. I'm short, so I like that these are comfortable athletic shoes, but also add 1.5" in height. Overall, I'm happy with my purchase (and the price) and will be walking my feet off during my trip to London!

I have another pair of Frye boots and love them. I wear them daily. My wife bought these for me as a gift and, I suspect, to match the pair she has worn for years. She got the size exactly right, but when I tried them on, or rather tried to try them on, they didn't fit at all. I couldn't even get my foot halfway in. It was a real head scratcher. I was about to process a return request when she comes walking out of the bedroom with a pair her stockings, ah, I mean, silk socks, and said try these. I won't share the thoughts occupying my brain at that moment, but I figured what the hey, it's worth a shot. And guess what? The boots slid right on and fit like a glove.Now I'm not going to go out and replace all of my cotton socks with silk stockings, ah, I mean, silk socks, but I have other non-cotton socks that work just as well.The bottom line, these boots, just like my other pair, are amazing, and worth every penny of the price. I just won't mention to anyone that my "manly" dogs are covered with silk stockings, ah, I mean silk socks.
High quality shoe--more than expected. Fit perfectly and very comfortable. Purchased as an Easter shoe, and beautiful! Will wear for a long while.

I love these shoes because the medium runs on the narrow side. They do come in narrow, but not always easy to find in popular size 7. They are classic, tailored, like much of my wardrobe, so I own them in every color and color combination. They also wear well. Excellent quality at a good price. When I'm really lucky, I find them on sale.

I started wearing an orthotic in my shoes several years ago, it has been an endless problem to find shoes especially sandals that can fit an orthotic, this is the only one that has been designed properly. It has a thick innersole that is removable, you can replace it with your orthotic , they also supply another innersole to cover it. Totally comfortable,and rugged enough for light hiking. The orthotic sits down low enough, you do not have the problem of it trying to come out of the back end of the shoe. Great product,thank you Amazon for making it available.
You would expect a name like timberland to have reached a certain level of expertise to be able to build a $ 100.+ shoe that can compromise between comfort and toughness... ,but it doesn't .

I love these sandals. They are incredibly comfortable, and have super arch support. I wear sandals every day,and these hold up very well ( I average one year's wear out of each pair of Rainbows before I have to get a new pair.) Viva la Rainbows -- these are the best.
these shoes are so comfortable. the neat thing about these shoes is you can toss them in the washer and they look new again.
I have a 3 year old who is hard on shoes. These are good inexpensive boots that last a while . Its definitely worth the money
I previously had the same Keds sneaker. Liked them. Ordered a medium width, not a wide width. Had to return them.

I wish I didnt buy these, if you wear them barefoot they really hurt the soles of your feet. Quite simply the Speedo sandals I bought at Costco a few years ago are FAR more comfortable. If you plan on putting on thick socks whenever you wear these, then they may work better for you.

I love these shoes - they're classic, versatile and comfortable. They wear into the shape of your foot and become like a favorite pair of jeans - worn in all the right places, fitted to your form and reliable. I have two pairs of these and I just bought another pair for my boyfriend (who is now hooked).

The shoes look real good to start with.As for comfort - the only shoes that I counted on till now have been Nike. With all others I use gel soles - but not with Clarks; had ordered another pair (Men's Mercury Oxford) of Clarks; so am certain that I was not just lucky with this pair; they do make good shoes.Looks like my first choice of formal/semi-formal from now on will be Clarks.

The leather on the Student Footlight is pretty stiff and will definitely need some breaking in. I'm hoping that it will soften quickly once it warms up after being worn.My actual shoe size is 9AAA but I frequently wear 8 1/2 N because I can rarely find the 9AAA. In the Jr. Footlight, I wear a 9 1/2 N. When I was trying to decide what size to get in the Student Footlight, I wondered if the fit was similar to the Jr. Footlight and I have to say the Student runs closer to street size. Based on my experience with the Jr. Footlight, I ordered the Student in a 9N and a 9 1/2 N and both were too long. The shoe does seem to run pretty narrow, for those who are wondering. I think the width will be fine once I get the length right.I didn't find a significant difference in the padding/insole of either shoe. High density foam, not much arch support. Not a cushy shoe underneath the foot, but then that may be because it is meant for dance and their assumption is that the wearer would want to be able to "feel" the floor through the shoe.As compared to the jr. footlight, the extra 1/2 inch in the heel height of the Student Footlight does make a difference in the leg line and will make the legs look even better on stage or anywhere else.

I was so very glad to find these shoes! I was a bit worried at first-it had been so long since I had a brand new pair of slip on shoes! The reason for that is because Eastlands are so good, I can wear a pair for 10+ years! I have a pair of brown similar ones that I've worn for about that long-maybe longer. But they last forever and are the only brand I will buy. I'm still wearing the brown ones, but wanted a pair of black ones to match my purse and coat for winter. They felt a bit tight at first, but it's been so long since I've had to break in a pair of shoes since Eastlands last so long! Wore them a couple of nights at home, broke in perfectly, now they're my new favorites! I've tried others, but Eastlands are still the best:)

I picked these boots for my husband after reading reviews of all the other work boots out there. I wanted a product made in the US and these are from Wisconsin. He loves these boots and they fit really well. Shipped quickly as well.

These boots are the best I've ever owned. So good, that I own two pairs, and bought my dad a pair. And he swears by them too. If you have aching feet, soreness, or a weak ankle, these boots have a therapeutic effect! I am not into medicine or anything but I have to say, these boots are very supportive and make your feet feel strong and no strain on the joints.
This shoe is elegant, it's comfortable, the stacked heel is just right, the height is perfect and over all is a beautiful pair of shoe. I bought both colors that were available.Thank you.

These are cute, they stay tied, and there's just enough slip to use these babies on a dance floor without having to spring for full suede bottoms. They also hold up well when you throw them into a huge dance bag and accidentally crush them in the trunk of your car.

I ordered these for my daughter's birthday and they came in plenty of time and she loves them. Also, they were less expensive than all the other ones that we priced and made very well. It was a great buy!! :)
THESE ARE GREAT, FOR THE COST VERY HIGH QUALITY BUT ITS WHAT U CAN EXPECT FROM TIMBERLAND,A MUST BUY.

I wear a half-size smaller because these shoes come in wide sizes (i.e they fit)! I'm curious to see how long they will last as they are guaranteed for 1000 miles. Very attractive and comfortable, and reasonably priced. I recommend the quick-adjust velcro for anyone who walks before or after work, or at lunch, or who takes shoes on & off throughout the day.

This is a great shoe, though I find that it runs narrow. I could not get my left foot in the shoe at all. My right foot wentin with some effort. It is very well made and I like the padded arch support that is built in. I will re-order in a wider size.Idaho potato
Second pair of these shoes for work. They are very comfortable and not too casual. They were delivered on time and the shoes looked great. I am very happy with the service and price!

I've been shopping around for a good pair of Converse for a while, thinking that I could find them for under $20.00 if I looked hard enough. My last pair, which I bought three years ago, was $20, and I thought surely I could find more for less than the $35-45 price tag I was seeing. Stupid inflation.I finally bought these when I realized if I was going to get a new pair, I had to cough up the extra dough. I'm really glad I did. I wore the last pair all the time, and though they're still comfortable and I'm far too attached to them to throw them away, they have holes in the leather and in the sole, and they smell something foul when it rains. I have no doubt that these canvas Converse Chuck's will last just as long and be just as comfortable, and my first few wears makes me confident that I'm right. My last pair was leather, but the same shoe style, so I don't know if the fabric of these will stretch. I do know that the leather ones never did, it only got a little less structured after three years of wear.What I like:1. These are meant to wear as regular sneakers, so while you don't want to go on a run with them, they are just as comfortable if you're going on a long walk. There's no chafing on the heel no matter how far I go, and the support means they're not going to destroy your lower back if you find yourself walking or standing all day.2. For me, at least, they fit true to size. I have wide feet, but the design of the shoe means I can lace them tighter or looser and not worry about them cutting into my circulation or falling off.3. I got the navy blue ones, and the color is exactly what you see in the product picture. It's vibrant, but not bright, and well-dyed and even-toned.As for dislikes, well...there's nothing I dislike about Converse, so you're asking the wrong person if you're looking for complaints. All Converse I've ever owned are comfortable and simple, and I think it's what the brand does best.
Pro: Good design, comfortable.Cons: NoneSummary: I will buy it again.

These grasshopper shoes are one of the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. The sole of the shoe is cushiony and you almost feel like you are walking on air. I was a bit concerned about the light color (they only had beige available at the time of purchase). There was a little bit of dirt on the shoes and it wiped them off lightly with some warm water. I would definitely recommend these shoes especially for summer and the warmer months.

I love my j renee bev pump shoes. so comfortable, like walking on clouds. Look sooooo good on.The cognac colour goes with everything. Everyone asks me about them. They dress up jeans so well.Heel is not too high and can dress up or go causal with these shoes.

These skechers running shoes are probably the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn. They are very light weight compared to my old running shoes and are just a pleasure to wear. You can't beat the price for a quality shoe like this either.
I am very satisfied with the shoes, I have 2 pairs.
Firm support, but soft enough for comfort. Perfect for tennis! And the price is unbeatable! Other online vendors sell the same shoe for twice the amount. Shoes arrived fast!
I purchased these to supplement some others I had my students wearing. I have had to repair the buckles every time hey have been worn.
I have worn this model of EAsy Spirit for a long time...Hope they don't discontinue it...Wears well..I have narrow feet so I like the way these fit and are available in AA width...

These shoes are beautiful, but the size 11 I ordered was too small to put on.
I love my new shoes! They fit great and I got them in no time. Thanks. * * * *

This has been a decent winter running shoe with plenty of stability, fair amount of cushion, and decent traction. My primary gripe has been the insert not staying in place and riding back in the shoe.

was given a pair of these shoes used,worked in them in my shop welding/ machining/auto & truck repair for about 6 years. very comfortable & rugged. this is why i went online @ located another pair through amazon. so far this pair is exceeding my expectations. my thanks to AMAZON & HI-TEC: heavyhaull

My father is the most difficult person to please. He absolutely hates to try new things, regardless of quality. I chose to buy this slipper for him as a Christmas gift, knowing that his old pair was worn. I also knew that he has worn the same style of slipper for the last thirty years. These socks are for shoe size 12.5-5. My son is a size 5. I bought these for him for soccer. I think they will fit for another year, even if his foot grows. Currently, they fit over his shin guards and fold over below the knee about 2.5". If he grows, the fold will be smaller, but that's OK. I love how these came in a huge variety of colors, so I could get the color that matches the league jerseys. My son said, "They're fuzzy. I like that," when he put them on for the first time. I don't think they're fuzzier than other athletic socks, so I'm not sure what he meant. But, he's happy, so I'm happy. These are a great price for 3 pairs!

I'm really, really happy with these boots. An awesome price for a super-sturdy piece of footwear that seems like it's going to last a really long time. I needed footwear that would support my ankles, for both every day walking and hitting the hills with my dogs. These fit the bill.Why buy a second pair?Two reasons:1) I'm paranoid the price will go up.2) These are nice enough to wear out into the real world, and I didn't want to have to worry about keeping my daily pair "nice".The biggest problem for me? They do require some breaking in and for me, it was kind of a painful process. They are rigid, strong boots, and they do give way eventually. Already, after only a few months, my first pair are taking on that nice patina that well-worn leather boots get.It makes me said that I'll have to go through that process again with my second pair, which will take longer because they will be worn less frequently.
I gave this snikers to my 15 year-old son and he loved. It has a juvenile color and it can use it daily, are confortables, the color is durable. Their friends have liked it. I recommend it

Been wearing converse for years; great shoes, came just as promised in the picture and description. Cheaper, even with the shipping expenses, then in the stores where you can find all black chucks. Shoes packaged very well; shipping was ridiculously fast, had it in two days; great amazon experience!
Crocs are soooo comfortable. With foot problems, they're the only shoes I can wear throughout the day. Love them!

The ballet shoes are very nice, but not true to size. My granddaughter (age 4) wears a size 7, I ordered a 7.5 to give her room to grow, and they were too small! Some advice about the sizing would have been helpful. Now we have to send them back.

I am satisfied with what i got! I love it so much.thinking of buying again with different colors.good job guys.

I've had two pairs of these shoes and they are by far my favorites. I didn't realize when I bought the first pair that they are actually "lightweight" trainers, which means you're not really supposed to use them for long runs and high mileage. I have trained for and completed two marathons and two 10-mile road races in them and never had a problem, plenty of cushioning, extremely comfortable. I don't like a lot of arch support because it hurts my feet, and this shoe has just enough support. Also, this shoe has plenty of room in the toe box--many others cramp my feet in the front. Highly recommended.
Natualizer is known for it's comfort. I wear a 10W and these shoes are very comfortable as well as stylish which is hard to find in my size. I really love them and wish they came in more colors.
I have these in the Leopard, and they are so cute with jeans and really comfy shoes. Mine are true to size.
These sandals are great. The heel is not too high, true to size and very comfortable. Can be dressy or casual.

This has been a decent winter running shoe with plenty of stability, fair amount of cushion, and decent traction. My primary gripe has been the insert not staying in place and riding back in the shoe.
This was eactly what I was looking for. Perfect fit. Prompt Delivery.
Super comfortable, easy to walk. My mom wears it around the house like slippers and she loves it. I'm glad I got it for her, it's very important that her shoes are comfortable.

I have had several pairs of these boots over the years and liked them. The most recent pair had a manufacturing defect that was biting thre inside of my left ankle. I had to lace them so loose that the support was inadequate. I guess with Chinese children making boots you can't expect perfection.

THESE ARE NICE AND SPACIOUS BOOTS AND THE BURGANDY IS A HARD COLOR TO FIND BUT MY GOD THEY COME WITH NO INTERIOR CUSHIONING SO BEWARE.....IT TOOK 2 SETS OF INNER CUSHIONS TO RENDER THESE WEARABLE. IF IT WERE NOT FOR THE COLOR THEY WOULD HAVE GONE RIGHT BACK.THEY ARE DRESSY ENOUGH FOR WORK ON IN CLEMENT DAYS BUT THAT HARD FOOT BASE ALMOST GOT THESE A 1 STAR RATING.
I wasnt really sure if I liked this shoe at first but after trying it on i realised just how comfortable and stylish this shoe is. This shoe is awesome for basketball and just walking around
VERY fast shipping. I bought shoes as a gift and was sure that they wouldn't be delivered in time, but they made with days to spare! And the shoes looked lovely. Thanks so much! :)

Even if you've worn these since the 60s, 70s, or 80s (as I have), do yourself a favor and DON'T order these online. They're smaller than they used to be and after wearing them for decades they no longer fit (too narrow especially). Not only are they hard to find in stores now, but now that most people will be ordering them online they changed the sizing. Worse, if you order direct from K-Swiss they will take a return but will deduct $5.00 unless you do an exchange. I'd exchange for a 12 wide but they don't have one listed on their site for this shoe, nor on this page as of this writing. Too bad, because I really liked them for 30 years.
I had another pair of this exact shoe and wore them out from wearing them so much. I couldn't find them anywhere locally, so I was so glad to find them here. They are great shoes.

I bought these when we were living in Belgium and owned two cars with manual transmissions so I needed some sandals that I could safely work the clutch pedal with. These were just fine. I still love my old Birkies more than these but these are well made, reasonably priced, and great for working a clutch if you own a car with a manual transmission.

The ballet shoes are very nice, but not true to size. My granddaughter (age 4) wears a size 7, I ordered a 7.5 to give her room to grow, and they were too small! Some advice about the sizing would have been helpful. Now we have to send them back.

LAST CHRISTMAS I ORDERED THIS BOOT AND NOW THIS YEAR THE PRICE HAS DOUBLED. I AM WISHING THAT I HAD ORDERED MORE THAN ONE PAIR. I WILL ORDER ANOTHER PAIR THIS YEAR. I LIKE THE SOLES AND HEELS ON THIS BOOT BECAUSE THEY LAST LONGER THAN MOST AND THIS IS THE FINEST LOOKING DRESS BOOT MADE AS FAR AS I AM CONCERNED. IT IS THE MOST COMFORTABLE BOOT THAT I HAVE FOUND.
