One of the best items I have ever bought; she loved them. I will purchase again a different pair of shoes at a later date.

These shoes just arrived. I ordered an 8 after looking at dancedepot.com, which said this style runs true to size, and measuring my daughter's feet with a tape measure, against their measurement chart. The 8 JUST fits her. I know toddler shoe sizes run all over the place, but my daughter wears a 7 or 7.5 in street shoes with room to wiggle her toes, so I would say that these run a tad small. Luckily I have a younger daughter who will inherit these lovely shoes when her older sister outgrows them (which I am guessing will be in the next few months). I will order a larger size for my older girl, as I'm very happy with the quality of the shoe overall.

I hike several days a week all year in rough mountain terrain, much of it off-trail and over rocks. I've gone through several pairs of these Hi-Tec Altitude boots over the years. The factory supplied insoles are comfortable initially, but are made of a compressible closed cell foam that eventually does not rebound from compression well after some months of use. When the foam becomes compressed, the padded effect is lost and my feet begin to hurt. This can be solved by purchasing and installing an aftermarket pair of insoles such as the Sole Softec Ultra foodbeds, or another quality insole.This problem is not exclusive to Hi-Tec, as I've seen it with other boots and running shoes also. Some aftermarket insoles/footbeds are made of resilient material that does not tend to stay compressed with heavy use. I am not sure why the manufacturers of boots and shoes don't just use suitable footbeds in the first place, but I assume that they save a little money by doing what they do.Aside from the poor insoles, the boots themselves are comfortable, keep my feet warm in fairly cold weather even though they are not insulated, and the soles provide good traction.

These are good dance shoes and hold up well! However, I have a foot that is somewhat narrower than normal, and these slippers are extremely wide. I had to pull the strings for a while until I got the proper fit. But then the material from the slippers started to rub at my heel bones from the tightness. It was a little painful so I readjusted the strings to loosen them in the heel area and now the slippers fit comfortably. I did notice, however, that after using them for just one dance class, the sole started to darken significantly. It's not a big deal to me, but others might be bothered by it.

I ordered these shoes for a high school student to wear during a production. After reading the reviews, we decided to order them one full size larger that the normal shoe size. This was definitely the way to go. After hours of use there were no blisters or pain. I recommend going the full size larger.

I have fat feet, and I wear a size 12 wide. I ordered the 12 E, and they were long enough and wide enough, but not "tall" enough. I couldn't get the tops of my feet crammed in them, even when I loosened the laces. There's just no stretch to the canvas. They seemed like they'd be comfortable if I could just get them on! So those of you with fat feet, get something else!Returning them was so easy though, and only took a few days.

Flip-flop looks great, feels comfy (just tried on, haven't wore for any length of time), but the color description on the pair I purchased was brown(sole)/white(straps)...the straps are actually an off-white, not white...not what I was expecting.

I feel like I wasted my money with these shoes. They were expensive and were not as supportive as I wanted. They're okay for walking around shopping or something but not for working around the ranch, which is what I wanted. Nice fit and comfortable, though.

A very elegant pair of shoes at a reasonable price. What really amazed me was the intact condition upon receipt. I must say that this is the first time I buy shoes online. No minor scars or damage...better than buying at the shoe store! The shoes come wrapped in protective material inside a very nice box, conserving the fresh leather smell and shine.

Great sandal. I got to replace some aqua socks I've had for years that fell apart while at a water park. These are super comfortable and can easily be work with the heel strap on or off. Look kinda clunky, but that's the idea. Love the toe protection, which has saved me many times. I would definitely get again.
I love these shoes and color as well. Look great with khakis and jeans and the seam in the middles is really cool. The laces were not very strong but i bought replacements for a dollar; no problem.

These shoes are inexpensive, light weight, and very comfortable.They were hard to get on at first. There is a loop on the tongue that holds the laces... I relaced the shoes without using the loop and they went on much easier.I'm happy with them.
This shoe is one of the most comfortable I've ever owned. Great for hiking, walking, or just regular weekend wear.

I love this shoe! I am SO glad that I gave them a second shot - I had heard so many good things about this sandal that when they first came in the mail, I didn't waste any time ripping open the box and putting them on... and I was really dissapointed. Right out of the box, I did not find them comfortable at all. The arch was a bit uncomfortable (a little too high) and the fabric was kind of stiff... I didn't think I'd ever enjoy these sandals. However, I didn't want to go through the hassle of returning them, so I decided I'd give them a little chance and wore them around my kitchen while I made supper. They were getting MUCH better. Within 3 minutes I was thinking "hmm... I could actually wear these." Now they are my absolute favorite pair of sandals. They are so comfortable, and my feet feel just great in them. I am SO SO glad that I gave them a second chance!
" Santa" brought these for my son and he hasn't taken them off since! I was worried about how they would fit since he didn't try them on first and he has a narrow foot, but no complaints from him!
awesome shoes. what can i say. look great with pants, jeans, khakis. whatever. versatile, durable, sylish. you won't regret this purchase. maybe run a half size bigger than my size. but it's iffy.
They're not very confortable. Not a lot of support for even walking one hour straight in. Probably wouldnt order them again. Wasn't impress with their shipping practice either.

I have very flat feet and no arch in my feet (shoe store lady told me she never seen such flat feet in her entire life) She recommended the Gel Kayno Shoes and they have been really Great! So good in Fact that I decided to only wear Gel Kayno shoes...My first pair cost me $139.00 and a year and some months later I decided I like them so much that I brought the exact same pair for $79.00. (i wear these shoes with arch support insules from finish line and really i have not found a better more comfortable shoe)

What else can I say? Converse's Chuck Taylor High-Tops have been tried and true for decades. They are comfortable, fun and in my case, red. I am 51 years young and I receive more compliments on these shoes than any other item of apparel that I own. Love them.

I've been wearing this exact Executive Imperial Wingtip shoe for more than twenty years. They are extremely durable and still take a great shine for the entire life of the shoe. They break in quickly and run true to size.

My daughter is a size 12, and these fit perfectly - they were not too tight and she loves wearing them in dance class. I highly recommend these.Gave it 4 out of 5 stars because the seller doesn't provide amazon prime shipping option.
Shoes arrived witin the stated delivery time. The colour was as shown. Very good shoe and I would recomend it. Looks quite nice under pants as well as skirts.

sizes seems off.. I asked for M60 & the flip flop said M50 but it was still little bit lose... the quality is much better... & soft...

Looked all over and could not find these anywhere including the Vans outlet here locally. Arrived on time and fit great.Love my Vans!!!

I felt that my karma would be bad if I didn't take a moment to describe my experience in dealing with GrandSlamNY. I purchased a pair of Converse All Star's for my girlfriend for Christmas. I got the size she asked for (even took into account the additional information supplied on the site about how the size of this particular shoe runs about a size big. When they arrived they were too big! I THEN checked the return policy and saw that the period had expired (I partied hard during the holidays and the shoes were returned close to 4 weeks after purchase. I sent an email to the owner of the store and he told me to send them back for exchange. I did so and received the new pair 4 days after mailing the incorrect pair back to him. did not wash well... price was great but doesn't seem like the same Keds that you buy in dept stores. Not real happy with them.

These are great for my 13month old who is walking. Barefoot is easiest but when we go out these are the next best thing. The best part about the penny loafer is that they go with anything- dress outfits or comfy clothes.
Hush Puppies Mall Walkers are an excellent product. Fit well. Good support. True to size. Highly recommend them for casual wear.Hush Puppies Men's Mall Walker Oxford
Shoes were received in original packaging, band new! My son is going to love them, they are just what he wanted & I got what I expected. Thanks...

Great price and quick delivery. I have worn Wilson Pro Staff tennis shoes for 20 or more years, so you know I like them. You play in them the first time, and they feel broke-in immediately. I play two to three times a week and the soles don't wear out on the heels and edges for well over 6 months. Others may pay more than twice as much for theirs shoes, but not me as long as these classics are available.
You would expect a name like timberland to have reached a certain level of expertise to be able to build a $ 100.+ shoe that can compromise between comfort and toughness... ,but it doesn't .
My son needed these for wrestling and is very happy with them. He says they are comfortable and also look good. I would recommend them to anyone.

I sing/dance in several amateur theater productions a year. After going through several pairs of lower quality character shoes in the last few years, I decided to spend the money and buy Capezios. Once I began rehearsing in them, I was immediately glad I spent the money. They're worth it!The leather is stiff enough to support but still flexible enough to conform to my foot, & the strap is securely attached and doesn't fray at the end. The elastic attaching the buckle is well attached to the shoe, not something that will soon fray and break. Nothing inside the shoe or on the uppers has an edge to rub on the foot, so they've been comfortable from the first wearing.I would suggest buying a 1/2 size larger than your street shoe size. I don't normally wear a wide shoe, but the fit is perfect, so unless you normally wear a narrow shoe, I'd order the wide. I've also found they give me a more adult look than the mary jane-style character shoes. I went from 1 1/2" to 2" heels with no problem. The only problem I had is that the sole was a bit too smooth, even after a few wearings, and I had to scuff them quite a bit to keep from slipping & falling!

With Christmas looming, I ordered these blue Converse Lo Tops. They arrived immediately! Crisp, new and perfect fit for my daughter.The extra pair of navy shoelaces arrived two weeks later, separately. No problem, we all had a good laugh over the arrival of onepair of shoelaces, amidst all the flurry of Christmas packages. Thank you!

The shoes fit well but the sole is thin making it hard to walk over stones or climbing up onto shore. I purchased them to protect my feet while tubing down a river. They would be better used on a beach or boating.

This is a really great sandal. I have bought them in the past and have found them to be very comfortable. Not like regular flip flops. The narrow strap makes them very fashionable along with the many colors they come in. After wearing them for awhile they seem to mold to your foot shape. What I like most about them is they have a built in arch which is great for people like me who have a low arch or are flatfooted. Also the price at Amazon.com is a great buy compared to what I have payed for them in the past at other places.

This is more a review about the easy return than the product itself. I own many pairs of these in different colors. You can't find them at the store any more so I ordered here. One shoe came with glue lumps under the sole that wouldn't even out. The other shoe was fine. Amazon refunded the money and I didn't have to pay return shipping.
These shoes are really cushy for flip flops and very comfortable. They stay put on my feet even when I'm running and they are so darn cute.

I first found these shoes at Shoe Carnival last year and had been looking for a second pair ever since. They are so comfy- and this coming from a woman who can't stand flip flops with that thing between your toes! If you cook or stand a lot at home, BUY THESE SHOES. There's something about the foam that keeps my feet from hurting, especially after cooking or doing laundry for an hour or more. I bought a black pair for inside and a brown one for outside. As for my old black ones? I wear them outside now. They've never slipped off- even when running for the bus! Get the 2 pack. I'm a witness...
Good value for the money. The soles provide more support than I anticipated. The only drawback is that they are definitely not as stylish as I had hoped.

I had been looking for an SAS outlet online without success, and found these shoes which looked VERY similar, but cost about $40 less. I decided to try a pair and they are pretty comfortable but much tighter than the SAS shoes. I use a 9W in SAS and ordered a 9 C/D in the Softspot version, although the box they came in was labeled as the same size as 9W, the same size as the SAS. The Softspot shoe is smaller and tighter than the SAS, so next time I will order a wider or bigger size.

These boots are the most comfortable boots I've had. This is my second pair. In my years in the military I've had custom made boots which don't even compare to the comfort of these. The only bad thing is that they are a bit bulky and not the lightest out there. Overall they are a great everyday boot.

Bought these for a white school uniform shoe. It is narrow at the ball of the foot, completely straight where your foot would be widest. Might want to consider a wide width or one size larger, even if you don't normally need wide. Seems to hold up well to wear. Leather in good condition.

I have been in pair after pair of the black Reef Ginger flip flops for well over a decade now. When I first saw their skinny, comfy little strap and the cushiony, arch-supported footbed with durable rubber bottoms I was in love. I even love the little rubber Reef logo tag along the strap. They make me feel like a cool surfer chick even though I've never seen a surfboard in person. I live in the South and I pretty much wear mine from late spring through summer and into fall when I start feeling self-conscious beginning of October and have to switch over to proper shoes. I can get by with one pair every couple years, but they really start to look rough around the middle of that second summer. They casual up a flowy maxi dress and go perfectly with jean shorts or cropped jeans...and pretty much anything else.These seem to have been slightly altered from the models I've had in the past. Little difference in the fabric strap pattern and the pattern on the bottom rubber piece. No biggie.They come in whole sizes only. I'm almost always a 7.5 in shoes so I wear the seven and they fit to my foot great. My mom is an 8.5 and wears the size 8 Reefs and they look great. I don't think your heel or toes will fall off if you get the half size down. But I guess that is personal preference if you like to go up and get a roomier pair, say if maybe you have really long toes or wide feet. When I first slip a new pair on the straps are a little snug but they stretch to fit perfectly after one wearing.Just about as lady-like as a pair of flip flops can get.

The product was is in great quality as expected from the Timberland brand. The only issue I had was that the shoe came looking new from the outside whole the inside showed sines of wear (dirt scuffs, sand, etc.) which disappointed me since the shoe was a gift for a loved one. The shoes are comfortable and well supported as reported to me. Be careful when you go with white. Stains only come off if you clean them right away. Scuffs are easily noticeable and near impossible to get off. The colors in the pictures on Amazon are very accurate.I would definitely buy them again and would reccommend it to others.
My daughter loves converse so the fact that it fit her witout us having to return or try on in the store was a plus - it arrived on time
These are all black Chucks! You get what you would normally expect from Chucks. What else can you say? Love em
I wear Ked sneakers always and I was over joyed to find this show at such a low price. It is just as expected, great quality and reliable shoe!

When I had decided to purchase this particular style, I clicked on the "Sizing info" link next to the size choice box. I very carefully followed the directions there, then used the measurements I made to reference against the sizing chart. From there, and partly against my own better judgement, I made my size choice thinking that I shouldn't have to guess at the right size, this precisely laid-out process should yield the correct size choice.Well, I should have just guessed, because what I got were shoes that were about right for my neighbor's 2 year old instead of my 10 year old.On the plus side they weren't expensive enough to make it worth the effort and cost to return them. So I gave them to my neighbor.And luckily I was able to find something in a brick-and-mortar store that worked for the costume I was putting together for my son.Maybe I'm just an idiot and followed the directions wrong, but I won't be buying shoes from Amazon again anytime soon. Maybe pictures with the different size shoes in the same frame as a clearly labeled ruler would be more useful than a giant table full of numbers that repeat themselves at arcane intervals and are best understood by shoe-industry professionals.

HELP!, I need somebody, HELP! Not just anybody....and soforth. I cant buy these shoes ANYWHERE!!! Ive searched all over and they either dont have them in my size or I just cant buy them. this site wont let me buy them cuz it isnt listened as a product i can buy... i have no idea why. If any1 has any information on where i can get my hands on these shoes please email me at: stevemosca@hotmail.com

I do believe that this product is a type of Birkenstock, or maybe they have a license to sell as a Birkenstock, but they are not the Original Birkenstock as they claim to be.I did not appreciate the service I received from Midwest Sports. Choosing the size by the sizing chart and comparing it to my shoe size, I thought I chose the correct size; but it was not, it was a size larger. So I had to exchange them. Not only did I have to pay for the postage to return the item, I was also charged to have the correct size mailed back to me. In my past experiences, the dealer has always been the one to pay for the postage.Will I purchase from Midwest Sports again? No.
Had to return them due to not fitting which is no falt of the boot. They were perfect, just not perfect for my feet. :(
I love to go out and dress up with these shoes on! They are pretty comfortable and fun!

Love these shoes...I bought the pewter color which goes well with silver/platinum. (Just not as super-shiny as the silver version of these shoes looked online.) Did put an insole in as they have no support or cushioning whatsoever. With this inexpensive insole - the shoes are perfect. Nice crossover of the metallic and ballet flat trend, but timeless looking. They go with everything!
i was worried about the way the sandals look in the picture since they round up, but ddint effect walking or anything. very comfortable my boyfriend says. he likes them a lot!

I like the no scuff leather. The boots broke in hard , but all the good boots I have had broke in hard. I have a pair of Hi- Tec boots like this pair I have had for years and if this pair holds up as good I will be a Hi-Tec wearer for life!

My youngest daughter who has a wide foot needed these for her ballet class. They are always reliable and fit as they should. Also as a Prime member, they qualified for FREE two day shipping. If your little one is starting out in dance or is a pro, these are the best shoes. Oh yeah, the price is also very economical.
These wooden shoe trees are a great bargain for the price. I purchased 3 on my last order and plan on purchasing the exact same shoe trees to fill all my shoes.
I really am completely satisfied with the product and with the attention given by you really that I have recommended my friends and well I hope to buy something and receive the same attention

Firstly, I will list what makes this shoe great! I have had shoes before like this that were called "leather" yet the fabric torn within the first use. However, this is made from fine, real leather material I found to be very durable and of a high quality. The footbeds are some of the best I have ever used, and the bottom soles seem to be very stred resistant, unlike many dress shoes. I did find these shoes a little hot without super thin socks. Fit wise, there are some negatives. *I had to get this in a 4E, two widths normal than usual, which I usually never need to do. So be careful when chosing your width* Also the lining of the shoes is a little snug, maybe I am being picky, but that was just a little uncomfortable. The look is as simple as can be, so it will go with everything! As long as you are size cautious, you'll end up with a quality shoe.
i think that this sneaker was a bit tight but otherwise a good buy. waiting to procure a similar item.
For quick moving feet and an improved jump shot pick up the dunk-feast a3 adidas b-bal shoe, you will not find a better fit. Great support for lower ankles and arches. Over all great shoe
This is not an all terrain shoe and should be used only for manicured grass and soft tracks.... but for those surfaces it is an excellent shoe

Bought these in 2 colors, the violet and red. I am purchasing the rest of the colors. My advice to you is ... if they have your size, get them before they are gone!These are the most comfortable shoes I've purchased in a very long time. So much so that I have actually worn them as slippers in the house.The Francesca Flat is very well constructed and an extremely flexible sole only adds to my satisfaction. The colors are deep and rich. One reviewer indicated that the red was more of a burgandy, but that is not really accurate. It is a dark red, but not candy apple red. It is certainly not burgandy. The violet is simply gorgeous.This shoe will dress up or down. I've worn them with everything from black for early cocktails to jeans and a silk blouse for something more casual. Very versatile addition to any shoe wardrobe, and a solid 5 star rating.
did not wash well... price was great but doesn't seem like the same Keds that you buy in dept stores. Not real happy with them.

I love these shoes! I have bought several pairs in different colors. They are as comfortable as atheltic shoes but much more stylish. But beware--they run small! I normally wear a size 6.5, but I have to order a size 7 with these.

I bought these for the sole purpose of weightlifting. Excellent ankle support and flat bottoms without much heel make these an ideal shoe in the gym. These shoes provide very firm footing and i would highly recommend them to bodybuilders on a budget.
i like these shoes to wear around the house instead of house slippers.they are comfortable.have them in all colors.i realy like them.
This is a nice Justin Roper boot. The boot does not come with a liner, so you need to put one in. Actually this is a nice option so you can decide if you want to put in a thicker one.
These boots are exactly the same as the pairs I owned 30 years ago, they don't last that long I was elated to find them again at such a reasonable cost.
Just what you would expect from Steve Madden. Fits true to size. Best of the gladiators!

These are some of my most comfortable and dependable flip flops I've ever owned. I had my first pair for eight years until darling puppy decided to chew them into peices. I was so elated to discover that they're still available and I ordered a replacement pair. Super comfortable that gets better with time - great arch support.

I fell in love with Puma Gvvs the moment I saw them at the mall. Already owning two pairs of Puma Gvs (with shoelaces instead of velcro), I couldn't wait to get my hands on a pair of gvvs. They are ridiculously cute; however, I have no idea why Puma only manufactures them as men's shoes. I could never see a guy wearing these shoes.Anyway, I bought a pair from the puma website. I am typically a size 6 in women's, but got a 5.5 in men's which is a 7 in women's (because they were all out of smaller sizes). I was very happy with the way they look, except that they were too big for me. After a while though, the bottom of the shoes started yellowing. Of my two pairs of puma gvs, one yellowed and one has stayed white. I don't know why puma makes shoes whose soles turn yellow! It's gross and I hate it! So I would recommend purchasing these shoes in person. Feel the sole; I've found that the pairs that stay white are more plasticy and slightly glossyish. Besides turning yellow, they are great shoes!

Who notices a man's shoe?Well, oddly enough people have had nice compliments. They are comfy and easy to slip on if you need to jump out a window at a moment's notice. The tread on them is interesting. I can't say what long time wearing will do to it but it borders on wearing rubber cleats without scuffing the floor.I say buy them ... but then what would make me special for wearing them if you have the same pair?
Very comfortable and true to size. Love the red or black shoestring options. In my opinion you can't go wrong with Saucony.

These are the best flip-flops I've ever worn! Not only do they have great arch support, but there was no break-in period (no blisters!). Comfortable from day one. I'm hooked. I want a pair in each color!

These shoes were a lot dressier than I thought they were, I wanted them for everyday shoes to wear with dressier jeans and slacks. These shoes are very shiny almost like tuxedo shoes but they look really nice and the price can't be beat.
These shoes are cute and match outfits very well, but I think that they forgot about comfort. If you plan on walking around for awhile, these are not the sneakers to do it in.

I though this was a comfortable shoe that's why I bought it but it really stiff in the arches that every time I go walking in it my feet hurt but maybe i just have weak arches it's kind of lose in the heels but maybe i bought it too wide, hopefully it gets comfortable after a while.

This is my third pair. The first finally wore out after 5 years of use in the yard and all around durring the winter and my second is reserved for just hiking, (they took me over the Indian Himilayas very nicely, thank you.)Light weight, inexpensive, and a good fit. I can recomend them. Oh Yea they truly are water proof till about 5 years old.
I had a pair of boots that I worked in for two years. These boots were just like them. I like them very much.
Product arrived faster than I expected and it was exactly what I expected it to be but it was too small for my son. So I returned it.
These shoes have been the traditional Xmas gift to my sail boating son-in-law for 20+ years. He will not wear any other boat shoe. The 9 wide is a perfect fit. Most other brands do not come in wide.
I purchased these shoes for my husband for PT because I have Asics and I love them. My husband says that he really likes them. Comfortable shoes!
I bought these becasue I like very flat and simple shoes. Some reviews say these run big, but I ordered my usual size 13 and they fit great.
I have always loved Keds sneakers, however, 2 weeks after purchasing these shoes, the bottoms came loose and I had to throw them away.

I run somewhere between 30-50 miles a week and am a mild pronator. I'm on my second pair of the GTS 7's in about 6 months and I rotate between these and the similarly designed shoe from Mizuno (Wave Inspire 3) and Adidas (Supernova). Personally speaking, I find the Adrenaline are a pretty decent compromise between these shoes. They feel comfortable, pretty responsive, and generally wear very well once broken in. I feel faster in my Mizuno's, though (I don't think I've ever raced in the Brooks), and there is a definite break in period for me where one of my pinky toes can get badly blistered if I run exclusively in the Brooks. Once they're broken in, though, this isn't a problem, and if I rotate shoes, it also isn't a problem so I really don't fault anything in the design of the Adrenalines.With a couple changes these could probably be my favorite shoes and a shoe I would race in, but as is, they're about tied with the Mizuno's as my favorite running shoe.

These are a great pair of shoes--stylish, comfortable (for the most part) and very well made. They are exactly what you would expect from a Clarks shoe. The fit is true to size, good amount of cushioning in the sole, heel is just right. My only complaint--and a minor one at that--is that there is some breaking in required, the top portion of the shoe tends to rub the top of your foot. But this is minor and can be solved by wearing the shoes with socks around the house for a couple of hours. I would definitely recommend these shoes.
These shoes are great for the price. I agree with other reviewers who say the shoes run small. I ordered size 7 for a size 6 foot and they fit well.

I took a chance and ordered these online ahead of a three-and-a-half week trip to Italy. These shoes MADE that trip a joy. They are exceedingly comfortable: the velcro straps allow precise adjustment, the padding removes all chance of blisters. But, even more than that, they provide support for balance and stability. Besides walking in city centers with cobblestones and uneven pavements, i wore them when we hiked in natural areas as well. They were brilliant! They also make a reasonable transition to city life. I got the black leather ones, which looked fine in restaurants and at conferences. They were worth every penny!

We love the color, very comfortable, my niece just love them. These are high quality product let me tell you :) Order came as I expected, we are so happy with Capezio products :) and amazon has better prices than at the stores, I compared the prices :)
It works like a charm. My husband cannot bend very well due to his age and this helps him put on his shoes every time.

Man... i wore these as a kid and some of the older dudes at work thought it would be fun to purchase them to wear on casual fridays. I bought the leather ones and can't get over how comfortable they are. Darn if I don't get complimented on them, too. PF Flyers make you "run faster and jump higher"!

These sandals do what I wanted -- keep water off my feet at the pool and provide a quick slip on/off at my other exercise classes. But I was surprised how goofy these looked on me in person! First, several reviewers recommended sizing up, but I would disagree. I usually wear a 9.5 or 10, so I got a 10, and these extend over an inch behind my heels. The band over the foot is excessively tall, making it pretty loose to walk in. If you tighten the velcro, the top part of the band then sticks straight out to the side, which just looks silly. Finally, I'm not sure if it's just the too-large size, but the sandals look much bulkier on me than they do in the picture. They are fairly heavy and thick in both the sole and the band. I'm very lazy about returning purchases so I kept these -- but I'd recommend skipping them and looking elsewhere.

I wanted a pair of trendy cute slip-ons. However, when I received them, they weren't nearly as cute as the pictures make them out to be. They have a really bulbous round toe, my boyfriend (lovingly) called them "clown shoes" the first time he saw me wear them!I got these in the black and red floral print and the red looks understated in the pics but is actually fire engine red in real life. Sadly, I don't wear these to work like I wanted to but they are fine for running to the mail box or the grocery store.As far as quality of the shoe, it's a nice shoe. Well made, pretty comfy, no complaints about that. Just wish it were cuter and not clowny.

I have been wearing the Rockport ProWalkers for many years. I wear them at work and wear out a pair every 9-12 months. They "ugly out" before they actually wear out. I have always had black and I polish them once a month or so. They are the only shoe that lasts through a Disney World vacation. I am not limping at the end of the day. When they are 4 to 6 months old I usually place a foam pad into them to renew the soft feeling.

was gonna mark this one star...the size was miss-leading, and too large for my daughter to wear. She really, really wanted these, was soooo excited when she opened them. One full size, or more, too large, maybe men's vs. women's? Miss-marked? Now what? There they sit in her room until I can fix the problem. But...the quality was very nice, shipped well, all that. SO, two stars.
I received a tottaly different pair of boots !!Instead of leather I received suede and the model was not the same ...I hate returns so I am glad I like the boots...

My son is on pair four. He loves the comfort of this shoe. Oddly enough he needs a shoe horn to put them on but once on they are like a comfy glove. Sadly it looks like they are phasing out and the black and white ones are rare to find which are the only ones he'll wear.

i got these cleats for $50 at amazon. they are the best cleats i have ever bought. I am not sure they are worth $150 which is what they are asking for them right now but if you will use them every day, they are worth it. i kick somewhat better in them and they clean very easily. this is a big deal for me because i travel a lot and my team's home field is constantly muddy. the interchangeable parts of the shoe seem cool but i don't actually change parts of it depending in where i am playing. it takes a little while to actually do it.
Good ppl had a problem with my tracking number so i emailed them and with great responce my questions were answered..
I have been wearing KEDs for over 50 years, love them. They were exactly what I odered, no problems
Nice looking shoes, but the ones I received are way too small. They say size 7.5N, but definitely are not. I will have to return them.
I bought the shoes for my father who just turned 49 and he rocks them from day one hard body!

These shoes are great if not for getting the wrong size, as I now find out. I ordered a half size bigger than what I normally wear, so when these arrived yesterday, I tried them on. I ordered Size 7.5 M (US) which is what I order for CLARKS, and these shoes fit are smaller. Other than the fit, I really like the look of the shoes as well as the quality of the leather used to make it, so I do hope I can exchange the ones I received for a size that fits better. If these fit, I am sure I would be quite happy with them. Just be aware that the size as posted can either run a half size larger or smaller. Mine was the latter.I will change or put up another review for this once this is resolved.
They're very well-made. They don't have much arch support, so I did have to add inserts. Otherwise, I'm really glad to have purchased these.
These are great shoes, very comfortable! The shipping was on time, and I am overall very pleased with them.

These boots are quite the surprise! At first I thought "another tennis shoe boot" . Not so! I started to wear them to get a feel and they were pretty good out of the box. After a long committed hike of about ten miles I stopped and thought wow these are actually feeling BETTER than when I started! From there on I hunted in these for about 60 miles with close to 20 thousand verticle feet(checked by GPS). They were great! I have had two neuromas removed from my feet and soft shoes are a must have. These have been the best boots even against my Danners at half the weight and a quarter of the price. They also have great traction in all conditions. In wet deep grass they will get wet inside. They also don't stink inside unlike older boots of this type. Will I buy another pair? Well I'm shopping for another pair to replace these right now.

THESE ARE NICE AND SPACIOUS BOOTS AND THE BURGANDY IS A HARD COLOR TO FIND BUT MY GOD THEY COME WITH NO INTERIOR CUSHIONING SO BEWARE.....IT TOOK 2 SETS OF INNER CUSHIONS TO RENDER THESE WEARABLE. IF IT WERE NOT FOR THE COLOR THEY WOULD HAVE GONE RIGHT BACK.THEY ARE DRESSY ENOUGH FOR WORK ON IN CLEMENT DAYS BUT THAT HARD FOOT BASE ALMOST GOT THESE A 1 STAR RATING.

What else can I say? Converse's Chuck Taylor High-Tops have been tried and true for decades. They are comfortable, fun and in my case, red. I am 51 years young and I receive more compliments on these shoes than any other item of apparel that I own. Love them.

Have worn Softspots in the past as a nursing shoe and found them to be very comfortable. This casual style is every bit as comfortable and true to size. The only drawback I could find is in the arch support. It could be a bit firmer.

I adore these shoes. It is so hard to find a nice pair of comfortable dress shoes. I hate high heels, and someone on the internet recommended these to me. I now have 3 pairs. You can dress them up or down, they are perfect for work with a pair of slacks, and best of all you can walk around A LOT without your feet hurting.
I have arch issues, (I.E. plantar fasica, bone spurs)I find these sneakers dissipate shock and provide the best support Iv found in any prev. sneaker,I would recomend this sneaker to anyone. John
These are the best stability running shoes I have ever had. I just keep buying them over and over...

This is a very comfortable well wearing shoe. This is my second purchase. When the time comes to buy another new pair of shoes, if these are still available, I WILL buy another pair. My only problem was that the liner in my first pair wore out, after two years, before the rest of the shoe.

I love them----but I hate that you can not keepthem tied. There should be a material used sothat you are able to tie them. I feel I have to cutthe cord and knot the cord. Other than that, theyare great. They are compfy and well sized.
This are wonderful well made and resistant work shoes. I order this for a friend of mine in honduras and she is very happy with them.
This is a well made and comfortable boot. I have them in the rich brown also that I bought out West. I wear them with jeans or a country looking dress or denim skirt...sharp looking AND comfortable!

Recently had to have a brace for my foot. Needed a 4EEEE. Ordered this shoe in a 4EEEE but this shoe is doing good to be a 1E. Kept them to wear the one on the good foot and bought another pair from Payless shoes that were half the price.

I've been looking for this specific color and style and went to every athletic shoe store in Phoenix and Las Vegas but could not find it until i happened to look on Amazon. They, of course, had it and i ordered it immediately. It took a little longer than expected to get the shoes but once they were here i slipped them on and they fit like a glove.
Good looking shoe that was well made. It was the right size, but just didn't fit. I had to return the shoes. I have a very narrow foot that is hard to fit.
This are super confortable shoes if you do not mind the 'men' look. Great with pants. Wear for 8h or longer with no pain, padding is extraordinary. The brown is beautiful.
The left show was not assembled evenly when compared to the right. Had to return them. Its a shame because they are the best boat shoes I was able to find.

I first ordered these slippers for Christmas 2010 as a gift for husband. He liked them so much that he wore them almost every day. Even though they are still in good shape (a plus) I ordered him another pair for Christmas 2011 in a slightly different color. He was thrilled to get them. My only issue is that the price for these went up almost 100% from last year. But I still consider them a great buy.

I absolutely love these shoes. This is actually my second pair of them. My first ones were starting to get old and worn so I wanted to get a new pair while they are still around. They're SO comfortable and very sexy.

i've always hated seeing people wear these shoes out in town as a regular shoe... but i got a pair after a training deployment to Thailand and blew out 2 pairs of flipflops (shower shoes) walking over gravel and dirt going to and from the showers. I got the Realtree cammo special just to be different from everyone else and i love them for what they are. great on the beach, at the river, around the yard and house. i just wish they made the XXXXL in white. id really like to get a white pair in my size for my dads wedding comming up later this year. hes getting married on a boat on the river and were all doing a casual dress up.all in all, great shoe. but i still wont wear them out in town.
I love Birkenstocks! They are so comfortable and they wear well. I've bought two so far and walked in them all around the world.
The shoes were not the size that I thought I was ordering. I wanted a women's size. These will be sent back.
They looked great when i got them and are still holding up good. This coming from someone that wears out shoes like no other. haha
can someone tell me if this uggs are real i need to know asap so i can buy them so can anyone reply fast plz

Love these shoes. Have had for a couple months now. Well constructed, fits nice and snug. I wanted something like a tennis shoe, but without the hassle of laces. A little less supportive and less cushioned than tennis shoes, but that's OK, I'm not running or standing for long periods of time with them. I use them as my kick-arounds, and the white is nice.
This shoe provides excellent stability. It's very comfortable and roomy enough for orthotics, but it is quite heavy and clunky looking.
This was a gift for my father on fathers day. He tells me they are very comfortable. So I guess according to him, these are very good sneakers.

These are very nice shoes, but the site showed them available in a triplewide but what was shipped was a double wide. So, they were too small for my mother-in-law to wear. This was real frustrating because she has such a hard time finding shoes that fit and my husband spent quite a bit of time shopping on the internet. They were sure they had found an answer when they ordered these sandals. We got our refund (minus shipping) and that's all good, but we wish the shoes had been what they were represented to be in the beginning!

I didn't notice the buckle when I ordered, but the shoe fits so well that the little extra time involved doesn't bother me at all. I ordered it in red (not a bright true red, but toned-down - think medium rust with touch of pink and chocolate). It will go with most things in my closet. Propet is a wonderful shoe - I have a similar sandal in tan with two velcro straps and a closed back (a "tennis shoe" sandal), and a boot with 2" heel. All are very comfortable - at this age, the most important detail in footwear!

I ordered these shoes for work beauce of a number of positive reviews I'd read about them, however, these are not walking shoes! They make my feet ache just walking to and from the bus stop which is right down the street. They haven't much cushioning, had to buy inserts but in doing so make them extremely tight. The only feature I do like is the easy slide on/off. Do NOT buy these if you do a lot of walking.Still searching for the right shoe. So far, Nike Air Max has provded the best results (for me).Hope this review helps.

After wearing 574 for a few years I decided to try the another retro show the 420. While the show is nice looking and flexible. There is very little padding compared to the 574s I have had. I will wear the shoes till they wear out but will go back to 574s for my next shoe.
They are about 2 sizes larger than I wear.But for long rides they serve good to keep the feet protected.

Absolutely beautiful boot and can't wait to wear them. We don't have a lot of cold weather in Houston but I always wear my boots as often as I can. Sorry I can't write about how they feel yet but being Rockport, I doubt I will be disappointed.

The black version of the Itasca SeaRay Slides arrived on time and in a box. They fit and are moderately comfortable. For the $30 or so shipped, they are about what i would expect. But, these are not some deeply discounted irregulars or end of line, though they may actually be. The are worth the $24.99. The smell of rubber was dominant when i opened up the box. there is no more than a flat piece of thin material separating the rubber from the removable insert. They are light and do fit comfortably but do not , by any means compare to the other higher line mocs that happen to go on some drastic sale and if i am lucky enough to find my size at the same time they go on sale-once every 3years. maybe. So, these seemed to be ok out of the box. i am wearing them and went for a walk without them breaking down and without getting any blisters. They do have a nice back for the achilles tendon and some foam in it with a center portion cut down for easier entry and removal, not much support but a nicer addition. there are elastic gores on each side with very little stretch to them but fine. my size was on target.the only real issue was that these were no way first quality or regular. there are glue spots all over the toe and fronts of both shoes. not little ones but sizable and 4 on one shoe and a couple on the other. they do not come off. At first , i thought it was only dust from shipping or a shelf storage. only it didnt come off with a light brushing nor with some water on a cloth. For me, it isnt a big deal because i always spill something i am cooking on my new shoes the first time i wear them anyway. I cant help it, always have, I used to cook for a living and now for amusement so am used to having a couple of oil spots on everything. Some people might be put off by the glue drips. I dont really mind but would normally want to be the one who gets the first spots or stains on my shoes (or shirts) thinking that this time I will keep them in perfect shape for more than a day.For the price i paid ,no problem, had i paid the 'full price' listed on the screen of $60, i would have returned them today-the day i got them.

Oh man I'd forgotten how easy these are to wear! Make sure and get 1 size smaller, they do run big no matter what they say at the shoe store. A classic that never goes out of style. I hadn't had a pair in years and these are rapidly becoming my "go to" pair of shoes.PLUS THEY'RE JUST PLAIN COOL!!

This really is the best shoe I have found for training on pavement. It is very cushioned, and I notice less leg pain than with the various kinds I was trying before these. It wears like iron - I get probably 50% more life than from a pair than from other trainers I have used. Part of that is due to the fact that the uppers are still made with real animal hides, not synthetic. I put 600 miles on my last pair and visually it looked almost brand new.Oh, the best part: they're one of the few shoes still made in the USA by American workers.
I took everyone's advice and ordered two sizes larger than I normally wear. The boots fit perfectly and are very warm.

Maybe I'm biased. Although, I doubt it. I was 12 when i first wore a pair of Ipath Grasshoppers when a buddy offered them to me.I picked these up from amazon and they've become my go to shoe.Pros:The insole is great, the gum sole doesn't have too many spots where rocks can wedge themselves in, the tongue is thinner than most other skate shoes i've owned from Circa and Supra. Pockets in the tongues of the shoes.Cons:The Strap doesn't come off, and when it's unstrapped the shoe kind of shifts better. It's great though
This shoe is bigger than any other size 9 I own... by at least a full size.
AS ADVERTISED ! ! ! !shipped fast.! ! !no problems ! ! !very comfy ! ! !

I found these boots to be very comfortable - I wore them almost everyday for all kinds of activities. I initially started with the Stealth II boot, also with the side zip. When the zipper broke after a few months, I got them replaced with another Stealth II. These lasted longer, but when the zipper broke on that, the guy at the local shop said I might have more luck with the first generation boot (the ones here) because the zipper seems to be sturdier. I liked these boots more, but the zipper ended up failing on these as well.Now, I was very careful to treat the zipper well, especially on the third pair, but it failed nonetheless. I ended up buying more Magnum boots, but I won't buy boots with the side zip again.

I used to have a keds as a kid and I wasn't sure whether I would want a shoe that I had during my childhood. I don't regret anything about these shoes, they are just as comfortable as I remembered them.
I loved the super soft leather and the fact that these shoes come in wide sizes. They would br 5 stars if the soles were thicker to give more cushion.
Great shoes in all facets except for the insoles detaching from the shoe. I just bought some of those Dr. Scholl's to keep them down and attached. Overall, not a deal breaker.

Soy guía de turismo en Costa Rica, mi trabajo exige largas caminatas en bosque, ciudad, playas, senderos, etc. Por tener tantos meses de lluvia siempre he usado botas hi-tec impermeables y no tengo queja alguna, los últimos 2 pares los he tenido que cambiar porque se me gasta la suela! Cómodas, ajuste perfecto, livianas, muy resistentes, y con un precio accesible!El envío fue mejor de lo esperado.Pura vida!
The shoe runs a bit on the narrow side but over all I am pleased with the product.

The first time I saw this shoe (in black/white patent leather) was on the feet of Boston Celtics All-Star forward Antoine Walker. Being a fan of "old-school" shoes and Mr. Walker, I immediately took a liking to the Adidas Promodel 2G.The Adidas Promodel line has been around for over four decades now and many a current and former NBA player has spent time in a pair, whether in high school, college or at the pro level. The first thing that stood out to me was how Adidas kept the classic "shell toe" as part of the shoe while adding minor adjustments to give it a nice blend of modern/retro looks. The patent leather also gives it a nice touch making the shoe simple, but unique.Another huge plus which I'm sure everyone will notice is the price. ... it ain't gonna clean out too many pockets and for this price y'all can go out and cop a pair or two (one for home games, one for the road). So, the bottom line on the Adidas Promodel 2G is that it's worth considering if you're a junior high or high school-level team looking for a good value in a team shoe (... the Promodel costs a lot less than most shoes designed for team use) or if you need a shoe for those lazy Sunday afternoon games down at the park.
They are extremely comfortable and lightweight! Perfect for walking, running, or shopping! I was so pleased that I ordered a second pair for 13 year old daughter that wanted to take them over!

I loved these shoes when I got them. They Rock. The company Dress Code is great also they were really good to me when I received my shoes unfortunately they didn't fit so I had to return them for a pair one size bigger. Anyway I didn't have the money at that time to send them back right away so I told them I would send them back as soon as I got paid and to my surprise a few days later I received a prepaid return label from them it was great. Now I am able to send them back right away I am very happy with everything.

Sure, Keds aren't made like they were back in the day, but for the price you really can't complain. I got these to wear casually since I didn't want to shell out double the amount for similar shoes, and I love them! There's no arch support, but that's nothing some insoles can't solve. After a few months of wear [even to dances and the gym], my Keds still look pretty new. However, beware people with wider feet! These shoes are a but narrow in the toe area.

I got the black Women's size 7 tap shoes and they look nice. The heel was just the right height, but no taps included?! They weren't put on the shoes nor were they included in the box. This is weird. Now I notice that the photo in amazon featured just the shoes with no taps. I should've been more observant! Now I have to purchase the taps from a specialty dance store and go to a shoe repair shop to have the taps put on professionally. Beware.
These shoes are a classic and are very comfortable, but, you have to be careful or they will rip. mine ripped in the first month

I just got my pair of Boots today in the mail. I was actually expecting them to arrive Jan.4th-Han.8th, but they came two days earlier ! So, I was very surprised and happy about that. At first when I opened the box, I thought they were used because the shoe box was all "worn out" and stuff, but the shoes weren't used. They are actually cuter than they appear on the picture. I love them. THey are sooo comfy and they look great on me unlike my friend's Emu Boots. The sole is the strong-durable like kind. Made of rubber, and you can roll the top of the boots so the fur on the inside will show. I was going to get a size 8 but they werent available so I got a size 7.5 instead. They fit perfectly. Still leaving room for my toes to wiggle around. They are amazing. They came early, they were a great price- I think mine were around $15-$19! That's a great deal for brand new boots like these. I really like them. Thank You !

These are very nice shoes, but the site showed them available in a triplewide but what was shipped was a double wide. So, they were too small for my mother-in-law to wear. This was real frustrating because she has such a hard time finding shoes that fit and my husband spent quite a bit of time shopping on the internet. They were sure they had found an answer when they ordered these sandals. We got our refund (minus shipping) and that's all good, but we wish the shoes had been what they were represented to be in the beginning!

Great SHoes, nice quality, not to mention comfortable as well.Will buy this brand again. Great Price TOO!! which is always a factor when you are shopping for yourself. Purchased 2 pairs, one pair black, and the other pair brown. Excellent service and received the shoes within a few days. Will buy shoes again here at amazon!! Great dealing with them, have never had any problems ...at all!!!! It is really nice to shop from home too.

the t-mac 3 is a great shoe it looks so niceand is very comftorble. I have 2 pairs the white and the black becauce i like thoughs more then then the blue and red. And just let you guys now the black ones have better traction then the white.DA T-MAC 3s ARE DA BEST!

Once I got the size straight they worked out great. The wide, medium and narrow threw me off. Ended up with the next size up and medium width for a good fit.She loves them.

I am delighted with this product. previously bought addias trainers,but found these are lite, hard wearing and very comfortable . I purchased these boots for my cousin in England, who has trouble finding such a large size in a hunting boot. He said these boots are wide enough for his feet ( he usually wears 15W )eventhough they read Medium. He also said these boots are the best for keeping his feet warm while out in the fields in temperatures well below freezing. The fleecy type coating on the inside keeps feet dry and warm.He did comment one thing though......he said he spray paints the yellow strip around the boot, purely because it stands out too bright for real hunters like him. I do not have a clue as I am a City kid!!!!In any case, the boots are the best of the best and he is a World Champion Shooter.....Great Purchase indeed.

Love them, when going out with my kids, terrific slippers. They are SO EASY to clean and dry. Very comfortable and resistant. Shoe is true to size. There is cushioning on the sole and it is so comfortable. I literally ended up at an event for 12 hours in these shoes and my feet didn't hurt they were so comfortable. Love my Mocs....have worn them since I was a kid. Love the colorand the fit, as always, is perfect. The sole makes it easier towalk outside. Love them!!!

I ordered this item two weeks ago. I ordered a size 11 and got a 7.5. Went through the hassle of getting a refund, repackaging and shipping the item. Then I ordered a new pair after being assured that I would receive the right size. However ONCE AGAIN THE SHOES ARRIVED IN A SIZE 7.5. This is ridiculous. Please beware, don't waste your time.

The copa mundial has been the best selling soccer boot for the last 20 plus years. There is a reason for it. First, the styling is simple and elegant. Three white stripes and that it. My cleats have last over 10 years and then i bought the exact pair again. Why? The comfort and fit. The Kangaroo skin leather stretches to molds to your foot for a permanent custom fit. Try them and you will become a believer. They are the gold standard of soccer boots.
I bought these for my daughter's spring musical. They fit great and she's been able to break them in during rehearsals. You definitely need to order a half-size larger than street shoes.

Greatest Most durable boots I've ever purchased. I'm actually very surprised with these for the price I paid. All comparable boots in local stores were easily twice the cost. I'd highly reccommend these boots to someone who wanted something long lasting.
I ordered these in a wide width because the regular ones always seem to make my feet hurt. They are comfortable.
These are absolutely wonderful! So comfortable and easy to walk and stand in, can wear them all day! Sizing is accurate. Delivery was right on time.

Impressive work.As a person living in singapore,i'm not exposed to this brand at all. These are my son's favorite and he swears by their quality. They don't fall apart like other brands he has tried and believe me, he is hard on them. He likes the fact that the soles don't come apart from the uppers.
Good looking shoe that was well made. It was the right size, but just didn't fit. I had to return the shoes. I have a very narrow foot that is hard to fit.
Fantastic quality,comfortable and most important they are an asset to any wardrobe. This boot is by far my favorite pair of boots.

These are the best boots ever! Most comfortable, warmest, durable! I started my search for boots after playing in the Wisconsin snow with my daughter and my feet were frozen. I am usually a 6.5 I ordered a 6 and they work great but my friend order a 9 (she is usually a 8.5 and hers are too big!) I read in the description to order smaller she didn't read that. The cost is worth it the quality is superior to anything out there!
Converse All Star are made to feel comfortable, this kind of shoes is never out of fashion, with jeans or shorts, wit t-shirts or shirts, once you wear a pair you will wish to have all of them.

comfortable, reliable, and it preforms. In today's game, the classics are what stand out. Everyone is wearing neon green, pink, plastic shoes that will be popular for a month then fade. Oh and they cost $400. This boot will never stop preforming and looking great.
This is a great shoe at a very competitive price. Shipment was quick and I could not be more pleased!

My wife got a pair of these crocs and absolutely loved them so I figured I would give them a try and I purchased a pair myself. They are the most comfortable shoe to wear. They look nice, they hold up well, they are so light and they massage your feet while you walk because they have all these little bubbles inside. I purchase them before we went on vacation and loved them because they can get wet or anything and can't hurt them. You really need to try a pair of crocs. You won't be disappointed.
I had not had a new pair of Birkenstocks in 20 or so years and these arrived I opened them up ,put them on and all was good with the world.

Naturalizer Scout ShoesI have been looking for another pair of these shoes for years now. Not carried in our local stores. I didn't know they still made them. I had two pairs which I wore until they wore out. I will be ordering more, so keep them stocked. I hope they keep making them! I have feet that are very hard to fit, so that the Velcro strap helps. So does the design and comfortable heels. But I mustn't praise them too much or you'll be all sold out next time I want to buy a pair.

I bought these shoes to complete my cheerleading costume for a special event. They looked Great!Customizable: The color blocks are easy to interchange, they tie into the laces, so they stay well, too.Size: The shoes were very comfortable, and I found them true to size - I wear an 8 1/2, and I bought the size 9. As with running shoes, I find that you should always go up at least a 1/2 size to account for the forward motion, and they fit perfectly. There was a little extra room, as expected, but when jumping around in them, I found them to be great.Traction: My only concern was that there was little to no traction. This may not matter for your use of the shoes, but I was wearing them on a slick dance floor, and when someone spilled a drink, I fell pretty hard. If using on a track surface, grass, or other "standard" cheerleading materials, this may not be a concern for you.

This is my second pair. The tops outlast the bottoms but they are good quality. I have a c width foot so they are good for me. Everyone likes different sneakers for fit and quality. These are made well and will last about a year of daily use. I am satified with them and will keep buying them. Rob
This shoe is true to size. Love it love it love it!!!!! And most stores are NOT carrying timberlands in kids sizes at the moment.

its only good if you get the right size, if you don't it might break on you.

I ordered these for Halloween. Shipping was quick and arrived well before the estimated due date. My shoe size is an 8 and typically doesn't vary depending on the shoe, but I should have ordered a half size smaller in these. They were suprisingly comfortable for having a five inch heel and fit my calves and thighs perfectly.

I purchased these hiking boots for a month-long trip to China which was going to include a lot of hiking and not a lot of packing space. Aside from the initial try on when first receiving these boots in the mail I did not wear these boots in before setting off to China, with any other boots this might have been a poor choice. My first experience of these boots then was on a 15 mile hike on the Great Wall, up rough terrain and through some snow, and at the end of the day my feet felt fine. These shoes seem to have really great support without being constrictive. They are comfortable, durable, waterproof, and best of all for me, they are warm without causing my feet to sweat, even during rigorous activity.Another plus for me was these shoes odor fighting powers, despite being worn for 30 days straight, often without a fresh change of socks due to lack of laundry facilities, they wore very well. These shoes have been everywhere from strange nightclubs in Beijing to open-air markets in Tibet and continue to be sturdy and functional boots. I would recommend for anyone looking for a versatile and comfortable boot for your next adventure.

My teenage daughter got these over a year ago - they are a little discolored now from lots of abuse - but are holding up great! No separation of the sole - no rips or tears. Even the laces have held up!

Just an impressive product. Comfortable, easy to wear, pick the right color and they kind of go with anything. I am just a comfort guy when it comes to shoes and clothes. I put these on at home, when i go out to the store, whatever. They fit right based on the description they give, delivery was right on time and the price was right. No complaints!
I wear them every single day. I work at home so they get lots of use.Need a new pair about once a year.I have over 20 pairs of shoes and these are my favorites.

I danced for years as a kid, and these split sole capezios were one of my favorite types. I had to exchange them, and the exchange process was hassle free and quick - had the new shoes within a few days.
I love these so much. When my last pair died, I bought them here. When that pair dies, I'll buy more. I hope they never stop making them.
these are the best boat shoes so well made, even wet, non slip on deck or dock I have several pairs, and these have more support in sole and arch, good price too.

I keep a typical bi-fold wallet in my briefcase but also maintain a slim wallet to use for going out to dinner, movies, shopping, etc. This wallet is perfect. Cash compartment, 3 slots for cards, and a clear sleeve for your identification card. Slips flatly into a front or back pocket. Perfect!!

This shoe boot is okay for the money but I discovered the Timberland outlet where you can buy a much better quality shoe book for the same price as these. If you can't locate a Tim' outlet then these will do fine.

This is the perfect slip-on sneaker. I bought the plain black before and was very happy with the fit and comfort. I thought the black/silver would dress it up a little and give it more diversity. I was right. Also, the Amazon price could not be beat. I would recommend this shoe highly.

These shoes were exactly what my son wanted for Christmas. He loves them. They run true to size and they are comfortable. He has a hard time keeping the tongue straight on the shoes. When he tightens the laces, it will stay in place.

It is very hard to find cute, tall heels in wide and Nine West has been my savior with these shoes! I have already worn them on several occasions and loved them. They were a tiny bit big, but I got some insoles that go just under the ball of your foot and they made the shoes more comfortable and perfectly snug.
