When I'm serious about all day wear, I'll look for something better. The Justin line has been made in China for years and the so-called Basics I just bought are completely truthful in revealing that the upper and sole are manmade. That said, the vamp and upper both look good enough in the Bay Apache color. They have weird bright white stitching (even on the black model) at the top of the sole. I used three coats of heel black applied with a fine paint brush to kill the white and make them look normal. But I've always liked the Roper look so I'm willing to work for it.The arch support on the Basics is non-existent so that they feel like you're wearing empty Kleenex boxes. Since I'm flat-footed I assume that all my shoes will require fairly stiff arch support inserts so this didn't bother me much. The manmade uppers are not as soft as real leather so you need long socks to protect your calves from scratches, etc.If you just want some knockabout boots that look good with jeans for a casual day or evening, these are okay. They are available at a lot of sporting goods stores, Tractor Supply Centers, etc, and they're certainly cheap. But if you expect heavy use, all day comfort, great value for you money, etc. you need to spend AT LEAST $110.00, on higher end Justins or Ariats or other big names I know nothing about. Other boot experts will say you need to spend a lot more than $110.00 and I will defer to them. If you have problem feet, consider hand-measured, hand-made from a local boot maker, but bring lots of money and months of patient waiting.I can't imagine buying boots online without extensive local legwork to make sure of my size and comfort. Justin boots are sized MUCH larger than Ariat and when it comes to any pull-on boot, your regular shoe size is meaningless. The Justin website has a simple and helpful video about how to find the right-sized boot here [...] DO NOT accept a boot that is the least bit uncomfortable. Within days, you will be in agony and you will eventually give your boots to the Goodwill box.Frankly, even some relatively good manufacturers and catalog houses are sloppy about their color photos on their website, so don't be sure of the color until they come out of the box. You could be in for a surprise.

I ordered these for my girlfriend and they fit perfectly, and are very durable. She didn't need to break them in as much as other shoes because of the solid craftsmanship. Highly recommended sneakers for everyday wear.

This product is great for avoiding falls and slips on the ice.I put them on when I leave the house, and then I take them offas soon as I enter the building at work, so I'm not sure ifthey hurt floors or hard surfaces that are not covered with snowor ice. Some reviews indicated that the spikes scratch the floor.This sounds pretty bone-headed to me. I mean would you wearshoes with golf spikes anywhere other than on grass? Sowhy would someone wear spiked grippers for ice on linoleum?I have a small foot - women's size 5. I purchased a similarproduct by another brand a few years ago, and I found it verydifficult to get a "small / medium" on my foot. I found itespecially difficult to take them off once my shoes were coldfrom the snow and ice. So, for this purchase, I bought alarge for my size 5 foot, and they work great. I have notrouble putting them on or taking them off. The backeven has a little handle to help take them off easily.Even though my foot is small, I have never had a problemwith these grippers falling off. I read other reviewsbefore purchasing, and some said that there were not as manygrippers on the bottom as illustrated in the photo. The pairof grippers that I received were exactly as illustrated.I find this product very effective and very easy to use.Great value for the price.

I love Kipling bags for 2 main reasons - all the exterior and interior compartments and the durability. I have 5 now and love them all. This one is fantastic. I would not use it as a backpack as the tiny backpack phase ended almost 20 years ago now and I never liked that look in the first place, although it would be handy. I do use it with the strap as a cross body bag and without the strap for work. I am rather busty so a lot of cross body bags don't fit comfortably on me, but this one is longer so it fits perfectly. The strap is adjustable as well. I take a backpack to work as I bring my lunch and some magazines and whatnot and I like to have my hands free for the hike across the parking lot. This little purse pops right in and I can pull it out to go to lunch or breaks and have all my stuff with me. It has 2 main compartments, one with a double zipper. The double zipper compartment has an interior pocket that runs the length of the inside with a velcro strip in the middle of the largest pocket. Mounted in front of that pocket are 4 little credit card slots. I put my cell phone in one half of the velcro'ed pocket and my face powder compact/mirror in the other side, both fitting perfectly. I keep a small cosmetic bag and a few pens and prescription bottles in the main compartment, with room for a more small things. The other main compartment is large enough for my wallet, my Kindle 3, and my little Filofax (day planner). In addition, there is an outside zippered compartment on the back and a small velcro fold over pouch on the front. I keep all those items you keep in an inside zippered pocket in the zippered compartment, such as a pillbox with OTC meds, a nail clipper, small comb, another pen and a small lotion bottle. I keep a lipstick in a lipstick box with a mirror in the front fold over pouch as well as some sunblock, yet another pen (i love pens!) and some hand sanitizer. It fits a lot and having so many compartments ensures you can find something really quickly, which I love! Amazon has this purse at a great price too. Some people believe that Kiplings are overpriced, but their bags are made to last forever so it's worth spending a little extra money on one. Plus you get a great little gorilla key chain!

I LIVED in Dr. Scholl's sandals as a teenager in the 70's. As others have commented, I could buy them for $19.95 at the local drug store. In my 50's now, I am absolutely thrilled to find these shoes alive and well. I just purchased my first pair in 30 years and still find them to be stylish and comfortable. Yes, the toe grip has changed but it still forces your toes to "hang on" and I still feel the pull in my calf. I do remember the rubber in the heel section wearing down so before I wore this new pair I took them to a shoe repair place and had them put on the small, clear plates on the heel that prevent this from happening. Cost was $5 but figured it was well worth it since, aside from that wear the sandals would have lasted a lifetime. I have enjoyed reading the reviews of this shoe. I agree with many and disagree with some. I live in Florida where we spend most of the year in sandals and flip flops. I plan to buy many more in several colors since they are WAY more comfortable and much cuter than flip flops.

This is a great boot and it fits well. The foot is leather lined but the shaft of the boot is unlined and is very thin leather. I bought and returned them because of the unlined shaft. Boots are supposed to be warm and that unlined shaft would not be as warm as the average boot.
These shoes fit great and look cool. They were shipped on time and looked exactly as described. My son's friends complimented him on his new shoes!

These sandals are super comfortable but I hadn't even worn them, but had only played with them before the key hole on the cap stripped. I would jsut recommend tightening and loosening the cap by hand.

I owned a pair of Tac Boots a few years ago in the Army; by the time I got rid of them, they were a couple weeks from breaking some of my toes. Needless to say, I was hesitant about getting another pair. However, these have exceeded my hopes.They take a little work to break in, but it isn't as bad as you might expect. Took less than a week to break them in well enough to be very comfortable.Less than 3 days after receiving these boots, I found myself doing backwoods trail maintenance on narrow, muddy trails during thunderstorms. As other workers slipped and nearly fell off the cliffs, I was able to keep a tight grip on the trail thanks to the solid tread.Today, I spent a few hours hiking part of the A.T.in TN/NC, then went to work at a rock wall for a few more hours; I've also been biking and walking around town. Essentially, I've been on my feet for about 12 hours. My feet are only a little sore at this point.The hidden pockets aren't much to marvel at. Not a lot of space. I just use mine to attach the clip for my boot knife.The side-zip feature is very useful for quick on/off, but overuse of said feature will quickly wear out the velcro cover.Boots are easy to clean, waterproof and lace.Put simply, believe the product description. These are great boots for an even better price. I would usually expect boots of this quality to cost at least $175. No serious complaints here.
Needed for a wedding and they worked. They are a little tight but I'm stretching them out, width wise but other than I like them a lot!

The sandals are super comfy - and I have badly battered feet - so comfort is of top most importance. Have only one complaint - that Naturalizers don't carry the SCOUT sandal in Canada, so had to go via daughter in the USA, and she had to ship on to me. Don't understand that sort of merchandising. This is shoe - not some Cuban Cigar nonsense.

My son is on pair four. He loves the comfort of this shoe. Oddly enough he needs a shoe horn to put them on but once on they are like a comfy glove. Sadly it looks like they are phasing out and the black and white ones are rare to find which are the only ones he'll wear.

I work on my feet everyday. I'm also walking in chemicals, so It's not easy to find a boot that isn't too heavy, looks good and can hold up under the conditions. I'm on my 2nd pair, the last pair worn daily for 12 hours per day lasted 5 years! These boots, this brand are the BEST!

This shoe is outstanding. It is a soft leather that feels great to the touch. The wedge heel gives you height, but yet remains comfortable. If you're looking for a great summer shoe (I bought the white), but don't want a sandal.. look no further. I would definitely recommend this shoe.

...so why they are so hard to find, even at Adidas stores, is a mystery. Adding to that most stores not selling my shoe size (12), I thought there was nowhere to go. Thankfully Amazon has them. The interior of the shoe is very comfortable while giving good arch support. A very good buy for the money.
good looking shoe, well constructed, but size runs small, at least 1/2 size.
I have worn these shoes for a while now and they are the most comfotable sandal I have ever owned. I am about to buy another pair. Oh, did I mention I have foot probems? Not with these sandals.
The classic indoor soccer shoe. Works well for everyday wear as well. Holds up as a shoe for daily wear.
I received my Scout Sandal very quickly. It was in perfect shape and fit just like was supposed to.I am very pleased with the service and the product.

I gave these a five star based on price and performance. I purchased these boots for about 50% off at 50 dollars. They have served well in the snow- waterproof and warm. I probably would have liked the black color more if it was available. As a workboot, the only things lacking are a steel toe and an oil resistant sole. Overall a great shoe.
Bought as a Christmas gift for my son....he hasn't seen them yet but the overall service dealing with Amazon is always great & the shoes look pretty awesome, I think he will love them
This is my 2nd pair. This pair was stiff and needed some break in, but feel great now.Would recommend

These sneakers are fantastic! I've always been loyal to Saucony, and this is the best pair I've bought yet! The sneakers are very comfortable for walking or running. They breathe very well and provide superior cushioned support.

For anyone who needs to wear something casual but not TOO casual like ordinary sneakers, but still needs the cushioning and comfort of padded-heel sneakers, Saucony Originals are the answer. They let you choose colours to go with different outfits and still walk in sneaker-like comfort. They are defintely more padded than most ordinary (and expensive) so-called 'walking shoes' in the market (I have tried them all over the years, even the most expensive brands). Saucony Originals beat them all. I walked through the Museums and Galleries of London and then explored the street sites for hours each evening in my Saucony Oringinals and was amazed to find that my feet did not hurt by the end of the day! Usually just a few hours walking on the hard marble floor of a Museum is enough to get my feet aching. My Sauconys allowed me 10 hours of pure pleasure with no pain!! Without looking like a dork! Now I wear them to my business appointments matched with smart-casual pants. I always get admiring comments on them (my first pair are a pale green combo).These are also suitable for people with real-foot problems. I have a very bad pronation and they have held up and held me up, wonderfully.The only complaint is that Amazon doesn't carry enough of the colour combinations in different sizes!I'd buy not one more pair, but a cupboard-full!

High quality, nice color, nice size, and the shoulder strap extends to just the right length. Extremely good, especially given the price.The only slight downside was the lack of a zipper-closing pocket on the inside. (The only inside pocket is a small non-closeable one that hangs from the rim) Also, due to the thick material and grommets, adjusting the shoulder strap can be slightly more difficult than normal (However, you can still do it in two minutes or less, and it's not something you need to do often.)All in all, a definite recommendation.
I bought this converse for my younger sister that she badly wanted them. Transaction was very smooth, they got here on time, and she was really happy!
very comfortable shoe. I have worn these for many years & have many colors. Good with casual or dressy. I was so happy I found the black again. For a long time they weren't available.

I ordered these on a whim and wish I had gotten a second pair in a different color before they sold out. These shoes are incredibly flattering on and manage to look fashionable and contemporary while still being understated enough for work. The fit is pretty true to size and the bronze finish is not at all too metallic or shiny so these look great even during the day with a conservative suit. I am pleasantly surprised and very pleased with these shoes!

I was so pleased when I received these shoes. I like Clarks but these are not only comfortable but very pretty. I like them so much that I have ordered another pair in dark brown. The price was good, the service was good and I just love the shoes!

I've been wearing Chuck Taylors since the mid-80's but this is my first pair with a black outsole (all others have been the standard off white). I went to a party over the weekend in a backyard that was very little grass, mostly dirt, and was able to just wipe off the outsole with a damp cloth. If I had gone in shoes with an off white outsole, they would have been trashed. I also like the fact that these seem just a litle more "dressy" than most canvas Chuck Taylors. Highly recommended.

the left boot has completely fallen apart. throughout the entire circumference where the leather meets rubber, a complete separation has occurred. although I've owned the boots for over four years, i didn't regularly wear them. in fact, i exclusively wore the boots while i was camping or while up in the mountains. in all, i probably wore them a total of 30 times (that's being generous) and i never did anything more strenuous than walk or sit. my wife owns a pair of canadian made caribous, which she has worn for 15 years and they still look brand new! when not wearing the boots, they stayed in a cool, dry closet. to say I was disappointed to see the seam break apart while shoveling three feet of snow is an understatement. i also found the lacing system to be ineffectual and the heel strap equally ineffective. i would not recommend this boot.

These boots are beautiful and look like excellent quality. They arrived promptly.Unfortunately they are too big and we had to return them. The heel is too wide and the foot slips around inside. We ordered 1/2 size smaller than usual due to the reviews we read, but guess we should have gone a full size smaller.

I have worn birkenstocks before and I love that the footbead conforms to your foot. However, the reason I did not give it 5 stars is because the material covering the footbed started to peel off on the back of the shoe (heel area). Otherwise, very happy with the comfort of the shoe.
I have two knee replacement and these shoes, give me strong support and solid structure for walking. So I get a new pair when they wear out in 6 months to a year.i

I purchased these shoes because I have a hard time finding my size 5. I have purchased these before through another place and they seemed to be more comfortable and softer inside. I can only wear these for a short time before my feet start to hurt and I have to remove them.

My daughter and I loved these shoes so much, she wanted a pair. She loves these more than the high top version she got previously. They are great shoe and versatile. I used to wear converse style shoes all the time when I was in high school, so it was fun to get another pair again. They fit comfortable, and felt true to size to me. Although a lot of people are saying they are not true to size. Because of that, my daughter and I bought the wrong sizes twice. So it confuses me why so many people are saying the sizing is off. So I am throwing my two cents in for that reason.My feet are about a 7 (one foot is a little longer than the other) and normal width. I'm not overweight nor extremely thin. I ordered the womens 7/ mens 5 and they feel just right. My daughter also ordered the size most closest to her foot size and she said they fit better than the other two pair we tried to over/under compensate with. Good luck!
Fast shipping (Amazon Prime) and perfect packaging. These thongs are awesome! They fit just perfect (size 15 medium) and are very comfortable. I just hope they last...

So I went to my local outlet today and got these shoes. I LOVE them. The only reason I didn't give them a 5 star rating is because they are NOT true to size. I had to buy one half size larger than normal. They have these great nubby things on the bottom that flex when you walk. It's like wearing massaging gel insoles on the outside! They are so comfy. If you are into the new low profile shoes, these are perfect. They are a bit snug through the widest part of my feet and that concerned me. But after wearing them all day, it's a good snug- like my feet are being nicely cradled. These are my new shopping shoes!

My 4th pair of these and I have never been disappointed. I contemplated ending my running due to knee pain. However, I researched and found that I had been using the wrong shoes! I now have been running without knee pain ever since I have been using Brooks Beasts. I found no other shoe to correct over-pronation as well. Greatest on motion control too. You will like!!

My Eastland plainview shoes are high quality and comfortable. I usually wear a 7 1/2M but after reading the reviews I decided to order the wide instead and so glad I did. Fair warning: even the wide is a little narrow at first, but start to feel normal after a week of breaking them in. I work in a retail setting and I think they look very nice under a pair of dress pants.
My husband is so pleased with these boots. He loves timberland and we were so lucky they had his size. Absolute great buy.
These shoes are very comfortable. Good for work and home. I really like them. But it runs a little bit narrow. If you have a wide feet, they may be too tight. For me, it works well though.
Holds up well and the sole is great for wearing outdoors. This is the third pair we have been through and we wear them constantly

i am having trouble with my amazon orders i am still waiting for a bible tote i ordered in early june and have paid for. i ordered some crock shoes and got a double order and sent back a reply on this no responce .i like o order amazon things but have now stopped till it replys to my email on my wrong order also about my binble tote i ordered in early june . loretta bickle

Been wearing converse for years; great shoes, came just as promised in the picture and description. Cheaper, even with the shipping expenses, then in the stores where you can find all black chucks. Shoes packaged very well; shipping was ridiculously fast, had it in two days; great amazon experience!

Shoes are fantastic, I was recommended them by a friend.The only thing I can say is that the sizing guide on amazon.com does not match the manufacturer's one. e.g. On Amazon a UK size 8.5 needs a US size 9. However Keen website (and the box they come in) says that a UK 8 is a US 9.Double check people....

I love how comfortable they feel on my feet. I did forget that Timberland's are usually sized a bit large when compared to shoes. Normally I'm a size 12 shoe but only in Timberland's I would be a size 11. Luckily for me I ordered a 11.5 size so it wasn't bad enough for me to return. Just have to lace them up tighter but still not an issue when it comes to them being comfortable and durable. It did take me a couple of days to break them in so now the size issue is none existent.

Functionally, these shoes are great. They feel really good. I get good support on my problem feet, and I no longer have knee pain after running.I guess the only draw back is that these shoes look like "medical" shoes. The kind that would be prescribed to old folks with foot problems.

i have a few pairs of sensi ibiza, & am planning to buy more today.most importantly, they are as comfortable as the ugly crocs or tevas for long periods of standing & walking (as in DisneyWorld), but actually look really good on. i walked 10+ miles daily over a period of 8 days, without any blisters, ankle or leg pain.unlike some other sensi styles as well as crocs, the ibiza has arch support (moderate). also, love that they have "drainage" so water & rain don't collect in the footbed. they are easily cleaned ~ just wash with water, use soap if needed (impossible with tevas).do order a full size up (i wear 7 1/2 to 8 normally, but am a 9 in sensi footwear). also, they do require some "breaking in", but after a few days the rubber becomes very soft & pliable, like an "old shoe".summation: my top pick in any summer footwear for its combination of extreme comfort with style.
great shoe but i had to receive three pairs before i got one that wasn't defective with regards to the toe seam.

I purchased these shoes as a gift for my aunt in PA. She said it is the most comfortable shoe she has ever worn. I will purchase another pair for her closer to spring but told her the red ones are year-round too. Next, I will purchase a pair for me. Many thanks. NJ
buenos zapatos, excelente producto y llego a tiempo, por lo tanto lo recomiendo cien por ciento. saludos a todos ( a b c d )
I just picked up a pair of these boots and on the first use they felt great even after being in them all day. They also look good too. Great job Wolverine!
I love these shoes. However, I ordered the wrong size and exchanging them has been a hassle. It has been over a month and I do not have the shoes or the money and no one can seem to help me.
Easy Spirit Women's AP1 Sport Sneaker,White Leather,9 M Thanks, the shoes are nice and the service was great. Amazion is the place to shop.

My son loves Chuck Taylor Converse All Stars, and these are so durable! He wanted the high tops this time, so I got these for him. He loves them, and they came so quickly even though it was during Christmas season rush.

These were my first pair of boots. Bought them for motorcycle safety training (needed footwear that covered the ankles) & been using them sparingly over the last year. The shoes are a nice dark shade of black but the lace rings are a little too shiny for my liking. Price could be cheaper too. No other complaints.

I've worn these VANELi dress flats for years and have them in several colors...and highly recommend them for both comfort and quality. They are expensive, so I always wait for sales. However, the last few times I've ordered these shoes on sale from this store on Amazon, the shoes have felt like they are at least a half a size too small. Sadly, I've had to return them.
My son was thrilled to find these Tims at this unbelievably low price. Amazon shipping was prompt as always, and the fit was perfect.

(I wish more people would write reviews on Amazon of the shoes they buy here! They sell thousands of shoes but no one seems to review them...)These are not the most comfortable shoes I own. The big toe of my right foot tends to get a blister from the peep toe. I think because they are made primarily of fabric, they don't stretch as much as, say, leather would.That being said, they are very pretty and make my legs look great. Although the heel is high, since it's a wedge, it's much easier to walk in than - say - a stilhetto shoe with a heel of the same height.They look good with jeans but also with flirty dresses.
Should've gotten a wider width. A little tight.Great to wear with anything.As an Actor they look good in action sequences... Too cool!Rocky ViazzaniCapo Balia Films

I recently got these sandals for my husband and he absolutely loves them! We live in Hawaii and wear sandals/flip-flops all year round, so he wanted something really confy and durable that he could wear to work and to the beach. He said that after trying these pair he will never go back to any other brand or style. The band around the heal glows in the dark which makes them look extra cool!! Aloha :)

Youth Pink Cowboy BootI purchased this boot for my 9 year old daughter who wears a childrens size 4.5. Youth size 4.5 is actually a woman's size 6.5. This was not clear on the sizing charts supplied. The boot skipped from a children's size 3 to youth size 4. Sizing needs to be explained more thoroughly. I thought the boot was overpriced also....it wasn't leather. My daughter was happy, however, and wore the boots for Halloween even though they were too big.

I am usually very picky about what shoes i wear and it was my first time ordering them online and not having a option of trying them on, but i heard good things about this brand and model, so i gave it a shot, i have bad support in my feet and week ankles, these shoes look kinda big, but amazingly they are very very comfortable and have nice support, and they lasted a very long time, i plan on making another order soon.
I have been a loyal customer of the ASICS GT-line for over 10 years and I have not yet been disappointed.

This shoe is made of nice material, and is fairly comfortable, I'm a twelve and it is a tad big, so perhaps a half size down from your usual might be suggested, but they fit well, and most importantly, they're a great price.
This shoe has been a real asset in the snow and ice. The recommendation to buy 1/2 size larger was right on. Fit great with no break-in time.

i love them! they are exactly what i wanted. thank god i ordered them a half size big, because they would be way too tight otherwise. i'm usually a 9 but i read other reviews and saw that i should get a 9.5. i'm very glad i did. yay! i love them

I always thought these shoes were sexy on men. So, I ordered them for my boyfriend. He says they are very comfortable and he gets a lot of compliments on them. He knows he can tell me if he doesn't like them b/c I wouldn't care, so his testimony can be trusted.:)

Nice shoe, with a great finish. You can pull off wearing these with high quality jeans or even a suit. However, they have rubber soles, which are actually not mated well to the shoe itself in several areas. I guess one can't complain for the price they're clearing them out for...we'll see how long they last.

I bought these based on reviews. First pair of shoes I bought online just from reviews. I went off the sizing in other peoples reviews and they were correct. I bought a 12 and my feet are a 11 1/2. I wasn't used to high heel hiking boots so that was an adjustment. I felt as though I was stepping into Ski Boots. I bought them six days before needing to use them enough time to try them out and go to a local store to buy another pair (which I didn't need to do).You WILL need to break these in. Don't expect to go and hike in these without doing this. For me I broke them in by wearing them to work for three days straight. I work at a desk most of the day with a walk during lunchtime. I would say four days would have been ideal but the shoes were very comfortable during the hike minus the minor bruise i had on my heal because I wasn't use to high heal shoes. It was bearable though and I wrote it off to me not breaking them in enough (or breaking in my feet).These are gortex and waterproof and I tested them out with a wide brook crossing. There were some rocks that the water was running over and I was deep enough to cover my toes. My feet stayed as dry as advertised. The hike had all the terrain you would find. Soft needle filled trails, moss covered rocks, old dry brook beds, roots, steep slabs and gravel.Heres where the shoes loose the fifth star. Compared to more pricey boots the sold are very hard and I was wavering on the steep slabs that were slightly wet. They gripped but just barely. Some better soles would be solid such as my buddies. But and this is the big BUT - for a starting out hiker these are fine and would be FIVE stars for their purpose. I only spent around 80 bucks on these and my buddy spent over 200 on his.If you are interested in reading about my first hike my buddy blogs about all his hikes in New Hampshire. We hiked Mt. Potash in the White Mountain region. It was a great trail for a first hike or even an experienced hiker who wants to do a quick hike. It took us about two hours up and two hours down with about 1.5 hours stopped. [...]Overall I think I picked the best first book, I expect to use them for shoveling in the winter because they look nice enough for me to wear to work (Business Casual). Give yourself plenty of time to break these in I would say at least a week. If you haven't worn high healed boots before you will probably get a small bruise on the back of your heal. I think it is normal and it goes away as you wear them more. The support in your ankle is key for any harsher terrain and slab walking you will do in your hike.

I got these shoes in Mocha in 2008 and even though I wear them quite frequently, they're still in good shape!They are really comfortable and I think the more you wear them and break them in the better they get! I also own a pair of Birkenstock Gizehs and I think that these shoes are very comparable to the original Birkenstocks. The only difference is maybe slightly less arch support, but I think these Betulas still give you support and, as I said, are very comfortable and durable. (I actually just ordered a pair of Betula clogs because I was so happy with these!)These sandals are definitely a great purchase and they give you the Birkenstock look and feel for a reasonable price.

These shoes are terrible. I read the reviews and took the risk anyway because the price was so good - too good to be true. My foot fits in fine, but my big toe (as another reviewer claimed) gets pinched even after a week of wear to break it in! Also, the "leather" start rubbing off within 10 hours of wear (1 day!) Other reviewers have claimed this as well! The shoe does truly look great out of the box, but a shoe that starts to get destroyed and is painful is not worth your money. Pay extra and get a shoe that is more comfortable and won't be ruined within a week.I bought a slightly more expensive Rockport and they are more comfortable and the leather does not just rub off! Do not buy this shoe.Bostonian is no longer a trustworthy shoe company. I urge you to look towards competitors like Johnston & Murphy and Rockport. Do not make the same mistake I did.
These sneakers are comfortable from the moment you put them on. No break in period required.
These shoes are great for the price. They are light and they let your feet breathe easily. Only con is there is no arch support so after wearing the for a while my feet hurt badly.

Outstanding boots, this is my 3rd pair. I've worn them for everyday and hiked the 400+ miles over the years in them... Not totally water proof (IE Don't go wading in them) but they are light comfortable and as good as boots costing twice as much.

I bought these boots after ordering the wrong size directly from the company. I saw that they were almost $80 cheaper and thought I had found a deal. The boots I bought directly from Danner were top notch. The leather was stiff, polished, and looked awesome. Unfortunately they didn't fit, so I sent them back and ordered through Amazon. The discounted boots arrived and as soon as I opened the box I knew I made a mistake. The boots were dirty and the leather on both toes was scratched. Instead of stiff leather, the boots sagged. They appeared to have been worn or possibly reconditioned. I immediately sent them back and went to the Danner website to order the REAL boots. Be careful ordering these boots from this seller. Had they mentioned the boots were not factory new quality I would never have ordered them. Get the real deal from Danner!
The shoes were delivered on time. They were exactly what I wanted, and they fit well. The color matched pretty well what it was advertised to be.
My husband was very pleased with this Front Pocket bilfold. He liked the slimness and the soft feel of the leather.

I rarely leave reviews on anything, unless it is really really good. I just ordered these slippers because 1) I just moved into a new house that has hardwood floors and I have an extreme dislike for dust ending up on the bottom of my white socks (which happens now matter how much I vacuum and clean the wood). 2) I have CRAZY cold feet all.the.time.I went ahead and ordered these and wished like h-e-double-hockeystickes that I got the right size, since I read a few others having issues with wrong sizing. They were perfect. My feet are only warm when Im in bed, in the shower, during my hot yoga class...and now in these slippers.The inside padding is probably the most comfortable that I have experienced in a slipper and I am halfway expecting it to wear down, but right now, it feels like my feet are surrounded by clouds.
Buen producto, por el precio excelente, envió oportuno, en empaque adecuado, recomendable!!Buen producto, por el precio excelente, envió oportuno, en empaque adecuado, recomendable!!
If you buy a Chuck Taylor, you know want you want, they are the classics, fits right usually I use 7 1/2 but in this case the 8 size fits better, most comfortable.
great price, great shoes - the market is filled with Top-Sider 'wanna-be's. These are the genuine article. I highly recommend them!
VERY fast shipping. I bought shoes as a gift and was sure that they wouldn't be delivered in time, but they made with days to spare! And the shoes looked lovely. Thanks so much! :)

Maybe it should be obvious, but don't expect to use them for anything besides playing racquetball (or whatever sport you use them for). I did not last long walking before feeling pains, and definitely not good for running or casual wear. Just thought I would point that out.Otherwise, it's great for the purpose it's intended.

This being the first pair of dance shoes I have bought I unknowingly followed the advice of the other reviewers and ordered a half size up from my street shoe size.Do not do this.Order true to size. My dance instructor took one look at my shoes and said they were far too big.Your feet are supposed to be extremely snug in the shoe to avoid blisters and other problems.
Brought these for my mother and she stated that these were the most comfortable pair of sandals she owns. I would recommend these as good buy as it is very difficult to find wide width shoes

Ok, I'm 47- and a professional female - probably heading back to my 2nd childhood - um - if I ever left childhood completely in the first place?Anyway, I hadn't had a pair of Converse Hi-Tops since I was around 12 years old. I had seen some of the more "artsy" ones, but could never find my size (average foot)when I was looking...and I knew I wouldn't be able to wear them to work if they were "artsy" Converse - because they are, after all, athletic shoes.I decided to buy the completely black Hi-tops...and they are great. They are comfortable, even on my 47 year old feet. I really like them a lot. Glad I bought them, and maybe I'll even see about getting a pair of the Artsy ones...or maybe a pair in pink???Hope you'll enjoy yours, when you get them.

I just love these. They fit perfect and are so soft inside and out. My baby's 6 months and so I got him the 6-12 month size. Seems like they will fit for the whole winter season. I really love these - enough that I found my computer just to write a review! The brown is a nice chocolate brown. They look a little like mini-Uggs.
Was looking for adidas superstar shoes, but couldn't find them anywhere! However, I found them on amazon.com! They were at a great price and I got them fast! I am very happy!

After seeing all the reviews about this shoe, I wanted to actually physically try on a pair before buying to make sure of the size. I love these shoes. They're comfortable and just great. I just wanted to post about the size difference I experienced. I have been wearing size (male) 10.5 for years now. I've bought many different shoes from different brands and this is always my style. After trying on many pairs of these shoes I finally found my size for these shoes. 8.5. A full two sizes lower! 8 was too tight and 9 was a bit too big.

I am delighted with this product. previously bought addias trainers,but found these are lite, hard wearing and very comfortable . I've been wanting these for a long time......had them ages ages ago, and they were my go to every day shoe. My only issue was that I had to buy the men's size because the women's ran way too narrow.

Just received these ballet shoes and they are cute BUT they are way, way off in sizing. In the same order, I had also received size 6.5 toddler stride rite shoes and they fit just right (even a little big, which she will grow into the next few months) and also a size 7 Pediped shoes and those are way, way big (still planning on growing into these) So I ordered a size 7 in the ballet shoes and not only are they tight, her toes are totally scrunched up in them...I can't believe how off the sizing is!

What a pleasure to walk all day in a stylish flat that also offers cushioning and good support and not have to wear clunky running shoes with skirts. Well, this is the first shoe I've been able to wear all day and still feel stylish without breaking the bank. I bought them in every color, including metallic silver and gold! A shoe for all seasons:)

Yes, these shoes are comfortable, but they flip-flop against my heel, and have little side support. Too easy to fall off on a slope or steps. I'll wear them as slippers.The supplier was great: fast delivery, shoes in perfect condition.
It is exactly as described on the post. I'm very pleased and I highly recommend the product if you like converse products of course
Great product and very true to size. I would buy this product again. Thanks for making a shoe for a real woman....
This shoe/slipper isn't just for hanging around the house. They look great with jeans, and everyone at my school is wearing them! My favorite colors of the slipper/shoe are brown and pink. Enjoy!
This is fashion classic tall boot that give the women nice looking specially at this time in winter and could weather
goodgreat value. glad I bought it. the quality is good and the fit is excellent and i hope you like it.

i love these. if you are getting them, get your EXACT size. really comfy. GETTING MORE. happy buyer, and more to purchase!
I like this shoe. It is simple and gives you a clean look! somewhat stiff in the beginning. Made out of cotton and does get dirty, but for the price .. I like them alot!

I have these shoes in brown. I have been complimented several times on these shoes, and they match everything. I don't dress for comfort, but these are pretty comfortable. The only problem is that they look old quickly.
The shoes were not clearly identified as narrow width. they were way too tight. I gave them to a friend.
the keds fit perfectly. Usually I am leary about ordering shoes without trying them on, however these fit well and I am pleased with them

I purchased my rampante last week and tested it for twice so far. I have to say I am kind of dissapointed because I thought these were the perfect soccer shoes for me. The truth is the shoes are a little bit too narrow, and there is no improvment in shooting compared to cheaper shoes. I used to have lotto primato before and the shooting accurecy is same in reebok rampante. However reebok rampante's heel comfort is way advance than lotto primato, or other cheaper shoes. Nonetheless if you don't wanna pay $200 for a puma or adidas predator mania, reebok might be the second choice for you.

After being associated with the 50's hipster and the 70's hippie, the 80's punk and now the millennium prepster these shoes have made the journey across time and generation. Made with a canvas material and a rubber soul these shoes stand the test of time and once thier broken in will quickly become your favorite pair of shoes . No matter the winter or the summer you'll find yourself pulling these out of the closet to pair with your jeans or your skirt. And owning one pair is never enough. A pair in every color low and high is definitly required for the true converse wearer. Buy your first pair today to emmerse yourself in a true piece of history and the future
I had a previous pair of these slippers and they really were comfortable but wore out after two year so I got a replacement .

I literally live in these shoes. And considering I reside in CA that is not an exaggeration at all! They are extremely comfortable, the foam sole molds to your foot. The fabric strap is very soft and doesn't rub at all. Though $20+ seems like a lot for a pair of flip flops, they are well worth the investment. I have burned through 6 pairs and have never had a single one fall apart. I buy a new pair to replace them once I wear all the tread off the bottom of the sole which takes about over a year of daily wear. They are incredibly well made, I once got my foot caught in a mud hole (the knee deep kind around natural hot springs) pulled the shoe out in one piece despite the tremendous suction that required my husbands help to free me. They are by far, the best flip flops on the market!
These shoes are light and comfortable to walk around in all day. Thier sizing is a little confusing. These run about one size larger than most shoes. I recommend using extra or replacement insoles.

You can't go wrong with this sandal. It has drain holes for use in the water, very durable and they're very comfortable. Even without wearing sandals all year I can put them on for a week and no blisters. What more could you ask for.

My husband has been wearing this paticular Hi-Tec Altitude IV WP boot for about 5 years. He says they are comfortable right away....no break in time. He is a farmer (wheat & dates) and also a commercial tuna fisherman. He does pretty much everything in his boots and loves them. They are also great hikers. We always carry a new boot for when the others just can't make another day or he wants to "dress" up. He is flat footed, so wears an ortho in it. His favorite shoe ever.
I have bought these sandals in a physical store before and they fit better. The ankle strap just didn't have enough velcro on it or it wore off quicker than expected.
These shoes proved to be a little fancier than I expected, and look really sharp with any suit or dressy outfit. These shoes do not work with casual dress clothes.

I have purchased this shoe several times because it is the best I have found in comfort and sizing. It does have some issues with the insole though. They run a little large and since I take a half size (sort of) that helps me. The size 10 is too big and feels like a flipper - not secure for water aerobics at the YMCA. So I am able to buy the size 9 and it fits me perfectly. I have purchased the aqua and hot pink and like them both except for a problem with the insole. The silky fabric comes loose from the insole - and the insole comes loose from the bottom of the shoe. I wear them once or twice until they come apart - then I use Gorilla glue and paint a thin coat on the fabric and glue it back to the sole. When that is dry - I put a thin coat of glue on the bottom of the sole and then try to carefully insert it back into the shoe without getting glue (that stiffens and scratches) all over the shoe. I like these shoes very much except for this insole problem - I sure wish the manufacturer would correct it. They are very comfortable for the workout. I replace them about every 5 months and that is with water aerobics 3 times a week. The color does fade in the chlorine but only a little. I do not find the bottoms slick in the pool at all.
Very cute my husband is 67 but he still loves his converse allstars! Thanks!! Every thing is up to loving!
great shoes for exercise, really let the feet breath, just a little peaved I had to pay duty/tax since I am in canada. 5 stars on the shoes, and 0 stars for east bay...

Pretty updated flipflop shoe. I like the crisscross style & the sole has some cushion which makes it more comfortable. It stays secure on my feet. The only thing it doesn't have is arch support, so I wear these less than an Orthoheel or Birkenstock which is my typical summer shoe.
These were purchased for my 14 yo and she loves them. She would definitely buy them again. They are durable, still look good after a couple of months and keep your feet warm.
I love this brand,very confortable,defenitely I will bought another one for my wife and my son.Highly recommended.Thanks a lot.

I received my boots today and I absolutely love them. They are incredibly comfortable. They are better than Uggs. They really do run one size small. I'm so glad I read the reviews so I didn't have to send them back. I can't wait to show them off!
The price was reasonable. An added attraction was free shipping. And the delivery was prompt. The product was just as described.

I purchased these shoes to wear for special occasions. My last pair was eaten by my bosses dog. I live in Costa Rica these shoes are not sold anywhere here. In this climate rain, mud, sand, & mold can ruin shoes quickly here. These are perfect they look stylish & are extremely comfortable. I am happy with my purchase!
Reebok Ex-O-Fit Sneakers (black) are a classic. Nice style/look confortable and excellent quality. I have been wearing them for the past 15 years. Good work out sneaker.
LOVE THESE SHOES! I have them in both colors...I wore them all around Europe (since stilettos are really out of the question). VERY comfortable and I normally have sensitive feet!

My wife says it's a very comfortable shoe but a bad color, and she asked why they don't make it in classic white. She also asked why Reebok doesn't make more women's shoes in a size 10.5, which is large enough to accommodate her orthotics as well as socks. Reebok has been her favorite manufacturer for years and she's sorry to have to start buying from others now that she has to buy a larger size than in the past. All in all, however, she says they fit very well, are light enough and are a great product for a very reasonable price.

I prefer and have worn this style of Reeboks for years. I was unable to find them in the local stores. Ordered my usual size and had to return them and eat the shipping cost. They were just to tight and a bit narrow. Just as a lot of other reviewers have stated, I guess they run a little small. I re-ordered them, this time one size larger and 1 width wider. That is why I rated them 4 stars instead of 5. When they fit properly they are nice and comfortable.

We have found that by shopping on Amazon we are able to obtain all manner of items that we would not be able to purchase normally. My husband is 6'6" tall and is a big man with big feet as you would expect. He wanted to buy these particular shoes as they were something that he had worn in his childhood and loved so much. We were not able to buy these in Australia without actually having them especially made. Phil's foot size is normally 14 wide, so we opted for the size 15 US. Absolutely perfect and for a very reasonable price.We are very happy and even though some items are way out of our purchase league due to the varying shipping costs, we are still very fortunate to have discovered Amazon.
muy bien lo que se esperaba y en el tiempo estimado 100 % recomendado muy buena la compra del articulo
Capezio shoes have always been made well. These ran a bit small so I ordered the next 1/2 size up for my daughter.

I only buy boots every thirty years. These are lighter and better feeling than the heavy clod-hoppers they replaced. My only complaint so far (I've only worn them once to date) is that the bow-part of the laces tends to slip behind the tongue of the boot, coming to rest on my socks.
Most comfortable shoes ever! I wear these for work and they are very comfortable, look great and I love them!

My cons were cheaper than getting them in the store and are my first pair. I love them they won't be my last. The people I ordered from through amazon sent me a shipping confirmation and on the confirmation it said it was a different shoe, but when I got them they were the ones I ordered from amazon so no harm done.

I got these after my old Birks bit the dust (after wearing them almost year-round for 4 years). I think the price was a bit steep (you can get them for up to $15 less from other retailers, except none of the cheaper ones had my size, unfortunately). The shoes arrived on time and are as advertised. I was afraid I'd get knock-offs but to me they look and feel like the real deal. My feet are happy. I would have rated higher if they were a bit cheaper.
I am very satisfied with my recent Amazon purchase. My All Stars came significantly earlier than the prospected delivery date! I am extremely satisfied with the seller! Thank you Amazon!

As I have been wearing Earth shoes exclusively for the past 5 years, I knew exactly what I was getting when I placed my order. My sister & I both call them miracle shoes. They will feel different if you are wearing them for the first time, because the heel is a little lower than the toe; therefore, there is naturally an adjustment period of aproximately 10 to fourteen days. Before I started wearing these shoes, all I could think about was my feet and how much they hurt. I was on my feet my entire work day and by the end I had to concentrate on just putting one foot in front of the other. My pain was terrible. My first day of wearing these shoes, the pain was much better. After the first two weeks, it was gone! My back ache was less, too! I forgot about my feet, and I could concentrate on my job! I admit, I do have favorites and this Lazor is one of them..very comfy and weighs next to nothing! When I saw them on sale, I snatched them up! If your feet hurt, give them a try. I won't wear any other brand!

The shoe seemed true to size and width. Fairly comfortable, although the sole seems somewhat stiff. I've only worn them a few times, so it's too soon to tell how I'll like them after they're completely broken in.

I WAS NOT ABLE TO KEEP THE WALKING SHOE'S, BECAUSE THEY SEEM TO BE RUNNING A BITNARROWER THAN MY OTHER BRAND OF WALKING SHOES. BUT I DO HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM.I AM AT AN AGE THAT I PREFER VERY COMFORTABLE WIDTH, AND SUPPORT. LOVED THEVELCRO. KEEP UP THE GREAT PRODUCT, PROPET. SINCERE TRUTHFUL, DH
this shoe is for anyone that loves the F50s. not only are they a good cleat but they are comfortable too.

Bought white Keds for my daughter. She loves them, but after just 4 weeks they are showing structural wear and tear. They were only $20, so not over the top expensive, but I remember when Keds lasted for multiple seasons so I guess I am nostalgic...
This shoe is okay, but not quite as comfortable as my Medley style or the AP1 style.

After wearing them for less than a week, I have identical cuts on both of my ankles from where the shoe jabbed into my skin. There is a flexible backing on the shoe which is sewn to the inside right where your ankle goes. As you walk, it grinds into your ankle and makes walking extremely uncomfortable. I HIGHLY recommend not buying this product.

I should have ordered this as a size 12 or 11 1/2 if available but I still likeed the shoe and still have them for around the house lounging around but not good for any strenuous sport because of snug because of size, not the shoe.

MY GRANDSON ORDERED THESE FOR HIS CHRISTMAS GIFT AND WAS VERY HAPPY WITH THEM. THEY WERE THE PERFECT FIT AND VERY COMFORTABLE FOR HIM.

This is a great shoe, though I find that it runs narrow. I could not get my left foot in the shoe at all. My right foot wentin with some effort. It is very well made and I like the padded arch support that is built in. I will re-order in a wider size.Idaho potato

LOVE THESE but they are rough on the inside and wore a sore onto my foot for the first two weeks I wore them. By then they are too worn to return. I like the look of them though.

I ordered these for my 8 year old daughter who wears between a 2.5 and 3 street shoe, depending upon the shoe. I ordered a size 4, hoping to get a couple of years out of them. They fit her nicely with room to grow, but not so much extra room that they will be cumbersome on her foot while dancing. The elastic laces allow you to tie the shoe a little snugger which helps when buying a slightly larger size -- it allows you to make it somewhat adjustable. They quality is excellent. My daughter liked 2 things about the shoes -- "they feel good on my feet", and "they are such a pretty shade of pink....they are like a baby pink, not that orangey-pink like my last pair".

I must be one of the few people who didn't own crocs. I thought they were ugly and no "plastic" shoe could possibly be comfortable. Boy, was I wrong (at least about the comfort!). I was complaining because standing in the kitchen preparing dinner was taking a toll on my back. My husband suggested trying his crocs. Even 2 sizes too big, they worked great. So I ordered some in my favorite color. I am so glad I did. No more back problems. I wear them around the house instead of slippers because crocs have more support. They do have cuter styles, and I don't know if they all offer the same support, but I will stick with my bright purple crocs.

My daughters have been wearing this type of ballet shoe for years with no complaints. They're comfortable and reasonably good quality. I want to comment on the sizing issue, though. If you're buying for a child who wears a youth size 1 to 4.5 you must convert the size to an adult women's size by going up 2 sizes, otherwise it will be too small. So, for example, my older daughter wears a youth size 4 so she wears a size 6 in these shoes. My younger daughter wears a youth size 3 street shoe, so we order an adult women size 5 for her ballet shoes. Hope this helps someone :)
I love Easy Spirit walking shoes. They aren't a sneaker and don't look like one but that is what they feel like - very comfortable!

Very quick and easy, description was perfect. I went and tried them on in the store first just to make sure of the size. I usually where a 7 or 7.5 in most shoes, but wear a 6 in these.Delivered faster than expected!All in all it was a great deal!
I would like to have been able to wear the shoe. It was too little and was not what I wanted. I would recommend it for other to try however

I wear a women's 11, I have high arches and wide feet, but not fat feet, these fit ok, could be a smidge wider and a smidge longer, but they work still w/out looking too small. They feel comfy on my feet, I had a pair of Crocs that were awesome, but broke after a summer of regular wear, hoping these will hold up better.
This is just great and reliable shoe and I would only like to ask if it's possible to ship this straight to Bosnia and Herzegovina?If not, then it would be 4 stars.... :(

I bought these six days ago and they came in the mail today! I love them. This is the third pair of bearpaws I have owned. I love that the bottoms are rubber which make for good grip in the snow. I love the color and the soft inside. People on here are saying "they are not as good as uggs" but for the price these boots are compared to uggs I'll take bearpaws any day. I have ever owned ugg and I don't ever interned too. I live in maine and my bearpaws keep my feet war and dry. Just be sure to weather proof them. The boots are true to size but they don't have a very wide top so they're not good for people with bigger calfs. Over all I love them.

The shoe is nice but they run really small. I am not sure if this is how dance shoes are supposed to fit but I wear a size 9. So I bought a size 9..they were tight so I exchanged them for a 9.5...they are still tight in the toe area. Be careful!!

I chose 4 stars because I fear 5 stars. Otherwise these shoes are great! I tend to step with my heel and my other shoes didn't have the strength that these do. My old shoes were so bad that when I walked parts of my feet would creak/snap (yes, obviously this purchase was overdue). I will say that I worried they would be too narrow for my feet when I first tried them on but after a few hours wearing them I feel great- no cramping or blistering. I am happy with the color! They look almost black at first glance but have a hint of grey/green. Great traction when I am mopping and cleaning up slippery floors. Did I mention the price?! What a great value.

I concur with all of the reviews regarding this wonderful flip flop. I have worn this flip flop every day for 1 1/2 weeks. I wear a 9 1/2 inch shoe and I purchased a 10 M flip flop. This size is just right for my foot. My foot is an average width (D), and the flip flop just fits me. If you have a wide foot I would not recommend this sandal. After the initial break in period (about four days) this flip flop is very comfortable. I mainly wear this flip flop indoors as a bedroom slipper. However I also wore it outdoors on a non-rainy day. Since the straps are made of leather, I would not recommend this flip flop if there is any chance of rain.
Love the boots, fit perfect. Brand new in the box with all the paper and wrapping from the factory. Shipping was fast and the price was even better! Wear them all the time!

I bought these shoes last year and they fit great ,I wore to work with some jeans and everyone love these shoes.The heel was fine for work and my feet did not slipout the shoe.Also I got the gold because I like the gold and the metallic look also .It is not too much flash and everyone loved them .I have a lot of J.Renee shoes and these are one of my favorite.I will be ordering in the black and brown also .The price is also great.I price these shoes elsewhere and I cannot beat these price.
Just ordered these shoes from amazon! Got them and love them! They are so light and comfy! Stylish too! Got my mom some and she gets alot of compliments as well! Awesome shoe!
As all ugg classic boots, they are the most comfy and soo warm. I wear them with no socks wonderfull for cold weather inside home or outside.
Very stylish, and comfortable. I have yet to wear them for a long period of time, but I usually can never tolerate heals, and this one has yet to hurt my feet.

I bought these shoes because I have foot problems and my doc said they could help me walk better. They really did- for about 2 months. They stretched out quite a bit and no longer gave the support I needed. That's not good enough for the price. Now I am looking for something better.

Love these boots, short break in and now I feel like I could just go all day. I look forward to pushing them harder and harder. My wife bought a pair as well and loves them. This is a short review, but Hey! they are good boots.

These sizes published are off an inch. I can get my feet in them, but the top arch makes them to tight. The extra toe length wont matter because these come to a point anyway, your feet will not be lose in them. I've been buying these shoes for over a decade, same problem with size today as a decade ago. They are very soft, and super comfortable if you get the right size, zero break in time. Very soft rubber which wears out pretty quickly on cement/pavement, but great around the yard or short chore stuff, great grip no slip. These are always sharp looking too, athletic look to em, but I would not work out in them because they do wear out quick. I buy 2 pairs at a time.
Nice pair of shoes, however, the beading detail on the side comes of easily, so you have to be very careful when you have it on

The tops of these shoes are very long and look "manly" I ordered an 8 even though I am a 71/2 (since they don't have a 71/2) and they were too large. So if you are going to order them, remember the top of the shoe is very long and order them small. I wonder if they are actually mens not womens?

Great buy. Size fit perfectly. Normal wear and tear is almost unnoticeable. I gave them a four because in the beginning they cut at the back of my ankle but after a month or so of wearing them out they now fit like a glove. Came before delivery date. I highly recommend them. :) :) :) :) :)
They're Chuck Taylor's. If you'll like them, you'll love these. Black high-top sneakers were a great gift for the scene girl with black everything
Well made, comfortable and easy to care for. The color is a darker brown in person compared to the photo.

I received these shoes the other day, and they're great, but I'm writing to encourage others to be sure to adjust the straps carefully and take a few minutes to flex the sole by hand before deciding they're not for you.Strangely enough, even though the size is a perfect fit, I found that the strap adjustments are not intuitive at all. Generally speaking, I have a wide foot (10W) and have to cinch the ankle and widen at the toes. Not so with these! I actually had to cinch a good bit at the toe, loosen the front of the ankle as far as it would go, and then cinch again just a bit at the backstrap. But having done so, it's a perfect fit.The other thing I did, upon finding that the footbed is really, really hard and stiff, was to google "how to break in birkenstocks" and found that a number of people advise manually flexing the footbed with their hands a few times. I did that, though perhaps not as gently as suggested, and it helped a LOT with comfort.If you're as new to Birkenstocks as I am, try these things before you send them back. You'll be glad you did!***Also, a note on color: I ordered and received the Cocoa Nubuck, but it is not a red brown as pictured, just a regular old brown. Kind of disappointing after seeing the lovely rich reddish brown color in the picture... but not disappointing enough to send them back. Though if I had bought them for color alone, they would indeed be winging their way back to Amazon right now. Just so you know.February 5, 2013 -- UPDATED TO ADD: I really found the color blah and boring, as I mentioned above, and the more I looked at them the more I hated them, actually. But $3.00 and a bottle of Angelus Suede Dye later, they're an absolutely gorgeous rich deep red. I also added some cheap copper bling from the beading section at Walmart to match the buckles, and now you'd never know how plain and blah they once were.One hint: if you've never dyed suede, google it thoroughly before you try. It's very easy but there are definitely tricks to it, and if you don't wear gloves and you don't tape off the cork, you will have a permanently ruined shoe. Follow the instructions to the letter, from people who have done it, and you'll be amazed at the results. I was!!!
These shoes are the best walking shoe. The quality is excellent and always the same. Highly recommend these shoes. An added bonus is the fact that these shoes are quite water proof.
bought these for my wife. She had a pair years ago and loved them. she loves these too. will probably last 10 years like the last pair.

This climbing shoe is a solid choice. My wife climbs in these. They are comfortable, grippy, and have the unique (and very cool) Madrock heel hook.They are definatly a shoe as opposed to a slipper. For those who don't know climbing shoes are more solid than slippers which is better for things like edging or getting nubbins of toes to hold while slippers feel the rock better which can help you find holds better and place them better. The shoe vs slipper debate is one of preference.They would get a 5 star but the flash from madrock is just a bit better and you have to differentiate somehow.

I had to break into these shoes before they got comfortable, but shipping was fast and it's a great price for the quality of the shoes. I've never had Keds before so idk if it's quality has gotten better or worse, but you get what you paid for.

As mentioned numerous times, these boots are not accurately sized. I was burnt by the extra shipping cost of having to return them - $65 from Australia!- despite ordering a half size smaller than my normal US12. I ended up ordering a US10.5 (1.5 sizes smaller than usual),which feel about right. They are not super comfy straight out of the box but I get the impression they will soften and loosen with time. Nonetheless, they are certainly a classic and versatile boot which will no doubt be worn on many occasions and at the price, represent great value.
I wasnt really sure if I liked this shoe at first but after trying it on i realised just how comfortable and stylish this shoe is. This shoe is awesome for basketball and just walking around
Its useful but not 100% unbendable/unbreakable though like I expected, you still have to be careful.
These shoes are a little high price wise, but you can't beat the convenience. Right at your doorstep and back into childhood for just a few extra dollars. No brainer. Will be back for more.

I swear this has to be the most comfiest boots I have ever worn. It has fur in the inside even on the sole so you have warmth everywhere you go. I probably confusing the fur with the sheepskin but u get my point. These boots are great ! And they came literally 2 days later after i ordered them !

Cons-Extremely Stiff-Way to narrow-Long soles (like short snow skis)-Heavy-Squeaks at the ankles.Pros-Very DurableEven after 3 years, these boots are still taxing to wear. However like many others, my partners on duty love these boots.

Tengo estos zapatos desde hace mas de 4 años; los compre originalmente para cross training, y termine utilizandolos para casi todo, son comodos y duraderos. Una recomendación, verifiquen su talla en un vendedor local de Columbia.
I have worn these shoes for a while now and they are the most comfotable sandal I have ever owned. I am about to buy another pair. Oh, did I mention I have foot probems? Not with these sandals.
Got these for a family member for a gift and they are nice colors and seems to be nice shoes.

I bought 4 pairs of this shoe (in 3 colors) in Macys over the last 3 months... I LOVE THIS SHOE. I have been in search for my size and there it was on Amazon! It goes with almost any outfit and is super great when you have to wear heels and work retail!

I've had a pair of these shoes in black, enjoyed them so much I bought a pair in brown, too. These are very comfortable walkers that I wear as my daily shoes m-f. Fue una muy buena compra, excelente calidad, tallas ideales, lindos diseños actuales. Recomiendo a todoas a comprar este producto, se llevarán una buena sorpresa y le encantará si es un regalo para alguien.

I got these shows and began to wear them right off to break them in. I have to say if you stand for a long period of time dont wear them. If you are weight lifting with them then they work great. The shoes were delivered on time. They were exactly what I wanted, and they fit well. The color matched pretty well what it was advertised to be.

I bought these directly from Carrie B's (I live in Portland). They are fantastic practice dance shoes. The tops are soft, glove-like leather and you can wear them for hours at a time (they feel more like you're dancing in socks than shoes).They're particularly slick on hardwood floors, but I even swing with them on carpet.
Communication and tracking was great. Product arrived much earlier than expected perfectly packed. Shoes better than expected.Thank you Amazon.

We were in need of boots for camp this summer. We ventured out this past week combing through 3 or 4 local retail stores. We found no boots. When you get these shoes/sandals, they won't look anything like they did online. They are very cheap looking and not made very well. Wish they made these with a velcro flap instead of the laces.
This slipper is OK for the price, I WISH it was available in 1/2 sizes also. The slipper is light and comfortable, but only suitable for LIMITED use outside.

The Keen Newport H2 Sandles I purchased about a month ago, I absolutely love. I plan on taking them with me on my British Vigin Island cruise trip where I can wear them along the beach and also hiking. The best all around shoe!
I bought the hot pink in this in a size 5- and it was exactly that- hot pink but with a black lining. I like it alot. It's worth the price.

I am a pastry chef and work standing on my feet all day in a bakery. I started to wear my pair of Crocs that I purchased for a beach trip to work. At first I had to break them in a bit, but they proved comfortable... for awhile. I'm very hard on my shoes (and feet for that matter) in my profession unfortunately, and I wasn't impressed with how my Crocs have held up wearing them daily to work for 3 months. For casual wear and definitely on the beach, my Crocs are fine, but they've not given me the support I need for work.
HAD A PAIR OF NIKE SHOX THAT THE SOLE HAD SEPARATED SOME. PURCHASED SHOE GOO. APPLIED AND CLAMPED FOR 48HRS. ONCE CLAMP REMOVED SOLE SEPARATED IMMEDIATELY. GOO DOES NOT WORK!!!!!
. . . . . . . . . . Terrific fit, great deal and they look good on tiny feet!
Being a Santa these shoes ar GREAT! They take me back to my childhood and what I do now. How fun. I get so many complaments.Thanks so much for making such a great product.
These shoes were exactly what I was looking for. The price was the best I've seen anywhere. I couldn't be happier.

Prior to my Dominator 5's, my MTB shoes were from Lake. It's a tough world out there for riders with wide feet. I do not think I would have shelled out the bucks for them, but a friend works at a bike shop and got them for me at 25% below Amazon's price. The firm bottom on these give me much better power transfer than my Lakes. The cleats are also quite aggressive but doesn't seem like they will load too badly with mud. As to that "water repellant claim," forget it! I wore these shoes today with my road bike on the street in a light rain and my socks were soaked all the way through within 10 minutes! My only other complaint is the mounting system appears to be pretty much SPD only. Finally, unlike other high-end shoes, the Dominators do not make you look like you should be piling out of the clowncar at the circus with the other cyclists with their shoes.
This shoe is wonderful! It's looks great on your feet and are quite comfortable if you like high heels.

These are my son's favorite and he swears by their quality. They don't fall apart like other brands he has tried and believe me, he is hard on them. He likes the fact that the soles don't come apart from the uppers.

What else can you say about a sneaker that has been around for over 90 years. These sneakers are simply great!!! I got the classic black high top and am very pleased with them. They are comfortable, durable and stylish. On a hot summer day the don't heat up like a bread oven, like some sneakers do, keeping your feet cool and comfy. If they do get dirty or funky you can simply toss them into your washer and bada bing like new!!! They offer enough support for me to last for a long day of walking around town or work. One of the coolest things about these sneakers is that they offer a "back at ya" response to the more expensive and mostly ugly "skater" and basketball sneakers. A great sneaker at a great price. I love mine!!!
I bought it for my wife and she love them.... they even come with extra red laces... Everythin arrived on time and in perfect condition...Thanks
soft, comfortable and fit like they were made for me. All this at an incredibly low price. would buy another pair.

I have been running on top of the line New Balance for over 15 years. I'm overweight and pronated. As a 50+ year-old runner, I'm more interested in running tomorrow than if I got a personal best today. New Balance minimizes my injuries better than the other four top shoes I've tried from four other brands.

the title says it all. I love these sandals. They're a little more hefty than your run of the mill flip flop (especially when toting some unidentified liquids) and i believe that that is part of why my first pair lasted so long. I strongly recommend this product for anyone looking for a well made, built to last sandal, especially if you want one with a little more flair than most.For someone thinking about this sandal a few tips;Wash the inside out thoroughly before and after using the flask, especially before the first useempty your sandals if you aren't going to use the liquid in a reasonable period of time, it is plastic afterall and may develop a slight plastic taste if left for too long.After several months of steady wear you will notice these sandals (like most upscale sandals) conform to your feet and are even more comfortable.I don't recommend this sandal to people who fly frequently as they dont take kindly to your shoes having hidden compartments at the airport these days. (you'll get through just fine, just expect a small hassle)I will say I wouldn't particularly recommend this sandal to very heavyset people either...after years of use from me (a 6'3 170Lb male) my father (significantly larger) finally dealt the killing blow to them when i let him borrow them when he couldn't find his own shoes. (the sandals still work fine but the plastic casing of the flask was cracked beyond usability) I was surprised at this because they are very well made, and had served me well for years. But I suppose it was just their time. I have every intention of buying another pair, and another after that.

This is a beautifully classic shoe and quality is nice. The heel composition is the exception. It is a hard, hard plastic or rubber. It is very slippery on tile or brick floors. Be careful. As other reviewers indicated, the sizing is off. Consider ordering a half size larger.
Do you have a Vans Old Skool Black White 7D(M) US ?Could you tell me on my e-mail?It's thiagomizuki@yahoo.com.br

This is my second pair of UGG footwear. The original pair of tall boots for the winter are on their 10th year. They've held up. The Slippers are something I always wanted, but was afraid it would cause my feet to overheat and sweat. After 3 weeks of constant use (I've even considered wearing them as a shoe to work) they have been great. I used to wear socks all the time in the house since I like to put my feet up on the ottoman and lay down on the couch, but with just socks I also had a pair of slip on shoes. This is the best of both worlds.

With the proper sizing of my foot by a podiatrist, I then logged on to Amazon, knowing I wouldn't be disappointed! My New Balance size 13 D shoes arrived well within my expectations.I knew I could count on Amazon!A very satisfied customer!

When I was a kid in the 70s, there were all kinds of new sneaker designs coming out, but nothing ever beat the reliable old standards, either Converse Chucks or Pro-Keds Court Kings. Those sneakers were great for any sport, they held up under abuse, and never went out of fashion for boys and girls alike. These Pro Keds are a bit of a play on the old design, and come in a wide variety of cuts, colors & materials. I've got several pairs of low-cuts, one pair in suede with natural (translucent brown) rubber toe, another made out of bright yellow tennis ball fuzz with white rubber, and this pair, shiny navy blue leather with light blue & white rubber. There are a variety of color combinations to pick from, in fact on the Keds website you could even make a custom pair for awhile. They are some of the toughest, well-made sneakers and incredibly comfortable as well. They're the ultimate casual weekend shoe, and the most recent ones I've gotten come with a lighter, shapely molded insert rather than just a flat foam rubber & canvas insert, giving better support. I wear a lot of Vans and Converse sneakers too, and honestly, the Pro-Keds are constructed more solidly than either of the other brands. They can stand up to serious abuse, especially the ones made out of leather.
This is my second pair of Hi-Tec Altitude IV boots and I really like them, the waterproofing is great. I only wish they came in a narrow width as the medium is a little loose for my B width foot.

I recently bought the Bearpaw Women's M405 10" boot in black and I so love them! I had tried my daughter's very expensive other famous name sheepskin boots that grandma bought for her and found them to be so warm and cozy that I wanted a pair. Of course, I couldn't afford those, so I saw that Bearpaw makes a similar product at a fraction of the price. Well, living in Western New York state, I needed something warm and fast, so when Amazon offered a sale on Bearpaw, I ordered a pair. When they arrived, they looked sturdy, fashionable and warm. But the test is to wear them outside in a foot of snow! So I made sure to first use the sealant that came with my daughter's boots, and when they were dry, put them on and ventured out into the weather. I was so cozy, warm and dry, I couldn't believe it - I've lived 40 years up here with cold toes every winter! I've had them about 6 weeks and they are still every bit as good as the other expensive ones. I love, love them and highly recommend them to everyone!
These shoes were a Christmas gift for my granddaughter and she loves them.. She says they are very comfortable and snazzy.When these Converse shoes wear out, she will purchase another pair.

It has a very thin sole, so if your feet can't hack it and you plan on using them for a lot of walking, don't get this shoe. I love this shoe because they are great for my bike commute. Love that classic Adidas style. The price is right where it should be in my opinion. Give it 2 to 3 days to break them in.
