It took nearly 3.5 weeks to arrive in South Carolina.My son loves the shoes, but the strings and the shipping are not well done.
buy them for the new year, I like the classic tennis and this is perfect, comfortable and a great price. certainly buy them again.
These shoes are great. It only took a day or two to break them in. They look and feel great. I highly suggest them to anyone!
The heel is perfect for "mature" women, but not "old ladyish".Very comfortable.
I am very pleased with these shoes. I have ordered them multiply times before.
Bought the book as a gift and the receiver loved it. The item came quickly and as described, great deal.
Thanks best shoes if bought Light Nice to walk run and Work with. Going to buy another pair again in the future
Just what I expected and arrived in a timely manner. I have narrow feet and the B width fit pretty good, so you may want to keep that in mind if you have wide feet.

I bought these at the same time I bought a pair of Nike Basketball shoes.. both in size 12.5, I used the sizing guide on Eastbay to confirm the size I should buy. The Nike are a perfect fit, however these Adidas are way too small, and it is a very narrow shoe..The size is more like an 11 or 10.5, and the regular width is more like a narrow fit..Great looking shoe, very lightweight - just watch your sizing when you order this. I'd go at least a size larger, and a wide width if avaiable.
We could not find these anywhere in the stores for under $60.00. I was very happy with the price and the delivery was right on time. They were a gift and it was exactly what she wanted.Thanks,Theresa
I had to return the shoes because the heel was too wide. The shoes were my normal size, 8M, and fit otherwise but I could not keep them.
It's the first time when I bought this type of shoe, but I'm telling you, I love it; comfortable, cool, nice, I can't take eyes off them; Yes I'm talking about "CONVERSE" by Chuck Taylor, baby.

These shoes a nice looking and feel good. I am diabetic and there is plenty of toes room. This also rest my legs which have been operated on because if bad circulation. I would recommend these shoes to anyone who has or doesn't have leg and foot problems.
The shoes I ordered were just as described, with super fast service. Would do business with again. Thanks!
My new keds are so awesome! They look exactly like the picture. I am so happy that I got these. They are comfy and stylish, and when they wear out, I will buy from amazon!

A pair of winter boots were long due. I couldn't decide which one to buy without proper reviews. I bought this product after my cousin told me about it. Apparently she had been using it since 2 winters and was very happy with it so I decided to go for it.Please make sure that you go for the next higher size(I am a 8 1/2 so went for 9). These are very very cozy, comfortable and great value for the money. Only qualm is that the fur from its inside kept peeling off the first few days of using it make my white sock dirty:(

Purchased these boots originally for my son (the outdoor / boy scout / hiker) ... then went camping but my old boots (Vasque Clarion Impact Gore-Tex Hiking Boot ) which were tight even at a size 11 W... (I wear a 10.5 EEE) ... I decided to try these boots HiTec Boots at size 13M... thinking, why not give them a chance... on a weekend camp out in mud, rain and lots of walking (a Mountain Man theme camp out). The boots fit great... granted a bit long, but the width was just right, I replaced the insole with a pair of Spenco(r) Heavy Duty Insoles... they were comfortable and they kept my feet dry. So, I did the next logical thing, bought a pair for me, same size, and all... word of advise, I bought these in 11 W, they were to thin, I then bought size 13M... maybe it was just my feet, but they work for me... with a good insole, and a great lace technique, you have a good boot... enjoy.

Years ago I realized the value of spending money for quality footwear. That said, shelling out over $300 on a pair of boots was not an easy choice! My last few pairs of boots (including 2 pairs of Magnums) failed me within 6 months, so I wanted something that was going to last a long time. I did a lot of reading and looking around online and kept coming back to the Danner Fort Lewis. Everyone who owned a pair raved about them, so I sucked it up and took the plunge. Great decision!I have bizarre feet. At 6'4" tall, one would expect a size 12 or greater, but I wear an 8.5-9 EE. In addition to high arches, I have hammer toes, so I need room in places most shoes don't allow; hence I wear boots most of the time. When I got these in and put them on, I was a little nervous. They seemed to fit well, but there was some rubbing on my outside toes. 2 days of break in later and I was good to go. I've now worn them for 2.5 years in a variety of conditions, including motorcycling through massive down pours and on hikes through mud and muck with no problems at all. In fact, each time I polish them (which isn't often enough), they could almost pass for new! I've been surprised at how well the waterproofing has held up, as this is often one of the first things to go. I have never treated them and they still keep my feet dry, even when I stomp through puddles just to see my wife's look of exasperation.Since buying these, I've been in the Danner Outlet in Portland a few times and learned that these are still US made boots, which is cool. They tell me they remain on of their best sellers, especially with LEOs, and the only time they sell a second pair is when someone wants a dress pair. I can believe it, they really are remarkable. As with all boots, trying them on first is a good idea, but for wear and durability, you can't do better than these!

Times have now changed, however, and now I wear these around the house. When outside, I wear slip-free restaurant-style Croc look-alikes and can care less what people think of me.Until I find a wider shoe, I will always be wearing Crocs as they are simply the only shoe that has ever fit me nicely due to their extremely wide profile and tons of toe clearance.I can go as far to say that they are the only shoe that looks like it matches the same anatomical shape of the foot. Think about it for a second: how many human feet are shaped to a point like almost nearly all shoes in existence today? Needless to say, my toes have never hurt when wearing these and toe pain has always plagued me throughout my life.The last four years, as of this writing, I have had major foot problems working in a restaurant and walking around. I have heel spurs on both feet and had major toe pain on both index toes and both big toes - for some reason, they would swell up considerably at the toe joint and it would prevent me from even moving them. Ever since I switched to these shoes, I never had that problem.I used to believe we should walk barefoot as much as possible in order to strengthen our feet but now, I'm thinking the opposite because we live in an industrialized world - an industrialized world requires different needs for our bodies. I'm wearing these types of shoes everywhere and will not look back.

I love these shoes. When I run in them, I am faster, my feet feel lighter but supported, and my knees hurt far less than when I wear any other pair. I just bought a lightly used pair of GK-13s and a new pair of GK-15s, and I picked them up because of how well the XIs have performed.
These shoes are the best I have ever had; they fit just fine; they look great! And the price was right!ghl

I previously owned a pair of these sandals (over 5 years ago) which I really liked, but for some reason they no longer fit confortably. I decided to order them in a wide width thinking that might be the problem now that I no longer wear high heels, but more casual, loose fitting shoes. My new sandals fit beautifully. I can wear them all day long in complete comfort. I'm really glad I gave them a second try because I really like the style and have always thought them to be an attractive shoe too.
This is the third pair that I have purchased.Drew is a great company and their shoes are the best that I have ever had.
The quality of this shoe is much better than I expected. The leather is high quality, the overall design is nice and fits well. Very pleased!
My son wanted either red or green Chuck Taylors which are fairly difficult to find. The shoes I bought arrived quickly, were good quality, and were priced very reasonably.
Got this pair for my girlfriend as I got a pair myself for a themed party we had and well party is over and we are still rocking them

I had been trying everything before for to attack and improve my cellulite in my legs and button,and nothing worked at all lately.I take care of myself going to work out,being vegan and organic...and i felt in the way of depression when i wanted to wear a mini short or skirt that which i love those so much and I used to wear that when i was younger...Since the first moment I started to use finulite ,just couple days after I noticed the improvement results surround my knees.It was a miracle for me cause I was getting some info about some very expensive laser treatments that they couldn't to guarantee me about the results that I was looking for.So when I,ve done with my first finulite set,I started with the second one right away for complete the professional recommendation.It,s been few months ago that I finish with the cellulite treatment and my legs looks amazing.I highly recommend this product for real.From women to women.
not bad, looks a little plain though.

Adidas has great cleats.I would not even try to use any other. I used adidas cleats since I was 8.Nothing to say against this one. It is simply classic and one of the best cleats ever. Comfortable, durable and does jobwhat can you say about cleats more
MRS BOWLES WAS "VERY PLEASED " WITH THE PRODUCT, THE SPEED OF DEV., AND THE ACCURACY OF THE ENTIRE PROCESS.WE FELT LIKE WE "WERE FAVORITE CUSTOMERS"....
Been wearing these slippers for years. Love them - so comfortable. Easy to wear and put on. Classy and good looking.

I have had several pairs of these boots over the years and liked them. The most recent pair had a manufacturing defect that was biting thre inside of my left ankle. I had to lace them so loose that the support was inadequate. I guess with Chinese children making boots you can't expect perfection.

Good part: it's airy, good looking, cushioning as they said, received on timeBad part: It's too tight around your foot and I would say you should consider this factor before to buy it! However, you can get a little bit comfort if you keep shoelaces loose otherwise ok
The bottom soles are wearing very well.The top of the shoes are wearing very well.The mid-solde is cracking along the flex-areas, but I can still wear them and will easilly purchase another pair.

These look so nice. I was trying to imagine them in leather when I ordered them for DH's Christmas present. He wears them all the time and they still look new. He reports they are very comfortable. Loves 'em!PS I'm not a kid, just didn't want my name all over the net.
I purchased these shoes a half size larger than I normally wear and found them still very tight. Toe area is quite narrow. Otherwise, well made and good height for dancing.

This very attractive little sandal would probably be very satisfactory, but it runs both short and narrow. It is not true to size by any means, so rather than return them, I gave them to a cousin with smaller feet. They were on sale. Now I know why.

I ordered two pair. One red and one blue. I love the red ones but the blue ones was not true to size. The blue ones seemed more narrow then the red ones. If you order blue you may want to try the wide in them.
While I don't know much about dance yet, these have made my three year old very happy and are holding up great to weekly class and additional "practice" at home!
Really great pair of shoes. they look awesome, very stylish and comfortable. only giving them 4 stars for being so expensive. other than that, no complaints.

This booties look great with about everything (jeans, a skirt or a dress) The heels make your legs look slender, they are of a medium height and very comfortable. The quality is good, I allways trip over things and it still has no scratches. They work for dressy and also for casual occations.

This is a generic big shoe of average manufacture and materials. It is clearly foreign but none of the cost savings of such outsourcing has been passed through to the consumer. It can be extrapolated that such behavior by the owners/managers of this company will overtime generate a market niche for an on-shore competitor to retake market share with potentially higher quality materials at the same price.

These grasshopper shoes are one of the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. The sole of the shoe is cushiony and you almost feel like you are walking on air. I was a bit concerned about the light color (they only had beige available at the time of purchase). There was a little bit of dirt on the shoes and it wiped them off lightly with some warm water. I would definitely recommend these shoes especially for summer and the warmer months.

I couldn't really tell from the pictures, but the toe area on this shoe is very narrow. And I even purchased the wide ones. I'm on my feet all day and can't have my toes all squished up, it's uncomfortable and just asking for trouble.More importantly, and if you're thinking of buying these please pay close attention, the way the decorative leather pieces overlap just at the side of your small toe, cause a sharp painful rubbing right where you DON'T want it.I tried on the right shoe, tied it up, felt the sharp rubbing on my baby toe, and that's all she wrote. These went back in the box and back to Amazon immediately. Thank goodness they have such a hassle free return policy. Thanks Amazon!

I grew up associating Bass shoes with quality, comfort & style. If these mules are a reflection of Bass' current shoe selection, I need to change my brand perception.These mules seem to be well made. They have a good outsole, a nice leather upper & a cushy insole. They fit true to size. However, they have zero arch support.As for looks, these shoes fit into the "old lady shoe" category. They are not out & out ugly, but they have no pizazz and are not contemporary looking. I can't pinpoint my reaction to the shoe - it could be that because they are flat makes them less stylish or perhaps the seam on the toe cap makes me react negatively to the shoe (I don't like the seam at all). I ordered them because it is very hard to find a nice dark blue/denim blue mule. Because they would be expensive to return, I will wear them with longer jeans so they will stay covered up.

I recently tried to purchase the Propet Women's W3902 Tour Walker Velcro from the store I previously purchased them from and was told they no longer carried this product. I searched and found them at Amazon.com - They have a very comfortable fit and are ideal for me. Best fitting Walker for the money. I love the velcro as it is so easy on and off. Love, Love, Love them.

I measured my daughters foot and ordered the correct size for her however the shoes were way too small. The entire shoe was smaller than my daughter's bare foot! I would say to order at least a size bigger.
These are so comfy and are really walking shoes. I liked them so much I ordered a second pair. Shoes are difficult for me to buy as my feet are small and narrow but these fit.

I initially ordered the 9B and found them to be both longer and narrower than I had anticipated. Exchanging them was quick and painless, but the exchanged pair came with the right boot just slightly wider than the left. I've decided the difference is negligible, so I'm keeping this pair. They still need to be broken in (especially in the ankles), but the foot bed is well padded and very comfortable.

Hard to find this shoe in stores. Shipping was fast. Price was right. Shoe fits well. Very pleased with the service and product and price. However, the shoe has not lasted even a year. The heels wear down quickly. Not sure I will buy another pair of this brand.
My pair came on time as what was schedule and everything is just as advertised. My shoes has already taken a beating, but they work just like new.
These boots fit my son and he really likes them This is the first time I was successful in purchasing footwear on line and actually having them fit. Hooray!

I walk about 2 blocks to and from the office every day. This show has been very comfortable for that walk. I've had them a month and they still look new. Comfortable on my feet all day long, nice and light. This is my 4th pair of Rockports. The first 2 were outstanding, the 3rd was not so great, very uncomfortable and heavy. Nice to be back in a pair that feels good again.
Best shoes ever sold. Been wearing them since I was 14, and will never change. Tried to get a trendy pair before, but was greatly disappointed. Shipping was really fast to my FPO address. Thank you.

My daughter bought these flip flops in Florida and loved them. I have RA and cannot really wear them, but I needed something to wear to my yoga class. These were so comfortable and soft and a bit of a heel so I could actually wear them. Hers were a size 8, I needed a 7. They fit perfect.
The shoes run large so order a half-size lower than normal. They just didn't fit right on my Mom, she was really disappointed. Usually Easy Spirit is more true to size.

I ordered these a while back and I simply love them. They are fun, yet stylishly funky, and go with just about anything. The only downsides I can think of is that they don't have much traction, so I can't wear them as often as I would like during these long Wyoming winters.Go ahead and buy a pair! You won't regret it!

I really like these shoes. I've been wearing store brand knock-offs for ages and I finally got a pair of proper all-stars and I'm so freakin' happy. They're more flexible and comfortable than I expected and I'd say these are comfortable enough to jog in - if I every jogged :P. But yeah, great shoes, and for this price they're totally worth it.I feel like Dwight from Sin City when I wear these xD.
I love these shoes---I hardly wear anything else! I have them in multiple colors and they are SO comfortable!
Shoes are nice and durable like only vans are, however this classics are very harsh on your feet the first couple weeks

I read reviews of these before buying this pair - I have bought two pairs of Timberland boots before, one pair thats literally lasted app. 20 years with a lot of use, and another pair that only lasted two years. I received these in yesterday, and will update the review if they don't break in well or last. So far my impressions are - 1. Accurate to size, 13w, I wear New Balance / Nike wide tennis shoes as additional reference 2. Comfortable, but not cushiony if you know what I mean, I wore them all day yesterday without blisters or sore spots 3. I was expecting non insulated boots, which I got, but these are still warm to hot - gussetted tongue and no ventilation means these are not a boot I am looking forward to wearing on a construction site in the middle of a Texas summer. I have received in what I expected, and given Timberlands reputation and my exp I'm giving it 5 stars pending further experience with this pair of boots.

I love these Eastland shoes but can't seem to find them anymore. I was excited to see them on Amazon as my old pair is looking quite worn. When I got them, they were too small! I guess I learned my lesson and won't purchase shoes online again. I just did my first ever return to Amazon and will see how that goes. By the way, I have worn the same size shoes for years!

This is the most comfortable shoe that I've worn in years.I also have this shoe in white and beige and so glad to have found it in the color black. I hope it is never discontinued. The soft leather is amazing.I'm very satisfied and thank you so much.
So beautiful. So powerful when touching the ball.I strongly recommend this item.

I purchased these socks based on Amazon buyer feedback. They appeared to be of good quality and fit well. However, upon the first washing, the elastic/lycra in the socks broke down. When I took the socks from the dryer, hundreds of broken elastic strings were protruding from the outside of the material. They are now worthless after a single use. I strongly recommend avoiding this product.

I would not recommend this shoe for anyone with wider feet. In general, the fit is good, but the toebox is a little cramped for someone with a wider foot. Would have been a perfect fit if I had an average foot.
The boot was well priced and solidly built but not true to size.I would go at least a half size smaller.
I have another pair of these shoes and loved them; therefore, I purchased the pair through Amazon at a good price.

I have had a number of seatbelt purses. As you all may know...they are super durable. This bag serves as my carry on as well as a diaper bag. I can easy put my items, my laptop as well as my little one's diapers etc... in it. Its heavy, but its made out of seatbelts, duh! If you are going to carry this as an everyday bag, just keep in mind that its pretty bulky. Overall I like it.

I buy tennis shoes on line all the time and they run true to size. I wear a 5 1/2 and have trouble finding certain shoes. When I read reviews that these shoes run small I ordered 1 size up and they fit just fine. The box said 61$'s and many in my class bought from a local shoe store for that price. So this is a very good deal. I'm an senior and love to TAP now!
What can i see... i am a reef womens a love the sandal for reef.... is the best, is durable came in a great condition
All-Stars, Old School, Awful. Delivered in France, in times.Amazon's the only place where i can find huge shoes size.First purchase, definitly not last.

These kicks is tight. I was strollin' down the block, and some female was all like, "YO! Those kicks is tight!" I was all like, "What you know about these kicks? I gotta show you wassup!" Then later on in the day, we hooked up. So this fresh gear is where its at.
I got a pair of these for my 6-months pregnant wife. She says they are like "walking on clouds."I recommend them to any expecting dads looking to score some points!
great product, just as advertised. The item was purchased at a good price and the shipping was fast. I would purchase from this person again. they come highly recommended.thanksusm1975black

I am not pleased with the fact that I returned the item & requested an exchange of a smaller size. Instead I was given a refund even after I filled out the exchange request. This was a gift for my daughter & she was disappointed that they refused to make the exchange.
I've bought the same shoes in 1999 and I used them every day in every weather condition for 5 years.I really love them and think to buy a new pair.These are the best product I've ever seen.

After buying my first pair of Clark's Natureveldt back in '02 I had to get a pair in black. The only place that carried the original Natureveldt is Amazon, as other carriers only have the currrent model, Nature 3. I placed my order and received them within 2 days. They feel great just as I remember them.

They are very fashionable. Many people on my college campus wear them in a variety of colors. I am a size 11 foot and bought 10.5 and it fit great. WORD OF ADVICE: If it fits too loose and your not wearing socks, this shoe will destroy your heel. But if it fits correctly it is very comfortable and supportive.
The Boots are great for about two months then break down fast.I think the construction could be alot better,I hope that it can be improved on

Great fit. I read other reviews saying this shoe runs large, but I'm almost always a 9 in Nine West shoes and this one was no exception. These are higher than I realized but still easy to walk and stand in. I love that these aren't plain leather - the suede adds a nice extra touch without making them feel like I saved them from the 90s.
These are fabulous boots. My second pair...very comfortable. I can wear them all day without any problems. Great for work or weekend. Highly recommended!
this shoe is the most comfortable running if have ever had.Thanks
These are classic Converse shoes. They arrived quickly. The fit was true to size and they look great with our school uniform.
These are some of the best shoes I have ever bought. Would recomend them to everyone looking for good fit, and good value.

Sexy, but too tall for me. I'm 5'3", and these boots went almost all the way up to my crotch. Since they went so high, they squeezed at a very bad spot (think muffin tops of the legs). I am pretty slim too, so that wasn't the problem. Wish they had them in "petite".
These shoes are very comfortable and look great. They're perfect for work and casual wear. I would highly recommend them.
I'm using this shoe now because it is easy to get on. I prefer the world class walking shoe by rockport but it is harder to get on for me.

I first wore Rockports when we lived in Wisconsin in 1985. Lately I have had trouble finding my size (extra wide) here in Texas. Amazon has them in several styles at a very competitive price so I ordered a pair. The arrived in a few days and are just like I remember them. I will be ordering another color the next time I wear out a non-Rockport pair of shoes.I work in a 2.25 million square foot hospital and put in about 1.5 miles before 8:00 AM. I appreciate that the Rockports offer great arch support and are surprisingly light weight.
They are cute, and cushy on the bottom of the feet, but rather narrow, and uncomfortable at the edge of the heels.

Working a new job, I needed to wear nicer shoes. Didn't want to mess up my best pair so I bought these Skechers. Much better than I was expecting. May need to just clean up another old pair and keep these for going out on weekends. Highly Recommend.
i brought the shoe for my belly dance class. the shoe is worth it however the sizing is off by a shoe size. i wear a 10 and i should have ordered a 9.

Wonderful sneakers! They are comfortable and stylish. They run slightly large ( I wear a size 7 shoe, so I ordered a 7). They are very roomie, but comfortable and I can wear thick socks with them if I need to.
I wear flip flops a lot here in Florida. These are the most comfortable I've put on my feet, but they were also the most expensive I've ever bought
I got these for my brother for Christmas, and he loved them. What more can i say? Converses are awesome for anybody!

I wear them almost every day. They look just as they do in the picture, and they're so comfortable. They're my favorite pair of Sanuk's yet. They've stretched out a little, obviously, but they still pretty much fit.

Ordered these online. The first time they arrived we realized we had ordered them a size smaller than we needed. The return process was clear and simple - we mailed them back at no cost and were refunded the entire balance. We ordered the correct pair and received those in just a few days. They arrived in great condition, the right price, the right product, and in the right amount of time. No complaints, only praise for this vendor. Great job.
Fast delivery and I like these shoes a lot, fit is a little tight, but im sure after breakin they will be just right, very well made and good looking too..

I was first introduced to this awesome sandal by my sister, who gave me a pair she'd worn for about a year that she'd actually been given by a friend who'd worn them for a few years even before that! They both had gotten new pairs but neither one wanted to see this "old" pair go to waste because there was nothing structurally wrong with them.I wore this pair nearly every day that was weather-permitting (in Utah), which was about 6 months of the year for about 7 more years. They FINALLY gave out! I wore them until the bottom sole was so worn through that one of the straps eventually came loose and a nice penny-size hole wore through right at the ball of my foot. Even the originally inch thick heel was getting close! Did I stop wearing them? Oh my, no. I merely tied the strap to another strap and did my best to ignore the ever-growing hole. I just purchased another pair to finally lay this vigilant pair to rest and can't wait!Since I didn't have to do any of the breaking-in, I can only say that these were not just the most comfortable pair of sandals I've ever worn, but hands-down the most comfortable shoe that this shoe nut has ever had on her feet. My vast shoe collection became severely neglected once these hit my rack! I have incredibly high arches and never had any issues at all with the straps - as I mentioned though, I didn't do the breaking-in. The straps themselves will ease up and loosen over time though and also bear in mind that the insole is specifically designed to shape and mold around your foot, so your foot itself will eventually rest lower down in the shoe, which will also ease any strap pressure. This process, from what I have read in many reviews happens fairly quickly too. I'll be finding out for myself, however, within the week! Yay!I'm INCREDIBLY excited to have this Teva again and have frequently recommended it to people who comment about them - which a LOT of people do.

Very comfortable sandle. Hard to find a good quality sandle that offers support and leave your feet feeling good even after walking a long time. The sole is thick enough to absorb hard pavement. Best sandle I've ever owned.

I run marathons and various triathlon distances, and have done plenty of miles happily on Asics Kayanos. I was worried about the cushioning on such a lightweight shoe when I took them out of the box. But they run beautifully. They are so incredibly light it makes a noticeable difference to my running. Not sure how long they would last given their minimalist design, but I guess we tend to retire our shoes before there are any signs of wear & tear on the upper part of the shoe anyway. The only issue for me is the tongue design - yes the single-fold makes sense in a weight-saving capacity, and once the shoes are on there are no comfort issues (on the contrary they feel great), but if you do triathlons and need to do a fast transition, you need to spend a bit longer to make sure they are put on right. Nevertheless, they are still my new favorite running shoe. JK

I got this product on sale and i am so glad i didn't pay full price not worth it. They get slippery when is wet. I don't have wide feet and after walking on them for a few hours they start hurting on the sides. It makes my feet sweat and smell and it was the same with the two pair of keen sandals that my little boy had owned.

I bought these around New Years, and by June, the sole was already breaking apart and the back of the heel was deteriorating. I stopped wearing them regularly and they eventually wore down further and got few holes in the canvas right above the sole. I was expecting a little higher quality unfortunately. :\
Birkenstock shoes are the best fit for my feet, and are durable. Good shoes-good price-fast service. I reccomend this site.
These are my favorite Flip Flops.... so comfy, yet cute. And in Black they can pass for more than sporty.... I keep buying them year after year.

I ordered the "Chuck Taylor" Converse All Stars in Black, just because I think they go with almost everything. The packaging was fine and I had no issues with the product. It arrived before the projected date and looked exactly like the photo. The box did include two pairs of laces, both black and white. I've been wearing Converse Chuck Taylors for years and needed to replace my pair that I've worn out. I rotate my shoes, so they had just ran their course. I really enjoy these shoes, I like the look, the style (which is very classic), and the comfort. These are the most recognized sneaker, ever. More people comment on these more than any other pair that I own. The only drawback is that they run large. Make sure when you order them, you order them to your true size. Other than that, I have had no issues. YMMV.
I ordered these sneakers for my cousin. He loves them! Great pair of basic sneakers that blends well with any outfit. Great decision, rather than over priced sneakers!
An old school shoe, with style. How did our feet survive these things? Oh, that's right, they didn't.

I really like these flip flops, but when I walk in them they make a lot of noise. The flip flop noise if you know what I mean! They are the loudest flip flops I have ever owned. When I walk I try to hold them closer to my foot (so they won't be so loud), but it does not seem to work. Other than that, it did take alittle while to get use to the arch support. I have only ever had flat flip flops. I'm not sure if they are the best for walking long distances which is what I wanted. But basically they are comfortable and look nice.
have been wearing this style of sandle for years, don't know what i would do without them. and i am a shoe person!

This is the first shoe I have had in years that was wide enough for me; I bought the 4E. They do run a little short; I normally wear a 7-7.5 and with these in an 8 one toe hits the end. The biggest problem I had is that the shoes are way, way too big top to bottom. However, now that I have layered an insole and ball-of-foot pads over the shoe's removable insole, they fit pretty well and are very comfortable. They do get a little bit hot, as someone else mentioned. I am very happy to be able to stand and walk in them a lot and yet not look clunky. The leather is showing creases after just a few days of wearing them though.

I was worried in the beginning as they did not feel very comfortable. They were very stiff around my toes, but after one or two days of walking around, they start feeling great. I never had blisters or anything, so it was just a mild adaptation. So I am quite satisfied with them after all!

I was a lifeguard for years, for summers I lived in these! They have a wonderful foam-like sole, but the best part is the fabric material that holds your foot. I never had a blister or any discomfort while wearing them. My grandmother borrowed a pair of mine to wear, she was very fond of them and I bought her this pair for Christmas. I currently have three pairs; I went through my first pair of the 'Ginger' Reefs. They had a thinner sole, which I wore through in a summer, I'm sure it was because I was walking across the rough cement all day long. I found that the "Sandy" Reefs stood up better; they also have a rubber like base to the shoe, which held up at work. Since my grandmother and I both enjoy them, I would defiantly recommend them to anyone.
Shoes were received in original packaging, band new! My son is going to love them, they are just what he wanted & I got what I expected. Thanks...
did not wash well... price was great but doesn't seem like the same Keds that you buy in dept stores. Not real happy with them.

My husband loves this shoe and has been wearing the reebok brand shoes for many years. This one seems to withstand the best. Great shoe and I hope that we can always find it when we need it. Thank you

Greatest Most durable boots I've ever purchased. I'm actually very surprised with these for the price I paid. All comparable boots in local stores were easily twice the cost. I'd highly reccommend these boots to someone who wanted something long lasting.

Fantastic fit and feel.. negative heal-cup = comfort.found the best deal on the net, shoesontheweb.comOverstock said they price match.. but that turned out to be bunk.I've had a pair of everything Birks, keen, .. My favorite pair was from Bass (suv series). But they were discontinued. I couldn't be happier with these. It's been a few months too and they are wearing well. I use them like slippers--mostly indoors.

I've had various NB cross training shoes over the years and really liked them. But I've never had any that were so slippery on hard wet surfaces as these are. Even after a few weeks of wear, they are still like ice skates when the walking on wet sidewalks and roads. Be careful!!!

good morningthe excellence of the purchase is that I arrive in the estimated time and are products that people want to buy is a great way to buy cards by providing this optionto shop and provide good service and hope to continue buying the best of you waiting felicitacciones

I bought these for a halloween costume, and even though I selected standard shipping, the cost didn't show up on the balance until I got the confirmation and the order had gone through--shipping cost as much as the shoes I thought I was getting at a discount!Also, though I used the conversion chart to get a women's size, they ended up being too small.
This is the third pair of these shoes I have bought. All different colors. They are great to wear in the office in the summer.
these shoes are so well fitting and cushiony and durable. My feet are in haven

I love my 574's. Got the black and silver with the dark gray foam about a year ago (my 3rd pair), and walked all over Mexico in them. They've stood up really well, and have aged really well too. Prices seem to fluctuate a lot on them, but whatever you end up paying, they're pretty much worth it. I like darker colors because of their versatility, and their durability, and if you can avoid the white foam I highly advise it because the dirtier your shoes get, the worse they look. An who wants to pay good money to look a shambles?

Love the shoes. I have this shoe in 5 colors. When I wanted a third WHITE pair could not find them on line at J. C. Penney's as I have in the past and could not find the white shoes on line at Easy Spirit. Amazon directed me to Shoemall.com where they had this shoe in about 18 different colors. Thank you Amazon!

I have been ordering and wearing these shoes as casual work shoes for 10 years. They are well made, a good price and the thing I like the most about them is how many different sizes/widths are available. Once you find the size you need you can depend on always getting a shoe that will fit.

I bought these shoes to complete my cheerleading costume for a special event. They looked Great!Customizable: The color blocks are easy to interchange, they tie into the laces, so they stay well, too.Size: The shoes were very comfortable, and I found them true to size - I wear an 8 1/2, and I bought the size 9. As with running shoes, I find that you should always go up at least a 1/2 size to account for the forward motion, and they fit perfectly. There was a little extra room, as expected, but when jumping around in them, I found them to be great.Traction: My only concern was that there was little to no traction. This may not matter for your use of the shoes, but I was wearing them on a slick dance floor, and when someone spilled a drink, I fell pretty hard. If using on a track surface, grass, or other "standard" cheerleading materials, this may not be a concern for you.
They came in a timely manner, in the little Converse box. They're just as the should be: classic kicks that will last a long time.

I hike fairly frequently in the Sierra mountains, often in rocky, steep or muddy terrains. So I spent a good amount of time researching for the best pair of boots that will provide and comfort and durability for an all-day hike. I finally decided on these Altitude IV boots.I was very pleased with my decision, as they were very comfy, no blisters, and durable, not to mention better looking than other hiking boots. Good grip over rocks, mud and dirt trails. I will buy another pair of Altitude IV after these wear out.

These seemed like good quality boots, however the sizing was 1/2 a size off. I ended up returning the product so I can't speak for actual comfort or longevity of product. But it is frustrating when a product doesn't fit. Shoes are usually pretty constant too. I purchased these particular ones based on all the great reviews but I didn't see any that commented on sizing issues, so just beware.

Me and my husband both took this bag on our honeymoon to the Mediterranean and we loved the bag! We went to Italy, Greece and Turkey and this bag went everywhere with us on all the excursions. We went to tons of ruins and hiked everywhere and this bag held up great! It was great to just sling over my chest and keep safe close to me plus all the compartments were amazing! It could hold so much and there was a nice compartment for my camera that kept it ready for any pictures. I would recommend this to anyone going on any kind of trip. We definitely plan to take our bags on any future trips we take. Thanks to company for making such a great quality product!!

The only casual shoe my husband will wear. He wears them to work every day, and goes through about 2 pair a year. He is hard on shoes and these hold up very well. He says they are the most comfortable shoe he can find. Most stores no longer carry this style. I was very happy to find them with the help of Amazon.com.
You can never go wrong with SAS shoes. The delivery of the shoes was great and in a timely fashion, I'm sure I will order again, and the prices can't be beat!

I was told by my director a week before our show opened that he wanted me to wear black character shoes instead of tan. Having Amazon Prime, I ordered this product which verified that the shoes would be delivered in two days. However, four days later I still hadn't recieved the delivery. When I went to track my package, the delivery estimate was still set for two days after I ordered it yet the order hadn't even been shipped yet- four days later! After a week of nothing, I checked again and now the order has disappeared from my account as if I never even ordered them in the first place. Needless to say, there was no reliability from this company who- after making a mistake by not shipping my shoes- decided to just erase the order entirely. I rarely write reviews but feel as if I should warn other customers before something similar happens to them.

I purchased a pair of these boots over a year ago for my job as a local Mall Guard. I wanted steel toe protection just in case i had to break up a fight and some kid would try to step on my foot. Turned out the steel toe was unnessicary. What I can say was this boot held up resonably well under the conditions i put it through. I walked over 5 miles a day on a hard tile floor at first for 5 days a week then for 3 when i went to nights. these boots held up. After over a year and a half the front foot tread area is compleatly flat. the tread is worn compleatly off, at the back i have a large heel bevel but when i think about how much i walked with them on. Just to let you know the velvet ease comfort insole installed in the boot will flatten out in no time and your going to have to come up with one on your own, also its not really water proof. Just to let everyone know its a B.A Mason boot at a higher price, I got mine for 109 out of the Mason Catalog and thats what its really worth. Also it's Made In China and they have the nerve to call it work america. So to sum up It's a good boot thats going to do what an old school work boot was made to do, Its nothing fancy but it will do its job. Better Yet its cheap enough that when you wear em out you can toss em and get another pair. The only problem is the lack of padding and a very hard rubber sole. But of corse a cushion insole can fix that. Also they have a padded collar at the top to keep the leather from eating your ankle. I can attest to this i beat the crap out of mine and they held up. Another Nice feature is they do come in narrow B widths. If you cant find em here head on over to B.A Mason

These boots are beautiful and look like excellent quality. They arrived promptly.Unfortunately they are too big and we had to return them. The heel is too wide and the foot slips around inside. We ordered 1/2 size smaller than usual due to the reviews we read, but guess we should have gone a full size smaller.

Awesome shoe. Looks great, I have the coffee suede, and is fantastically comfortable. Just beware the for both myself and a friend of mine the shoe ran a half size too big (I'm a 9.5 but needed a 9 in this shoe, she's a 9 and needed a 8.5)

I love all the sexy and high-heeled shoes out there, but as we age, they are not as suitable as when we were young (and even then probably not). This style of Naot is somewhat magical - I've had many compliments, such as, they look like ballerina shoes, funky, stylish, classy, versatile - can wear them with pants or skirts. They've become my signature shoe - I have two pair in different colours. I can walk for miles in these shoes, they are that comfortable. I highly recommend them.

These cleats are the best. I didn't want to spend a lot of money on them since I don't play competitively anymore but after too many seasons of blisters I went back to these. I love them, there's a reason they've been the go to clear for so many years.

the shoes were perfect and came right on time. however, the very first time i wore them, they got scuffed by a tricky curb. i wish you could have installed some kind of invisable force field around them so that they would stay so white. you really need to work on that.

After placing my order for these shoues, they arrived very soon.They're comfortable (and ideal for me because I have diabetes; the velcro allows you to adjust the tightness of the shoes). Great traction on the bottom. Very nice looking. They appear to be well constructed and should last many years.

since buying these slippers for my son he wears them and tells me that they are so so comfortable. The color is transparent to dirt so if you have a high schooler like I do and are looking for a pair of slippers these are for "You"!
You would expect a name like timberland to have reached a certain level of expertise to be able to build a $ 100.+ shoe that can compromise between comfort and toughness... ,but it doesn't .
Great looking Dressy sneakers wouldn't look bad with a tuxedo at a prom, but run very small/short at least one full size...

I love these shoes. They have become an essential part of my wardrobe. While some might say they are a bit tall, I find I can wear them through a whole day without a problem. They go with almost anything.

I really wanted these shoes to work out, but they didn't fit. The right shoe was too small, which is kind of weird because I had also tried one-half size larger, but the right shoe in that size was too large. I LOVE these. Trekked all throughout Costa Rica in them and they held up great. Through wet, dry, hard, soft surfaces, these were a phenomenal addition to my trip. They lasted a little over a year for me (they went through a month in Costa Rica, three months at a summer camp, multiple music fests, and many other outdoor excursions) but I have no qualms with purchasing a new pair. These are a beautiful pair of pumps. I love the tailored look I can wear with them: trousers and a vest. You get not just the ribbon ties as seen in the picture but also regular cord ties, though I think the ribbon is much more attractive. The only complaint I have about these pumps is that there isn't a lot of padding inside, so as the day went on my foot would rub back and forth in the front and cause some friction. Other than that they are wonderful.
This is the best looking shoes i saw. When I ordered them I dint think they will be so good. Most of it is leather and with a buetiful back. i dint know how the sole was but it was also great .

Read the reviews (5 stars) before purchasing these shoes and this is what prompted me to purchase them. When I finally got them, I was a little disappointed because they are higher than I expected and a bit unstable. These shoes are good if you are mostly sitting down and they look very sexy. However, I'm not so sure that I can walk in these for more than 5 minutes. If you are an expert stiletto wearer then these are the shoes for you.

Some guys I work with on my Army dive team swear by these as dive booties because you can take your fins off and move out cross country without having to stop and put on boots. I bought a pair to try out and thought they were ok. I have kind of a wide foot and low arches so this shoe isn't really made for my foot.
Sneakers were a gift for son-in-law. That's the kind he likes. He's happy.

Ordered for my husband for Fathers Day. His normal shoe size is 10 1/2. So I ordered size 11. Way too large. Then re-ordered size 10, STILL way too large. Hopefully size 9 will fit. A full size and a half smaller than normal shoe size! I also ordered a pair for myself. My normal size is 8. So of course I order size 8, way too big too. Re-ordered size 7. These did fit.
