shoes are very light, comfortable and good price from amazon. just the look is not as nice as otehr shoes i like , but for the use purpose, thay are great.
they do a really good job; fast shipping and the item was in very good condition i give them 6 stars!!!!!!!!!!!!!
The shoe is of good quality and fit.. Very comfortable fron first step.. Would purchase again...Timberland Men's Kiawah Bay 2 Boat Shoe

I got this on sale for a really good price. I have always been a fan of Adidas shoes but I thought I gave Converse a try for the good price. Currently, I also wear Adidas Team MAC 2, which I bought for a few dollars more than the Converse. The Team MAC 2 defnitely has much better feel and support, especially when landing after a jump. I have worn Nike, Reebok and other brands of basketball shoes of about the same price and the support provided by the Converse is only average. For example, the tongue of the Converse is thin while the Adidas is breathable mesh and much thicker. I feel like I am wearing a cheap, store brand basketball shoes with the Converse. Don't let the ICON system fool you, it doesn't do anything special and is no comparison to Adidas's AdiPRENE+, Torsion System and A3 Structure. In my opinion, Adidas has the best fit, feel and support for about the same price. I currently own 4 pairs of basketball shoes and one pair of running shoes. All are Adidas with A3 or AdiPRENE+. All are remarkably comfortable. I know, but they were all on sale for very low prices. So I stocked up.
i absolutly LOVE these booties! very stylish and sleek. very light weight. i really like the suede look as well. I would love to have them in every color!!

I love this wrist-let. I have a larger frame and the wide strap is really comfortable and flattering as well. Highly recommend this to anyone of any age, goes from casual to more dressy. I got it in the black and it is good quality leather- not too shiny.

The product was the perfect color, soft leather and a nice heel height. My only problem was that it fit me too tight across the toes. I was sad to return it since it was being sold at such a great price but I have wide feet and would not be able to deal with that tiny problem after 4 hours in those pumps. Great shoe overall.
This is a quality lightweight shoe. I think you'd have a hard time finding a shoe of this type, as well made, at any price range. Very comfortable, very stylish.

I ordered a blue 9. (one size bigger) It's WARM AND COMFY. Exact the height that I want. But I found out that the chestnut in 9 is back to stock again. So I am wondering if I need a change. Let me try their customer service:)

This is the second pair of Aetrex walkers of this particular type I have purchased because they support my feet, never cramp them, are easy to put on and take off, the velcro straps stay in place all day and my feet do not hurt at night when I take them off. They are good appearance (black) and I wear them with formal business attire (suits) as a professional business man. I also have a more casual pair (white) for daily non-business wear. If you have foot problems - give them a try. I could not find any of my size in any store and had to estimate at the fit on the first pair (13-wide)and they fit perfectly. After 10 month's of daily use (10/hours/day/5-days a week) they show no noticeable wear. The nonskid soles are of great importance, although they do cause a squeak when wet(rainy days) and walking on marble corridors of some buildings. It goes away quickly as they dry. I highly recommend them.

I had knee surgeries on both knees in the 1970's when large segments of cartilage were removed compared to the minimally invasive surgery today. Because of this, I have to be very careful of the shoes I wear.What is required is a shoe with lots of padding and support. Wearing the Softspots Marathon allows me to have a pain-free day. If you have knee pain, you will not go wrong with the Marathon.

I bought this boot for my husband and they arrived this week, just in time for all the snow. When he came in from snowblowing, his feet were still warm and dry as if he were just going out!! Perfect for him, he said he love these boots and that they are very, very comfortable. So if you are looking for a good warm and waterproof boot that's not heavy, these boots are what you are looking for. Perfect for all of this Chicago snow we are having now!

I was looking for a strong pair of shoes that would be worth investing in. Look no further. I trusted the 'Clarks' brand and i was duly rewarded. This shoe is waterproof to an amazing extent. It also has nice stitches on it that hold it together very well unlike other shoes which use glue. the insides are made for comfort and really take good care of your feet on long working / active days...I can attest to that, I'm a high school teacher.
These are some of the best shoes I have ever bought. Would recomend them to everyone looking for good fit, and good value.
This is a good shoe, but not an excellent one. I purchased it 3 months ago and it's holding well. It's very comfortable.
The shoe arrived promptly, the color was lighter than the picture and the fit is a little loose, but they are comfortable and soft. Good for leisure.
I brought these crocs for my husband..He's wanted a pair for the beach.He finds them comfortable, easy to take off and on, plus they are a casualslip on..

I'd give them five stars but I think they're kind of ugly, not being a huge fan of the color orange. Using them for walking, about 5 miles a day, and so far they're holding up well and and are comfortable for the whole walk.Updating this review almost a year later: Still wearing these shoes, uppers still in good shape; still comfortable but about ready to be replaced, after holding up well for over 1000 miles! I'm going to try to replace them with the same shoe, I've liked them so well.

I purchased my rampante last week and tested it for twice so far. I have to say I am kind of dissapointed because I thought these were the perfect soccer shoes for me. The truth is the shoes are a little bit too narrow, and there is no improvment in shooting compared to cheaper shoes. I used to have lotto primato before and the shooting accurecy is same in reebok rampante. However reebok rampante's heel comfort is way advance than lotto primato, or other cheaper shoes. Nonetheless if you don't wanna pay $200 for a puma or adidas predator mania, reebok might be the second choice for you.
It arrived on time as stated. It works good like expected with no complaints so far. I will consider ordering from this site again.

I tried surfing for the best price at shoe stores, but Amazon found me the best price at Bealls, in Florida. I walk on hospital cement floors all day. Rockports are more comfortable all day for me than other brand names I have tried. Thanks Amazon.com!

The dye on these shoes comes off. I bought this to wear around the house and they are comfortable enough per the other reviews, but they turned the soles of my feet black after an hour of wearing it on the first day. My clean feet looked really dirty after wearing these although I was just walking around on carpet at home.
These are perfectly comfortable, I have had these boots before, so I knew I could not go wrong and the price was within my budget. I wear a ladies 5.5-6 and the 4.5 big kids fit great!

I ordered a different model with the same brand for my daughter and the sizing wasn't even close. She had a 1.5 last year in the model that uses velcro so I ordered a 3 this year. They were smaller than the 1.5 last year. Her true foot size is a 3. Nothing bad with the quality of the shoe but the sizing needs some work. If you need to order this shoe, size up 1 to 2 sizes.

Update. I recently (8/2012) purchased a 3rd pair of Arroyo ll's from another vendor. The footbed in this (the Chocolate Brown/Woodrose) is very different from the previous two pairs I've owned. The heels of this pair is notably higher than the previous pairs I've owned. My heels get sore within an hour of putting them on.3/2012. This is the second pair of women's Arroyo II's I've owned. The Arroyo II seems to run a bit narrower than most other Keen shoes of this type which is just fine with me since my feet are narrow (2A). They are still a little wide for me even with medium weight socks, but I chinch them down tight. On the last pair of Arroyo II's I had, I added a second lace through the top two sets of loops so that I could tighten the heel more. It made all the difference on long walks on rough terrain. I will be doing the same on this pair as well. I also sometimes replace the footbed (inter-soles) if I'm wearing thiner socks. I always were socks with these shoes. Which brings me to my biggest problem with this shoe -- the accent color Sap Green. I would much prefer all neutral colors (browns, grays, blacks). Sap Green just does not go with many colors. This is an issue with me because I'd like to be able to wear this shoe everywhere (that a casual shoe would be acceptable) with my many colorful socks. My old, worn out Arroyo II's were brown with gray accents. Loved them. One additional observation--this is a rather heavy shoe at almost 13 oz per shoe.
speedy shipping, package arrived before estimated time of delivery.gladly do business with seller again any day of the week.

I bought these at the same time I bought a pair of Nike Basketball shoes.. both in size 12.5, I used the sizing guide on Eastbay to confirm the size I should buy. The Nike are a perfect fit, however these Adidas are way too small, and it is a very narrow shoe..The size is more like an 11 or 10.5, and the regular width is more like a narrow fit..Great looking shoe, very lightweight - just watch your sizing when you order this. I'd go at least a size larger, and a wide width if avaiable.
Do you have a Vans Old Skool Black White 7D(M) US ?Could you tell me on my e-mail?It's thiagomizuki@yahoo.com.br

I buy this shoe for swing dancing. It's a standard shoe in the Lindy Hop community. However, there are some drawbacks to it. It has adequate padding for every day walking, but not dancing, especially when jumps are included. Thus, many of us put insoles into them. However, doing so causes the shoe to fit incorrectly and your heel to slip out when using your regular size, and using the next size up causes the shoe to fit incorrectly in the toe as well.If you dance regularly, this shoe wears out in about a year or two.I put suede on one pair for slickness, but not on a second pair, which I wear on slick floors for more traction. Friends of mine have complained that the current productions of this shoe are slick on the toe and heel and sticky on the ball, giving the shoe an inconsistent slickness and causing unpredictable results on the dance floor.So for every day wear, great! For dancing, ok, but better than other non-dance-specific shoes.

My hiking involves work. As a UPS driver I step in and out of my truck about 180 times a day. On top of that I deliver a lot of apartments, up and down roughly 800-1000 steps a day. I hoped these boots would have been more comfortable based on other reviews. They do fit well and may be ok for a few hours but beyond that if you are on your feet all day I can't recommend.

I love my Uggs! I decided to get this particular style because everyone has the original style. I enjoy being different. I wear them with boot cut Levi jeans and they look great. I even wore them to a night club and I received so many compliments. They are very fashionable, if you live in NYC. They are very comfortable and warm as well. 90% of the time I wear them without socks. I wear a size 8 1/2 but I purchased a size 8 because they run a little big. They are worth the money and I can tell they hold up well in snow. Thanks Amazon and Uggs!

I'm a 27-year-old teacher with fibromyalgia and I hated that I had to enter an orthopedic shoe store, because I needed support and marshmallowy comfort to even consider leaving my home, so imagine my pleasure leaving the place with these! I adored this sandal so much, I bought it in 2 more colors (so now I have it in a mossy color, white, and bronze)! Its ankle-strap keeps me from going too far forward. The footbed is soooo comfy, yet supportive, and that, with its wide, soft leather straps, let me wear it on my worst, I-can't-stand-anything-touching-me days. Yet still, the way the foot-straps lie askew and a little further back from my toes, it doesn't look to old-woman-orthpedic-y. Even better, I wore one pair all day, every day, all summer and they're still almost like new.
wear them fall, winter, and spring. love these boots. I do use an innersole though.Great price from Amazon (the best I could find)
They fit great, our daughter thinks they rock. They are easily adjustable with the ties. You might want to double knot them. Great for the price!
Arrived in a timely manner. However the seller neglected to state that the sandals are narrow width. Luckily they fit me fine.
My elderly mother has bunions and hammers toes. She likes a little heel and these are perfect for her. This is the third pair she gets. These are also VERY durable.
I love this sneaker for my daugther, it goes with every outfit and is very easy to keep clean

These were wonderful quality, upkeep with just saddle soap. The color was a pleasant dark gray and goes with everything. I have many pairs of Birkenstock sandals and these fit the same as all the others. I have back problems and appreciate the great foot support of these sandals.

I ordered a different model with the same brand for my daughter and the sizing wasn't even close. She had a 1.5 last year in the model that uses velcro so I ordered a 3 this year. They were smaller than the 1.5 last year. Her true foot size is a 3. Nothing bad with the quality of the shoe but the sizing needs some work. If you need to order this shoe, size up 1 to 2 sizes.
I have worn these shoes for a while now and they are the most comfotable sandal I have ever owned. I am about to buy another pair. Oh, did I mention I have foot probems? Not with these sandals.
I can never get enough of Rainbow Sandals. I bought one for me and my boyfriend because it was about time to retire our old ones.
Very happy with the size and look of this item. Have ordered these many years for my husband and he always says they are very comfortable and his favorite shoes.
The shoes run large so order a half-size lower than normal. They just didn't fit right on my Mom, she was really disappointed. Usually Easy Spirit is more true to size.
This shoe is okay, but not quite as comfortable as my Medley style or the AP1 style.

My feet hurt. Not so much in these shoes. That's about all there is to say, other than to add that I'm rather heavy, which causes most shoes to give up and blow out way before their time, especially running shoes. I've found that these can take the pounding that a daily two-mile walk gives them, and a bit more. I do add a thin gel insole, for my heel spurs and other aches and pains, but I doubt that has any impact on the Omni Grid 5's durability, which is OK.The almost all-mesh uppers make these much more comfortable than most ath. shoes that are labeled specifically for walking. So, although it's a running shoe, it's a more supportive, durable one, and I prefer it to the "walking shoes" out there.

This shoe ran big and I needed a half size smaller and a D width rather than a wide. The ad states the shoe has a soft crepe type sole but it came with a hard synthetic sole. It was not very flexible and it's been my experience that if a shoe needs much 'breaking in', it won't be very comfortable.
Very comfortable. Much nicer then the last Keen I had.Love the black on black. The yellow looks great.Thanks

My favorite flip flop. Nicely contoured and cushioned footbed and quality leather uppers. Sole is durable and funky with the can opener attachment, although never got to use it (would have loved this in college though). My third pair. Replacing only because footbed material compresses after a few years and cushioning decreases. Sole and stitching still in good shape, even with heavy wear.Recommended.
It are an old shoes but the price its really amazing. You should buy it.

I purchased these to wear with my halloween costume. They look great but rub in several places so I am returning them. I tried walking around the house in them to test them out and it just won't work out without multiple bandaids and a gel insert for the instep. Pretty shoes. Wish I could wear them.

These boots seem to be very well made, and I have yet to slip on ice due to the super grippy soles. Of course, they look awesome.However, I bought the smallest size that Demonia makes (6), and they are too big all around. I'm generally a size 6, sometimes 5 1/2, but these feel closer to a 7 or 8 (I can't make my toes touch the end even if I try). Also, the boots stay up because they are stiff, but they are also loose on my calves and ankles. These are not designed for small and slender people.
As ever I am more than satisfied with my purchase from an Amazon vendor. I received my boots within a week of ordering.
Feel like I 40 yrs. younger. For a causal shoe for Santa these are Great. I really enjoy them feels great to be able to wear a really well made shoe. Thanks ConverseSANTA GARY
Very high quality slipper! The rubber sole is durable, and the lining is very warm. Perfect for cold feet after a long day.
Exactly what I was looking for. Quick with no hassles. Beats gas, time and crowds that are experienced when going to a brick and mortar store.
Muy buen producto. Lo que esperaba.Lo recibi a tiempo. Ahora mi hija esta contenta.Lo que recibi fue lo mismo que vi en la PC.

I have bought about 20 pair of these boots over the past 6 or 7 years. I usually buy them 2 pair at a time and wear one for work and one for good.Even when you buy them at the buy one get one half price in stores the price on here is by far cheaper than anywhere else.They are comfortable, waterproof, last a long time and are light weight.
I have wide feet and to top it off an annoying hammer toe. This is the second pair I ordered. Very comfortable.
This brand fits me very well, making it easy to order online which I have done more than a dozen times.
These shoes have always been my favorite standby for summer. They have been around for years and I always have a pair or two in my closet.

I have been wearing these boots for 5 years there the best work boots I've ever purchased. I also seal them with sno-seal which really makes them water proof, keeps feet warm and dry in slush and snow.

Great shoes for wet wading or just hanging in the river. However, even though they are self bailing, they are not safe for swimming. I've had these for about 2 yrs and used thim many times. Last weekend my kayak got swamped in a waterfall and while trying to swim out, these shoes just about made me a permanent fixture of the river. So don't use them for swimming, they do not allow you to kick well to swim and the added weight of them after being completely submerged is a killer...literally

I ordered this shoe directly from the Easy Spirit site. I ordered a medium width, and that is the marking the shoe is showing, but it is much too narrow for my foot, making it very uncomfortable. I made the mistake of not returning them, thinking that I could wear them and stretch them out: That didn't work. Guess I'll spend the money to take them to a shoe-shop to have them professionally stretched.
Most comfortable, longest lasting shoes I have ever owned. Very good value. I don't wear anything else.

I've had this shoe for about a year now. I find it to be very comfortable for about 8-12 hours a day. Anytime after that, my feet starts to throb. What I really love about this shoe is the arch support. With my flat feet this makes it really comfortable. If you can deal with the shoes almost but never slipping out of your feet than this shoe is a great buy. Beware, because these shoes are handmade each shoe fits differently and thus you may need to try different sizes to find your comfort level. As a reminder, they do stretch to accomodate the shape of your feet.I gave it 4 stars for the following reason: Lack of ankle support will make your ankles bend if you are rushing and not paying attention to how you are walking.
Bought as a Christmas gift for my son....he hasn't seen them yet but the overall service dealing with Amazon is always great & the shoes look pretty awesome, I think he will love them
I have a ridiculously thin foot 5A. I love these sandals. They are comfortable and durable. If you have thin feet, you really can wear these sandals.

I am very pleased with these boots. So much so, I bought two pair each of both the brown & black! I didn't experience any of the difficulties cited by a few other reviewers regarding unsteadiness, slippage, etc. I've had no problems. These boots look adorable on and can be dressed up or down. For this price, you can't beat them!
These are the ONLY shoes I've wanted this tear, and i found them here for the best price, after browsing the malls
The work like they are supposed to, keeping your feet nice and dry. I would recommend them to someone who is looking for inexpensive rain boots.

These shoes allow me to be comfortable while looking good as a medical professional. I appreciate the extra width, the sizing is accurate. I liked them so much, I ordered a second pair the day after I received my first. I'm very satisfied with the Prowalker by Rockport.

I purchased these on the basis the description stated they were waterproof. After 5 minutes walking in wet grass, my feet were soaking wet. On the other hand, these boots are extremely comfortable - when dry. If your looking for nice pair of hiking boots, under dry conditions, these are a great choice. Wet = 1 star, Dry = 5 stars, Overall = 3 stars.

In the ongoing quest for the perfect, small, Kindle sized bag, I ordered this bag thinking it would be the one. As a fulltime working mom, I need a bag that is strong and durable enough to handle my home life, and presentable enough to take to work. I also like a tiny to small bag as anything heavy is too much for my shoulders, and prefer crossbody as other bags slip off my shoulders. An added challenge recently is to find a bag that can fit my Kindle Fire and allow me to carry it comfortably (the Fire is quite heavy).The distressed nylon is a fantastic, durable fabric that (in black at least) looks both casual and office-worthy. The pockets in this bag are legendary, and the zippers work beautifully. The interior slip pocket (behind the zipper pocket) is just the right size for my Kindle in leather Roocase. This was a key feature for me as I don't want a bag where my kindle is flopping around or where it can lay flat and make a bag uncomfortable.The challenge with Ameribags is choosing the right size. Since I wanted the smallest bag possible, I ordered the Extra Small, but unfortunately the length doesn't work well for me crossbody. At 5'8" with this 15" bag, the length of it doesn't cross my back enough for a proper fit, particularly where the strap wraps at the side and across my chest. I worked fine on my shoulder, particuarly when carried the opposite way (with the bag at the front and strap at the back), but this isn't my preference for bags. I returned this and tried the FUL Ditty (also to be returned, see other review) and the Ameribag Distressed Nylon in Small and Large Baglett, both of which are keepers (see their reviews).If you're thinking about a Healthy Back Bag, you can't really go wrong with Amazon and their great return policy. If you're not going to carry it crossbody and/or are 5'4" or less, this bag might be perfect for you.

I have never worn a more comfortable shoe. The shoes help your posture and balance, with just the right support and heel height. They take so much strain off my calve muscles because of the heel height. They are the best.

The item came sooner than expected in excellant condition. I have purchased this shoe 3 times before so I knew I was getting a fine shoe at a decent price. Just be aware that the steele shank in this shoe will set off the metal detecter at the airport. No big deal just know you have to remove your shoes. Small price to pay for a comfortable shoe that has support as well. I have a bunion and the shoe comforms to my foot and feels great. Will definitely purchase again.

Greatest Most durable boots I've ever purchased. I'm actually very surprised with these for the price I paid. All comparable boots in local stores were easily twice the cost. I'd highly reccommend these boots to someone who wanted something long lasting.

I saw these at a local uniform store & they were too pricey for me. I did an online search and found them on amazon for 1/2 the price! They are very comfortable and so sharp looking! I expect these will stay cleaner being a dark color. I'm a nurse in Michigan and we are only allowed to wear navy and white. So happy to have found these shoes at a great deal!!

I've worn these VANELi dress flats for years and have them in several colors...and highly recommend them for both comfort and quality. They are expensive, so I always wait for sales. However, the last few times I've ordered these shoes on sale from this store on Amazon, the shoes have felt like they are at least a half a size too small. Sadly, I've had to return them.

Had my first pair for seven years. Most comfortable shoes/boots I've ever found. Just a little too worn to look nice. I'll use them around the yard. Paid even less for the new pair than I did seven years ago. Thanks Amazon!

My orginal order was too big, however the instructions on how to reorder and ship back so as to maintain the free shipping offer were very clear and concise. The new pair arrived very quickly and were exactly as expected.

This product is well made, durable, warm and comfortable when properly sized to fit. The product was delivered on time and met my expectations upon first perusal however once worn my views changed slightly. The slippers run large to size, the black dye stains my feet (so I have to wear socks) and the black sole leaves black skid marks on my hardwood floors. Other than that they are great.

This review is very deserving of 5 stars. My boyfriend needed a new pair of chucks for work that matched his uniform... we don't wear many other types of shoes.. Love chuck taylors! 5 stars for fast shipping, and low price. Thanks!

I got the shoes really quickly. They were very well priced. They arrived pretty quickly in the mail, although I wish they had arrived slightly quicker.
Excellent value for the dollar here. Fit well, look good and very comfortable to wear.

I have searched all over my area for a pair of royal blue cleats for my son but with absolutely no luck. Before he settled for a black pair like "everybody else had" I decided to check amazon and thank goodness I did! We were able to find exactly what he wanted and they arrived before his next tournament game!
I like them, however, the fit is a little big. The draw back is they only come in whole sizes and I find they run wide also.

I typically wear a size 12D when it comes to sneakers and Sperry Original boat shoes. Stores in my area didn't have this particular model for sale, so I tried on Sperry Billfish for reference, as they are the closest to the Mako as I could find. Size 11D in the Billfish fit me perfectly, so I ordered the Mako in 11D. They are actually a little big, even when wearing thin socks (I can fit about my pinky finger between the back of my heel and the heel of the shoe). They're not too big to the point where I think it will cause too much discomfort in everyday use, but definitely the sizing seems to be a little inconsistent with Sperry. Sizing seems to be inconsistent with boat shoes in general as I wear a 10D in Timberland Earthkeepers. Other than the sizing, the quality of the shoe and materials is great, and the shoe feels of very high quality.

Most important is that the Stephanie pump is comfortable. It's true to size and still available in narrow (AA) widths. I'd like to be able to get (AAA). The colors are Black, white, taupe, Navy, and bronze.

to grip the ground very good, soft skin, hit the ball very stable. Only size is not competable with USA. According to Nike my shoes size is 9 but shoes size of Adidas is 8. It is so difficult for me when I give online order. This shoes is strongly recomended...

I bought this shoe in August of last year. I have worn them for about 300 hours, most of that time spent standing and walking, and walked many miles in them in all weather and all kinds of pavement. I guess the wear I put on them might be a little above average. I love the fact that a $70 dollar pair of shoes is of such high quality, has a leather sole, and looks so good. My only complaint is that after a year of wear, the soles, especially the heels, are wearing very thin. The leather heel is very soft, and wears down to the wood very quickly, which looks a little ratty now. It's not too bad, and if I find a cobbler I'm sure I can get that taken care of, but it is an annoyance. I highly recommend these shoes, but don't expect the soles to last more than a few months of intense wear.

I bought these a while back, and have to tell you these are my favorite go-to sandals. Very comfy and good padding for lots of walking. Will buy more of this style, in other colors, come spring. They run true to size and width.

I am a huge Teva fan and have about 4 pairs in the original thong style. I wanted something a little more strappy and decided to give these a try since I already really enjoy Teva sandals. These did not disappoint. I have a wide foot so the straps need to be stretched out a bit so it took a few wears until they fit my feet better. After that they were perfect. I live in the city so I do a lot of walking and wanted something that wouldn't give me a ton of blisters. These worked well and have such a thick sole that there is no way these can't be comfortable for a days walk. Would recommend to anyone who does a lot of walking and wants I slightly nicer, very comfortable flip flop.

I realize dance slippers run small, so I ordered my niece an ENTIRE size up from her normal. Still way too small. I would seriously recommend you order a size, maybe even two sizes up from what your little one normally wears..

I ordered a size 7 and a 1/2 and they fit perfect. That is my usual size in a shoe. I like how the heel is wide so it is easy to balance. They are plain but I wanted a shoe that could go with a lot in my wardrobe. I wear eyecatching tops so the focus is not on my shoes. I would recommend them.

They need to note on this listing that in Capezio world woman's size 3 is a child's size 1. So if you buy your kid with size 3 feet a size 3, you are going to get a shoe that is way too small! It's very irritating, cause at this age/size, you can't buy from the listing that have child sizes anymore. Otherwise the shoes look very nice. You do have to start sewing on the elastic now - not like the Daisy's that come with it presewed. Just do the math and make sure you get the right size.

These shoes look adorable, but they're inexpensive and it shows. I bought mine in white patent and I'm satisfied considering the price. I think I'll be wearing them on Halloween or other special occasions that call for fun dress up. They're not hard to walk in, the heel is high but it's stable and the platform is high enough so that it's pretty easy if you're used to walking in heels at all. I wear a size 9 reliably but I've bought Pleaser shoes before and they run small so I ordered a 10. My feet were swimming in them. I returned them (thanks for making it so easy Amazon!) and ordered my 9 and they're a little tight in the toes, but not bad. Overall great dress up fun, but the quality is not great.
This is the third pair of these shoes I have bought. All different colors. They are great to wear in the office in the summer.
Good ppl had a problem with my tracking number so i emailed them and with great responce my questions were answered..
These shoes are one of a very few I have been able to wear all day without a break-in period.

The shipping was quick (arrival to my home in about 3 business days) with standard shipping and the product was exactly as described. My only real qualm with this shoe, which was the first K-Swiss shoe of this style I've ever purchased, was that the heel cuff on the back took a little while to break in. This being the case, I ended up suffering a very tiny blister on the upper part of my heel from the first few days in these shoes. Of course, this may just be my foot measurement or a flaw in the manufacturing and is certainly not a reflection of the seller here on Amazon.Thanks!

As a soccer player I have been wearing Sambas for over 20 years. The quality and foot support of this sneaker is undeniable and the product itself has maintained it's status as a 'goto' sneaker for soccer players. You see these shoes everywhere (often times the black version). When you combine the build of the shoe with a very reasonable price tag it is not surprising that Sambas are still as popular as they ever were.If you are used to a running shoe the wear might feel a little different as I feel like the Sambas give you a 'flatter' wear in the sole. They aren't as springy as a running shoe. This is just a matter of preference. They still offer great arch and foot support.I would definitely recommend Sambas to anyone looking for a casual everyday sneaker or someone who plays indoor soccer.

Comfortable shoe, modern styling. I bought the black/black style, which I think would work well with jeans or black khakis, though not dress slacks. It's definitely a casual shoe. My shoes are marked under the tongue "Made in China, leather upper, balance man-made materials". Although these uppers are supposed to be leather, with the rest made of synthetic materials, there is an overpowering plastic smell and I don't smell any leather.

These are definitely cushy, but the arch support is not as good as advertised. It feels more like a little pebble under the arch of your foot than a full arch support. Also, they seem to be a little narrow for a regular width - I don't know if it is just that the straps are tighter than what I'm used to, or really are narrow. Bottom line, they are not as comfortable as my Crocs flip-flops.

Had my first pair for seven years. Most comfortable shoes/boots I've ever found. Just a little too worn to look nice. I'll use them around the yard. Paid even less for the new pair than I did seven years ago. Thanks Amazon!
Bought for son, who loved the comfort. Within a few months, inner sole began peeling and the tongue has come almost completely off.

Been wearing these for a bit now and thought I'd write a review...These boots are quite comfortable, and I don't say that lightly. I have been wearing boots of some kind since I was 12 and while in the US Army, and these are one of the most comfortable I have tried yet. They fit well and feel very durable. The oiled leather has a great feel to it that simply says quality. I have no doubt that with proper maintenance they will last a good long time. All of that said my only gripe, and the reason I gave them four stars is that, as mentioned by another review, the shafts are quite narrow. My feet are not huge at 9.5D but these are difficult to get on, and downright hard to get off. Almost to the point of needing help to get them off, but I personally don't mind a tighter fit. I wear a medium padding merino wool blend hiking sock with them. It makes these boots quite comfortable, but it nearly pulls the sock off when taking them off. Would I suggest them to a friend? Yes. Will I buy another pair when and if these wear out? Yes. Are they right for you? Not a clue.

These flip flops are SO comfortable! When I walk it really feels like I am walking on a sponge or cloud or something really soft. I also have really high arches and I can walk around all day in these and my feet feel great.I am a woman and bought these shoes because after having my twins my feet have gotten wider so all of my women flip flops were too narrow. I actually think these shoes run small in the lenght, probably 1 size small in my opinion. I had read some reviews elsewhere about them running small so I orderd a mens size 8 which is a womens size 10 and they fit me perfectly. I in no way wear a size 10 in womens shoes, I wear an 8 1/2(womens) sometimes a 9. They also aren't too wide, I tried on some other mens flip flops in the store and they were really wide on my foot and looked manly. These don't look girly at all but they are plain enough that they can work just fine for a man or women.As another reviewer mentioned, the straps do feel a little tight at first but losen up when you wear them, they aren't uncomfortable at all though, first time I wore them they were still really comfy. I have the chocolate and black color and love both of them.
I ordered a different pair before they were really tight. But This brand comes in a wide and makes dancing more comfortable.

I love this boot. I rarely order shoes over the internet, but these caught my eye. They look good and they feel wonderful. I wore them all day and my feet were not uncomfortable. They keep my feet warm in snow and cold weather. I am so happy I bought these boots.

I absolutely love theses boots! I haven't stopped wearing them since I received them a few weeks ago. They fit well and are very comfortable after breaking them in a little. My only complaint is that they squeak quite a bit when walking.

I ordered these shoes but were too narrow. Sent back for an XW. Received new pair very quickly from The Denim Shop. We are very pleased with the quality and fit of the shoes. Will shop at The Denim Shop again.

I've had these for about 2 years now and I love them. Sperry's are comfy and go with everything. I wear them most everyday and I don't even think about it. I had the classic sahara color for a long time and decided to go a little more riske. Well this color is nearly as traditional and the contrast sole is a great look. They match with everything, and arguably with more than my sahara sperry's that look a little too similar to khaki color pants. Love them

I ordered an 8-1/2 and rec'd an 8 so I had to return them ~ I decided after seeing them that they were toooo flat and the company gave me a refund with no problem ~ They even refunded my shipping and handling....

I love these shoes. They are comfortable and I was looking for something I could simply slip on when running into town. HOwever, I would recommend buying a half a size, or even one size up. They are "tight". The back of your foot just just fits inside the shoe. I'm a size ten (10).Otherwise, great little shoe.

I got these boots as a birthday gift for my husband who sometimes experiences foot pain even in his sneakers. They did not disappoint and he likes them very much as they are comfortable and give a good arch support. They are casual enough to wear with jeans but look good enough for church too. They have taken him from Michigan to Florida a couple of times without trouble and a cinch to remove at the airport. A good buy and worth the few extra bucks.

The Dockers Men's Gordon Cap Toe Oxford, Cordovan color is an excellent shoe, very stylish, great color but unfortunately was too narrow. Regretted having to return the shoes, but there wasn't really any alternative.
I loved the looks of these... until i put them on my feet.The plastic was too stiff and they weren't comfortable at all.I returned them.

My teenager loves these Chuck Taylor's and he is so happy that he received them for his Christmas present.He says they are very comfortable and they look good with his skinny jeans too!Also a great price too.

I've worn the classic Top-Sider's for 25 years. The local retailers want to push the higher priced versions that i have tried and do not like. They tell me that I need to move beyond them ... no thanks, i love this classic shoe!
i purchased these for my lady and she says they fit good and are very comfy,,
The shoe was exactly what I was looking for and the price was better than on Keds own web site.

My [...] daughter has a narrow foot and it is hard to find a good fitting athletic shoe for her. But this is the second time she has had this Stride Rite, and it is a perfect fit! We will buy a third time if it is still available.Suzanne,Tacoma, WA
They are not only made well but comfortable and durable. Timberland makes a good product and they last (my last pair must have been 10yrs +). Throw in a good price and you can't loose.
i have owned at least 6 pairs of this shoe over the past 20 years
These arrived quickly fit great and are very comfortable. I bought these for general use during colder months to replace sneakers.
My son wanted either red or green Chuck Taylors which are fairly difficult to find. The shoes I bought arrived quickly, were good quality, and were priced very reasonably.

This product was purchased for my mother-in-law who has poor circulation in her feet and has to be very careful to have shoes that do not constrict the blood flow or cause any blisters or sores. These shoes have been great for her. She has them in several colors.

Eastland Newports are good strong leather shoes. I am a teacher and I walk around my classroom a lot during any given day. My Eastland Newports are very comfortable and roomy; therefore, my feet don't hurt at the end of the day! The wide width, coupled with the fact they go with almost any pant outfit from khakis to jeans, make the Eastland Newports my choice of casual shoe!
These shoes are great,they can be worn down with jeans and a tee or worn with nice dress clothes.I'm getting the ones in pink.Get these shoes if considering.Very comfy also[Holla Back]

Crocs are great, very comfortable, easy to clean, fast on and off. Great for poolside or just hanging around the house. I personally wouldn't wear them out but now I have a pair, I've seen them on nurses, office workers and educators.
The shoes arrived very quickly and the correct size. They are very comfortable despite being taller of a heel than I expected.
Bought as a replacement for kid brother. Item as describe! Size is true and recommended for teens since shoe does not go out of style.

I have owned a lot of boots in my lifetime, trying different brands to find a fit and quality that matched the expense. I've found comfortable shoes that lacked support (Dr. Marten's 8287s), supportive and durable, but on the tight side (Caterpillar Alaska FX) and had mixed results with Durham, Propet, Wolverine, Sebago, New Balance, Lugz, Worx, Carolina, Eastland, Stacy Adams/ SAO and other brands. There have been some great feeling shoes that looked and functioned more like tennis shoes as far as materials and styling, but I've been hard pressed to find legit work boots with a soft toe, accurate true to size measurements, comfort out the box, and support. We'll see how the sole holds up since it's got tons of cushion and at best a 1/4" of rubber tred, but so far they are a dream to move in. The last in the boot shifts your foot onto you toes and has a high instep with the heel ( at least for a flatfooted guy like me who can't slip a piece of paper under his arches), so it put more weight on my bad ankle (ruptured tendon 2 years ago) than I would like but for it to be on my toes i feel good. This is especially important given i had reconstructive surgery on both feet 21 years ago where they broke 6 of my toes. The surgery was a flop and my toes are hammered with 0 range of movement in the joints, offering minimal support and weight displacement so the lion' share of my weight resides on the balls of my feet if i am walking properly, forefoot striking first. This can get very painful if I'm in bad shoes, as can the impact of those strikes on the tips of my toes since they curve into the sole, rather than the pads of my toes, like normal people. None of this has been an issue in these boots. I feel like i could run a track meet in them , that's how much spring they've put in my step!UPDATE: I was going downstairs a few months back and missed the last two steps and came down HARD on my left ankle, in which I ruptured a tendon. I felt gravity take hold and just KNEW I was going to wreck my ankle something fierce with all my weight coming down on it with added velocity. Well, HALLELUJAH for Thorogood cause I swear my boots went "Boing!!!" The amount of Cushioning in the heel (that entire gray area you see in the picture is foam, it's not EVA I think, which is fine because it's better!) absorbed the impact so well I was shocked. I have a pair of Nike Shox and They don't even offer that level of shock absorption and weight displacement. Absolutely Phenomenal. All this and they have offered enough support that my lateral movement while moving large/ heavy objects hasn't aggravated my ankle, though I have to double-knot the laces as they do tend to slip and come loose.But yes, these are the best boots I have ever owned. Just keep a little boot oil handy to touch up scuffs (I use Dr. Marten's, which doesn't augment the color of the finish, so long as you don't transfer color from one pair of boots to another via using the same sponge on dissimilarity colored boots) , and use Armor All Leather whips to clean them and you'll be good to go.
I ordered these for my daughter for christmas she loved themshe has been wearing them everyday even when we have had 70 degree weatherthank you

I really like these! They are super comfortable and move nicely. However, sizing information is super confusing. The size chart is confusing so I looked to reviews for help. They were even more confusing. I ended up buying my street shoe size, and they are just a little too big. I probably could've gotten away with a 5 1/2 (I wear a 6). But other than that they are great!
Being a Santa these shoes ar GREAT! They take me back to my childhood and what I do now. How fun. I get so many complaments.Thanks so much for making such a great product.
The shoes were not the size that I thought I was ordering. I wanted a women's size. These will be sent back.

From the first time I saw these shoes I knew I had to have them. They are very stylish, go great with jeans, and are extremely comfortable. Also didn't hurt that I was able to get them for about $35 less at Amazon than anywhere else was selling them for if they even had them. My new favorite pair of shoes.
A wonderful boat shoe. A great fit, support and stylish. Wish I could have bought more in any color available.

I have these shoes in brown. I have been complimented several times on these shoes, and they match everything. I don't dress for comfort, but these are pretty comfortable. The only problem is that they look old quickly.
I desperately needed a blue flat when I bought this shoe. It's very comfortable and durable, but I'm not thrilled with the design.

I REALLY LIKE THE LOOKS AND COMFORT OF THESE SHOES . HOWEVER , THEY ARE IMPROPERLY SIZED . I WEAR A 12D AND THIS SHOE IS ABOT 1/2 TO 1 SIZE LARGER THAN A 12 . WHEN PLACED HEEL TO TOE WITH ANY SHOE THAT I OWN , THEY ARE MUCH LONGER . A FRIEND MADE A COMMENT ON THER LENGTH .

These slippers were ok, but definitely run wide. In street shoes I wear a 10 or 10.5 and I often size up to an 11 in loafers or ballet flats to accomodate my slightly wide feet. I ordered a 10W since these slippers are not offered in an 11, and they were loose even with the drawstring completely tightened. I ended up exchanging for a pair of Blochs, which come in longer lengths.
These shoes are very pretty but they do not run true to size. I ordered 1/2 size larger to wear with thicker trouser socks. The shoe literally slipped of my foot.

Have been wanting a pair or Frye harness boots forever, just recently found out they made them in wide sizes. They fit pretty true to size, have decent arch support, and feel like armor on your feet. The leather is heavy and can be a little warm in the summer. My only real complaint is that the toe is REALLY squared off. Almost unfashionable. Still, all in all, very good boots made in America.

I'm really an 11.5 (US)so perhaps this is a little unfair... I ordered Size 12M and it is was way too wide and a little too roomy at the front. However the quality is pretty good and it's quite an attractive shoe so I've inserted insoles and I'm good to go!!!

This is the second one of these that we purchased. I like the heated option, it makes all the difference when you need to dry boots or shoes quickly. The problem that we experienced was with the knob on the product, it was poorly constructed and broke prematurely.

I have used these boots everyday for about a year, and put them through the paces for sure. I Have owned many pairs of hiking boots in this price range.So we'll start with those perty green laces, throw them out as soon as you get them. They wont keep tied, and will very quickly break. I think mine lasted almost a month, and during that time I would have to be constantly reminded that my shoes were untied...they were an annoyance to say the least, complete garbage if you really want to know. The cuff on the ankle is about a half inch too low and does not fully support the ankle. The leather is 1 piece, and have kept my feet very dry. The leather is also too soft, they again don't give any ankle support. I work a job that requires I have 100lbs+ on my back in remote mountain locations. These boots will offer NO support for sprains.The plus side is that they break-in almost immediatly, week-week and a half, and they wont cause blisters during that time. The boot is also very comfortable. The Goretex lining really helps with drying the boot after tromping through mud and swampy trails. The eyelits and hooks are very burly. ALL of my other boots have had the eyelits pop out, leaving pencil diamater holes in them. The sole is good, I walk up wet slippery bedrock without any concern. They still have about 25% tread left.So here's the deal, If you are planning on wearing these boots every once and a while and only taking day hikes with small weight on your back, If your into "urban" fashion then these boots will be fine. But If you require a little more ankle protection, If you want a boot that will last, I have to reccommend you buy LIMMER boots. They are made in the US, they have an unlimited lifetime warranty I.E will literally last forever, and they cost about the same. The down side is that they are much stiffer, meaning you have to suffer a very brutal break-in period, and they have to be worn fairly regulary to maintain that break-in. So if you think these boots have a tough break in two suggestions don't buy this boot, and grow a pair, Danners are practiclly slippers.I also have a big concern with the Danner Website who directly controls what reviews are posted and ultimatly seen by their prospective buyers. Meaning that they don't want people to know the actual quality of their boot, they just want people to buy them. I feel duped into buying these after having read all of the glowing reviews on their site. These boots are NOT as good as you might imagine from reading the reviews, don't be fooled. Today I went to post on their review page and my review was rejected. It was a 3 star review! Very disapointed with the company's attitude towards its customers.
I wore the new sandals to New Orleans, did lots of walking and the shoes proved to be very comfortable.
I think these are great shoes. They've held up well and my toddler is constantly on the move. Also, they are easy to wipe off which is a plus.

I suffer from severe swelling of my legs and feet and ordered these slippers and paid a huge premium to have them delivered on a Sunday. Not only did they not deliver them the next day, they didn't refund any of the shipping costs and waited almost a week to ship them with it taking several more days in transit. The item didn't fit so at great difficulty and pain to get to the post office to return them. Because I used Amazon's method to return the item I have no record that the item was returned. So I don't have the mechandise, I'm out of pockect for the purchase price and the huge fee for sending the item next day.I'll tell you one thing - if I ever have to return something to Amazon again I am NOT going to use the Amazon Return Authorization paperwork. It's sad that the only recourse I have is to warn others about this vendor. But I mostly hold Amazon.com responsible for the entire problem.Sure the cost to return the item was free but who cares when I am now $56 out of pocket for an item that sells for $38.95. Sad part is that this item was fulfilled by Amazon LLC.

The shoes do run small so I ordered one size up based on previous reviews. My feet are wide at the toes so I stretched them overnight and now they fit and feel great. My feet hurt after 12 hr nursing shifts with special shoes, but I can square dance in these for hours and feel fine. Almost wish I could wear them to work!

I have flexible flat feet and tend to pronate. While this shoe is not as good as Brooks Addiction, it is lighter and moves more easily. I only wish I had known it was available in narrow width. I expect that would have made it an even better fit and more help with my pronation problem. It does accept my custom orthotics. I ordered a pair for my mother as well as myself and she loves hers. She has serious mobility problems but these shoes in her narrow width and size 10 make walking much more stable and safe for her. We will certainly order them again. They look good too!
A great shoe with a classic look. These are nicer for wet days than the canvas and are lasting longer. They look great & are well made.
This is a great sandal except it runs 1 size too big. I am a size 8, and ordered a size 8, but it's about an inch too long. I would have needed a size 7 I guess.

I bought two pairs of Adidas cleats. This was one of the pairs.I purchased them thinking of the comfort they seemed to provide based on the photo. And yes, they're very comfortable, it's like wearing a regular sneaker, but alas, after 20 minutes of sprinting on the field my legs really began to burn, the weight these cleats have is at least twice that of a regular mid cleat.I'd rather wear some worn down pairs I have at home that these, the unnecessary added strain on my legs is just too much.
These are an excellent quality and comfortable work boot. I spend 9-12 hours a day wearing these and have never found them uncomfortable. They are by far the most comfortable work boot Ive worn.

These shoes are the most comfortable shoe I've owned. I have bone spurs in my heels, plantar fasciitis, and am overweight, and these shoes make me feel lighter and without so much pain, like I am wearing comfortable slippers, except with support. I will definitely buy more.
Ordered the shoes and they were too small. Sent them back and they were replaced in time for me to play in our next golf event.Thanks guys!

I love this product and I received it in a very timely manner. I have absolutely no complaints except maybe it's my fault I got white keds because now they are pretty dirty haha but I knew that would happen. I recommend everyone get a pair of shoes like these! And from this site. Just wish there was free shipping...
Girlfriend loved them. Price was better then local area stores. She has other colors of the same shoe so they last a lifetime.

These shoes are great. Probably the most comfortable shoe I've ever had. These shoes make me want to stop wearing Vans because of how durable and comfortable they are. Style of the shoe is awesome. If you're looking for a shoe with a "fat" tongue then these are the shoes for you. Would definitely buy another pair or a pair just like them. You don't have to be a skateboarder to get these. I don't really trick skate anymore, but I've always been a fan of the Accel. The all black Accel is so cool and fashionable, which means they go with any style of clothing, any color, and so on. Umm, just all around great buy. FIT TRUE TO SIZE. Recommend getting them in your most common shoe size if you like them snug and want the shape to stay the same after months of wearing them. If don't care about the shape, then get a half size bigger. Either way the size will still be very comfortable.

I ordered these boots overnight. They arrived faster than I expected and work better than I expected. They are very comfortable and don't get to hot. I am really hard on shoes and go through them fast but these are holding up very well. I would recommend these boots for anyone that needs durable work boots.
only worn twice but seems decent quality for price, tongue is set low so wont be waterproof past halfway point and size seems pretty accuratehard bare inside so should use an insert

I find this pair of Reebok running shoes to be of excellent quality. They are very comfortable and cushion the shock of walking. I am past the running age, so I need a good foundation and arch support. The price was right also. Reebok is the best name in sport shoes in my estimation. Thank you. I hope this helps.
Beautiful leather and a lot of class for the money. Very comfortable to wear all day. Love these shoes. No need to speak further!
I would be very greatful if u can let me know if the white chucks is one size bigger then nornal sizing cause I didnt see the remarks like on the black ones.Thanks

This was my first purchase of Dansko shoes, after glowing reviews from coworkers. I got sized in a local store, but couldn't pass up the discounts on Amazon. Problem is, each shoe is handmade, so sizing is very inconsistent. I've also heard from multiple sources that Dansko as a brand has slipped in quality control now that they've shipped production to China. The pair I got had size 39 on the packing slip, outside of the box, and stamped into the sole of the shoe. However, the imprinting inside the shoe said it was a 38. I'm not sure what size they were meant to be, but they were much too small. Amazon was great with getting me a replacement quickly. Unfortunately, the second pair was not much better. This pair was a 39 by all written accounts, but the left shoe was considerably smaller than the right shoe. I know most people have one foot that is slightly larger than the other, but I've never had this problem with any other shoes. I'm not sure if this has to do with the shoes being handmade, but I'd definitely call this a mismatched pair. So I've had to return both pairs. Very please with how Amazon customer service handled the issue, but I think I'll have to try to find this product someplace locally to purchase in-person.
This is my third color in the levee flat- fits true to size-and it looks as good dressed up or down.

The shoes arrived quickly and as described. They are very comfortable& a quality product. They do tend to run a half size small so if you order them get them a half size larger. Beautiful craftmanship.

I ordered these and they were too big which I should've known. I almost didn't return them because I liked them so much. But I did and the return process was so easy. I will definitely order from this vendor again. Hopefully the right size this time!
It is pretty good in general but the colour in definitely not pink. It is like skin colour so it didn't match the Leotard and the skirt which I ordered for my little child from Capezio also.
Worn keds my whole life. Still love them. This is my daughters second pair of black. Think it's so cool that as a teenager she wears them.

I bought a pair of these flips for regular pool deck use after a cheaper, Chinese flop flapped off and nearly broke my neck on a wet pool deck.They are absolutely terrific, albeit purchased (in my case) from a less costly closeout rack.Still, I am glad to have them, and recommend them highly.
My new keds are so awesome! They look exactly like the picture. I am so happy that I got these. They are comfy and stylish, and when they wear out, I will buy from amazon!

I bought these pointe shoes for my daughter who is studying to become a professional ballerina. I love these converse so much. They run about 1/2 size too big, which is fine for me, but overall these are my favorite pair of shoes that I own.

I saw this TSUBO shoes while travelling in Asia a year ago. Very cute my husband is 67 but he still loves his converse allstars! Thanks!! Every thing is up to loving!

Beautiful comfortable shoes. I walk three miles to work every day and teach all day long, so I'm literally standing for 8 hours a day. These shoes are classy and offer excellent arch support. This is my fourth pair of Sperry's, and definitely not my last. (They shipped quickly, too.)

I have a pair of UGGS that are over 16 years old. They were made in New Zealand and of higher quality. Now UGGS are made in China and it shows/feels. After verifying authenticity and trying on my boots...they feel so flimsy, but what can one do?My old pair finally started to wear out on the inside behind the heel. They are still ok with a double pair of socks, but I wanted a taller pair of boots. The toes on my old boots are reinforced with another strip of suede. It feels really strange putting on my new ones as they don't have that reinforcement and feels like it will wear out over time in the toes.Hopefully I will be proved wrong.
This is a nearly perfect shoe. It fits well, is comfortable, and can be worn with many different colors. I would love to have more in additional colors.

We were eager to kind a pair of kids wrestling shoes for our son who needed them for his first tournament.We called around to find the most cost effective pair considering that he would outgrow them before next season. We found what we were looking for within Amazon.The order process was simple and the confirmation and tracking emails were easy to use. We were most impressed when the shoes arrived ahead of schedule. The external packaging was secure and inside the shoes arrived within the original factory box.The quality of the product is excellent and we will use this shopping option in the future.

My first pair of ECCO shoes were the Track IIs. I wore them almost every day, they were the most comfortable shoes I had. The sole did come apart after 3 or 4 years. They are expensive, but they lasted a long time. I've now got 3 other pair of ECCO shoes, I love that the sizing is very consistent and they are all comfortable and look good.I recently found that www.nushoe.com can resole, repair stiching and refinish ECCO shoes. I still had my old Track II's in the bottom of a closet and sent them in. Looking forward to getting them back. The resoled shoe is a vibram rubber sole, not the poly original sole. So we'll see how that works. They claim they will have the same comfort as the original.
These are the most comfortable timberlands my husband has ever had....He loves and wants another pair for work he said its worth it!!

The Puma Men's Roma Shoe is simple but classy, yet good for everyday use. A great selection of colors assures that you'll find a pair just right to fit your personality and wardrobe. They kind of hurt my feet. Maybe I have the wrong size. They're cute though !
It's very good product. It's not too confortable like the other brands. So, if you spent a little more bucks, you can buy one better product.

He said that the shoes fit - to that means that Amazon was right in the sizing. He liked them a lot - he said that they were comfy and light.Thank you - from me - Amazon for the comfortable price of $29.00. Very nice!And He says thank you - To Amazon for coming through with this miricle shoe.
My husband is so pleased with these boots. He loves timberland and we were so lucky they had his size. Absolute great buy.

I used these for my wedding.I wore them for about 4 hours and they were comfortable until the end, they started to hurt a bit. But definitely good for several hours! I added a gel pad prior to the wedding, because due to the height the ball of the foot can tend to hurt. Also, these shoes tend to run narrow, so buy a larger size than your average size. The bottom of the heel and the front part of the foot are very flat. I didn't try to dance in these because of the height. Overall they add the needed height, and are very secure (unlike the average "stripper" shoe). One bad thing about these shoes are they tend to scuff easily. This won't be noticed by everyone else, but you may notice the scuffs yourself.
these boots a great just gotta break them in. which will take me prolly a good week of wearing. got a good deal too. about 2 days after i placed my ordered they went up like $20!
I love my boots I wear them almost everyday,I received my boots within a matter of days alot sooner than expected.

I would truly recommend this pair of shoes. Its soft suede leather and crepe sole gives me real comfort when I'm wearing them. They have a wide range of colors to choose from to complement whatever jeans you're wearing. Because i like them so much, I'm planning to buy another pair soon.
Please get some more sizes in. I need to buy a few new pairs! These are the best shoe on earth!

This is the most comfortable sandal I have ever worn. I bought a second pair for wearing outside because I use the first pair as slippers. The insole is like walking on a cloud, a dry cloud. The front straps are adjustable. The fit is true. I can wear them all day long. I have had shoes and sandals that gave me blisters on my bunions or corns on my toes. Not these. I have been a huge fan of the 760 series, starting with the 762, and all the way up. These are the best yet. Perfect support, and extreme comfort. They work with you to get great workouts. Buy them while they still have your size!

These Birkenstock Birkoflor Arizona Sandals are exactly what I have come to expect from Birkenstocks. They are uncommonly comfortable. This is my third pair of Arizona sandals over the past thirty years. I wear them constantly, and they remain comfortable and incredibly durable, and you can send them to Birkenstock and have them "rebuilt" when they begin to wear out - and it takes them a very long time to become worn out. My last two pairs of Arizona sandals have been Birkiflor rather than leather. It's a personal preference to avoid leather. Buy Birkenstock products with complete confidence.
I always have several pairs of these shoes in my house -- ordering and receiving them online through Amazon was easy. I recommend both the shoe and the process.

Hello, These boots aren't perfect, but for $100 bucks they're not bad. The red boots are dark red and a brighter red on the inside so if you turn them down the colors don't match. My girlfriend takes size 8 1/2 shoes usually, sometimes she gets a size 9 in tall heels and they fit well. These boots only come in whole sizes so we naturally chose size 9. They were just a little too big. In the description it says 27" up from the arch is 17" around, this is not true. The boots are 27" up from the arch, but it's 19" around at the top. My girlfriend's calves are 12 3/4 and her thighs at that height are 17" so I thought they would be just right, but they are just a little loose. I think an 8 would be too small. So if your calves and thighs are an inch or so more than the size I've listed here and you take a regular size 9, then the 9's will fit you perfect. The ties in the back can be made looser but not tighter than 19" around. It would've been nice if you could tighten them but you can't. And there is very little arch support, which makes her walk on the balls of her feet. (she has other equally tall shoes that don't do that)Having said that. They are VERY sexy. She has no intention of wearing them out. She said they make her feel naughty sexy, and she easily slips into that persona when wearing them. I bought some red micro g-string panties and a short red skirt...absolutely WOW..A little loose or not, these boots are NOT going back.don't just say they were too tight. tell us the size you bought and the measurements of your legs. Too big or too small doesn't tell us anything.The quality isn't very high, and the size is a little hit or miss, but to me,..they're worth every penny.
I ordered the wrong size and they where returned and new size sent without any delay. Thanks for the good service

These are perfect Pirate boots, along with the added bonus of being cute enought to wear as regular foot wear. The only down side is they are a little difficult putting on. I had some trouble getting my foor & heel past the ankle area. Oh and you'll need a hand pulling them off. Since they are so long you can't rest your leg on your knee to pull them off because then you're holding the boot in place. On the whole, I love these boots and can totally see my boyfriend really enjoying helping me out of them. *winks*

I have had 4 pairs of these shoes.They are very comfortable.These are true topsiders... they grip the deck.They look more stylish than traditional topsiders.There is one problem; I bought a pair of the 2-tone tremonts... the dye bled into my socks badly!
I really like the way the Kasey clogs look. They are perfect for a dressy casual look.

The shoe is light and very comfortable.It also has a sporty look.Although much of the sporty elastic gets hidden if you wear your jeans and then it looks like an ordinary shoe.But I like the comfort fit and light weight.

I love these shoes. I work in a place that has a professional dress code and I can't wear sneakers or shower type shoes. Recently my company instituted a fitness/walking program of 10,000 steps a day. The floors in my building are hard stone/granite and can be slippery when the humidity is high, so I needed a shoe with a rubber sole, looked professional and gave support and comfort... this shoe fit the ticket. The shoes are comfortable, very lightweight, well constructed and good value for my money. I would recommend them to anyone who walks or are on their feet a large percentage of the day.I'm thinking of getting another pair in an alternative color. I have seen these shoes in various mail order catalogs for about $10.00 more than from Amazon (and the vendor).
Awesome shoes! They're the classic lo top in a modern color. Fit great, feel great, and goes with most outfits.

They are affordable, easy to use and I like the color (I chose Glow). They are easy to slip on and off when walking indoors. Very useful on snow and snow covered ice. However, I didn't feel that they offered enough traction on thick, solid sheets of ice.

The shoe is a dark brown color; not a dark tan as depicted in the photo. I have been wearing these shoes for several years and this is the first time I bought them on line. It is not the color I was expecting. However, I will keep them anyway.

great price, good shoe, just a teeny bit tight, but maybe that's me (I've had other pairs that fit like silk), but I like it and think it's a great value.

Good fit and great for softball if you don't like wearing full cleats. Very light and comfortable, except for the staple that protruded on the inside. Easily removed though, but a design flaw none the less.

I'd ordered these boots based on decent reviews and price. I rarely return purchases to Amazon but I did return these. The boots were fairly heavy, stiff and narrow. I returned them and bought Adidas boots with Gore Tex uppers which were much more comfortable, flexible and light with good sole traction.
Good ppl had a problem with my tracking number so i emailed them and with great responce my questions were answered..

Fit is true to size. Was a bit leary ordering, arches are usually an issue. I am on my feet at least 10hrs a day and have no aches or pains related to wearing these shoes. Toe is just wide and round enough to be comfortable without looking odd or big.
These are very pretty to look at but when I wore them they I didn't like the way they looked on me so I gave them away. My sister liked them.
