I'm sure they will work fine for what I am using them for. What else can I really say about a pouch?

I was very happy to purchaed a pair of Bally shoses in great price. However, It was disappointed that I have to return the shoses because the size are not the same as standard shose size. So, if you are interested Bally shoses, make sure to double check the size chart for Bally shoses.

I wear a 5 or 5 1/2, so it's difficult for me to find shoes. I've also had foot surgery, so I want and need something that's comfortable. These shoes are great. They're small and comfortable for short and medium stints. They're not great if you're going to be on your feet all day. (I've wished I hadn't been wearing them on a couple of my all-day shopping sprees.) They also come in a variety of colors, which is very nice. This brown was a nice, dark brown - a neutral brown, unlike some of the lighter, redder, more milk chocolatey ones. They have a shelf life, though. The cushioning wears out, so I've learned when to call it quits and order another pair.
The shoes were not the size that I thought I was ordering. I wanted a women's size. These will be sent back.

I have been using this product for a very long time. Fit and quality is excellent and they are true to size. Amazon offered the lowest price I have ever received on this particular item. Very satisfied with my purchase.
I bought this pair of converse for my daughter, and she loves them. They are so comfortable to wear and great quality as well.

Love the style of this sandal. Not my first pair. Very comfortable, good fit in the size I need. The only problem I had was that the color was not what I thought I was ordering, but would like to have more colors in the same style.

Softspots are my favorite shoes. These are super comfortable, fit well, and last a long time. So far I have two pairs of these that I use for work, and my feet never hurt. Bravo! I highly recommend them.

I work in a profession that requires me to be on and off my feet for 24 hours straight. And these shoes are unmatched in fit and comfort, and speed for kicking them off, and putting them back on... and so on, and so on... (figured out what I do yet?). I can't say enough great things about these shoes. Try 'em, and I guarantee your feet will never feel better.

Puma's Frankenclyde is the best pair of Puma's I have ever owned! I just spent 4 hrs looking for a pair of Black with Blue strip to replace the ones I have had for two years. I tried to find replacements last year and the pair I got sucks! They are too narrow! I just emailed Puma to ask, WHY SO STUPID! I say that because looking online, I am not the only one who misses these shoes. The only place I could find a decent color was on ebay! Wish me luck and I wish you good hunting! If you can find these, they are worth the money.

At half a century old, I've been camping for as long as I can remember. When I had to start buying my own boots, I went cheap to save money. I got exactly what I paid for! Now don't get me wrong, if you need reliable foot protection to go caving one weekend, K-Mart and WalMart offer excellent choices. Personally, I would rather drop $70 on a great pair of boots and wear them 2 years than spend $30 every 6 months.I've owned 3 pair of Timberlands. The first shrunk too small while drying next to the fire. My bad. The bottom of the 2nd pair, in my opinion, wore out prematurely. It wasn't until the 3rd that I realized the sole was simply an inferior material. Hello Hi-Tec! I fell in love with my first pair immediately.ProsThere was no break-in period, not even for my EEE wide dogs! I wear them till they fall apart. Then I purchase another. Years later, another. The Altitude IV waterproof hiking boot has great ankle support, it's fairly light weight, definitely waterproof, somehow breathes well even for the aroma my feet produce, the speed laces are absolutely a plus and the soles have a more aggressive pattern than comparable brands. (Did I mention I use mine for caving?)ConsConstruction and durability - absolutely NONE!Availability - I only wished more shoe stores carried them so prices would be more competitive. Thank goodness for Amazon.Would I recommend this product?A good pair of boots is an "investment". Don't let anybody tell you otherwise. When I did the math, the only correct answer is Hi-Tec!

I've been looking for this specific color and style and went to every athletic shoe store in Phoenix and Las Vegas but could not find it until i happened to look on Amazon. They, of course, had it and i ordered it immediately. It took a little longer than expected to get the shoes but once they were here i slipped them on and they fit like a glove.
These are the most comfortable timberlands my husband has ever had....He loves and wants another pair for work he said its worth it!!
Very happy with these sneakers. Look great and feel comfortable. Want to buy another pair!!
The older model of these shoes was fabulous. I am hoping the same type of comfort and performance from this "next gen" version.
Brought these for my mother and she stated that these were the most comfortable pair of sandals she owns. I would recommend these as good buy as it is very difficult to find wide width shoes
This shoe is okay, but not quite as comfortable as my Medley style or the AP1 style.

I really like the color. It is a really pretty shoe. My only problem is that it feels so narrow. I bought a wide shoe. And the shoe tongue is very stuff as other reviewers said. Wish they fit better because i love the color.

I went back and forth on this purchase for a while. I am a huge fan of Frye, and I own/have owned at least six other pairs of Frye boots/shoes. You can't beat Frye for style and quality. I believe they are the oldest continuously operating show manufacturer in America. They provided footwear for soldiers during the Civil War!I wanted a pair of nice, dress boots that I could wear for more formal occasions or even with a suit. I looked at other styles from Frye, like the Oliver and the James. But I am so glad that I went with the Emmett. They are exactly what I wanted. I have worn them with suits and even with my tux, and they look great. They have a great classic style, but at a glance no one would be able to tell you're wearing "boots." They blend in to any outfit like a dress shoe would.They aren't super cheap, and they don't seem to come down in price much, especially in black. But I am confident that these will be my black dress shoes for years and years to come. Who knows? With care and with only occasional wear, they may be the last pair of dress shoes you ever buy.
Could not love them any more if I tried! Perfect fit, perfect color, perfect delivery. I especially loved being able to get a half size, which is often hard to do with Converse.

This is my second Danner boot purchase, the first being a pair of Chinese-made imports. While those boots are pretty good, they don't hold a candle to these Hood Winter Lites. Perfect fit, perfect comfort right out of the box. I'm sold!

I made sure I really knew my correct size before ordering. I have very narrow feet and these shoes fit me perfectly. They are almost like wearing slippers. I take West Coast Swing classes and it's important to be able to spin and turn effortlessly. Regular street shoes do not fit tight enough on my feet and consequently, my feet hurt at the end of the night. These shoes fit like gloves, are very light weight and after several hours of dancing my feet do not hurt! Needless to say, I'm very glad I bought professional dance shoes. I priced shoes locally and the least expensive at the same quality were $40 more.

This is my 3rd pair of the Carly sandals which I have bought over the past 5 years (in 2 different colors). They are very comfortable and go with almost any of the outfits which I wear. The service was excellent...very quick and great price. I could not find these shoes in a store.

I wasn't really feeling the other colors that came out before the gray and reds. These are so hott and definitely a MUST HAVE. Don't forget to throw on some jeans and a gray & red rocawear shirt and you're good to go. ROC
This boot fits to size and is comfortable. I would purchase again. I use to purchase boots from LL Bean.
I have been wearing this shoe style for several years they are very comfortable, light and durable
These shoes fit great and look cool. They were shipped on time and looked exactly as described. My son's friends complimented him on his new shoes!
We had to exchange another pair as the 10 didn't fit properly. These were a great option for the new pair.

I ordered these for my granddaughter's birthday. They were shippped promptly, and I was able to track them very efficiently. They were exactly what we wanted!!! They are very attractive and wear well.
This shoe shows definite signs of being used. The heel of the shoe is worn and the writing on the inside of the shoe has been rubbed off from use. Terrible!

Dada's are some of the best basketball shoes i have ever had. The only bad thing i have found is the price difference between youth and large. $20.00 more for a bigger size is rediculous, but other than that they are really cool shoes especially how you can personalize them with your teams colors and your team name, your name, and your number. Some of the reasons they are really good shoes are because they are comfortable, have good traction, and just look good.

"Comfortable " doesn't do these shoes justice...like walking on cotton candy puffs all day long! No need to break them in, either. Snug fit so they don't slip or slide off while walking. Sturdy sole makes for surefootedness. Shoes are a bit heavy- fine for me, but some may need to be aware. Waterproof too. Will buy more when needed.
These are the only Brand of Sandals I can buy and be guaranteed to be able to wear without taking time to "break them in." They are comfortable for walking and very nice looking to wear.
these are great shoes for anyone to have they are very comfortable and great for playing basketball and even for casual wear

the t-mac 3 is a great shoe it looks so niceand is very comftorble. I have 2 pairs the white and the black becauce i like thoughs more then then the blue and red. And just let you guys now the black ones have better traction then the white.DA T-MAC 3s ARE DA BEST!

I buy this shoe for swing dancing. It's a standard shoe in the Lindy Hop community. However, there are some drawbacks to it. It has adequate padding for every day walking, but not dancing, especially when jumps are included. Thus, many of us put insoles into them. However, doing so causes the shoe to fit incorrectly and your heel to slip out when using your regular size, and using the next size up causes the shoe to fit incorrectly in the toe as well.If you dance regularly, this shoe wears out in about a year or two.I put suede on one pair for slickness, but not on a second pair, which I wear on slick floors for more traction. Friends of mine have complained that the current productions of this shoe are slick on the toe and heel and sticky on the ball, giving the shoe an inconsistent slickness and causing unpredictable results on the dance floor.So for every day wear, great! For dancing, ok, but better than other non-dance-specific shoes.

Lets be honest I needed a cheap pair of LARGE wrestling shoes fast to fight in for a army combatives tournament, these were $19.99... How could I go wrong? Well after having got them ONE DAY after I placed the order. And starterd to wear 'em... DAMN!!! I'd of paid the full price for them (whatever it was befor the huge mark down) Well worth it, the company that sent them was EASTBAY.

The shoes are beautiful, no doubt about it.But they are not at all deck shoes (the style they try to copy, shoes people wear on boat decks); they are very slippery when floor is wet or when you go inside after walking in the rain outside. You have to be careful!

In typical fashion, Crocs' always delivers with true to size and color. Got these for my mother who has been having a problem with swelling feet and now she owns 4 or 5 different colors so they will go with anything. Very comfortable with no slipping or sliding.

I originally bought these shoes because I wanted some old school shell tops. After wearing these kicks for a month to the gym and walking around in them I've discovered how comfortable they were and I would definetly buy them again

Ordered these shoes to add to my year-round collection of Birkenstocks and Birkenstock-like shoes. These are very nice and the price is considerably lower that Birks.I wear these as often as I want to. Comfortable from the first day.
This is the 10th pair of Supernova Cushions I have purchased and I love them. They have a very thick cushion and it has cured my shin splints.

I love how comfortable they feel on my feet. I did forget that Timberland's are usually sized a bit large when compared to shoes. Normally I'm a size 12 shoe but only in Timberland's I would be a size 11. Luckily for me I ordered a 11.5 size so it wasn't bad enough for me to return. Just have to lace them up tighter but still not an issue when it comes to them being comfortable and durable. It did take me a couple of days to break them in so now the size issue is none existent.
I LIKE THESE SHOES THE STYLE AND WEAR IS VERY COMFORTING. THEY CAN BE DRESS DOWN AND UP IN WHAT EVER YOU WEAR.

I've been wearing the black, classic low converse for several years now and it came that time I needed a replacement pair. Beals Florida shipped it faster than the other items I had ordered from Amazon that same day. Was definitely worth it for the price, and of course the shoes are one of life's little necessities for some of us.

The shoes are comfortable and do the job, look good and have good support. They don't have much coushion but out of all the bike shoes compatible with SPD I would say they are among the best out there. This supplier (Huck N Roll) is however not reliable. I ordered 2pairs to make sure I get the right size. I sent them two requests to return the unopen box and still no response. This is the first time I ever encounter an issue like this on Amazon, I'm still hopeful I'll get some help but I really can't recommend buying anything from Huck N Roll.

I really like these shoes! I just bought them at a local retail store and was looking on here to see if I could find them cheaper. I've always loved Asics running shoes because they are so comfortable on my feet. But the main problem with my old Asics is they're dorky looking for casual wear. These new casual style of Asics fit my feet like my old shoes and actually look great too! They are very lightweight and almost feel like I'm not even wearing shoes. Unlike running shoes, these are very thin and offer very little little support. Lots of shoes make my feet look big, but these make my feet look sleek. Workmanship appears good but I don't think they will last as long as other shoes because they are so thin. Normally I wouldn't pay $70 for casual shoes but I did this time because these are so comfortable and good-looking. If you like Asics running shoes but want something better looking, I highly recommend these shoes!Update 10-2009Well I've had these shoes over 5 years now and they are still in good shape. Granted I don't wear them on a daily basis any more but I was really surprised how well they held up given how thin they are. Hope I can find another pair once these finally do break down...
I would be very greatful if u can let me know if the white chucks is one size bigger then nornal sizing cause I didnt see the remarks like on the black ones.Thanks
Have been wearing Rockport shoes for years since wearing a brace. No breaking them in. They are comfortable from day one and good value for the money when purchased from Amazon.
I received my Scout Sandal very quickly. It was in perfect shape and fit just like was supposed to.I am very pleased with the service and the product.

I first purchased a pair of Hi-Tech Altitude boots approximately 10 years ago. They fit me extremely well and were very comfortable from the first moment I wore them. Prior to this purchase, I have had 2 different pairs of the Hi-Tech Altitude boots and I have not been disappointed. They wear extremely well and seem to last me about 4 or 5 years. I have found them excellent for everyday wear as well as for use in fishing and hunting. I think these are excellent low cut boots for such a moderate price. Haven't ventured into buying the $100+ boots, but then why should I when these work so well, so can not comment or compare my $70 Hi-Techs to the more pricey boots. I think you will be pleased with these boots.
I just can not get away from my tried and true Rockport shoes. I am a Flight Attendant and wore them in the early 70s. I keep coming back to them. These shoes feel great! And well made also.
An all year kind of sneaker shoe that can be worn from all. Really comfort for every day use. There is a wide variety of colours which can cover all needs
I bought this for my mom and she loved it... good and complete product, good quality for a very good price
Normal chucks...awesome as always. I've worn them for the past 2 years. They're looking a little worn now, time to buy another pair. :)

I have been wearing Reef Ginger sandals for several years now. They are the most comfortable flip-flops I've ever worn. I stand on my feet for 8+ hours a day and when I wear these sandals, my feet don't hurt. I've had several pairs of these flip-flops and I've never had a pair break--I just wear them out from wearing them so much!

I bought this shoe to use in a 12 hour adventure race consisting of Paddling, Biking and Orienteering. IT WORKED LIKE A CHARM. From the water, to the mud, to the miles on the road on the mountain bike; it took everything I could throw at it. Would recommend to anyone looking for an all around great outdoor shoe.
Pretty well made slipper, however, it runs wide. I always take Medium but it's much too loose. Next time I'll get Narrow as it stretches.
I usually wear 11.5, but it was a bit small for me.The product was good, so i will try 12.
This product arrived on time and in excellent condition. These boots have a good arch and seem sturdy. They do look a little cheaper than I anticipated. The tread is great. Size runs true.
Go Merrell (Vibram) it came in a good condition and great quality. Hundred Percent I recommend this one, so light not that Heavy as it looks...
I've had these heels for a few years now and they are still holding strong. I've worn them quite a bit and there's not much wear and tear at all. Definitely worth purchasing.

I just love ugg boots and have a few already. They are warm and comfortable and have given them as gifts also. My shipping experience with the seller was excellent. True to size. Got it when promised. would recommend these boots to everyone. Since the inside is dyed black, the only thing I don't like is that when you take the boots off, have a nice brush handy for scrubbing when taking your bath because the dye comes off on your feet and toes. Still worth it.

I am a Croc addict. There, I said it. BEWARE!!!! Crocs Classic and Crocs Beach have completely different sizing. I wear a W9 in Classic and they all fit like a dream. The same in Beach looks like duck shoes. Huge. These shoes in yellow were not available at this time in the Classic style, so I took a leap. The wrong one. The shoes were returned and my credit was issued immediately. No problem with the shoe or seller, it wasmy fault, but the sizing needs to be standard across all sizes. As far as the transaction with this seller, it gets 5 stars. Crocs themselve get the 3 stars. Will still buy more though!

I purchased this recently and love the way they fit my toddler's feet. They are very comfortable and keep her feet warm in the cold weather. She loves looking at the little faces they have on the them. I'm going to purchase one for a friend expecting in April. I know she will love them!
Lovely shoes! Sturdy and so sexxy... I would highly recommend. Of course a shoe of this height is not for the faint of heart
I liked the flat enzo shoes. These are very comfortable.I have been wearing these shoes for quite some time.I would recommend these shoes to my family and friends.
I ordered these for my mom. She has always wore these even when she was a waitress. Both pairs she wares all the time. Shipping time was excellent!

These shoes are the perfect combination of style, sass, and design. They can be dressed down with a pair of jeans, or dressed up with dress slacks. I bought a pair in red at first, but I loved them so much that I ordered another pair in black!The red ones are extremely comfortable and rub no blisters...even after wearing them all day. The black ones, on the other hand rubbed small blisters the first day I wore them. I have no idea what the difference is between the two pairs.Regardless, these are GREAT shoes and they look GREAT on!
Very satisfied-very long wearing-comfortable shoe-have worn Grasshopper shoes-many styles the last three year-will continue buying them.
They didn't have the color I wanted so I settled for a different color shoe.
These shoe are great! They hurt at first, but once they are broken in, they are perfect for anything...

I got a pair of yellow low-tops for Christmas last year and I LOVE THEM!!! They're about to get holes in them because I wear them so much, and I'm trying to pick out what color I should get. There's so much to love about these shoes. There's like 25 colors to pick from, so there is the oppourtunity to have a piar for EVERY SINGLE OUTFIT. Or, you can wear just one pair, like I do, and mine go with everything. These shoes are breathable, unlike tennis shoes, so your feet don't get all sweaty, which is nice too. These shoes are quite flat inside, but there's nothing that an insert can't fix. THESE SHOES ARE THE BEST!!!
These crocs are incredibly comfortable. I got them for my husband who steps heavily around the house and they have helped loads. The color is very versatile also. He loves them!
These shoes are awesome! they look great with everything. you will not be sorry you bought them.
These Ariat lace up boots are very comfortable and definitely worth buying. I use them for work every day. They even shed the water well.
great sneakers! look great and fit perfectly. can wear with anything!the best for skydiving :)will definitely buy again, maybe different colors.thank you.

These artsy fartsy Chucks have the All Star logo emblazoned all over the shoe to the point that it's art, not just a logo or signature. You can tuck down the tops for a cool contrast red against blue, I personally prefer the flexible ankle support of a full lace up. Great looking shoe, sure to start conversations!

If you're new to purchasing dance shoes, make sure you go to the manufacturers website to check their sizing! Buying dance shoes is NOT like buying street shoes.We checked the sizing info, and saw that these dance shoes are comparable to street shoe size, so we opted to getting 1 size up. When the shoes came, my daughter tried them on, and they were just what we were looking for. There was just enough room in the shoe for her to grow into as the dance season progresses. The shoes are very well crafted, as most Capezio brands are, and the fit all around was great.

The product was is in great quality as expected from the Timberland brand. The only issue I had was that the shoe came looking new from the outside whole the inside showed sines of wear (dirt scuffs, sand, etc.) which disappointed me since the shoe was a gift for a loved one. The shoes are comfortable and well supported as reported to me. Be careful when you go with white. Stains only come off if you clean them right away. Scuffs are easily noticeable and near impossible to get off. The colors in the pictures on Amazon are very accurate.I would definitely buy them again and would reccommend it to others.
I was really surprised at how great these shoes fit. They are really comfortable and I love wearing them. At first I thought they wouldn't be wide enough, but they fit great.
excellent converse all star. the product was well described and satisfied my needs. the shipment has been quick

A freind of mine has these and my husband thought it was cool to always have a bottle opener(even though it is kinda gross if you think about it) So I purchased these shoes as a Fathers Day Gift for my husband. They are VERY Comfy! He loves them!
Very quick shipment. Great product. I ordered the croc in Orange, but one looks sliightly more of a redesh orange.
I had this shoe for over 3 years and they still rock! They are comfortable and stylish. Another great buy.

These are awesome boots, they just take forever to break in. These boots will last you forever, though, so a long break in is a small price to pay. The soles last years, and they're replaceable. They're somewhat heavy, so if you're used to lighter, tennis-shoe-style boots these may take some getting used to, but you won't regret it. Make sure you get a good fit and you'll love these boots forever.

Since I wear a hard to find shoe size (9 N), it has been more and more difficult to find a practical shoe in stores in our location (even in N.Y., City). I was delighted to find the The Enzo Angiolini "Liberty" shoe through Amazon. It's perfect for casual and dressy casual wear - shopping and running to the dentist or doctor. Ordering was easy and service was prompt. I'll do it again in the future.

The shoes arrived in a timely fashion and were even cuter in person than they appeared online. However, they were AT LEAST 1/2 size too small. I am a 5 1/2 and sometimes can even wear a 5. These were miniature! I took them to a shoe stretcher and they had to use the smallest stretching tool they owned to work with them. When I came to pick them up, the staff there was like, "oh, those tiny shoes!"I also happened to buy a Jessica Simpson dress online the same week and it was also smaller than the same size would have been anywhere else, so maybe this is a pattern with her whole line.

I have worn this style of shoe for years. It is a comfortable shoe. Of course, I would suggest that you try the shoe in a store first before purchasing on the internet because you can't judge the fit by a picture on a website. Since I had originally purchased the shoe in a store, I now purchased it on Amazon, and the quality and fit seem to be consistent.

As a soccer lover I know first-hand that Adidas does very well in this area when making products. However I was displeased with this shoe. The picture can be quite deceiving, it looks a longer when worn. This gives the shoe a boat like appearance that I found to be unattractive. I suggest watching a review on youtube just so you can get a more accurate presentation of these shoes. Secondly whenever it rains outside (with thunder) my team takes up a nice game of Futsal indoors in the gym. Let me just say that these shoes had 0 traction. I was literally slipping and gliding, and for all who've played Futsal you know it's a game where ball control is crucial.I'll give these four stars because they're meant to be casual sneakers, some people may like the look, and because they are a charming classic.
product received in good time and we liked it because it was requested by me to give away and use

I got these Adidas Supernova Control Running shoes to replace some cardio/cross training shoes that I had worn out (also Adidas). First of all, I have to say that Adidas has some of the best cross training/running shoes on the market! Keep in mind, buying shoes that have a regular retail price of $50-$70 are not going to get you quality. You'll need to buy the shoes that retail at $100-$130 (or more) to get the arch support and custom fitting to ensure that you have a pain-free workout every time (of course, until you wear them out from usage).My recommendation, go to a custom foot store, try on shoes and determine what type and style of Adidas shoes you need for your feet, then come on-line to Amazon and buy them at a discounted price. I tried these shoes on at the store, made sure they were what I needed and wanted, then I came to Amazon and saved 50% off the retail price in the store and my shipping was FREE! Keep in mind, I find that I have to buy Adidas running/cross training shoes 1 full size bigger than my regular size - that is another reason to try on the shoes to determine size, but not buy at the retail stores.These shoes are great for my cardiokickboxing and any other cardio workouts that I do. I have another pair of Adidas shoes strictly for running as they are the top of the line that Adidas offers and well worth the price! Spend the extra money on Amazon and buy the Adidas Adistar Control Shoes for your running - these are the best and most comfortable shoes for running and well worth every penny. Again, buy a size up from your normal shoe size but you won't regret it. Finally, I'm very narrow heeled and medium width in the front of my shoe and I'm able to tighten the laces with the 2nd holes that Adidas offers on all of their shoes - it is great to help fit everyone from the wide to the medium to the narrow width people. Buy these shoes or the Adistar Control shoes now and you won't regret it!
I couldn't purchase these anyplace in town and as usual you had them available for me! I got them in record time and ready to send off for a christmas gift.

I had them since I was in HS and they were one of the most comfy shoes I have had since. I am now about 3 years into college and they continue to be my favorite pair... And of course, Globe knows their stuff!Enjoy!:)

I love these shoes. They are comfortable and durable. My feet do sweat a little in them, but it is summer time. The reason why I only gave it 4 stars is because the left shoe the strap will not stay forwards. As I walk in them it slowly comes back and rides funny on my ankle. I have not contacted the company about this.
This is second pair that I bought for my daughter and she absolutely loves them. Quality is great. They are soft and cant beat amazon price. I would definitely order more.

After hearing a few 'word of mouth' reviews from friends, I decided to look into Danner to see if I would pay this much for a pair of boots. Suffice it to say, I am glad that I did. Taking the boots out of the box I immediately noticed the fine workmanship and attention to detail. The leather used in the upper feels like what good leather should feel like. I am still getting used to the fact that the tongue comes over the side instead of up the middle. I don't know if other shoes/boots do this, but I certainly find it unique and adds to the overall comfort. Adding to that comfort are the "airthotic" inserts that Danner includes. At first I chose to leave them out, but after deciding to leave them in for a day, I found that they're comfortable enough to leave in. I've been wearing them around regularly but haven't done any serious hiking yet. I'll update after that. Until then, buy these boots. They feel good, every one of their components are of the utmost quality, and the stitch-down construction is pretty freaking cool.

These boots are the best I've ever owned. So good, that I own two pairs, and bought my dad a pair. And he swears by them too. If you have aching feet, soreness, or a weak ankle, these boots have a therapeutic effect! I am not into medicine or anything but I have to say, these boots are very supportive and make your feet feel strong and no strain on the joints.

I love these shoes. I am 44 and have spent the last 10 years dealing with back issues. I have had three back surgeries and have lingering foot, back, and mobility issues. These shoes are stable, supply great arch support, and have a deep heel register to really hold onto my foot. If I needed to there, is plenty of room to put my thick custom orthotics, but I don't need to. They have excellent support just as they are. They have a fun Mary Jane look that is so much better than most orthopaedic shoes. I wear them with pants and capris. They are a bit chunky for wearing with a skirt, but when my back is having a bad day, I have done it. I have these in black, grey, and brown.
This is a very comfortable shoe.It also looks very nice. I like the Black and Brown style.Good for casual and church.
I really like the boots but unfortunately I had to return them because I need a larger size. I shipped them out today and can,t wait to get the new ones.
It's a reliable and good product. I always wear this make of shoe. it was shipped well.thanks. and good price.
Love the looks and confort of this shoe. Fit true to size and required no breaking in period. Goes with so many of my summer clothes.
These are super sexy without being too high. They run a half size big so account for that. They are a soft leather and they wear great!
My husband wears these around the house most of the day. He says they are warm and comfortable. He loves them.

These sandals are the perfect replacement for my Ocean Pacific sandals I bought back in 2000.As a frugal libertarian slacker dude, I wear my clothes until they fall apart. So when I buy my clothing, I prefer to spend the money on quality clothing once up front, and wear them for many years, as apposed to buying cheap clothing and having to replace them more often than necessary.These ECCO Men's Yucaton Sandals are very comfortable and seem very durable at this stand point (one month of summer slacking) and I am confident they will last as long as my 12 year old O.P.'s.

I have read several review complaining about how narrow these shoes are, well send them to me because that hasn't been my experience.I have narrow feet and I bought my first 2 pair about 3 years about ago and they fit perfectly. They are comfortable and provide adiquate arch support and cushing. Wanting some different colors I ordered some more the following year and am looking still looking for a pair that fit as well as the first. Teva has lengthed the strap that goes over the arch making them too big for me, I can hardly keep the shoe on making them uncomfortable to walk any distance. Teva, can you shorten the top strap about 1/4"? While that would still be loose on me, it would make them easier to keep on.

I purchased these boots for my son Jake for Christmas. They came really fast and were exactly what I ordered so I was very happy. Also, the price was $20 less than anywhere else I had looked, and there were a lot of places. Thanks!
My husband didn't know he needed these but they were comfortable from the first and he loves them. Very well made, attractive and versatile.Haven't used the water-proof part yet but glad to have it.

The Park Avenue looks good, and so far, it fits my feet well.The quality seems to be very good, other than one thing, there is one metal eyelet missing. I'd think AE quality control would have caught this. Since I like the shoes, I'm going to keep it, but still disappointed that it obviously have an issue which shouldn't be there to begin with.

I really like this shoe! It's hard for me to find a shoe as narrow as I need, but this one fits just right across the toes and on the heel. It's a little wide at the instep, but I can definitely live with it. I was a little dissappointed to find there is no arch support. I think if there were a support, the wideness would disappear.

I find this pair of Reebok running shoes to be of excellent quality. They are very comfortable and cushion the shock of walking. I am past the running age, so I need a good foundation and arch support. The price was right also. Reebok is the best name in sport shoes in my estimation. Thank you. I hope this helps.
I've been wearing these for years. They are the most comfortable, long lasting sneakers I have ever owned. I like the slim line to these. I don't care much for the big bulky looking ones.

I bought this shoe bacause I have a wide foot and this was one of the few shoes I could get online at 12EEE. The sneaker is very comfortable for walking. It is terrible for running though, my feet would really hurt after running in these shoes. If you are going to do any running DON'T BUY THIS SHOE! Otherwise, I think its a very good sneaker.

Bought this for my cousin, he said it an big about half to a whole size. He's an 8.5 and i bought him the 8.5 and its big on him but he was fine with it since he wears thick socks anyway. The color black was really nice and the design as well. As for the quality, can't speak for it right now since we just got it but so far upon close inspection when i got the shoes, it look durable and made well so hopefully it'll last long.

I bought these to replace another pair of Ariat pull on boots I have been wearing for the past couple of years for work. They look great and after breaking them in they feel great.Unlike my other pair, these have no traction. I wore them in the snow the first week and could not walk up a snow covered hill. At work I have to be very careful walking in mechanical rooms that have any water on the floor. I also need to be careful walking into a building with a smooth floor if it was raining outside.

I got these for my husband for Christmas and he LOVES them! They look really nice. We've only had them for a few weeks, so I don't know about their durability, but they look good! They came with two sets of laces--one white set and one royal blue set (they look kind of retro). My husband liked that because he can have two totally different looks. Great price, great looking shoes!
im glad with this product, i know them from before and was a good price.
love these shoes. my second pair but these are alot tighter than the one i have had for 3 years.
These boots were comfortable right out of the box and exceeded my expectations. I have owned Justin, Tony Llama and Nikona boots and these Ariats are better than any of them.
I've purchased several pairs of the cleats over the years. They're very comfortable for how light they are. I like that they don't flex too much on the bottom.

I have been wearing this model for over twenty years. When they switched from Vibram soles a few years ago the quality declined significantly. Previously I got two years of daily use out of the shoes, now I get less than a year, with holes wearing through the inner sole in the heel and the mid-foot. I still find them very comfortable and the waterproof feature makes them great in the rain, but I yearn for the better quality of the previous model. Over the years I found that the Rockport quality has deteriorated. A few years ago I purchased a pair of wingtips with the Rockport alternate budget brand they were terrible. I believe they ultimately pulled that product line from the market, but the quality is not the same.
These shoes look fantastic, but they seem to be a different shape to my feet - they're too long and too narrow, giving me blisters on my pinkie toes.
I ordered two pairs of shoes for a musical: one black pair and one white pair. The black pair wore wonderfully, but the white pair broke a strap and when cleaned the coating peeled off the shoe.

Easy Spirit tennis shoes are the best for my feet that I have found. They have good cushioning and arch support. These are relatively inexpensive as far as Easy Spirit's go. I am very happy with my new shoes so far. They have met the Easy Spirit threshold as I expected.

these are great with the stretchy straps. because crocs have 2 sizes (8/9, 10/11, etc), if you're on the smaller side of the 2 sizes, the stretchy straps help to keep the crocs on the little feet better than the standard crocs. works fabulously for my son. in fact, he won't wear anything else!
My wife teaches nursing clinicals and needed a great shoe to help her keep up her pace every session. These shoes do the job and then some.

This is my first pair of UGG boots. I am 7 1/2 and they fit PERFECT!! highly recommended. Ordered them and arrived in less than 4 days! Why pay for a Women size if you can fit in a kids size 6, and save some $$$?This seller is at UGG.com sellers list. Trustable.

I order those cheap shoes for dancers a show in Montreal .Shoes are rather sharp ( old model 1995 ). The final cost (transport and customs,) double the price(prize). It is not a real sale.. And this old style finally cost me around 90.00 !! ( Independently of the shape, those shoes are comfortable.

Shoes are really pretty and comfortable. I have received many compliments. They are easy to clean and have a little elastic on the back that makes them easy to put on and take off. I have trouble wearing heels but I was able to handle these well.
I have worn these shoes for a while now and they are the most comfotable sandal I have ever owned. I am about to buy another pair. Oh, did I mention I have foot probems? Not with these sandals.

I had heard all the good reviews for this boot, so I decided to take the plunge. I normally wear a 12/13 depending on the brand, so I tried on a 12 in the store. It still seemed a little big so I ended up ordering the 11.5 from Amazon and it's perfect, if not a little big. I can wear this boot anywhere and with anything. I bought some Sno Seal and am hoping it wont turn the Beeswax color too dark, but once its sealed I will wear this boot all winter long.
I bought these for my mother who has had lifelong shopping issues in regards to her feet. She said she loves these shoes and they fit wonderfully.
This shoe was true to size and a perfect shoe! The color is the best red! Can't go wrong with a Chuck Taylor!
Purchased this product for myself. Keeps my feet nice and warm. I would recommed washing in cold water and line drying to prevent shrinking.

Purchased a pair of these last year. Great hiker, light weight, good grip sole. Used almost daily for light trails. The only complaint is the material that covers the rear shank,(behind your heal/achilles, has worn through exposing the plastic shank which left the shoes unwearable. This could be solved if bit more padding or double over the material could solve this issue. Would I purchase again, yes.

Beautiful, awesome boots if you get them from a none junk shop! Watch out where you buy from!I'm 12 B, ordered 12D - seller said they run large. Nope, returned for damaged 13D and still tight but would have streched. Won't buy from them again on that.Sweet boots though! Just watch who you buy from!

These shoes seem to be really high quality but my daughter wears a 6 I ordered a 7 to be safe and they came EXTREMELY small. I know her foot didn't grow because all of her other size 6 shoes still fit well. I had to re-order a larger size so her little toes aren't crunched.

I tried on several more expensive backpacking boots before settling on this one. I have high arches and this boot fit and felt the best. I've put 70-80 miles of backpacking on the boot, including some hard, heavy miles. So far the boot is holding up fine. And they feel great - like I'm walking on cushions.The only downside so far is the leather has worn more quickly than I expected and the waterproofing seems to be wearing off - even after an additional waterproofing treatment.Update:My left boot stopped being supportive after about 90 miles of mid-weight backpacking (with 30-40 lbs). These boots are probably just not durable enough to rely on for backpacking.

I have owned Propet Walkers before and was willing to go the extra money to purchase another pair. They are good at support. My one disappointment was that they were listed as "wides" and they don't seem very wide at all. The tongue is thick and adds to the difficulty of getting the straps all they way across.

I'm really, really happy with these boots. An awesome price for a super-sturdy piece of footwear that seems like it's going to last a really long time. I needed footwear that would support my ankles, for both every day walking and hitting the hills with my dogs. These fit the bill.Why buy a second pair?Two reasons:1) I'm paranoid the price will go up.2) These are nice enough to wear out into the real world, and I didn't want to have to worry about keeping my daily pair "nice".The biggest problem for me? They do require some breaking in and for me, it was kind of a painful process. They are rigid, strong boots, and they do give way eventually. Already, after only a few months, my first pair are taking on that nice patina that well-worn leather boots get.It makes me said that I'll have to go through that process again with my second pair, which will take longer because they will be worn less frequently.
This is my third pair of these flip flops. They are the best flip flops ever. Comfy. Cute. Perfect. And the new ones with the cute stitching are awesome.

just got these boots and they are comfortable and even nicer looking than the photo. I have very wide feet with really high arches and these boots fit right out of the box. They feel like I already broke them in. These are going to be great for pants or skirts. I'm very happy with them.

I love the new reebok shoes but they should make them for women also. Because they are wonderful they feel good when you were them. The reason I gave the shoes 4 stars is because they don't make them for women becuse most women play sports like: basketball, and other sports. I think that they are wonderful as a matter of fact you should buy some and I mean right now! Go, run and get these before there is none let. Serious cause knowing me and all of my friends and family are going to be wearing them. I love reebok shoes!!!! Buy them NOW I mean it!!!

I love saucony running shoes, however, these shoes are considerably different and do not measure up as well as the saucony running shoes. Never the less, for just a basic shoe for messing around (home, park, light work, etc.) they are of good quality. I would not recommend them as a running shoe (I do not recommended them for trail running or road running or any other significant running).

I really like these flip flops, but when I walk in them they make a lot of noise. The flip flop noise if you know what I mean! They are the loudest flip flops I have ever owned. When I walk I try to hold them closer to my foot (so they won't be so loud), but it does not seem to work. Other than that, it did take alittle while to get use to the arch support. I have only ever had flat flip flops. I'm not sure if they are the best for walking long distances which is what I wanted. But basically they are comfortable and look nice.
Great boots. Never had better. Hold up well and definitely keep the water out. Nice and warm in the New England winters. Highly recommend these boots.
That's a product with a long tradition in market and I just was replacing my old sneakers. Coverse really rules.

The products are made smaller than the spec. I bought size 9 even though I wear 8-1/2 shoes yet I have force them to put them on. They will keep your feet worm like they say. I suggest the other to buy at least a size larger.
Great purchase! Great service! Great delivery! my boyfriend was very happy with his present. Thank you for making it so easy
I just got these shoes- the soles are uncomfortable, but they were on $13 and they look pretty nice- a good deal on a shoe you will just wear every once in a while for the looks.

This is my 2nd pair of Propet walkers. I have the other pair that has mesh instead of solid leather, which are good for summer time but not winter when it's wet outside. I wanted a leather pair to keep the moisture out of my shoes when I'm outside & I do walk a lot so a good walking shoe is a must.I'm type 2 diabetic & was having some ingrown toe nail problems. After buying my 1st pair of these shoes, within 3 months I was able to get rid of the ingrown toe nail. The shoes have more toe room & are stable to keep my foot from rolling out when I walk. I was having lots of back pain, and if I don't get a good shoe like i said my foot rolls out & my ankles start to hurt.With these shoes I have no pain, am steady on my feet & the rubber sole is good to keep me from sliding around on wet floors: an added plus.I wanted to mention that these shoes are comfortable, they have a snug fit feel to them, but not so tight that your feet feel crammed. Earlier I was wearing these shoes because my feet were so swollen I couldn't get anything else on except slippers. These went right on, did not make my feet feel crammed, & with the heel pain I was having from the swelling i couldn't feel it.These are really some nice shoes, they are light weight & feel good after being on my feet all day walking around, even when I take the dog for a walk.I've cleaned out my closet of all the other favorite shoes I had, and only have these 2 pairs now. Nothing else can compare to how these feel for me & how well they keep my feet healthy.
These boots are great. My husband swears it's like not wearing shoes at all. They are tough and withstand his job as a groundsman for a tree company. Outstanding. You can't go wrong with Tims.

I am now definitely a Clarks fan-most of the shoes that I own are by Clarks.The Sarong is a very cute shoe that looks nice with dresses,skirts,jeans,or shorts. The heel height is very nice and the shoe is extremely comfortable.I needed no break in period,they were comfortable from the very first wearing.There is no consistency in sizing though.I ordered 9.5 wide in the teal,and it's so wide my feet tend to slide through.I ordered the same size in the pink and it cut into my foot.I also ordered a pair in the same size the mint green and these are just fine.
The shipping was prompt, the shoes are GREAT and I have another order ready to send! Thanks for your commitment to customer satisfaction!!

I got my Kayanos because they were so cheap ($35). Best decision I ever made. Amazing support (I slightly overpronate and have weak ankles) and durability for middle distance running. These have inspired me to run more and stick with Asics.

I stand on my feet all day always looking for comfy shoes especially if they are cute,heel height perfect,could dance hrs in these,but will be wearing them to church and when I want to dress up,heel fits snug in a good way,love em,proab get another color since cute comfy shoes hard to find,yay.

Great steel toe boot that don't hurt your toes and is waterproof too. I've been wearing this style boot for over six years. Steel toes are required at my work. These have the oblique (wide) toe which keeps the steel toe from rubbing your toes as most boots do. Instead of buying boots half a size bigger to allow for the steel toe, on these you can buy boots that fit your feet and still have room at the toe. They are light weight, soft soles, cushioned in-soles and are water proof on top of all it's other qualities. For a per that works in a manufacturing industry, on their feet most all of the day and all concrete on top of that, these boots are great. I'll continue buying these boots as long as Rocky continues to make them and definately would recommend them to anyone that is looking for a good comfortable water proof boot. And for those that don't need the steel toe, they also make these same boots without the steel toe.

THE SHOES WERE DELIVERED SO MUCH EARLIER THAN THE EXPECTED DATE. GREAT JOB! MY SON LOVES IT SO MUCH FOR THE COMFORTNESS AND SHOWING OFF HIS BOOTS TO EVERYONE HE KNOWS. NO REGRETS AT ALL AND WORTH BUYING!

The shoe was one half size too short even though others said the shoe was fairly true to fit. No big deal, however. I packaged them in the box and used the Eastbay "Smart Return" label that came with the box. If you have any problem with the shoes, send them back and Eastbay will handle the transaction for you for a mere $6.50 return fee. They do NOT tell you that the return may take up to THREE weeks to process without any idea of a return date. The original shipment was fine. The return was awful so far. I returned them on 4-6 and on 4-8 they left Greensboro, NC. That's all I can tell you. That's all Eastbay can say other than "I just answer the phone and I have been told to tell customers who use the Smart Label (or whatever it is called) that it may take 3 weeks to get here." There may be instances of slow service by USPS, but I have NEVER encounted that type of delay. Eastbay essentially says tough and that's it. This is a quick review of an unsettled issue. When the process is over, if at all, I'll let you know more. JudyToday is the 19th and Eastbay does not know anything about the shoes. The Postal Service (contradiction of terms?) knows nothing even though they have a tracking number provided by Eastbay. Amazon, on the otherhand, has come to the rescue or at least they have tried to help unlike Eastbay and our wonderful USPS. My resolve: no more purchases from Eastbay; no more dealing with USPS.

This is the second Converse Low Top I bought this week because of sizing error(my fault). I ordered a size 10 in Mens the first time because I'm a legit size 10.5 Mens in every other shoe I wear. The shoes were received quickly by mail and the quality is great. When I tried them on, I had a good amount of space inside the shoes to move my toes which was too much for me. These size 9.5 shoes are a perfect fit. The sellers advice is spot on about sizing. Order 1 size down from your usual shoe size if you want a good fit. Other than that, these shoes are great for casual walking and weight training. I use them for dead lifting and squatting. Definitely recommend these shoes to anyone!

Awesome cleats. Comfortable and Amazing. Price is good, I almost cheeped out to save $30 to buy another pair and I'm so glad I didn't. I'd recommend these cleats and plan to be a lifetime customer of the Copa's.
Love the shoe, Love the look, but only thing I have an issue with is it's width. The shoe is very narrow....otherwise a wonderful shoe...love it

Thios show is great! Comfortable for my daughter to wear, and excellent capezio manufacturing. However, my daughter wears a 6.5, size 7 she has some room. I ordered a 7.5 wide, I danced for years and know ballet slippers are narrow. The 7.5 barely fits! I would return them but even the 10 minutes she wore them around the room showed too much wear to return. She will be able to wear them a few wooks before having to order new ones.

The most comfortable and durable walking shoes I've found, especially great for travelling as they don't mark you immediately as a tourist (unlike sneakers), slip on and off easily when going through security, and look good in all but dressy situations. I only ever need to buy a new pair every year or two because I wear out the support in them for lengthy walking. I still have my original two pair for use around the house or on weekend errands. While not waterproof, the shoes seem to be water resistant, the sole thick enough to keep the cold of the pavement from coming through, and a decent enough grip to walk in all but the iciest conditions. I hope Eastland never stops making these shoes!
I like this product because it was not used.Good product and cheaper than the official site.that is it
This is my second pair of the same shoe and I love it. So comfortable and good wear and tear.
These shoes are most comfortable. I first purchased an 8N; they were too small. I returned and requested an 8 1/2N. Promptly received the replacement. I can wear with slacks and skirts.

Received these shoes yesterday. I got a white pair in 7.5 - my street shoe size. Just for comparison, all of my Adidas sneakers are women's 7.5. I was really worried, because some reviews indicated that the shoes run small. They fit PERFECTLY.I got these for my Halloween costume, but now I plan to wear them around the house too.
SOFTSPOTS SHOES ARE VERY COMFORT, BUT THIS PAIR I HAD TO RETURN, BECAUSE THE SHOES WERE TOO LONGAND TOO WIDE.
These boots are very comfortable right out of the box. Good fit. No stiffness or "breaking in" time. I did spray them with waterproofing.

I love this shoe. It is the same style that I had twenty years ago. The shoe is light weight, comfortable, and durable. I would highly recommend them because you would not want to wear any other tennis shoe.Sincerely,csh

These are comfortable from day 1. Slip-ons are a nice convenience because they also slip off. You can kick them on and off at work. (I keep heels under my desk and slip these off and the heels on whenever I get up to go to a meeting or walk somewhere.)They fit securely on your feet when you slide your foot in them. You can wear them all day long. They wear well and they look nice. The many color and fabric configurations available give you some nifty choices for attention getters to plain and simple. I need a comfortable shoe and this is it. I am not someone who can walk into a Payless store and find something.If you have access to an Easy Spirit outlet, you can often find this style there at a good price.

I discovered Reef Ginger flip flops years ago, and will not buy any other flip flop since. These shoes are replacements for dome I have had for a long time...not worn them yet nut expect same quality as before.

This is the third pair of Easy Spirit Motion shoes I've bought. They are so comfortable and support my feet. I wear them to work and they look great with slacks. These shoes are very sturdy and well made as well as comfortable. I heard that Easy Spirit is discontinuing this style. I hope it isn't so!
Love them. Very cold here today in DC. They keep my feet very warm. Great for winter weather anywhere. Like!!
An old school shoe, with style. How did our feet survive these things? Oh, that's right, they didn't.

I compared hiking boots for quite awhile trying to choose the best for my situation. My ankles had been bothering me if I pushed too hard for years. Last fall, I injured some ligaments and tendons in my right heel and it was painful to walk. I reviewed and read reviews of hiking boots up to about $600, comparing features, weight, etcetera. I was unwilling to spend that much not being sure they would work for me. Many hiking boots are not available as a wide width, which I need. I read a review of hiking boots under $200, focused on the Hi-Tec Altitude boot; liked the price, features, and weight, and bought a pair. When they arrived, I put them on and was impressed how comfortable they were right out of the box. I wore them around home to break them in for several days, then went for a three mile walk - my feet felt great. Because everything I really like is sometimes not available when I need to replace them, I ordered a second pair and put them on the shelf for future use. I have had them several months now and am reveling in my new freedom.
This item is exactly as described. The leather is high quality, and it is well very well sewn. I recommend this for any looking for this size and shape of wallet.
The boot was well priced and solidly built but not true to size.I would go at least a half size smaller.

I am not pleased with the fact that I returned the item & requested an exchange of a smaller size. Instead I was given a refund even after I filled out the exchange request. This was a gift for my daughter & she was disappointed that they refused to make the exchange.

I bought the shoes for my little sister as a gift. She was delighted. She says the shoes are very confortable and can wear different styles. Nice confection and they were sent ontime. From my side, no complains.
An old school shoe, with style. How did our feet survive these things? Oh, that's right, they didn't.

First of all these shoes look awesome. I got them for about 22 dollars and they were perfect. Shipped on time and packaging was excellent. Also they are light and thin but they are meant to be so for running purposes. Also they are very very strong on the bottom as in their sole so they will hold up for awhile. Also I use them for running only every now and then and they look great enough to where you can wear them as sneakers. This is because the spikes on the bottom are removable, comes with a handy tool for it.

lots of comments about size ...so much so that i anticipated having to send them back.here's my advice - don't use the size charts listed because its way off. Do this:get a tape measure - stand on it, measure from the bottom rear of your foot up to the tip of your big toe...then match that with the size next to it... (skip all the US/ EU / GB size... they are clearly wrong on the size listing)So, my daughters measurement was 10" from back to tip - we ordered size 9. Perfect fit.okay, material quality is nice for wearing around the house or art school... but from what i could tell, it won't stand up to constant use. But hey, they're inexpensive (relatively speaking) so buy a few pair.m
These are my new "go-to" shoes. I'll be wearing them for years to come. These moccasins are also beautifully made.

These are the only boots that I will wear to work because they are so comfortable and durable. I even have them resoled after I wear them down to make them last longer, but when I do have to buy more, I will always buy another pair of these. I would highly recommend these boots!!

Bought these for my daughter who has flat feet and won't wear her sneakers with arch supports. Last summer I bought her very expensive flip flops that she wouldn't wear because they were too heavy. She loves these. Even bought a second pair. The bottom if firm enough that she she doesn't feel every pebble and I am happy because they have an arch support.

Nothing wrong with these boots, but they are not the kind of thing to buy off the web. Go some place and try them on first. I ordered a 9.5M and they were about 3/4 inch longer than other shoes I have of the same size.

I love Keds tennis shoes. Denim is very hard to find and I'm thankful Amazon is so easy to shop. No muss, no fuss. Just find the product and someone brings it to your door. Shoe is advertized as a leather upper. When it comes it is clearly marked as "ALL MAN-MADE MATERIALS" inside the heel.
