I loved the shoe and the price. I thought the shoe was different than my normal style but loved it.

Image shows Purple HI TOPS, but when you order....you get LO tops. Also, items that say 'qualifies for super saver shipping!' they're not. So unless you are ok with lo tops when you want hi tops...don't fall for it!

This bag is wonderful! I primarily use it as a pool bag (very roomy, with plenty of space for towels, magazines, snacks, and more). It cleans up easily, and the colorful patterns make it an eye-catching piece. It also makes the perfect summer "luggage" - it easily accomodated all of my needs for a week-long trip to the beach. It's very light-weight (unlike my "boat tote" bags) and very strong, so you can load it up with everything you need. I love this bag - I've already ordered three more as gifts for friends and family.

This is my second pair of Propet women's W3902 tour walker velcro sneaker purchased from Amazon. My feet feel so much better after wearing them and the velcro makes it easier than tying because of my hip situation. I would recommend these highly and the price and free shipping is great on your budget.

I was happy that Keds offered a canvas slip-on shoe in wide widths and in the color that I wanted. When I purchased the shoes, I was looking for an inexpensive shoe to wear around the house rather than a shoe for serious walking. However, I quickly realized that the shoe did not provide the foot support that I needed. Also, because I have a high instep, that particular style was not suitable for me. Consequently, I would not recommend this style shoe for those with a high instep or for those who need strong arch support for walking even for short distances.
I can't even tell you how happy I am with my new crocs. The most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. Not really the best looking, but definitely the most comfortable.

SanFran Jo says:I, too, noticed a difference in fit and also that the pair I recently purchased was made in China. I had to return my pair because they were not comfortable. I already have two other pair of Dansko Professional clogs, and they are very comfortable. I am disappointed in the comfort of the most recent pair I purchased. I have noticed that some of the clogs do say by Danita. Thanks to happy mommy mentioning Sanita, I googled Sanita clogs. Below is a statement found online from the Original Clogs website:For the last 17 years, all Dansko Professional clogs and all Dansko Stapled Clogs have been manufactured by Sanita in Europe. The relationship between Dansko and Sanita ended in August 2007. Since then, Sanita entered the US market and is now distributing their products directly. If you are looking for the Original stapled clogs with patent number 0060240 stamped on the bottom (made by Sanita exclusively), then look no further as our website features Sanita Clogs' products exclusively.I ordered the "original" clogs by Sanita and they fit as comfortably as the two other pair I have. The number mentioned above is stamped on the bottom.

They are comfortable and fashionable shoes, fit well with jeans and shorts.Besides having no pins are very easy to put them and remove them.The order in size 9 for my 3 years and are very good.Son unos zapatos comodos y a la moda, quedan bien con jeans y con shorts.Ademas por no tener pasadores son muy faciles de ponerlos y de sacarlos.Los ordene en talla 9 para mi hijo de 3 años y le quedan muy bien.

I'd been beating up Dan Post boots for about 20 years, and they've served me well -- good cost/looks/durability ratios. But I was looking for something with a more solid heel (Dan Post's are often hollow to save on weight, which also makes them LOUDER on a tile floor). These boots from Double-H are more comfortable, stay looking good through the weather (just give them a good brushing every once in a while to clean, and choose a saddle soap/mink oil/etc. routine that you stick to consistently whenever the leather looks a little dry) and cost a few dollars less than I'd been paying for Dan Post. And Double-H will be my first choice when it's time to go shopping again.

Simple great shoe. eS has been in the skate market for a long time but has yet to turn full hipster and still makes a quality skate shoe for those who need something durable and fashionable. I had my first pair of accels in 1999 and I can say that they have not changed a bit. They last forever and are very comfortable. I my self so not skate but I do a lot of walking/trail hiking and they are even good for that. I bought them originally for their durability but I keep buying them for their comfort and style.

Great products, mis-named in description (it was written pattern instead of patent, which prevented me from finding it for some time!). Comfortable, well-made, easy to wear with anything from jeans to a suit. Thumbs up from me.

These are my favorite flats, by far. They are so comfortable and work well both with work clothes and my favorite pair of jeans. When one pair eventually wears out, I just buy another.I'm very hard on shoes, but these tend to last better than other flats I've tried, and they're more comfortable.
RYKA shoes are simply the best. I am a very active aerobicsinstructor and hiker. No one makes better shoes than RYKA, period.
These flip flops are super comfortabe! Great for all day walking - I'm always looking for comfortable sandals and flip flops since I live in Florida. These are great! I also love Naot sandals.
Love them have been wearing Keds for yearsand they never let me down. My 10yr old daughter also loves hers.
Good boots for the money, only problem my husband had was the sides of the boots would rub on his legs, he is no longer wearing them because of that, could be just the way the boots fit his feet?

I thought these were really cool. A great retro-cool look (made me want to drink Mai-Tais and listen to cool jazz) but the sizing was not right for my foot, so I returned them. I tried 2 sizes (I burned up the savings by having to pay return shipping to Amazon - some competing sites don't make you pay to return shoes......); the first my regular size which was too big, and then a half size smaller which was too small. As popular as these shoes are, my guess is that the problem is with my feet, not the shoes. It probably could have been helped if the shoes had an extra row of eyelets so the strings would go up just that much higher. But, I don't blame Clarks for not altering a classic.

Alright well i am a size fourteen and i usually wear 4e shoes they say its a D size shoe but to me it feel like a 4e because it fits me quite swell. any way i got the cool green ones it fits perfectly i mean the best shoes i ever got. the only problem with the green ones is that when ever you use them it attracts a lot of dirt. A lot! but all i do is spray Shout on them wait 5 minutes and then wipe it down with a damp cloth. but other than that they really have nice ankle protection, by the way there my first ankle tops i ever got and i am extremely glad i got them. i would and did recommend them to everyone. so get them the best 33 dollars i ever spent!

I bought two pairs of Adidas cleats. This was one of the pairs.I purchased them thinking of the comfort they seemed to provide based on the photo. And yes, they're very comfortable, it's like wearing a regular sneaker, but alas, after 20 minutes of sprinting on the field my legs really began to burn, the weight these cleats have is at least twice that of a regular mid cleat.I'd rather wear some worn down pairs I have at home that these, the unnecessary added strain on my legs is just too much.

I've always wanted to wear Keds, and now I finally can! I have wide feet, so they have always been to tight width wise. I'm so glad I was able to find them in wide width. Love the low rise of the shoe, love the look. The only thing I would change is making the inside a bit softer, and maybe more support. But I still love them!

As in most things, not just clothing, you generally get what you pay for. These oxfords are beautiful and well made. The look, quality and construction will bring a smile to any man's face. I bought both the Merlot and Black Oxfords, and also purchased the matching colors of the AE Basic Wide Dress Belt. Perfect business attire combo for any executive. Highly recommended.

Since 1908, Converse has maintained their reputation of being one of the number one shoe suppliers in America. Marked by their innovative style and authentic sports history, they have been recognized by the public for being, "America's Original Sports Company."Converse is noted for their most famous product the "Chuck Taylor All-Stars," but this is not their "sole" focus. Amongst other creations, Converse has given birth to a new, sleek, stylish tennis shoe known as the Converse Targa.The Converse Targa fulfills both fashion and function. Its color variations and distinctive design compliment your style, while providing you with great cushion and support. This cushioning is provided by E.V.A. or Ethyl Vinyl Acetate located in the mid-sole, an essential part in most athletic shoes. Other assets of this material are its ability to aid in shock absorption, and retain its cushioning after bending or compression for a long period of time.I own several pairs of Converse tennis shoes including the Converse Targa, and I am completely satisfied with their durability, style and comfort.I recommend that you go out and purchase a pair of Converse Targa's. Despite their function and fashionable qualities the Targa's are reasonably priced, and for this low price you can "Converse with the Stars."

This has been a decent winter running shoe with plenty of stability, fair amount of cushion, and decent traction. My primary gripe has been the insert not staying in place and riding back in the shoe.
Classic perfection. Fits amazing. Looks beautiful. Shipped quicker than expected. Long lasting. This is my third pair of this exact pair. Each has lasted years. Awesomesauce in a box.
I love ASICS...I've been using these twice a week for over 3 years now. They're still functional (i.e. no holes, loose sole, etc.).
these are just like they have always been. comfy, good looking and long lasting.
I'm just happy i chose this coz i love the shape & comfort is perfect.
GREAT. STILL USING THEM. THEY KEEP THEIR SHAPE AND THE PRICE WAS RIGHT. WOULD BUY THEM AGAIN. KEEP THEM ON AMAZON.

My daughter has not taken these off since she opened them Christmas day! These aren't just cute ballet slippers they are the real deal. They seemed small at first but the leather has stretched to fit her foot perfectly.

It's hard to find a white tennis shoe that doesn't just look plain stupid these days. I hate the huge basketball puffy shoes and the super white polo club/preppy versions. So when I saw this shoe I had to have it. It is the right combo of both retro styling and unassuming 'I don't care' fashion. The shoes are really comfortable, durable as heck and just keep getting better looking the more they are broken in. I'm going to buy another pair because after 1 year of abuse I know I'm going to need a backup when they eventually disintegrate.I recommend the white with Navy myself. The white with black are a little too 'Run DMC'...though they wore Adidas....I know.
My husband is so pleased with these boots. He loves timberland and we were so lucky they had his size. Absolute great buy.
Very nice tennis shoe for the price. Comes with an assortment of colored decals to attach to the side.
Quick shipping, and no problems at all. They have all the colors so you can mix and match
very nice looking boot but they run narrow. the length is good so going up to a larger size did not work for me.

Hi, we purchase clothing and shoes from all over the world and only the US is significantly different.The US sizes are much smaller and this was not obvious on this web site.Other retailers around the world advise which sizing range is used, including some via Amazon.Or, they clearly marked which country sizing they were using.It should be clear on the website which sizing the retailer is using.On the plus side, the shoes were delivered as ordered, on time and in good condition.RussellAustralia
Very happy with the product. It is what was expected and the service was excellent.

Just love these clogs!I oredered size 40 (European). I'm usually take a size 9 or 9.5 American. These shoes are a good fit, though just a little loose in front. A 39 would have been too small I think. Wearing socks helps.They are comfortable & well-cushioned, though not extremely so. If I was doing a whole lot of walking I'd probably choose another shoe.I do wear a lot of clogs and though I usually prefer them with some embellishements or a little fancier design, these are just great & I've been wearing them nearly every day. They are lightweight & look good.The green suede is really attractive & perfect for these fall days in the Pacific Northwest. I sprayed some leather protector /water repellent on them and am ready to face a wet autumn. (As a matter of fact I'll be wearing them to a tailgate at the Husky game this weekend.)
the item is not what it appears to be. be aware of fine print shipping costs.

I got mine from a Converse store in a mall near St Louis for $20. I've had them for 2 and a half years and have worn them everywhere. I ran a 10 minute Mile and a half in them twice for my Air Force PT Test. I've worn them in Iraq, Kuwait, Arizona, Florida, Washington. they are a part of me. Truly an epic shoe. They're also a great driving shoe, with a nice rolled heel after some wear, and great pedal feel. Would recommend them to anyone looking for a nice all around, everyday shoe.
i got these shoes back in like early January and all ready the side is coming apart there is a open on the side. but there good shoes.
I really like these tims. They are comfortable and stylish. My son likes them too. I do recommend buying them.

WOW! I never thought a pair of shoes would make that much difference. I have been having problems walking for a couple years now due to a couple of operations that left one foot a bit deformed and no feeling in either foot. These shoes make it possible for me to maintain my balance better and walk almost normally.Also have had issues with hammer toes rubbing on the top of shoes....the leather linings prevent the rubbing.Wish they looked a little more stylish though...

These were a purchase for my 13 year old granddaughter. Although I have not physically seen them because they live in VA and I in MN, she tells me that they are just what she wanted. Pleased with the ease of this transaction and the speed in which they were shipped to her. Thank you.

I received this shoe and love it. However, the sizing is off. I wear a 7 1/2 medium ladies size. So in sandals I have always wore a size 8. This size 8 is more like a size 7. I would return the item, but will cost more than I want to pay. So I will give these to my daughter-in-law who wears a size 7 so hopefully she can wear it. I think she will love the style. I am debating if I will buy a size 9 in a different color. Otherwise, it is a very nice sandal.

My first opinion when they came in the mail today was that these boots are cheap. They look cheap and feel cheap. This is what I expected having only paid $32. They are not rigid like a work boot and are a very light "tan", (almost white). I play airsoft and they look good with my different sets of camo. They are roughly 8 inches tall and are actually pretty comfortable the first time I put them on. I didnt want an expensive boot because I'm only going to wear them once or twice a month so I hope they will hold up for that much. Conclusion: They look good with camo for all you airsofters/paintballers and they flimsy so it should be easy to run in them, but I do not believe they will hold up for moderate to heavy use such as work or hiking trips. Also they run a bit big. I wear a size 9.5 got a size 9 and they are still a little too big. Overall, they should work well for what I intend to do with them but not so much for anything outside of that. As we all know you get what you pay for.
I really like Adidas and I have probably bought 20 pairs or more for me and my family on Amazon. Amazon has great prices on these and when they are on sale, well that's unbeatable!
This is my second pair. They are comfortable, and being able to wash them with water is a big plus. Buy them.

These Keens were literally life savers for me. After going down some Class 4's in a sit-on-top fishing kayak on the Cumberland River, I had to climb lots of rocks. If not for these shoes, the outcome may have been different.They do get gravel in them sometimes, but not that big of a deal. GREAT SHOES, WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND!!!
Not many products as consistently good as Clark's Wallabee boots. For casual shoes they can look good in slacks as well.
These are classic Converse shoes. They arrived quickly. The fit was true to size and they look great with our school uniform.
Propet always makes a good walking shoe. These fit perfectly -- true to size and width.

I recommend these boots to anyone who has large feet and so far been unhappy with the range of safety footwear on the market . I will definitely buy again and will tell others with awkward foot size to try these Nautilus boots.
Had these for a little over six months now. I've been hiking in the forest, rock hopping, walking all day in the city in these shoes. My feet have never hurt after wearing them all day.
The order was on time and the way it was describe on the site. A+++++

This footwear is great for walking the treadmill. If I was buying training shoes I'd be paying about six to seven times the amount as I did for these. Now, normally I take a size 10/6x so new balance is about the only brand I can get with a fit. Well, I bought the crocs at $15 a pair because not too many peeps want a red xxlarge. I also have a high arch and walk on the outside of my foot. I needed to take a pocket knife to the inner side of the clog to make room for my width. The high arch and and wide foot is the reason I went with the xxlarge. Since I don't run on the treadmill (I walk briskly) these are most comfortable and ideal. The price was so low that I bought three pair. If I didn't need to modify them a bit with my knife I'd give them five stars for my needs.

I decided to try these sandals as a possible replacement for the old Clark's Sunbeat, which no longer lives up to its former standard of quality, unfortunately. These have a very similar appearance and, if anything, are more comfortable. I thought I might dislike the look of the Velcro straps, but it's actually not very noticeable. They are very comfortable and, I thought, more attractive than they appeared in the picture (of course, I'm at an age where "comfortable" tends to be synonymous with "attractive"). I downgraded them one star because the ankle strap tends to ride a little high on me, rubbing right underneath my ankle bone. I think when they get broken in and soften up a little, this will probably cease to be a problem, but for now, it's very irritating after awhile. Overall, though, I like this sandal and look forward to wearing it this summer.

I'm normally a 6.5 shoe size, so I ordered a 7. My foot fit perfectly at the base, but then my calves (which at their widest are slightly smaller than 14"), didn't fit. The size 7 boots wouldn't zip up past them! They look great, but it's too bad they don't fit. I'm rating them 3 stars because this is the first time any boots have never fit over my calves.
The order came quickly and I was very pleased with the shoes and also the price I paid for them.
I purchased these for my husband's birthday and they were an immediate hit. They were comfortable from the first wearing and now they're hard to get off his feet! Quick delivery, too.
I have a very narrow foot. Hard and expensive to fit. VANELi is one of the few shoes that meet my needs. These flats are great - can dress up or down. Would like to have a pair in every color.
i said the always fauthful converse 'cause its simply the best shoe i ever had, they gimme all the confort that i need to walk very much!!!! i mean walk A LOT!!!!
Christmas gift for family member. She was so excited and loved getting these on Christmas day. We almost ended up keeping them for my wife.

After reading multiple reviews that the wide is really not wide enough, I figured I would order a wide. I generally do not have a problem with regular shoes, although some feel slightly too narrow. I measured my foot which seemed to be between an M and a C/D, so I went with the wide since apparently it was not wide enough for most people. Unfortunately, the shoe is wayy to wide for me. I am generally between an 8 and an 8.5 and I went with the 8, which fits fine length wise.I got the wheatfield leather. I am a student and I walk at least a mile a day and live a generally active life, and I needed real shoes for my weak feet and ankles! I was hoping to wear them day-today and mostly at my restaurant, which has no dress code. I have been wearing slip on vans with 0 arch support. At the end of each 7-8 hour shift, my feet and legs ache and after I sit for a while after a shift, I end up hobbling around until my feet readjust to walking. These shoes seem like they'll help with much better support. I was hoping they would look even better than they do, but they look more like old lady shoes than I anticipated (I am 22, so perhaps I define old lady differently!). The top of the shoe ends pretty far down my foot, which means if I wear skinny jeans my socks will definitely show. I suppose this means I should start wearing matching socks.But I still think its worth it to return them for an M.
i was soo happy to find my shoes in the style, color and size i wanted. I looked everywhere and this was the ONLY store that had them.Thanks again!!!
Bought these for my wife...she loves them...very well made! Fits true to size. Very pleased with on time delivery too!
These shoes feel so great. They are true to size. Great for all around use.

The first time I saw this shoe (in black/white patent leather) was on the feet of Boston Celtics All-Star forward Antoine Walker. Being a fan of "old-school" shoes and Mr. Walker, I immediately took a liking to the Adidas Promodel 2G.The Adidas Promodel line has been around for over four decades now and many a current and former NBA player has spent time in a pair, whether in high school, college or at the pro level. The first thing that stood out to me was how Adidas kept the classic "shell toe" as part of the shoe while adding minor adjustments to give it a nice blend of modern/retro looks. The patent leather also gives it a nice touch making the shoe simple, but unique.Another huge plus which I'm sure everyone will notice is the price. ... it ain't gonna clean out too many pockets and for this price y'all can go out and cop a pair or two (one for home games, one for the road). So, the bottom line on the Adidas Promodel 2G is that it's worth considering if you're a junior high or high school-level team looking for a good value in a team shoe (... the Promodel costs a lot less than most shoes designed for team use) or if you need a shoe for those lazy Sunday afternoon games down at the park.
These are amazing and my 10 th pair. The color is like a light champagne and go with everything. I loooove them. The run small so get a size bigger

I bought two pairs of Adidas cleats. This was one of the pairs.I purchased them thinking of the comfort they seemed to provide based on the photo. And yes, they're very comfortable, it's like wearing a regular sneaker, but alas, after 20 minutes of sprinting on the field my legs really began to burn, the weight these cleats have is at least twice that of a regular mid cleat.I'd rather wear some worn down pairs I have at home that these, the unnecessary added strain on my legs is just too much.

Got this for my basketball playing son's shoes which were soaked after practice or game. They really dry them out within the timer of 2 hours on the dryer. Only problem is the shoes stink so bad, that when you put them on the dryer it circulates the stink into the air. We keep the dryer in the garage, not house! At over $100 for shoes, and getting the dryer after the season start, we are keeping the shoes. Would expect that putting new shoes on this from the get go would prevent the stink....will see. Either way, definitely worth it from the drying standpoint!!!
estos son los mejores zapatos que he comprado y les he sacado la chicha, super comodo y duraderos a parte de ser muy casuales y pavos al andar

I had been looking for a pair of moccasin's for awhile. I wear a size 11 so finding shoes of any kind in stores is a bit of a challenge. I saw these on Amazon and was hesitant to order shoes without trying them on first but I went ahead and ordered.Later that week I received them and they actually fit! I wore them the first time for hours and there wa no breaking in period at all. Very comfortable. I do wear thin socks as I found they were a little too snug with my usual white sport type socks.

Total satisfaction, works perfectly, everything ok, this product its ok, and it can be recommended for others users without doubt
I was really impressed with the sizing. My son is very happy, these were just what he wanted.
These are the most comfortable timberlands my husband has ever had....He loves and wants another pair for work he said its worth it!!

I usually get the more target brand converse in a size 8, which fit great, but when I ordered these in a size 8 they were uncomfortable. They felt just slightly too big and didn't fit well around my foot, I don't think ordering a half size down would have helped. I tried to break them in, but they gave me blisters, twice!

This purchase was very good choice, since they are an excellent pair of shoes, very comfortable, a good choice for day to day. Additionally, the shipping and delivery was prompt and the product was in perfect condition.

They have really big bumps and lots of them inside. Then the raised part under the toes is not too comfortable for someone with uncommon foot shapes. They are probably really good once you get used to them. I just looked inside the worn-out pair I have. They are smoother. I think they vary in the interiors quite a bit. I bought a pair of these, but returned them due to them being too bumpy. Mine are so old now, I don't know what they were like new.
I had a foot surgery so walking typically hurts. These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. It is like walking on marshmallows all day long

I bought this shoes because, of the good reviews. I wanted something light, comfortable, waterproof and keep my feet warm. It's comfortable and light but there is absolutely no protection for your feet. I was soooo disappointed, my feet was very, very cold and it felt like I have no shoes at all even though I was wearing very thick socks. I guess for what I paid for should not expected too much!

Being a fan of "old-school" shoes and Mr. Walker, I immediately took a liking to the Adidas Promodel 2G.The Adidas Promodel line has been around for over four decades now and many a current and former NBA player has spent time in a pair, whether in high school, college or at the pro level. The first thing that stood out to me was how Adidas kept the classic "shell toe" as part of the shoe while adding minor adjustments to give it a nice blend of modern/retro looks. The patent leather also gives it a nice touch making the shoe simple, but unique.Another huge plus which I'm sure everyone will notice is the price. ... it ain't gonna clean out too many pockets and for this price y'all can go out and cop a pair or two (one for home games, one for the road). I know this isn't the most helpful review but I would justlike to concur with the other reviews. I have had these bootsfor a year now and except for a few scuffs, they still are ingreat condition.

I got these for my 93 year old mother who still walks for exercise. She has an extremely hard to find shoe size (8 AAAA) and this is almost the only shoe made in that size any more so we are lucky to be able to buy it for her. She has these in several colors and finds them comfortable to wear every day, all day.
They feel comfortable and true to size. The black and white go with everything. I'll be buying this same pair again.

I bought my son a pair of Dada Supremes and he loves them. Unfortunately, the shoe strings are not well made and they broke within the first 2 weeks.Second, I was very disappointed in the amount of time for shipping. It took nearly 3.5 weeks to arrive in South Carolina.My son loves the shoes, but the strings and the shipping are not well done.

I am a nurse for critical care transport and needed steel-toed boots. When I was a volunteer with a busy EMS agency I had tried two other brands of steel-toe boots that were very uncomfortable, I'd come to believe it was just the price you pay for protected toes. When I tried these on I felt like I could jump up or down or run. They don't rub on my ankles or at the toes. I'm wearing them now and I'm not at work! They feel as comfortable as running shoes. We were out in the freezing rain/ice last night and they gripped the pavement well. The stretcher fell on my toe and it didn't hurt. I feel like I am better able to do my job, and my feet are much happier, in these boots! The online downside-the side zipper does not open very wide, I still have to unlace the boot to take them off. But overall I am extremely happy and would make this purchase again.

Good fit and great for softball if you don't like wearing full cleats. Very light and comfortable, except for the staple that protruded on the inside. Easily removed though, but a design flaw none the less.

I find it hard to get chuck taylors in size 12 in stores around my area. It was nice to see they had them here on amazon in a mulitple of styles at great prices. The shipping was faster than I could of imagined and I plan to order future products from this provider.
These shoes are great - comfortable and durable - exacly what I was looking for! I have worn them for multiple performances and they still look great!

Truly amazing shoes!I've being wanting this shoes for so long. I finally commit to buy them and the result as greater than expected.Excellent quality! Amazing fit!The shoelaces are a little low for my taste, but that is how the shoes are.

I love these shoes! I have bought several pairs in different colors. They are as comfortable as atheltic shoes but much more stylish. But beware--they run small! I normally wear a size 6.5, but I have to order a size 7 with these.

I bought these boots for my neice's 4th birthday, she put them on right after opening them! I puchased a pair of these for a 16 mile hiking trip. out of the box, no joke, these were(are) the most comfortable pieces of footwear i have ever had on my feet. as for the water proof part, i have found these boots are superior! during my hike it rained overnight and the next morning hiking through mud and rain my feet stayed completely dry. i also purchased another pair of these for work and daily wear because they are so comfortable, and part of my job as an auto-body technician is detailing a car after it is painted for customer pick-up. the drain in the shop at work is very poor, and during washing a car, u find yourself standing in a 2 inch puddle of water and my feet stay dry all day in these boots.i would also like to add that your feet stay warm in these boots. i usually wear normal socks, but when i go hiking or camping i wear warm thick socks. either way your feet stay warm

Easy Spirit shoes of all types are unquestionably the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. I recently bought 5 different types of shoes and they are all fantastic. I have medical issues that make it difficult for me to wear shoes of any kind. Easy Spirit allows me to walk like I haven't for several years. Quality and comfort are fantastic.

I have owned a pair of these shoes for over 3 years now and am currently going to buy the exact same pair again. I am a nurse and spend hours on my feet and these are the most comfortable shoes I've found. They've held up great! You'll love them too!

My father-in-law loves his new boot slippers, I don't think he's hardly had them off since Christmas, he say's they are the warmest and most comfortable boot slipper he has ever had. Thank-you for such a wonderful item.

No breakin period, stood in a stream for 5 minues and was bone dry, did a 10 mile hike - no hotspots.I love them... nothing bad to say, good grip, nice support, all I did is replace the liner with a gel footbed...but I do that with all my boots, the ones that came with were fine.LOVE THIS BOOT - way cheaper than most.
I'm very happy with this purchase. I love my new navy Keds! They came quickly and fit great!

Not having worn this shoe for any length of time, I can only surmise that it will be as comfy as it feels now. My only disappointment was, once I received the shoe, the squared-off toe is broader than it appears in the online photos. That's the problem with buying online -- there's nothing quite like having an item in hand.Also, I'm glad I read the online reviews from prior customers. As a consequence, I bought a size smaller than normal and even that feels a little loose. Being a loafer, I hope I don't have problems with it slipping on my heel.
Very comfortable. Matches many colors. When your feet are happy, you are happy. At least I am.
Bought the book as a gift and the receiver loved it. The item came quickly and as described, great deal.

Got theses for My wife for a modeling job she had.... She has tons of shoes that kill her feet and after shooting in for a few hours her feet were still feeling good.... She is normally a 5.5 and She got a size 6 and they fit her just slightly loose. Shipping was fast and as expected

First of all, I love the boots. My only problem is that I wear a men's US 10M. The boots fit like a 9 1/2. I like them enough I gave the 10s away and ordered 11s. If you are unsure, try on some DMs at a shoe store before you order. I am in Afghanistan, so no stores here. If they had fit properly, I would give them 5 stars.

I have been wearing this particular style of Reef flip flops for over a decade now. I strayed away foolishly for one summer when someone talked me into buying Rainbows and they fell apart in just a couple of months. When I lived in Florida these babies would last me for a full summer and up until the beginning of the next one when I would simply buy another pair. Now that I live in New York where there's more than 2 seasons, I can get about 2 summers out of them. I should have taken pictures of the pair that this order replaced. I had worn the tread off the bottoms and almost completely worn through the sole, but even then they were super comfortable. Although their sturdiness is amazing, what I love most about these flip flops are their ability to mold themselves to your feet in such a way that after a month or so of wearing them sometimes you forget you have shoes on (minus the fact that you're not stepping on glass or hot cement). Some people default to heels or sneakers as much as possible, I default to these flip flops as much as I can.

I don't know why they are called Rollers, given that these shoes have no wheels. However, they are a great pair of clogs! While they have a thick sole to give me a little more height, they are very stable. I might not wear these shoes for an extensive day of walking, but they are great for the office with khakis. All around, a great comfy shoe!
i got these shoes back in like early January and all ready the side is coming apart there is a open on the side. but there good shoes.

This is the first pair of Merrell's I ever bought and I ordered these based on a YouTube review.Update:These boots are outstanding in terms of ankle support,sizing. The tread is Vibram and they are the best. The sole,heel mid-sole are very supportive even in unstable areas. I put them to good use hiking and camping. The easy lace system made taking these on and off easy. Plus I feel like I can walk faster with these boots,probably that is because of the ultra stable foot bed of the shoe. This is the first Merrell boots I even owned and I am impressed. But I found them slippery when walking on wet porches made from wood. Also these boots were not waterproof above the fabric just below the first eyelets. Other than that definitly best boots for a hiker, great tread the sole has the shank I feel absorbs the rocks and roots that hurt feet after doing some miles on a trail.

I've used a lot of different brands of walking shoes and different models within brands and the Propet Stability Walker is head and shoulders above the rest. I walk 5 miles a day every day and need a good shoe. They are more comfortable right out of the box, they provide excellent support, and hold up under heavy use. I have used them for years and they have kept me pain free from plantar fascitis.

See the nice shine in the photo...well, you're not going to get that. You're going to get a "matte" finish on the leather portion. I bought these to spit shine for my VFW work...not going to happen I'm afraid.Comfort: just OKQuality: one of the aluminum eyelits is already dislodged.Will I sent them back...no ...too much hassle; besides, they didn't cost much
These shoes look nice and are extremely easy on the feet. I shot a wedding wearing them and never had an uncomfortable moment.
Purchased these for my 75 year old sister who had been looking and looking for some navy keds. She loves them.

They are a very comfortable shoe and they last a long time. I bought my first pair of these shoes many years ago, and I just replaced them with another pair of the exact color and style, that is how much I love them.
I bought these for my son. He had a pair he used for work (construction) and he wanted another pair that looked a bit nicer. He loves these and says they are very comfortable.

This product was purchased for my mother-in-law who has poor circulation in her feet and has to be very careful to have shoes that do not constrict the blood flow or cause any blisters or sores. These shoes have been great for her. She has them in several colors.
I love the style of this boot so much~~ Everything is perfect expect its weight. Next time I think I will buy a less heavier danner boot.
The product is very good. I am satisfied with the quality. So far I have not had problems since I'm using. We recommend

Chuck Taylors are just my style!! They look good with anything i wear, and are very comfortable. All you need are some black jeans with a white or black shirt and your good to go!!! My only problem is that people just can't seem to watch where they are going, so if I pat dirt out of it, it looks like the color fade's in that area. But overall great shoe to wear!!! Watch your feet though.
I am very satisfied with my recent Amazon purchase. My All Stars came significantly earlier than the prospected delivery date! I am extremely satisfied with the seller! Thank you Amazon!

THESE ARE NICE AND SPACIOUS BOOTS AND THE BURGANDY IS A HARD COLOR TO FIND BUT MY GOD THEY COME WITH NO INTERIOR CUSHIONING SO BEWARE.....IT TOOK 2 SETS OF INNER CUSHIONS TO RENDER THESE WEARABLE. IF IT WERE NOT FOR THE COLOR THEY WOULD HAVE GONE RIGHT BACK.THEY ARE DRESSY ENOUGH FOR WORK ON IN CLEMENT DAYS BUT THAT HARD FOOT BASE ALMOST GOT THESE A 1 STAR RATING.

They worked great for tap dancing in a school play. Great price for shoes that were only used a month. The only problem was in sizing, we had to order a size and a half smaller than street shoes although it was recommended to order two sizes smaller.

I would suggest to everyone to visit the Teva website and sign up for their emails, because often you can get a good deal on their shoes. That said, I used to buy $2.50 Old Navy flip flops, and thus thought my mother-in-law had lost her ever-loving mind when she purchased Tevas for me. Now I LOVE TEVAS!! This style in particular is wonderfully supportive and conforms to the shape of your foot. They clean easily-- they can be thrown in the washer-- look nice enough for business casual wear, and feel amazing. Regarding the size issue, I have a fairly wide foot, as does my husband, and we haven't had a problem with fit. (Common sense should dictate that if you are a half size, you need to purchase the next larger size, not smaller.) Do not hesitate to spend the money on this shoe. Your feet will thank you.

I usually can fit into a 5.5M in clarks comfortably, though my feet are on the wider side and the back of my feet are higher than average. I ordered 5M blue for lack of half sizes and after reading some reviews stating them run big. I have yet to try them in the slushy boston street, and I just tried them on walking in my living room. The zippers make putting on and taking off the ice muchers very easy, much better than my snow boots with laces. About fitting, these shoes do run a bit longer, but not wider. There is still room ahead of my big toes, but it is quite snug around the ball of my feet. At the end of a day, I feel more comfortable let the shoes unzipped with thick socks on, but that might be just the high back of my feet (which is not high arch). May update after trying them in snowy/slushy weather.

I have worn these shoes for the past 5 years, and never once have I been disappointed with the quality. I have owned at least 10 pair, and the only reason I end up buying new a pair is because they just get dirty. I even wash them repeatedly (which should shorten the life of the shoe, but does not) and they still look good. You just can't beat this shoe when it comes to wearing it casually, it matches everything, and is very comfortable. As long as they make these, I will continue to buy them.

This shoe has been the best! My foot is very narrow and it fits me fine, my heel feels very secure. Also the roominess in the toes is great because I have a bone spur problem in my toe and most shoes really hurt it. I am very excited to have found these.
very satisfied with the way this shoe looks and feels. got lots of compliments on this shoe,

This is the third pair of Five Ten Spire shoes that I have owned. They are great for long days on multi-pitch climbs. The leather upper forms to my feet and gives just enough to make a great all day shoe. The four star rating is because they seem to wear a little faster than my other shoes. If you are looking for comfort and performance for an entry level price, this is one shoe to try.

This isn't a review but just a message on the off chance that anyone representing Corcoran reads it.I live in the UK and it is virtually impossible to get these boots online in Europe. The ones I've finally managed to find cost an absolute fortune (185) which I'm still going to pay as I may not get another chance to buy any -since these ones will no doubt quickly sell out.There must be a huge potential market in the UK and Europe just from armed forces personel alone, such is the reputation of Corcoran over here. So for what it's worth, please for the love of god try and make Corcoran boots available on Amazon to the European market -I beg you!Regards, Liam.

This is my third pair of this sandal. They are so comfortable. They take me everywhere. The leather is of great quality. You can get them wet and they dry just as soft as they were before they got wet. This is one of few pairs of footwear that I literally wear out. They provide good walking support as soon as you put them on. No breaking in needed.
6 N is a hard to find shoe size. This white sandal was perfect in every way. It's exactly what I was looking for !!

i was extremely happy with this purchase. these boots normally retail for around a $100 and Amazon beat that price. the boots are my favorite footwear. Amazon was accurate in description and I received them sooner than the expected delivery date. love Amazon!
These are the most comfortable timberlands my husband has ever had....He loves and wants another pair for work he said its worth it!!
This wedge heel is so comfortable. I can wear it to work all day without a problem. The green patent leather is so pretty and easy to clean. I highly recommended it.
They are comfortable and perfect to wear as slippers around the house or outside. They arrived 4 days earlier than expected!

The style of this shoe is exactly what I was looking for. However, the size I ordered was too small and unfortunately it was not available in the size needed, so I had to return it and couldn't get another. Otherwise, I definitely would have kept it.

These shoes feel great, fit great too. The worst part about them is they squeak, and squeak loud. I cannot sneak out of the office or around employees because they are so loud and everyone knows I am coming.

These shoes lived up to my hopes after seeing the pictures on Amazon. The leather could be a little higher quality, it does have a slightly fake quality to it. I would pay a lot more for shoes that had this exact styling, but upgraded leather. All in all, they are a good value and look excellent. I've only worn them 15 times or so, but they still look great and are very comfortable.
I ordered these boots two days before Halloween and when I got them I was really happy with them! Great, sexy, and fun boots!
I know this isn't the most helpful review but I would justlike to concur with the other reviews. I have had these bootsfor a year now and except for a few scuffs, they still are ingreat condition.
Since I bought the boot model of these shoes, I was so pleased that I wanted to get another pair. One day, just browsing amazon, I found these incredible fun shoes.Now I have them all!!!
I bought these for my daughter's first ballet class. They are cute, easy to put on, durable, true to size, and shipped quickly.

kinda nice, but common coloured. Did,nt have the colour that I wanted in my size. Chocolate, sorta rare in this city. Many folks r with classic red that,s cool, though I like the chocolate chuck taylors best. Maybe i'll add another sumthin, shoe strings with prints.........

I have 2 pairs of this model shoe and love them. After being a Nike fan for years I decided to give something else a try. This shoe is lightweight and very comfortable. I also love the classic style. And you can't complain about the nice price.
i purchased these in different sizes. i got them on time and theyre perfect for my babies and i also got a great deal on them

These shoe trees make a big difference... they help keep my dress shoes in good form and kept them from developing a horrible smell from moisture left in them. These are built very well and will last for years. It is an affordable investment to keep your dress shoes looking/smelling great.

I'll just echo the other 5 star reviews here. Everything they've said is true. These shoes are incredibly comfortable, and they look great! First day I wore them to the office I got a ton of compliments. I look forward to buying another pair of allen edmonds very soon.

These are absolutely the most comfortable and lightweight shoes I have ever worn. I have these in several colors, and will continue to buy them. The only thing that I would change is to make the white on the soles the same color as the rest of the shoe, but the only time that has prevented me from buying the shoe is when looking for black shoes to wear as part of a uniform.
Estoy encantada con esas sandalias, preciosas, muy comodas. He tenido otras sandalias de esta marca y me han resultado excelentes. Si lo recomendaria.
They are as Comfortable as can be. Wear them everyday, and they looks fantastic. Looking to get another pair in a different color.

These are my busbands favortie hike boot and work boot. The hold up well for about a year, if i switch between these & another pair. Great 8hr day boot, especially those like me who do landscaping,street work etc. Great overall fit, his feet have bunions,water proof is excel.,great support,Amazon has had the lowest price anywhere. Great for lite/mod. hikes. Hiked at the Pinnacles, Hollister, CA up the Condor trail. The grade/incline is steep, gravely, dirt, and slippery these boots held up!!!!!!!!!!didnt see one Condor, but it was a nice workout and his feet were comfy, cool and no pain. Right out of the box, comfort!!!
I was so happy with this purchase. I purchased this just days before Christmas. These came on time and were exactly what I wanted. Thanks for the great service.
I've been looking for red chucks for a while now. I love these!! I would recommend getting a half size to a full size smaller though, they run quite large.

I first purchased a pair of Hi-Tech Altitude boots approximately 10 years ago. They fit me extremely well and were very comfortable from the first moment I wore them. Prior to this purchase, I have had 2 different pairs of the Hi-Tech Altitude boots and I have not been disappointed. They wear extremely well and seem to last me about 4 or 5 years. I have found them excellent for everyday wear as well as for use in fishing and hunting. I think these are excellent low cut boots for such a moderate price. Haven't ventured into buying the $100+ boots, but then why should I when these work so well, so can not comment or compare my $70 Hi-Techs to the more pricey boots. I think you will be pleased with these boots.
My sons loves his Tevas, and wears them all the time, now that we finally have some decent days in Seattle.They stay on his feet because of the two adjustable straps. Great shoe for summer.

Great shoes, but if you are looking at these you already know that. I bought an off color because they were the cheapest here on Amazon, but they were the best color anyways. go figure. So shop around here, amazing the small differences in prices.I have a wide foot and they fit me fine, seem to be true in size.

This is the 5th pair of these shoes I've purchased. I buy at least 2 pairs a year. They're comfortable and I like the way they look. However the last 2 pairs have had problems with the stitching coming undone very soon after purchase. I still like them, but I'm definitely looking for a new boat shoe.
These shoes are comfortable as well as long lasting. They do not make your feet sweat or smell bad like other high top shoes. This shoe never goes op of style

If you spend all day on your feet, and sneakers don't cut it, these are the shoes for you. This is my third pair. They hold up insanely well (I work in kitchens and wore my first pair almost every day for about three years). It's also possible to have them resoled and re-uppered, I believe, but I eventually tore out the staples at the toes and wore down the tread, so it didn't seem worth it. They are pricey, but I think they're worth every penny. My knees don't hurt at the end of they day like they do when I wear sneakers.The leather will look niced for longer if you polish them. I think dansko makes a specific polish, but I just use a regular brown leather shoe polish and a rag and haven't had any problems.I also have a "dress" pair which I wear when I'm not at work. That's how much I like them.

Absolutely love this style of shoe and this is my third pair. They did a quality change for SURE. I can barely slide my foot in it's so stiff. The sole seems to be a hard plastic feel instead of the soft kind before. And the shoe "leather" is stiff and looks cheaper. It is still comfortable to wear, once I can cram my foot in (practically needs a shoe horn). I hope I don't have the sole cracking problems others mention here. It's a shame, this used to be a 5 star shoe.
I was so happy with this purchase. I purchased this just days before Christmas. These came on time and were exactly what I wanted. Thanks for the great service.

THESE ARE NICE AND SPACIOUS BOOTS AND THE BURGANDY IS A HARD COLOR TO FIND BUT MY GOD THEY COME WITH NO INTERIOR CUSHIONING SO BEWARE.....IT TOOK 2 SETS OF INNER CUSHIONS TO RENDER THESE WEARABLE. IF IT WERE NOT FOR THE COLOR THEY WOULD HAVE GONE RIGHT BACK.THEY ARE DRESSY ENOUGH FOR WORK ON IN CLEMENT DAYS BUT THAT HARD FOOT BASE ALMOST GOT THESE A 1 STAR RATING.

These are great sandals! I bought some last summer and haven't been able to locate them locally, but fortunately they were available on the Internet. Love them! One of the most comfortable sandals I have found.

These are great run around shoes and camping. Light weight so you'renot logged down on short hikes. Don.t show dirt and i,ve washd them in the past. I wear 8.5 N andthese shoes fit pefectly. Nice navy lighter than shown but not toolight. Avazoncame through again for me. Jakjaneus

I purchased two pairs of these based on the Naturalizer "Scout" pair which I already own and love. I have had them for well over five years and they are fantastic. I was so excited to see this style for sale on Amazon.com.However, after receiving them, they are NOT the Naturalizer Scout. They are a cheap knock-off and definitely not worth the money. The REAL Scout shoe is a leather upper, padded sole, and has elastic in the back strap to help adjust the shoe.What I received is plastic! Plastic is never comfortable on your feet when you are used to leather. The sole is not padded and sinks in. The back strap does not have the elastic which helps to adjust it.I am so disappointed and I would never recommend these to anyone
Very happy with my purchase. Because of my small feet, I have trouble finding proper fitting shoes. These shoes were very comfortable and a perfit fit. I didn't even need to break them in.

I saw these moccasins in a store in San Juan Capistrano CA but by the time I went back to get them, they did not have my size anymore, so I found them on Amazon.com. Lucky me! They are so soft, and comfortable. I like the color because it is neutral and I can wear them with anything and they will be good in warm weather.

Love the Croc. Best thing yet for vacation air travel in the US, starting with the pre-boarding search and continuing through the flight. Comfortable, stable, and easy to slip on and off. Beats the heck out of the socks the airlines used to give out on the long flights (remember those?)
This is a great fitting shoe if you put a double air foam insoles in them. I now owe 6 pair in different colors.

Aside from the old-school good looks, comfort, support, and style of the New Balance 991s, these are the unofficial shoes for prep school students and fraternity members. Wear them with khakis, a polo shirt, and a baseball hat (preferably of a large Southern state school - UNC or UVA is ideal).They are also ideal for use with contrasting laces - thick red ones are best.

I am an intermediate runner I would say. I run various 5K and 10K's, Half marathons and have started to dabble into the world of trail and adventure racing. I say that to let you know I am no professional but I do love to run and compete against myself. For the Kansas City half marathon this past year I wanted to try a minimalist shoe to see if my times would change any from my times I produced in Nike Vomero's and Mizuno Wave's. I tried multiple pairs of this type of shoe on and unfortunately for me (due to the color scheme) these felt the best.I was amazed at how comfortable they felt because by looking at them you would think it would feel like an old High School CC waffle, not the case. The only running I did on these prior to raceday was about 5 miles at an easy pace on a treadmill to get the feel of the shoe. Raceday comes and yes I get alot of looks but I eventually get over that. The first couple of miles were interesting and I thought I had made a mistake. However, once I got into my stride these performed greatly. I was able to maintain splits at personal record times with no thoughts about foot and leg pain. By the end of the race I had knocked off 5 minutes from my previous times, I will let you decide whether it was the shoe or training. My legs felt great as did my feet. I did have one little "hot spot" on one of my toes but that should be expected.I tried these just to see what it would be like to race in a minimalist shoe and I can now say I will never race in a trainer again. I swear by these shoes for racing and speedwork. Get over the color scheme and enjoy this pair of shoes. Oh yeah the "ecco friendly" piece doesn't hurt either.

These shoes,Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Hi Top are the ones that I've looked for all my life.They are extremely comfortable, well made, fit just right, keep you warm in cold weather and cool in the summer. I couldn't be happier with this purchase. Please, follow the advice stated in the link regarding women's and men's zises.This is very important.Don't get confused with other brands or models. I wish they'd come in different colors, I'd get one of each.

these shoes are SOOOOOOOOOOOO comfortable. usually when a shoe is flat is has no inside cushion, however that is not the case with these shoes. furthermore the style is SO hot, people ask me all the time where i got these shoes! they look great with jeans. good for walking around town, even going out!

My work takes me out in bad weather frequently, and I really need a boot that will keep my feet dry. I have suffered through 3 different pairs of "waterproof" boots that gave me no protection--you get what you pay for, I guess. Someone suggested I order from L. L. Bean, and I was getting ready to fork up the dough, when I saw these in an e-mail from Amazon. They are not fancy, but they ARE waterproof! And, after an initial breaking-in period, they are quite comfortable. I am thoroughly satisfied with these boots.
I mistakenly ordered the wrong width, have reordered it but havn't recieved it yet, I hope it fits as it is a nice well made thong.

These shoes were a birthday present for my 4yo. Based on reviews, I decided to buy one shoe size up from her current shoe size to be safe. She went up a size right before her birthday and they fit perfect. They match street shoe size as recommended. Great shoes at a great price!

I'm semi-handicapped and needed a slide-on slipper for cold days and nights and these slippers were perfect. Easy to slip on, keep me warm but don't make my feet sweat! I was hesitant to pay so much for slippers but they were well worth it!

Oh my gosh...this is the best shoe ever!If you have a problem with WIDE feet (mine are boats! High instep and just plain wide!), these are a wonderful shoe. I have such trouble finding comfy stuff to put on my feet. These are actually "walkers", so they are good for all the basic stuff. They are also SUPER LIGHT! They just feel like clouds on my feet. I am in heaven.Also, the styling on your feet is very slimming. Some shoes LOOK like boats on. These have small cording to tie up with and the shape is very narrow looking across the top. But very roomy inside.Wide shoe that has a narrow appearance. PRICELESS!They look like an athletic shoe, not geriatric like some walkers do (not that there is anything wrong with that ). Roomy... but I feel very secure in them when walking. Not wobbly at all.If you have trouble getting shoes, I feel your pain!!! and I highly recommend these.
Another GREAT shoe from Stride Rite!LOVE these! My son likes them also.True to size and width.

I really love the look of these sandals and hope that one day they will be comfortable. The straps rub the top of my feet and have caused blisters so I am trying to figure out a way to loosen up the straps. I have never had a sandal do this before. To walk on these shoes is very cushion like.
Ordered these for my husband, it's his 2nd pair. He wore the 1st pair into the ground over several years so pretty good value.

I work in a supermarket, with concrete floors covered by linoleum (as with most stores) so I needed a shoe that was sturdy with good support and yet, gentle on my feet. This shoe works great. I've worn this pair for about 6 weeks and am very happy with them. I ordered my regular size but in wide and that helps tremendously. I would buy these again.
[[ASIN:B0002LTGE8 Naturalizer Scout]]As difficult as it is to obtain a Narrow size, I was able to purchase this beautifully crafted shoe at a very reasonable price. Thank You.
I love my chuck Taylors. They go well with Jeans or almost anything that I want to wear. Looking to buy the Chocolate next.

I bought these shoes as a beater pair to only use while playing basketball outdoors. I have been pleasantly surprised at the good cushioning, comfortable fit, and great traction these shoes provide. I now use these shoes as my primary basketball shoes for indoor or out. I've had the shoes for a few months now and they have proven to be very durable as well. My only complaint is that if you get one of the glossy colors, it scuffs easily - but it's only cosmetic.

I have had over 10 pairs of easy spirit shoes and have these in two colours. I have high insteps, high arches and hammertoes... and these are still comfortable. The support is not as good as in their running and training shoes, yet plenty good for walking long distances and taking public transport daily.

I have a difficult time finding shoes that will work for me. Most stores do not carry fashionable women's shoes in wide widths. I am enjoying this pair of Easy Spirit Shoes in the color red. I would purchase these again without hesitation.

I purchased the Naturalizer shoe, Scout, Since I already have bought 4 or 5 pr Naturalizer shoes through Amazon, I knew the quality of the shoe, and what service to expect and I have not bee disappointed. Easily, a 5-star experience!

I bought this pair from a plus-size catalog, and have been extremely pleased with them. My flat feet are clown-sized and wide, and I'm partly disabled (one foot is usually swollen), so you can imagine how difficult it is to find comfy shoes. This brand and model is very lightweight and cushioned as I walk. The light weight is important because I don't have to stomp around in boots, and I don't trip on carpet or other surface disruptions. I can put on some mileage with this pair! The Velcro straps easily adjust for my normal foot and swollen foot. It's all good. Time to buy another color, because the first pair, bought in 2008, is by no means worn out or broken. Add to my cart, Amazon!
These boots are as cute as can be! Got them for my 10 yo daughter and she loves them. The stitching is nicely done and the silver toe tip dresses them up. She says they are very comfortable.

These are well made, very sturdy if you have problems with thin heels. They could use a bit of padding in the shoe, the inside is quite hard, would definitely recommend some gel inserts or such type thing.

The cayman i received fits fine and works fine. The details of the moldings, however, were noticeably less defined than the ones i bought last year. Upon closer examination, i noticed that the words MADE IN USA imprinted on the underside of the crocs on last year's model were replaced with MADE IN CHINA on this year's model. Perhaps THAT explains the lacking quality difference? Again it still works fine, but SORRY! I'm not paying $30 for crocs MADE IN CHINA that look like the cheaper chinese-made knock-offs! For those, the only things lacking are the cute little croc buttons on the sides. I'll buy other brands (albeit made in china) for a lot less.
As i was leaving feedback i accidently pressed the no answer instead of the yes answer. i just wanted to correct that and say that the sneakers were brand new and shipped on time

Out of all 4 of my current Air Force military boots, this has to be the favorite. Wearing them, they feel like running shoes. They don't feel like your wearing you heavy combat boots. They're not steel or safety toed, they have a box toe only. If you want one of those installed in this, you're going to have to find a shoe guy somewhere in town to do it (I've seen them charge $50-people told me it's still worth it since they can only have steel toed boots in their job). If you're in the military, buy them at your MCSS (Military Clothing Sales Store) on base. At AAFES, they're under a hundred dollars ($98.95) and not tax of course. I do recommend you buy these. You have an excuse not to shine the rest of the boot since it has cloth and no worries of having it crack at the flexing point. I accidentally used a hose to wash vehicles, and the water didn't go through the cloth. They're not water proof, they're water resistant, so don't walk through a lake in them unless you have to. They dry fast since it's mostly cloth and not leather. My opinion, they look better than regular leather boots and require less polishing. If you do want someone to steel toe them and find a person to do it, they usually recommend to buy a half size larger than your foot.
The boots are fairly comfortable right out of the box. After several months, they have not begun to show any wear yet. The laces do feel a bit flimsy but haven't broken yet.
I bought the bag in the whisky color. It looks cute and fashionable. Itself is quite spacious and perfect for mall shopping. Have got some compliments from strangers.

I have been using Deer Stag shoes, especially the "Times" model for ~20 years. They are both a good walking shoe and good looking dressier-than-most walking shoes. In addition, they require little or no break-in period, this is especially important to anyone who has sensitive feet. I'm a 79 year old male with tender feet and skin and I like to walk fast (3mph - 4 mph), so comfort is paramount for me.One caveat: The country of manufacture can make a big difference. I have a black pair of Deer Stag "Times" manufactured in Brazil and they do not have adequate padding around the edge or under the tongue. Consequently, they irrate the skin just below the ankles and around the heel. I doubt that I'll be able to use them even with sole inserts which help a bit.My comments in the first paragraph were about shoes manufacture in China and I would give them five stars. This is very surprising since I assume both countries are using the same specifications.

Bought this item from Bargain Outfitters. This is the last tme I buy from them. They listed the shipping weight as 2 pounds. I accordingly bought the item from them and had it freght forwarded to my overseas address. It turned out that they provided false information. the shipping weight was twice as much and I had to pay accordingly twice as much overseas shipping. When I contacted them about it they were telling me they are sorry I thought the shipping weight was different, in effect informing me that I do not know how to read their specific shipping weight ino they provide on Amazon. They refuse their mistake and would not provide a good business gesture of waiving the already charged shipping weight. I do not trust someone who provides false info and does not admit it.

It does not have quite the support I need in a shoe--wish that were not so as it is a beautiful shoe.I also need to have a heel that is rubberized as I found it easy to slip while testing out the shoe.

I bought these shoes to wear in my pottery studio, where clay gets on everything. They are very comfortable, even while standing on a hard concrete surface for long periods of time. I just throw them in the sink to rinse the clay off - whereas before I had to wear old tennis shoes that never got more than a surface wipe and were always dirty. The only issue I have had with them is that I have a high instep, and the top of my foot tends to stick to the upper of the shoe in one spot when I don't wear socks. Otherwise, they are great.
I found these to be a perfect fit. They are very comfortable and great for those long shopping trips. Look very nice with both casual dress and jeans.

I bought my son a pair of Dada Supremes and he loves them. Unfortunately, the shoe strings are not well made and they broke within the first 2 weeks.Second, I was very disappointed in the amount of time for shipping. It took nearly 3.5 weeks to arrive in South Carolina.My son loves the shoes, but the strings and the shipping are not well done.

I love SoftSpot shoes and have purchased many! But this pair was slightly flawed. One of the leather strips on the front of the shoe left an open space more than twice as wide as the other strips on the shoe.
Bought these for watering in the yard in the morning. Ideal for that task. Quickly slip on and off and comfortable

I love Eastland shoes! The Plainview Lace-Up Oxfords are well made, comfortable, and nice looking under a pair of jeans. What adds to the level of comfort is the fact that these shoes come in wide widths. I wear these shoes all the time. They're comfortable enough that I don't think about them at all once I've put them on.
This was a very good deal and was a fast delivery. I highly recommend this seller to all.

My children got me a brown pair for Christmas. I loved them, so I ordered a black pair. When I received them, the rope around the ankle was white....looked worn out. I was going to return them & get another pair, but I didn't get an invoice with my order. I wasn't happy with that, so I took a black laundry pen, and colored it in, & it looks fine. They are very warm. I got them a little larger than my shoe size in case I wear a thick sock. I would definitely recommend these boots.
COMET SHOES IS AWESOME!! I MADE A MISTAKE AND HAD TO SEND THEM BACK AND THEY RETURNED WITH THE RIGHT PAIR SOOOO QUICK!! AWESOME BUY
I love the shoes. They are great, shipping was good and thanks. I can't wait to order more.
This was the seventh or eighth purchase of this make and model shoes so obvioulsy I am very satisfied with them.
The shoes are WONDERFUL! They fit perfectly and feel great on the feet. I'm sure my wife will be ordering more of them in the future.

I'm on my third pair of these. I wore out the first two on my daily 3-mile walk. Now, one year into these, the left boot has started to crush my left big toe as it flexes when I walk. There is still plenty of sole left but I'm afraid I can't wear these again. I have really liked this particular boot for hiking and walks but I'm afraid I'm going to have to look for something else to replace it.2013-01-23: Update. I didn't wear these for a couple of weeks and then I tried them on a 3-mile walk tonight. They were JUST FINE. My left foot must have just been sensitive for some other reason which caused the problem described above. I wouldn't hesitate to buy these again when these wear out.

Problem with this shoe is that they don't carry my size 8.5 double E. So why is that I am having a problem finding my size. Is there some kind of conspiracy going on the the size department. To me there is no excuse of not carring my size.

Hello;I recvd my pair of Keens just before leaving for New Zealand and had a day of wearing them, loved the feel and how tough they felt. I wore them on the Brutal 22 hour flight and the odor core on them definately works. We went on a pretty easy trek on Mt. Pirongia for about an hour, when we got back I noticed that the back of the heel was coming apart, Bummer.. So I was not a happy camper! We just got back last week and I have just sent them back to Mt.Gear and hope to get an exchange. I'm just hoping that it is a defect. I met a lot of people in NZ who have Keen's and have not had any problems, so I am counting the days to get a replacement.Overall Great Sandal... But did't last very long less than 2 weeks.

I was paranoid that the shoes would be tight but stuck with the size 10 since my daughter had just gotten a few new pairs of street shoes in 10s. We always err on the larger size so that shoes will last for a bit! She just wore them to her first ballet class and the shoes were perfect, with a little room to grow. She even wore them w/out tights since I didn't have them yet, and was perfectly comfortable. I always wore Capezio shoes for ballet throughout my childhood and will certainly stick with the brand for my daughter.
The Last time I wore a pair of these, my codename was Roadrunner, fastest boy in the universe...lol.I bought these more for the nostalgiathan anything else.I have no complaints

let me preface by saying that my previous shoes were $350 (I pre-ordered and received them the day they came out) bright orange, F50 prime, that weighed 5 oz each. COOL! is what everybody thought about those rocket boots. I still love them even though they are all stretched and worn out after about a year of daily use. I also have my older F50 adizero chameleons (now cleaned up and for display) and those were more than double the price of the copa as well. Now, I still prefer the orange primes over my new copas when it is wet and muddy, because they are plastic they can be hosed off easily and forgotten about until needed again. I knew I needed to move away from F50s when they came out with the micoach computerized model. because I dislike micoach and it's generally very-buggy software. (a former micoach pacer addict, here).NOT HOT...You need to take care of them. I tried the shower trick when they were new and treat them often about once a week at least with leatherfood from eurosport. Traction is slightly less. They do not run as fast. (if you haven't worn out several pairs of top line F50s then you will probably just say "lame excuse, you just can't run as fast as you want to"... my 100m PR is 11s even and I can do a 5k in 16:50) They just don't feel as fast as the TOTL synthetics; in football speed isn't everything.So the copa traction is not as good, the speed is not as good. They are more than double the weight. So... what makes these shoes worthy of a 5 star review???SMOKING HOT...here the magic of the copa comes in. Whatever hesitation I would have, that extra touch I always felt I needed before letting off a shot or pass, it's gone. I am finally at the point where I can start learning juggling tricks. I've been playing since I was 4 and up through HS of course, but about a year ago I really stepped up my game. I worked hard to get where I am, and I'm not letting shoes take the credit for that. but I do think they help.Some day, adidas (and nike and friends) will figure out how to make a plastic shoe with better touch than K-leather. but that day has not yet come. You will be able to have your boot custom made exactly to your foot as precision-measured by a robot. but that day has not yet come. You will be able to print your own designs on your boots in any colour of the rainbow. but that day has not yet come. Everybody in the world will be able to afford a pair, and they will last forever. unless you want a new pair, and then the old boots will instantly turn into delicious cookies and beer. but that day has not yet come. Until that day comes I don't see anything better than copas, for me.If you look in the dictionary under football cleat you will see a picture of adidas copa. I'm no superstar; I pay to play, I don't get paid to play. I'm like everybody who just wants to have fun on the field and if you are the same, you should at least consider your next shoes a pair of copas too.That being said, if you've been wearing copas for the last four hundred years, and would never, ever, consider anything else, go out and try on the latest obscenely-expensive, all-synthetic, high-fashion boot. You may just be pleasantly surprised. At least enjoy modern technology once in a while. I will be buying another pair of F50s before long. I am simply addicted to the speed and the colours.P.S. Messi wears F50s, sure. but he wears very special leather F50s, not plastic ones. If I want to be like messi I will wear his shirt of which I have several. Not his latest adidas boot...

When I recieved the Skecher shoes they were great, but for some reason the expected delivery dates were incorrect. On amazon.com I was told to expect my shipment by August 28th. When I did not recieve the shoes by that date, I emailed Bealls in Florida and was told that my shipment was on schedule and would be delivered by August 31st. I'm unsure why Bealls was unaware that the expected delivery date on amazon.com was different than what they emailed to me, but I would recommend that Bealls consider that when responding to future customers. I'm unsure whether I will purchase from Bealls again.

I love these boots. They're so much fun! Don't let the height of the heel scare you...the platform actually makes the heel shorter when it comes to foot placement. Only problem - the laces don't stay laced when they're not on your feet. You'll have to relace them each time.

Loafers are such an irresistable throwback - and lacking tassles, this model sets you apart from the gregarious boardroom/country club crowd. They're just perfectly classic. Not cheap, but the leather is high quality and the workmanship is outstanding. Skimp on dress shoes and the result is simply cheap-looking shoes. Match these to most any outfit and you will get compliments and feel light on your feet.

I recently purchased a pair of the Reebok DMX Walking shoes while on vacation in nothern California. I have a pair of New Balance 842 Walking shoes that I normally use but I left them at home. The Reebok DMX Max Walking shoes have been a pleasant surprise. They are comfortable and have the feeling of walking on air. They were also about half the price of my New Balance 842s. I did considerable walking while in northern California up and down hills and on flat land and my legs really never got tired. I now use them at home over my New Balance 842s. I normally walk 3 1/2 to 5 miles a day.
This purchase was a replacement product and therefore a known entity. It is a good and useful summer sandal that meets a need. Ordering and shipping were on schedule and as described.
They are very comfortable and has a support arch which is just perfect. I am getting them in every color!

I had the originals back in grammar school in 1969 & always loved them.I have gained weight in the ensuing years & needed a very supportive shoe, so I looked into these again.This is a great shoe with lots of support for very overweight people, & highly recommended for them.

I got this pair of shoes two monthes ago. I wore this one for a couple of days each week and felt very satisfied with the price, the quality and the style. My friend can't believe I get this stylish shoes for just $19.99. This shoes is very light and comfortable. I like it vey much.

These slippers are very cozy and comfortable. They felt a little snug across the foot at first, but that may have been because my old slippers were very loose. In any case, I like the fit now. The sole is cushiony and springy, but not too much so. The microfiber fabric is quite soft and feels good against your feet.
These shoes are comfortable as well as long lasting. They do not make your feet sweat or smell bad like other high top shoes. This shoe never goes op of style
they fit a lil big, but are comfy overall. Just wear thicker socks. Wouldn't recommend for someone with wide feet being that they run narrow.

I bought these sandals for my mom because they looked nice and were from Softspots a company I love. She hasn't worn them out yet but reportrd them to be very comfortable. Just what we were looking for. Excellent product as usual. I highly recommend,
I had to get these for a wedding. Let's just say technology has made more modern shoes more comfortable. Liked 'em more when I was 8.

I love these shoes a LOT! The shipping was super fast and the shoes are just GREAT!!! I don't want to take them off, they're so comfortable and very pretty.
